item.trans: n. 算盘 The calculator is rapidly replacing the abacus .计算器正在迅速取代算盘。
n. 狂热；放任 vt. 遗弃；放弃 同义词:loose, mania, desert, yield, quit He abandoned all hope.他放弃一切希望。
vt. 使…谦卑；降低…的品格；降低…的地位 He abased himself before his superior.他在上司面前感到自卑。
vt. 减轻；减少；废除 vi. 减轻；失效 同义词:moderate, allay, to alleviate, ease off drugs to abate pain镇痛药
n. 屠宰场；角斗场 同义词:slaughterhouse The abattoir was once a marvel .这个昔日的屠宰场曾经是一个奇迹。
n. 缩写；缩写词 同义词:abridgement, sigillum Her name is Susan N . Armstrong . N is the abbreviation of her middle name .她的名字是苏珊N阿姆斯壮，N是他中间名字的缩写。
vi. 退位；放弃 vt. 退位；放弃 同义词:fall out of, render up, yield, desert, quit The king abdicated his throne, and the country became a republic.国王退位了，该国变成了共和国。
n. 腹部；下腹；腹腔 同义词:stomach, pleon One symptom is bloating , or expansion of the abdomen area .一种症状就是肿胀，或者在腹部产生膨胀。
vt. 绑架；诱拐；使外展 同义词:spirit, kidnap The police caught the terrorist who tried to abduct the girl for ransom.警察抓住了那个企图拐走这女孩以便勒索赎金的恐怖分子。

adj. 异常的；畸变的；脱离常轨的；迷乱的 同义词:novel, variable, exceptional, exquisite They 're aberrant in nature because , for one , they are very , very cold – much colder than any naturally occurring thing on the planet .它们在自然界里是异常的因为其中之一，它们非常非常冰冷--比任何这个星球上自然界里所产生的东西都要冰冷。
vt. 煽动，教唆；支持 同义词:fan, encourage, egg, carry, second to abet a crime教唆犯罪
n. 中止，停顿；归属待定，暂搁 同义词:hang, discontinuation The question is in abeyance until we know more about it.问题暂时搁置，直到我们了解更多有关情况再行研究。
vt. 痛恨，憎恶 同义词:abominate, revolt at She abhors his smoking.她讨厌他抽烟。
adj. 可恶的；厌恶的；格格不入的 同义词:sick, hateworthy The lustful scenes of the movie were abhorrent to the old lady .电影里淫荡的画面让这老妇人厌恶。
vt. 忍受，容忍；停留 vi. 持续；忍受；停留 同义词:stomach, go, stand, tough, tolerate, stay, hold, stomach Abide with me a while longer.和我在一起多呆一会。
adj. 卑鄙的；可怜的；不幸的 同义词:poor, base, mean, evil, dirty The boy felt shamed of his abject poverty .这个男孩因赤贫而感到羞耻。
vt. 发誓放弃；公开放弃；避免 同义词:escape, shun to abjure a claim发誓放弃权利
n. 洗礼；洗澡（常用复数）；斋戒沐浴 同义词:baptism, christening His daily ablution were always accompanied by loud noise .他每天洗澡的时候都会听到喧杂的噪声。
n. 拒绝；放弃；克制 同义词:rejection, refusal, restraint The convent is supreme egoism having for its result abnegation .修院表现的是极端的自私，而结果是极端的克己。
adj. 反常的，不规则的；变态的 同义词:unnatural, eccentric That is simply abnormal .那简直是反常的。
n. 住处；营业所 v. 遵守；停留；忍受（abide的过去分词） 同义词:residence, accommodation, stayed, observed, borne Abide with me a while longer.和我在一起多呆一会。
n. 废除；废止 同义词:destoolment, abrogation But it has 60 days to decide , in effect , between taking part in the election abolition as a legal party .到底是参加选举还是放弃合法政党的身份，实际上他们还有60天时间来考虑这一问题。
adj. 讨厌的；令人憎恶的；糟透的 同义词:evil, rank, unpleasant, poisonous Murder is the most abominable crime .谋杀是最可恶的“犯罪”“行为”。
vt. 痛恨；憎恶 同义词:abhor, revolt at We abominated the rascal.我们深恶痛绝那个无赖。

adj. 土著的；原始的 n. 土著居民；土生生物 同义词:native, original, primitive, indigenous, indigenous population The " new " Australians began to build and settle on the aboriginal tribal lands .这些“新”澳大利亚人开始在土著居民部落领地上建房定居。
adj. 失败的；流产的；堕胎的 同义词:losing, failing Bernard Leon Barker was one of the leaders of the abortive CIA attempts in 1961 to invade Cuba .伯纳德·利昂·巴克是中央情报局主要领导人之一，中央情报局于1961年入侵古巴未遂。
vi. 富于；充满 同义词:teem with, be imbued with Good fish abound in the North Sea.北海有大量优质鱼。
n. 咒语；胡言乱语 同义词:mantra, incantation Abracadabra , ' said the conjuror as he pulled the rabbit from the hat .魔术师囗中念念有词，把兔子从礼帽中掏了出来。
vt. 擦伤；磨损 vi. 经受磨损；受擦伤 同义词:raw, brush burn Much of the skin on her arm was abraded.她胳臂上的大片皮肤被擦破了。
n. 磨损；磨耗；擦伤 同义词:wear and tear, arrosion Standard silicon carbide seals provide high resistance to abrasion and corrosion over a wide range of temperature extremes.标准金刚砂密封，在高温或低温状态下，仍然具有强大的耐磨损和耐腐蚀能力。
vt. 删节；缩短；节略 同义词:cut, pot to abridge one's stay缩短某人的逗留时间

n. 删节；删节本；[图情] 文摘；缩短；限制 同义词:limitation, qualification, restriction They had a uniform guideline from the abridgment to the compiling of textbooks by Japanese left-wing force .从抗日战争时期对中国教科书的删节到日本右翼势力新编的教科书，其指导思想是一脉相承的。
vt. 废除；取消 同义词:abolish, recall to abrogate an old law废除一项旧法令
vi. 逃匿，潜逃；避债 同义词:absquatulate, elope The thief absconded with all the jewellery.窃贼偷走了全部珠宝。
n. 苦艾酒；苦艾 同义词:vermouth, wormwood Lovely creamy cocktail for those who like absinth in a different way .可爱的奶油鸡尾酒为那些以不同的方式出现的苦艾酒的人准备。
n. 赦免；免罪 同义词:acquittal, indulgency Absolution Add the solution to a mental pain metal pan of cool water .把溶液倒入原来盛有冷水的金属锅里。
vi. 自制；放弃；避免 同义词:contain, restrain oneself to abstain from alcohol (或smoking)戒酒(或烟)
adj. 节约的，节省的；有节制的 同义词:economical, managing, saving, moderate Ireland looks like an abstemious jogger that has suffered a heart attack .爱尔兰看起来像是一个有节制的慢跑者犯了场心脏病。
n. 摘要；抽象；抽象的概念 adj. 抽象的；深奥的 vt. 摘要；提取；使……抽象化 vi. 做摘要；写梗概 同义词:brief, summary, resume, deep, nonobjective, extract, brief to abstract juice from an orange从橘子中提取液汁
adj. 心不在焉的；出神的；分离出来的；抽出的 同义词:absent, distrait The abstracted tissue contained normal endometrium , remaining decidua and a small amount of chorion villi .结果：刮出组织含有正常子宫内膜组织、残留蜕膜组织和少量绒毛膜绒毛。
adj. 深奥的；难懂的 同义词:complicated, deep the abstruse phraseology of physics ;物理学深奥的措词；
adj. 荒谬的；可笑的 n. 荒诞；荒诞作品 同义词:ridiculous, preposterous He revolted against absurd idea .他厌恶那种荒谬的想法。
n. 荒谬；谬论；荒谬的言行 同义词:ridiculousness, boloney Now the absurdity is the other way round .但是，现如今的状况却莫名其妙地变得完全相反。
n. 充裕，丰富 同义词:plenty, pregnancy, amplitude, enrichment Wealth allows them to be indulged in abundance .财富让人类沉溺于大量的享受。
n. 滥用；虐待；辱骂；弊端；恶习，陋习 vt. 滥用；虐待；辱骂 同义词:punishment, vice, strain, maltreat to abuse a privilege滥用特权
vi. 邻接；毗邻；紧靠 vt. 邻接；毗邻；紧靠 同义词:adjoin, neighbor This piece of land abuts on a street.这块土地毗连着一条街。
adj. 深不可测的；糟透的；极度的 同义词:excessive, extreme He took courses to remedy his abysmal ignorance .他学课程以弥补他极大的无知。
n. 深渊；深邃，无底洞，地狱 同义词:deep, gulf, depths A few months ago the possibility of falling into the abyss seemed all too real.几个月前，美国经济跌入深渊的可能性似乎非常大。
vi. 加入；同意；就任 同义词:grant, join in They could do no other than accede to the demands of the victors.他们只好答应得胜者的要求。
vt. 使……加快；使……增速 vi. 加速；促进；增加 同义词:improve, increase speed to accelerate one's steps加快步伐
vt. 强调；重读 同义词:emphasize, stress, highlight to accentuate the first syllable of “into”重读“into”一词的第一个音节

vt. 使用；存取；接近 n. 进入；使用权；通路 同义词:make use of, fashion, employ, border, exercise, opening, admittance Bank customers can access their checking accounts instantly through the electronic system.银行户主可通过电子系统即刻查找自己的支票活期存款账户。(或：银行客户可通过电子系统立即取出活期存款。)

adj. 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的 同义词:accostable, comprehensible The general belief had been that these ancient people in southern Africa preferred to concentrate on accessible foods , such as fruit , nuts and roots .此前，人们普遍认为生活在非洲南部的古人类更喜欢食用一些易到手、易食用的食物，像水果、干果和树根。
adj. 意外的；偶然的；附属的；临时记号的 n. 次要方面；非主要的特性；临时记号 同义词:unexpected, sudden, subsidiary, surprising, occasional Was she an accidental victim , in the wrong place at the wrong time ?或者只是一场意外——在错误的时间出现在错误的地点？
vt. 称赞；为…喝采，向…欢呼 n. 欢呼，喝彩；称赞 vi. 欢呼，喝采 同义词:speak well of, pay a tribute to, praise, applause, cheer The crowd acclaimed the winners.群众为获胜者喝彩。
n. 欢呼，喝彩；鼓掌欢呼表示通过 同义词:applause, cheer The decision was taken by acclamation .该决议是经口头表决而作出的。
n. 向上的斜坡；[建] 上斜 Why did Ford 's accelerator always have an accidental failure on acclivity ?为什么福特的加速器在斜坡上总是有意外的出错？
n. 荣誉；荣誉称号授予仪式；连谱号；称赞 同义词:honor, glory, praise His new book accolade from the papers .他的新书受到报纸的热烈赞扬。
adj. 随和的；乐于助人的；肯通融的 v. 使适应；调节（accommodate的ing形式）；调解 同义词:easy-going The very act of accommodating itself to its own reflection would disturb it anew .这种试图将自己与自身镜像保持一致的行为会不断搅乱自身的镜像。
n. 同谋者，[法] 共犯 同义词:complice, co-conspirator One of the officers is charged with murder . The other is charged as accomplice .其中一个警员被已谋杀罪起诉，另一名为同谋罪。

n. 符合；一致；协议；自愿 vt. 使一致；给予 vi. 符合；一致 同义词:agreement, unity, identity, keeping, consensus, afford, allow, deal, extend, deliver, cotton, identify, square, meet with, correspond with to accord disputes调解争端
adj. 可折叠的 n. 手风琴 同义词:folding, collapsable, squeezebox The impact accordioned the car beneath the truck.砰地一撞，小轿车在卡车底下被压扁了。
n. 军人的配备；服装 同义词:clothing, wear, garment I love stationery and all the accoutrements of writing .我爱文具以及所有的书写的工具装备。
n. 添加；增加物；连生；冲积层 同义词:addition, adjunction The energy release can make accretion disks formidable power sources .此能量释放使吸积盘成为巨大能量的来源。
vi. 产生；自然增长或利益增加 vt. 获得；积累 同义词:result, breed, acquire, earn, buy, score, find The interest accrued to our account.我们存款长了利息。
vi. 累积；积聚 vt. 积攒 同义词:store up, scrape up to accumulate great wealth by hard work靠勤劳积攒大量财富
n. 酸，涩；刻薄 同义词:acid, acridness The tablet is of white or light yellow color with a mixed taste of sourness, spice , acidity and acerbity .乳白色或浅黄色片剂，具有酸、辣、辛、涩的味道。
adj. 带酸味的；尖刻的；带讽刺意味的 同义词:bitter, trenchant acidulous wine with a fine scent of white flower, grape and brioche .散发着一丝精致的白花、葡萄与奶油蛋糕的芬芳。
n. 顶点，极点；最高点 同义词:height, summit, sky, peak, pole A baseball player usually reaches the acme of his skill before he is thirty .一个棒球运动员通常在他三十岁之前达到球技高峰。
n. [皮肤] 痤疮，[皮肤] 粉刺 同义词:comedo Oil normal , no acne , acne .油脂正常，无粉刺，痤疮。
n. 侍僧；助手（指教士的） 同义词:friend, assistant, aid Grandmother Chen and the " acolyte " had already stolen away .陈二奶奶和“童儿”已经偷偷的溜了。
n. [植] 橡子；[林] 橡实 First an acorn ; then an oak tree forest .先有一颗橡子，然后有了一片橡树森林。
adj. 声学的；音响的；听觉的 n. 原声乐器；不用电传音的乐器 同义词:aural, auditive Thus , acoustic waves retain more of their energy when they reflect off the ground .因此，声波从地面反射的时候保留了更多的能量。
n. 声学；音响效果，音质 同义词:phonics, acoustic effect The hall has good acoustics .这个大厅音响效果好。
n. 熟人；相识；了解；知道 同义词:knowledge, awareness Should auld acquaintance be forgot and never brought to mind ?旧日朋友怎能相忘，怎能不深埋心中？
vi. 默许；勉强同意 同义词:connive to acquiesce halfheartedly in a business plan半心半意地同意一项商业计划
adj. 默认的；默许的；甘心接受的 同义词:conniving He is of the acquiescent rather than the militant type .他是属于认命的而不是好斗的那一类型。
adj. [医] 后天的；已获得的；已成习惯的 v. 取得；捕获（acquire的过去分词） 同义词:aposteriori, captured, grabbed to acquire an education受教育
adj. 贪得的；想获得的；可学到的；有获得可能性的 Japanese firms can afford to be so acquisitive because , unlike companies elsewhere , they are flush with cash .日本公司确实能负担起自己如此巨大的胃口，与其他地方的公司不同，他们资金非常充足。

n. 赦免；无罪开释；履行；尽职；（债务等的）清偿 同义词:implementation, tender, fulfillment But in jury trials , which were introduced in all Russian regions except Chechnya in 2002 , the acquittal rate is about 20%.而在陪审团审理（2002年，俄罗斯除车臣以外的其它地区都引入了这一制度）的案件中，宣判无罪的案件占到大约20%。

adj. 严厉的；辛辣的；刻薄的 同义词:severe, tight, hard, harsh, acid This summer she posted a message on it which was so perplexing that it sparked an acrimonious debate among supporters and commentators .这个夏天，她在上面贴的一条让人费解的信息，点燃了支持者和评论员之间的激烈争论。
n. 辛辣；尖刻；严厉 同义词:piquancy, pungency I didn't understand the mood swings at first but when I finally did, it was with empathy rather than acrimony .起初我不理解他那种突兀的情绪转变，最后摸到他脾气之后，更多的则是理解，而不是怨恨。
n. 杂技演员，特技演员；随机应变者；翻云覆雨者，善变者 同义词:posturer, tumbler We saw an acrobat standing on his head .我们看见一个杂技演员正站在他的头上。
n. 首字母缩略词 同义词:initialism The committee's name has been acronymed NACA.该委员会的名称被缩合成NACA。
vt. 刺激；使活动；使活泼；使产生放射性 vi. 激活；有活力 同义词:stimulate, fan, motivate, needle activate a recording device开动一个录音装置
n. 聪明，敏锐 同义词:brightness, wiseness Success involves every facet of live : your relationships , your business acumen , your health , and your happiness .成功包括生活的方方面面：你的人际关系、商业头脑、健康状况和幸福快乐。
adj. 严重的，[医] 急性的；敏锐的；激烈的；尖声的 同义词:serious, bad, keen In short the joy was ephemeral and the hangover acute .简言之，欢乐是短暂的，纵情后的头痛是严重的。
vt. 即兴演唱；即兴讲演 adj. 即兴的 vi. 即兴演出 n. 即兴的演唱 同义词:improvisational, aleatory The actress forgot some of her lines and had to adlib.女演员忘了几句台词，于是只好即兴编凑。

n. 格言，谚语；箴言 同义词:saying, saw, proverb, motto Such hacking is, nevertheless, a useful reminder of an old adage : if something looks too good to be true , it probably is .这些黑客在时刻重复着一条古训：如果什么东西看起来过于美好不像真的，那么它可能的确不是真的。
n. 柔板；慢板乐章 adj. 缓慢的 adv. 缓慢地 同义词:slow-motion, dilatory, slowly, lentamente First Movement : Adagio - Allegro in D Major , Sonata Form .第一乐章：慢板～快板，D大调，奏鸣曲式。

adj. 固执的，坚强的；坚定不移的；坚硬无比的 n. 坚硬的东西；坚石 同义词:fixed, strong, persistent, tough, steel, solid rock But it is adamant that it would not do the deal if it did not believe that Geely would be a "responsible future owner ".但是福特公司坚持认为，如果吉利公司不能成为一个“未来称职的所有者”，他们将拒绝同吉利签订协议。
adj. 适合的；能适应的；可修改的 同义词:calculated, propitious Adaptable -- It is possible to build a clockwork system that can adjust to predetermined stimuli .适应性——可以建立一个可调节的钟控系统来预定刺激物。
n. 附录，附件；补遗；附加物 同义词:attachment, appendix, supplement See the addendum in this manual .请参考本手册附录。
n. 上瘾，沉溺；癖嗜 同义词:addicted to, indulgence You may have some experience with this particular addiction .你也许对这种特别的成瘾有一些体验。
adj. 上瘾的 As with all addictive substances , there is a level for safe use , after which it gets dangerous .和一切会让人上瘾的东西一样，赞美也存在安全用量，过量就会产生危险。
vt. 使腐坏；使混乱 vi. 变质；变混乱 adj. 腐坏的；糊涂的，昏乱的 同义词:cloud, confuse, go off, confused, muddle-headed He has addled his head with reading and writing all day long.他整天读书写字，头都昏了。
adj. 头脑混乱的；腐坏的 v. 变质，变混论（addle的过去分词） He has addled his head with reading and writing all day long.他整天读书写字，头都昏了。
vt. 举出；引证 to adduce reasons in support of a constitutional amendment在支持宪法修正案中举出许多理由

adj. 熟练的；擅长…的 n. 内行；能手 同义词:experienced, skilled, accomplished, clever, practiced, expert, sharp How many college students in Taiwan are more adept at Internet use and software than they are at human relationships ?有多少台湾大学生们正在变得越来越熟识互联网和软件的使用而疏于人际关系呢？
vi. 坚持；依附；粘着；追随 vt. 使粘附 同义词:stay, stand on Wet clothes adhere to the skin.湿衣服贴身子。

n. 信徒；追随者 adj. 附着的；粘着的 同义词:Christian, believer, follower, inserted, appendiculate There is tight( or thin and highly adherent ) scale and decarburization , at least in certain areas .部件上有密布（稀疏但附着力很强）鳞片和脱碳痕迹，至少在部分区域如此。
adj. 邻近的，毗连的 同义词:nearby, neighbor China owns indisputable sovereignty over the Nansha Islands and their adjacent waters .中方对南沙群岛及其附近海域拥有无可争辩的主权。
vi. 裁定；宣判 vt. 裁定；宣判 同义词:rule, pass sentence, pass sentence The court adjudicated the company bankrupt.法庭宣判那家公司破产。
vt. 恳请，恳求；起誓；（以起誓或诅咒等形式）命令 同义词:require, order, command to adjure someone to take care of his health恳请某人保重身体
n. 副官，助手 adj. 辅助的 同义词:friend, assistant, aid, assistant, helping, subsidiary, auxiliary, aided I'm going out myself with the adjutant to recce training areas .我要亲自和副官出去侦察一下训练地区。
vt. 告诫；劝告 同义词:correct, recommend to admonish him about his obligations提醒他应尽的义务
adj. 劝告的，警告的 同义词:warning, advisory Objective To standardize the warning languages and the patterns in admonitory plates .目的使警示标识牌的图案及警示语句达到规范化。
n. 忙乱，纷扰，麻烦 同义词:trouble, headache "Bless you ! Don't ado about it , " said Margret , cutting short Mary's thanks .“天知道！你不要大惊小怪，”玛格丽特岔开了玛丽许多感谢的话。
n. 土砖，砖坯 But people who work with adobe must experiment .但是从事土坯工作的人必须做试验。
vt. 采取；接受；收养；正式通过 vi. 采取；过继 同义词:assume, take in sth The committee ultimately adopted his suggestions.委员会最终采纳了他的建议。
adj. 可爱的；可敬重的，值得崇拜的 同义词:lovely, pretty, taking, cute, delightful Wow you are mean but adorable . I chose the movie over you .你还真小气但是很可爱。我只是选择了电影而已。
n. 崇拜；爱慕 同义词:worship, praise His dark hair slightly ruffled and his eyes full of adoration as he looked at his bride to be .他那黑黑的头发略微有点乱。看着自己的新娘，詹姆斯眼里充满了爱慕之情。
vt. 崇拜；爱慕；喜爱；极喜欢 vi. 崇拜；爱慕 同义词:enjoy, worship, love, sweetheart to adore God with true devotion虔诚地崇拜上帝
vt. 装饰；使生色 同义词:paint, hang garlands of flowers adorning her hair她头上戴着的花环
n. 装饰；装饰品 同义词:decoration, dressing Mary was busy with the adornment of the room .玛丽正忙着布置她的房间。
adj. 敏捷的，灵巧的；熟练的 同义词:experienced, skilled, fly, accomplished, sharp He soon became adroit at steering the boat .他很快就熟练掌握了驾船技术。
vt. 过分称赞；谄媚；奉承 同义词:flatter, beslaver What is there to adulate in her!她有什么值得奉承的!
adj. 通奸的；搀杂的 vt. 搀假 同义词:extramarital to adulterate a language with slang在语言中掺杂俚语
vt. 预示；画…的轮廓；遮蔽 同义词:indicate, forecast, shadow, announce to adumbrate the plan简略谈计划

n. 到来；出现；基督降临；基督降临节 同义词:arrival, occurrence, emergence, appearance, rise What happened in Japan qualified, as did the advent of mass production in America a century ago .在日本发生的正是这种变革，就像一个世纪前在美国出现的规模化生产一样。
n. 对手；敌手 同义词:equal, opponent, comparative, rival, match If we use exponentiation to encrypt or decrypt , the adversary can use logarithm to attack .如果我们运用求幂运算来加密和解密，对手就可以运用对数进行攻击。
n. 逆境；不幸；灾难；灾祸 同义词:disaster, tragedy, evil, grief Adversity leads to prosperity .灾难使人走向繁荣。
adj. 明智的，可取的，适当的 同义词:suitable, wise, adequate, appropriate, proper Stemming advisable because it can sinter and complicate later charging .不宜堵塞炮泥，因为万一炮泥烧结堵死就会使以后的装药工作很麻烦。

adj. 咨询的；顾问的；劝告的 n. 报告；公告 同义词:consulting, directory, report, announcement, declaration Moreover , as in Britain , the shareholder vote will only be advisory , and can be ignored by management .此外在英国，股东的投票表决将仅仅是作为参考，管理部门完全可以不予理会。

n. 保护；庇护；支持；赞助 同义词:protection, lee, safeguard, conservation, holding Before the launch , the United States , South Korea and Japan each deployed destroyers to nearby waters equipped with Aegis anti- missile systems .在发射前，美国，韩国和日本都在附近海域布置了装备有宙斯盾反导弹系统的驱逐舰。
n. 万古，永世 同义词:eternity, eon Aeon aeon thou existed in beauty .在美之中永恒地存在。
n. 航空学；飞行术 同义词:aviation, airmanship Resin matrix composites are significant structural materials in the fields of astronautics and aeronautics .树脂基复合材料是航空、航天领域中的新型重要结构材料。
n. 唯美主义者；审美家 同义词:esthete He is a paradoxical aesthete as well as a paradoxical moralist .他是一个矛盾的唯美主义者，同时他更是一个矛盾的道德家。
n. 美学；美的哲学 同义词:esthetics Mainland Chinese taste is influenced more by history and tradition than by aesthetics .中国大陆人的嗜好，受历史与传统影响多于审美。
adj. 和蔼可亲的；友善的 同义词:pleasant, amiable A clever , affable outdoorsy type given to scuba diving , hunting and hiking , he ranks high in popularity polls.他聪明机灵，平易近人，爱好潜水、打猎和远足，拥有很高的人气。
n. 做作；矫揉造作；假装 同义词:simulation, acting Give up all affectation . What is natural is best .放下所有的矫柔造作，自然的是最好的。

adj. 受到影响的；做作的；假装的 vt. 影响；假装；使…感动（affect的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:assumed, simulate The researchers found that the virus affected every part of fire - ant development , including the eggs .研究者们发现这种病毒会在火蚂蚁成长的各个阶段感染，包括卵。
n. 喜爱，感情；影响；感染 同义词:infection, impression, favor, effect, influence There is no romance in the world now , no real affection .现在这个世界上，没有美妙的理想，没有真正的爱情。
adj. 深情的；充满深情的 He was certainly an affectionate fellow .他无疑是一个富有情义的人。
n. 宣誓书 This is my affidavit .这是我的宣誓书。
n. 联号；隶属的机构等 vt. 使附属；接纳；使紧密联系 vi. 参加，加入；发生联系 同义词:associated company, receive, take on sb, participate in, take part in, go through to affiliate oneself to (或 with) a party加入某政党
n. 友好关系；加入；联盟；从属关系 同义词:alliance, union, association, league, federation Changes in implicit affiliation and power motives are associated with changes in hormone levels .对于暗示友好关系和暴力动机的改变和荷尔蒙的高低有关。
n. 密切关系；吸引力；姻亲关系；类同 同义词:appeal, charm He soon developed an affinity for certain stamps and countries .他不久就渐渐地被某些国家的邮票所吸引。
adj. 肯定的；积极的 n. 肯定语；赞成的一方 同义词:positive, active, energetic Affirmative action — and other efforts — have certainly failed to rid America of sharp inequalities .当然，反歧视行动和其它努力都未能消除美国的极端不平等。
n. 苦难；苦恼；折磨 同义词:hardship, tribulation An affliction characterised by the incessant need to move faster .这症很闹心，让人不断的想要跟快的行动。
vt. 冒犯，有意冒犯；面对；公开侮辱 n. 轻蔑；公开侮辱 同义词:give offense, offend, floccinaucinihilipilification, scornfulness She was affronted at his conduct.她被他的行为冒犯了。
n. 迷；狂热爱好者 同义词:fan, afficionado If you are a computer aficionado with a free and unorthodox thinking , people call you a geek .如果你对电脑狂热，思维叛逆，别人会认为你是一个“奇客”。
n. 后果；余波 同义词:sequel, backwash In the immediate aftermath , the United States showed signs of what makes it great .直接的后果是美国表现出了是什么让它拥有伟大气质的原因。
n. 玛瑙；玛瑙制工具 同义词:carnelian The agate lamp within thy hand !玛瑙的亮灯擎在你的手里。
n. 议程；日常工作事项 This is a sensible agenda .这是一项明智的议程。
adj. 凝聚的；成团的，结块的 n. 团块；[岩] 集块岩；附聚物 vt. 使结块；使成团 同义词:volumed, briquette, conglomeration, cake to agglomerate dust particles凝聚尘粒
vt. 增加；夸大；强化 同义词:enhance, boost, jack, mount, hot to aggrandize oneself at the expense of others损人利己
vt. 加重；使恶化；激怒 同义词:anger, complicate The bad weather aggravated his illness.坏天气加重了他的病情。
vi. 集合；聚集；合计 vt. 集合；聚集；合计 n. 合计；集合体；总计 adj. 聚合的；集合的；合计的 同义词:amount, concentrate, collect, mass, crowd, assemble, sum, collective, all told, collective, polymeric to aggregate riches积聚财富
n. [地质][数] 聚合，聚集；聚集体，集合体 同义词:collection, polymerization, clustering, gather The main reason of aggregation is caused by the biology of the lady beetle .聚集的原因主要是由其自身习性所致。
adj. 侵略性的；好斗的；有进取心的；有闯劲的 同义词:invasive, enterprising The most aggressive apes of all were the bonobos .所有的猿类中最具攻击性的是倭黑猩猩。
adj. 受委屈的，愤愤不平的；权利受到不法侵害的 v. 侵害，伤害（aggrieve的过去分词形式）；使悲痛 同义词:indignant, attacked She was aggrieved at the insult.她因被侮辱而觉得感情上受到伤害。
adj. 吓呆的，惊骇的；吃惊的 同义词:astonished, appalled The crowd aghast .观众惊奇了。
adj. 激动的；焦虑的；表现不安的 v. 焦虑；鼓动（agitate的过去分词） 同义词:excited, anxious, hot, heated, inflammatory The washing machine agitates the clothes.洗衣机搅动衣服。
n. 激动；搅动；煽动；烦乱 同义词:warmth, excitation It could trigger mass agitation for a change of government .而这有可能引发大规模动乱导致政府更迭。

n. 不可知论者 adj. 不可知论的 同义词:nescient, know nothing, skeptical Here 's a favorite silly joke I can't resist passing along: What does an agnostic , dyslexic insomniac do ?这有个备受欢迎的笑话，我不禁要告诉给大家：不可知论者、诵读困难的失眠患者做什么呢？
adj. 兴奋的；有强烈兴趣的 adv. 热切地；渴望地 同义词:be excited, heady, eagerly, longingly The bartender is agog at the images , but I quickly get rid of him with an order for Yak milk .酒保凑过来想看照片，我赶紧点了牦牛奶，将他打发走。
n. 苦恼；极大的痛苦；临死的挣扎 同义词:unhappiness, vexation Ah , yes , the agony of heartbreak .啊，是的，爱情心碎带来的剧痛。
n. 协议；同意，一致 同义词:accordance, protocol, unity, identity, keeping We have not signed any agreement .我们没有签署任何协议。
n. 农学家 同义词:agriculturalist Yuan Longping is a world -famous agronomist with the reputation of "the Father of Hybrid Rice ".袁隆平是世界著名的农学家，被誉为“杂交水稻之父”。
n. 小病；不安 同义词:tension, unrest He got timely treatment for his ailment .他的病得到了及时治疗。

adj. [航] 空运的；空气传播的；风媒的 同义词:abn, skyborne The former Soviet Union is thought to have weaponised a strain of Marburg airborne powder : a single particle in the lungs could kill .据说，前苏联将马尔堡菌株与一种空投粉末进行了混合，这样人只要吸入这种粉末一颗微粒就会死亡。
adj. 密闭的，密封的；无懈可击的 同义词:tight, sealed Please make the fruit jar airtight .请把果酱罐密封。
adj. 雪花石膏制的；光洁雪白的 n. 雪花石膏 The floor was marble tile , and the columns alabaster .地板是由大理石铺成的，柱子则是雪花石膏打造而成。
n. 点金术；魔力 同义词:charm, fascination This fruitless quest was called alchemy by the Arabs .这种无谓的的探索被阿拉伯人称作炼金术。
n. 凹室；壁龛 同义词:niche, habitacle The Bishop installed his guest in alcove .主教把他的客人安顿在壁厢里。
n. 别名，化名 adv. 别名叫；化名为 同义词:allonym, byname Give an example of C++ code that creates alias .给出一个创建别名的C++代码例子。
adj. 疏远的；被疏远的 v. 使疏离（alienate的过去式） 同义词:remote, estranged Her behavior alienated her friends.她的行为使自己跟朋友们疏远了。
n. 碱；可溶性无机盐 adj. 碱性的 同义词:alcali In other words the whole spectrum of levels is just like that of an alkali turned upside down .换句话说，整个能级谱恰好就像是上下颠倒的碱金属能级谱一样。

n. 主张，断言；辩解 同义词:opinion, explanation, assurance, affirmation, claim " We have been advised by the Australian government of this surprising allegation , " a Rio spokeswoman in Sydney said .一位力拓发言人在悉尼表示：“我们从澳大利亚政府获知这一令人意外的指控。”
n. 效忠，忠诚；忠贞 同义词:loyalty, devotion For as long as the world economy was growing fast , financial markets commanded grudging allegiance .在世界经济发展迅速的时候，金融市场得到了勉强的忠诚。
n. 快板；急速的乐章 adj. 快速的 adv. 急速地 同义词:fast, sudden, lightning, fleet, hastily, vite You cannot play Bach's Air as an Allegro , even if you should feel like doing so .你不能把巴赫的曲目“天空”当作快板演奏，即使你感觉喜欢这样做。
adj. 对…过敏的；对…极讨厌的 These include the risk of life - threatening allergic reactions .这些还包括有生命危险的过敏反应。
n. 过敏症；反感；厌恶 同义词:hate, hypersensitivity Avoiding whatever causes an allergy may not always be easy .避免任何一种过敏原因都不太容易。
vt. 减轻，缓和 同义词:moderate, relax to alleviate postoperation pain减轻手术后的疼痛
n. 小巷；小路；小径 同义词:path, lane The Green Alley program also uses recycled materials .绿色小巷项目同样使用再循环材料。
n. 短吻鳄（产于美国及中国）；短吻鳄皮革；鳄口式工具 vi. 皱裂；裂开 adj. 鳄鱼般的；鳄鱼皮革的；鳄鱼皮纹的 同义词:gator, aligator, gap, seam They said , uh , " See ya later, alligator ".他们说，啊，“一会见，小鳄鱼”
n. 分配，配置；安置 同义词:distribution, configuration, assignment, positioning " We can have more precise asset allocation at very low cost , " he says .他说：“我们可以以较少的资金进行更精确的财产分配。”
n. [临床] 对抗疗法 同义词:enantiopathy of or relating to the practice of allopathy .属于、关于或实施对抗疗法的。
vt. 使成合金；使减低成色 n. 合金 vi. 易于铸成合金 同义词:composition metal to alloy silver with tin以锡降低银的成色
vi. 暗指，转弯抹角地说到；略为提及，顺便提到 The story alluded to a mystery in her past.故事影射她过去生活中的一个秘密。
vt. 引诱，诱惑；吸引 n. 诱惑力 vi. 诱人，吸引人 同义词:absorb, attract, engage, induce, seduce, duende be allured by somebody's promises受某人许诺的诱惑
n. 诱惑；诱惑物 同义词:temptation, seduction The economists would attribute the phenomenon to the bigger profit allurement in fireworks than in the other trades .经济学的答案，一定是鞭炮生产比他所能从事的其他行业更赚钱。
n. 暗示；提及 同义词:connotation, reference, mention, reminder, implication allusion to this instance , this dissertation brings forward the technology of Virtual Integration .针对这种情况，本论文提出了虚拟一体化技术。
adj. 冲积的 同义词:deluvial The water cuts the alluvial banks of the " lower " river into deep horseshoe curves .河水把下游那些冲积的河岸冲成很深的马蹄形曲线。

n. 同盟国；伙伴；同盟者；助手 vt. 使联盟；使联合 vi. 联合；结盟 同义词:friend, partner, assistant, comrade, aid, combine, associate, band, combine, connect, league, hand in hand He allied himself with (或 to) the other members of the committee who supported his ideas.他与委员会里支持他观点的其他成员联合起来。
n. 杏仁，杏树；杏仁状的东西 同义词:apricot kernel, apricot tree Almond is believed to improve memory .杏仁被认为是可以提高记忆的食品。
n. 祭坛；圣坛；圣餐台 同义词:prothesis He built altar there , and called on the name of the Lord , and pitched his tent there .依撒格就在那里筑了一座祭坛，呼求了上帝的名；也在那里搭了帐幕。
n. 修改，改变；变更 同义词:modification, changing One obvious impact is the radical alteration of the land surface .一种显而易见的影响是大地表面剧烈的改变。
n. 争执 同义词:difference, conflict, bustup Only occasionally a hubbub of altercation rises to the skies.只是偶然发生口角，大声地吵闹。
n. 利他；利他主义 There is also fear that his altruism may be motivated by calculated gamesmanship .还有人担心，安巴尼的利他行为可能是精心设计的花招。
adj. 铝的 n. 铝 But there is a penalty: aluminium components made with HPDC cannot usually be heat -treated.但是也存在缺陷：通过HPDC制造的铝部件通常不能进行热处理。
n. [材] 汞合金，[化工] 汞齐；混合物 同义词:mixture, hybrid, mix, compound Objective : To analyze the clinical observations about amalgam post and core of molar .目的：对银汞桩核用于磨牙修复进行临床观察和分析。
vi. 合并；汞齐化；调制汞合金 vt. 合并；使（金属）汞齐化；混合 同义词:incorporate with, merge, compound, merge Three companies were amalgamated into a corporation.三家商号被合并成一家公司。
vt. 积聚，积累 同义词:pile up, store up She amassed her papers for her memoirs.她把文件汇集起来准备写回忆录。
adj. 业余的；不熟练的；外行的 同义词:strange, leisure, lay I am only an amateurish cook .我是个业余水平的厨师而已。

adj. 双手灵巧的；怀有二心的 Both ambidextrous and multilingual , 20th president of the United States James Garfield could write Greek with one hand while writing Latin with the other.美国第20任总统詹姆斯·加菲尔德左右手都很灵活，他还通晓多国语言，这使他可以一只手写希腊文而同时另一只手写拉丁文。
n. 含糊；不明确；暧昧；模棱两可的话 同义词:vagueness, opacity But it may also be an ambiguity of convenience.但也可能是因用语习惯而造成的模糊。
adj. 模糊不清的；引起歧义的 同义词:blurred He is so careful as not to say anything ambiguous .他总是小心谨慎，从不说任何引起歧义的话。
n. [心理] 矛盾情绪；正反感情并存 But lately ambivalence is turning into out -and- out royalism .但是近来，这种矛盾的情绪逐渐转变成彻底的君权思想。
adj. 矛盾的；好恶相克的 同义词:contradictory, conflictive Are you contradictory/ ambivalent now ?你现在是不是很矛盾？
vi. （马）缓行；从容漫步 n. （马的）缓行步态；漫步 同义词:bummel, stroll to amble along the road沿着公路从容不迫地走
n. 特别美味的食物；神的食物 Ambrosia had pushed Edgar and the girl in there with admonition to have some fun .安布罗西娅把埃德加和姑娘往里边一推，还劝告他们寻欢作乐。
n. 埋伏，伏击；伏兵 vt. 埋伏，伏击 vi. 埋伏 同义词:lurk, waylay, lurk to ambush the troops in the heavy woods on either side of the road把部队埋伏在公路两旁的密林里
adj. 有责任的，应服从的；有义务的；经得起检验的 同义词:responsible, bound, liable, accountable We amenable to the law .我们全都是对这法律负责的。
n. 修正案；改善；改正 同义词:improvement, correction, reformation An amendment ratified in 1961 gave Washingtonians the right to vote in presidential elections .1961年通过的宪法修正案赋予华盛顿居民选举总统的权利。

n. 舒适；礼仪；愉快；便利设施 同义词:ceremony, comfort, sunshine, protocol, ease Landscape improvements were also carried out at over 30 roadside amenity plots to beautify the environment .超过30个路旁美化市容地带也进行了园景改善工程，以美化环境。
n. 紫水晶；[宝] 紫晶；紫色 同义词:lila In the 12th dynasty , amethyst was used for the first time ( a very hard material ).在第12个王朝内，第一次使用紫水晶（一种很坚硬的材料）。
adj. 和蔼可亲的，亲切的 同义词:pleasant, friendly, sweet, benign Amiable Style : Human Resources Manager . Very people- focused .和蔼型：人力资源部经理、非常以人为本。
adj. 友好的；友善的 同义词:friendly, fraternal In Beit Sahour , dealings between Christians and Muslims have usually been amicable .在拜特萨霍，基督徒与穆斯林之间的交往向来和睦。
n. 健忘症，[内科] 记忆缺失 Amnesia is a loss of memory .健忘是一种记忆的丢失。
n. 大赦，特赦 vt. 对…实行大赦 同义词:general pardon Some people amnestied in the past could face legal action in the future.过去被赦免的某些人以后仍可能被起诉。
adj. 与道德无关的；无从区分是非的；超道德的 同义词:nonmoral The idea that lawyers are amoral guns for hire is hardly new .认为律师是没有道德的职业杀手的想法并不新鲜。

adj. 多情的；恋爱的；热情的；色情的 同义词:intense, romantic, warm, loved, hot It will be well for men to resolve at me first approaches of the amorous but fickle pair upon interdicting even an accidental temporary junction .在这对多情而又易变的恋人刚一出现时，就设法防止他们利用任何偶然机会临时结合起来，这是很明智的。
adj. 无定形的；无组织的；[物] 非晶形的 同义词:formless, unorganized The shape of this movement is still amorphous and incomplete .这些运动的形式上不确定和完善。
vt. 摊销（等于amortise）；分期偿还 Propose the idea of improvement that the intangible assets amortize and improvement of the intangible assets report .对无形资产摊销的改进的构想以及对无形资产报告的改进建议。
adj. 丰富的；足够的；宽敞的 同义词:abundant, sufficient, competent, full, plenty He had ample opportunity to reaffirm his basic ideological commitment .他曾多次有机会重申他的基本思想信念。
vt. 放大，扩大；增强；详述 vi. 详述 同义词:extend, zoom up, expand on, enlarge on We must amplify our effort by working a lot harder.我们必须加紧干。
vt. 截肢；切断；删除 同义词:cut off, cut out to amputate a leg at the knee从膝盖处截肢

n. 护身符，避邪物 同义词:periapt, menat The power to summon Sun God Horus shall only be revealed to the bearer of the amulet within the temple of Semerkhet in Karnak .拿走护身符的人必须进入位于卡纳克的塞米尔卡特之墓，唯有如此，方能释放出召唤太阳神荷露斯的力量。
n. 时代错误；不合潮流的人或物 Contemporary monarchy is anachronism .英国是君主政体。
n. 止痛剂；[药] 镇痛剂 adj. 止痛的 同义词:paregoric, anodyne, painkilling, antalgic OBJECTIVE To observe the anti- inflammatory and analgesic effects of diclofenac potassium spray .目的观察双氯芬酸钾喷雾剂的抗炎镇痛作用。

adj. 类似的；[昆] 同功的；可比拟的 同义词:parallel, akin Our scenario is analogous to an infinite number of explorers embarking on all possible paths through every minimum in the landscape .我们的方案可以比喻成有无限多位探险家，以所有可能的路径旅行，穿越地景上的每一处极小值。
n. 类比；类推；类似 同义词:similarity, parallelism Of course , film and television projects are much riskier than real estate , so the analogy is deceptive .当然，电影与电视计画的风险比不动产高得多，所以这种类比不尽确实。
adj. 无政府的；无政府主义的；无法无天的 同义词:nihilistic His new magazine anarchic tendencies .他的新杂志有无政府主义倾向。

n. 无政府状态；混乱；无秩序 同义词:chaos, disorder, confusion, involvement, mix But this freedom is freedom with leadership and this democracy is democracy under centralized guidance , not anarchy .但是这个自由是有领导的自由，这个民主是集中指导下的民主，不是无政府状态。
n. 诅咒；革出教门；被诅咒者；令人厌恶的人 同义词:curse, malison Privatising anathema to a public that remains well to the left of the British centre.使之私有化必定受到偏好左倾政治路线的大众的厌恶。
n. 隐士 同义词:hermit, eremite Guard against injuring anchorite ! If ye have done so , however, well then , kill him also!注意别伤害隐士！假如你已经这么作了，那么还是干脆把他给宰了的好！

adj. 辅助的；副的；从属的 n. 助手；附件 同义词:assistant, helping, dependent, deputy, auxiliary, friend, assistant, aid, attachment, mate In an effort to diversify and stabilise their revenue , some drug makers are beginning to sell ancillary services tied to their wares .为了保持其收入的多元化和稳定性，部分药厂开始销售与其商品相关联的辅助性服务。
n. 轶事；奇闻；秘史 同义词:ana He was about to favour us with a little anecdote connected with it , when you entered .你们走进来的时间，他正打算讲段和这有关的逸话给我们听听呢。
n. 贫血；贫血症 同义词:anaemia, sickle cell disease The doctors analyzed the blood sample for anemia .医生们分析了贫血的血样。
adj. 麻醉的；感觉缺失的 n. 麻醉剂，麻药 同义词:anaesthetic, detoxicant, detoxicator, hasheesh Sir , I cannot do a procedure like this without anesthetic .先生，如果没有麻醉剂，我没法动这个手术。
n. 痛苦；苦恼 vt. 使极度痛苦 vi. 感到极度的痛苦 同义词:smart, hurt, agonize The loss of her husband anguished her deeply.丧夫使她极为悲痛。
adj. 极度痛苦的 v. 使极度痛苦（anguish的过去式） Their wounds like flames eat their anguished flesh .他们的伤象火焰似的烧灼着他们痛楚的肉体。
vi. 批判；非难；责备 同义词:blame for, talk to to animadvert on corruption对腐化现象进行谴责
n. 活泼，生气；激励；卡通片绘制 同义词:stimulus, vitality, pet, brightness, volatility Without question , this has been a year of animation overload .毫无疑问，今年已经是卡通片过剩的一年。
n. 憎恶，仇恨，敌意 同义词:hatred, odium His personal animosity towards Mr Thaksin is well- known .他个人对他信的敌意是众所皆知的。
n. 敌意；意图；基本态度；女性的男性意向 同义词:intention, meaning, will, offer, hostility His criticisms are clearly animus .批判明显带有敌意。
n. 踝关节，踝 同义词:gambrel, malleolus The models ankled through the stage.模特儿款扭腰肢穿过舞台。
vt. 歼灭；战胜；废止 vi. 湮灭；湮没 同义词:defeat, suppress, submerge Our soldiers annihilated a force of five hundred enemy troops.我们的战士消灭了 500名敌军。
vi. 注释；给…作注释或评注 vt. 注释；作注解 同义词:note on, note on Shakespeare's plays are often elaborately annotated to make them easier to understand.莎士比亚剧本往往注释详尽，便于理解。
n. 注释；注解；释文 同义词:commentary, exegesis Table not allowed in footnote , endnote, header , footer , annotation , or text box .不能在脚注、尾注、页眉、页脚、批注或文本框中使用表格。
vt. 取消；废除；宣告无效 同义词:recall, abolish to annul a contract废除契约
n. [电子] 阳极，[电] 正极 同义词:positive pole, positive electrode Remove old anode rod .拆卸旧的阳极棒。

n. [药] 止痛剂；起安慰作用的事物 adj. 止痛的；安慰人的；平淡无奇的 同义词:analgesic, paregoric, obvious, painkilling Many of them read the Financial Times and seem to take exception to anodyne things written by me .他们当中有许多人阅读英国《金融时报》，且似乎对我写的消遣类文章感到不满。
adj. 异常的；不规则的；不恰当的 同义词:novel, abnormal, exceptional, exquisite The resistivity contours appear much less diagnostic of anomalous bodies below the surface .地面下方的异常体，在视电阻率等值线上并无明显的反映。
n. 异常；不规则；反常事物 同义词:abnormality, deviance The organic matters reach high maturation stage . There is no thermal maturation anomaly .有机质已达高级成熟阶段，但矿区范围未见热成熟异常。
n. 匿名；匿名者；无名之辈 同义词:cryptonym The very anonymity of money then makes it a poor mechanism for guiding financiers ' activities toward socially desirable ends.货币的匿名特性使其成为一种糟糕的机制，不善于将金融家的行为朝有利于社会的方向引导。

adj. 匿名的，无名的；无个性特征的 同义词:faceless, innominate At some point in Italy between 1268 and 1289 someone came up with the idea , but the actual inventor anonymous .在1268-1289之间的某一时刻，意大利的某个人有了发明眼镜的想法，但实际的发明者却不得而知。
n. 厌食；神经性厌食症 同义词:asitia Drivers in Italy are getting an up-close look at the dangers of anorexia .在意大利，近来司机们可以很直观的看到厌食症带来的危险。

n. 对抗，敌对；对立；敌意 同义词:opposition, war, confrontation In spite of the fighting talk in India , the relationship between India and China holds much more potential than antagonism .尽管印度充斥着好战言论，但中印关系蕴含的潜力远远多过对抗。
n. 敌手；[解剖] 对抗肌；[生化] 拮抗物；反协同试剂 同义词:opponent, adversary He hit upon a plan to defeat his antagonist .他突然想出了唯一挫败他对手的商量。
n. 先行；居先；在先 同义词:precession, prior to Electric power is antecedence to the development of the national economic .国家经济的发展，电力是先行。
vt. 先于；前于 n. 比实际提前的日期 to antedate a check倒填支票的日期
adj. 大洪水前的；远古的；陈旧的；旧式的 n. 大洪水以前的人；年迈的人；不合时宜的人 同义词:old, primitive To the economists , Mrs Thatcher 's approach was antediluvian .这些经济学家们认为，撒切尔夫人的做法实在是“非常老古董”。
n. [电讯] 天线；[动] 触角，[昆] 触须 同义词:Arial, aerial That is where adaptive antenna arrays come in.这正是适应型阵列天线的切入点。
adj. 前面的；先前的 同义词:front, foregoing The ciliary body is anterior dilation of the choroid at the level of the lens .晶状体是脉络膜石晶状体平面上向前扩大的部分。
n. 赞美诗；圣歌 vt. 唱圣歌庆祝；唱赞歌 同义词:spiritual, chorale The national anthem calls America "the land of the free ".美国国歌将美国称为“自由者之地”。
n. （诗、文、曲、画等的）选集 同义词:selection, selected works He edited that anthology of poems.那本诗集由他主编。

adj. 类人猿的；类人的；（猿等）似人类的 n. 类人猿 同义词:subhuman, protohuman, great apes, pongo An arboreal anthropoid ape (Pongo pygmaeus) of Borneo and Sumatra , having a shaggy reddish -brown coat , very long arms , and no tail .一种大型的树栖类人猿（猩猩猩猩属）产于波罗门和苏门答腊，有稀疏的红棕毛皮、很长的臂且无尾。
n. 人类学 同义词:humanics It 's of the great academic value of anthropology and ethnology while it is also of strong readability .本丛书既有深刻的人类学、族学的学术价值，同时又有极强的可读性。
adj. 抗生的；抗菌的 n. 抗生素，抗菌素 同义词:germproof, microbiotic, bacteriophage After the wound is clean , use a small amount of antibiotic ointment or cream .伤口清理干净以后可以使用少量的抗生素药膏或软膏。
n. [免疫] 抗体 Our end product is an anti-cancer antibody .我们的最终产品是一种抗癌抗体。

adj. 古怪的；滑稽可笑的 n. 滑稽动作；丑角 vi. 扮小旦；做滑稽动作 同义词:odd, curious, jack-pudding, buffoon So we mixed with some antic elements . For instance , the obese bloomers and the large collar .所以其中融入了一些小丑的元素，比如说肥大的灯笼裤，大领子。
vt. 预期，期望；占先，抢先；提前使用 同义词:hope, presume upon We anticipated her winning first prize.我们期望她获得第一名。
adj. 预期的；提早发生的；期待着的 同义词:expected, due, prospective Previously you 'd see much more anticipatory hiring .过去我们会看到更多的预期性招聘活动。
n. 滑稽动作；古怪姿态 同义词:funniment I also read a review that said their onstage antics are way more bizarre and macabre than they used to be.我也读了一些评论说他们在舞台上的丑态比他们平时更奇异和恐怖。
n. [药] 解毒剂；解药；矫正方法 They kept whiskey to antidote themselves against snake bike.他们保存威士忌酒以便在被蛇咬时用以解毒。
n. [免疫] 抗原 He found that YF17D lets them live and continue to fulfill their antigen - presenting function .莱斯发现YF17D可以让树突细胞继续存活，并继续执行它们呈现抗原的功能。
adj. 过时的；陈旧的；年老的 v. 使古旧；废弃（antiquate的过去分词） 同义词:old, ancient, aged, advanced, disused This latest device will antiquate the ice-cube tray.这个最新的器件使小方冰块盘变成废物。
adj. 防腐的，抗菌的；非常整洁的 n. 防腐剂，抗菌剂 同义词:rotproof, germproof, conserving agent, corrosion preventive Lysol —— A trademark used for a liquid antiseptic and disinfectant .来苏儿——一种用于防腐消毒的液体。
n. 对立面；对照；对仗 同义词:comparison, opposite The antithesis of life is death .生的反面是死。
adj. 对立的；对偶的 同义词:contrary, opposite, against that trust and co -operation are not antithetic to a market economy , but essential to it;信任与合作和市场经济并不对立，而是后者必不可少的因素；
n. 鹿角，茸角；多叉鹿角 同义词:buckhorn, deerhorn Research has shown that antler helps to heal neural (nerve) tissue .有关的研究还显示鹿茸可以帮助修复神经组织。
n. 铁砧；[解剖] 砧骨 同义词:incus, stithy This black- smith 's stock in trade consisted of a forge , anvil , hammers , etc .这位铁匠的全套工具是由锻炉、铁砧、铁锤等组成的。
n. [解剖] 主动脉 Methods VSMCs proliferation model of cultured rat thoracic aorta was constructed .方法建立大鼠胸主动脉血管平滑肌细胞增殖模型。
adj. 冷漠的；无动于衷的，缺乏兴趣的 同义词:distant, impassive He wasn't exactly hostile to facts but he was apathetic about them.他并非完全对事实怀有敌意，只是没有关心到罢了。
n. 冷漠，无兴趣，漠不关心；无感情 同义词:aloofness, apartness The opposite of love isn't hate ; it 's apathy .爱的对立面不是恨，而是无动于衷。
n. 开胃酒 同义词:appetizer wine Would you care for aperitif ?您介意喝一些开胃酒吗？
n. 孔，穴；（照相机，望远镜等的）光圈，孔径；缝隙 同义词:hole, foramen Figure 6 - 9 shows the oven with the small aperture for viewing the radiation leaving the enclosure .图6-9表示一个空腔，上面开着一个小孔，用来观察空腔发出的辐射。

n. 顶点；尖端 同义词:height, summit, sky, peak, point " That 's where I was just before CEO , " he says , drawing a triangle and scribbling a line just below the apex .“这是我就任CEO前所处的位置，”他一边说，一边画了一个三角形，并在顶点正下方草草画了一条线。
n. 失语症（形容词aphasic） 同义词:alogia, aphemia People with Wernicke's aphasia speak in gibberish and often write constantly .维尼克失语症患者的症状包括胡言乱语，并且经常不停地书写。
n. 格言；警句 同义词:sententia, maxim But his aphorism is about as good a one - sentence summary of classical feminism as you can get.但是，就以一（短）句总结经典女权主义而言，这句箴言已是登峰造极。
n. 蜂房；养蜂场 同义词:hive These requirements rule for all apiary sites, including migration sites.这些规定是蜂房所在地必须满足的条件，迁移地也是一样。
n. 养蜂（业） 同义词:bee keeping In the recognition and support of the government , apiculture had a great development in China in recent years.近年来，随着国家对蜂业的重视和支持，中国养蜂学研究工作取得长足发展。
n. 沉着；垂直；泰然自若 同义词:self-possession, composedness " Blacks can run fast , " he said aplomb .然后他泰然自若的举了个例，“比如黑人往往能跑很快”。
adj. 启示录的；天启的 同义词:revelational WITH its deserts and its slight air of decay , New Mexico is a good place to shoot a post- apocalyptic action film .新墨西哥州黄沙漫漫，散发出淡淡的衰腐气息，是拍摄末世浩劫动作电影的一处绝佳之地。
n. 作者（或真实性、权威性）可疑的著作；旁经 There is a section on the problem of the continued use of the apocrypha in his district.信里有一段处理在教区里有人还用旁经的问题。
adj. 伪的；可疑的 同义词:suspicious, doubtful The thing is , they turn out not to be apocryphal .而事实是，这些并非杜撰。
n. 最高点，极点；远地点 vt. 位于远地点；位于最高点 同义词:peak, pole The markets recovered quickly and the dotcom bubble reached its apogee .金融市场很快恢复元气，而互联网泡沫则达到其最高点。
adj. 道歉的；赔罪的 When they do bring it up - to employers , for example - they apologetic , self - defeating language .当她们必须与别人（比如雇主）谈及这个问题时，她们往往会变得过于谦卑，甚至说出对自己不利的言语。
n. 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物 同义词:justification, advocacy Again a sort of apology arose to my lips .道歉的话又一次冒到了我的嘴边。
adj. 中风的；易怒的 n. 中风患者 同义词:passionate, irascible, paralytic Had the poor man been apoplectic , he could never have recovered from his paroxysm of wrath.说真话，这个老实人要是万一现在带着这股气劲中风晕过去了，那他准不会再活过来了。
n. 变节；脱党；背教 同义词:treachery, tergiversation And yet , ultimately , such apostasy leaves me unsatisfied as well .可是，最终，这种失去信仰的行为也并不能使我满意。
adj. 变节的；脱党的；背教的 n. 脱党者；变节者；叛教者 同义词:turncoat, flopper In 1985 a leading opponent of the regime was hanged after a court declared him to be apostate .1985年，一名主要的当局反对者在法庭宣判他为异端之后被处以绞刑。
n. 省略符号，撇号；呼语，顿呼 同义词:ellipsis Mary's dress玛丽的服装，
n. 神化；崇拜，颂扬；尊奉为神 同义词:praise, worship, celebration Christ 's mother is the apotheosis of womanhood .基督的母亲是女性的典范。
vt. 使惊骇；惊吓 vi. 减弱；变得苍白；令人发腻 同义词:astound, take aback, fall, lower They were appalled by the damage from the fire.他们对火灾所造成的损失感到震惊。
adj. 可怕的；令人震惊的 v. 使惊愕；惊吓（appal的ing形式） 同义词:terrible, electric, horrible, awesome, fearful They were appalled by the damage from the fire.他们对火灾所造成的损失感到震惊。
n. 服装；衣服 vt. 给…穿衣 同义词:clothes, garment, array, wear, thread, dress, clothe He is gorgeously appareled.他穿着华丽。

n. 幽灵；幻影；鬼怪；离奇出现的东西 同义词:shadow, ghost This apparition was so strange and so solemn , that every one rose , with the exception of Carlini , who remained seated , and ate and drank calmly .这一幕突然出现的景象是这样奇特，这样严肃，以致大家都站了起来，只有卡烈尼例外，他仍旧坐着，镇定地吃着喝着。
vi. 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判 n. 呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判 vt. 将…上诉，对…上诉 同义词:attract, clamour for, asking, request, motion, charm to appeal a case to a higher tribunal把案件向高一级法院上诉

adj. 吸引人的；动人的；引起兴趣的；恳求似的 v. 恳求（appeal的ing形式）；将…上诉 同义词:attractive, affecting, moving, absorbing, melting, soliciting This theory isn't terribly appealing , but I fear it may be partly right .这种理论并不十分吸引人，但恐怕在一定程度上是对的。
vt. 使平息；使满足；使和缓；对…让步 同义词:quiet, content to appease the angry King painstakingly竭力使国王息怒
n. 缓和，平息；姑息 同义词:relaxation, alleviation There can be no appeasement with ruthlessness .对残暴行为是不能姑息的。
n. 称呼；名称；名目 同义词:name, a form of address appellation of heretics has always been applied to the less numerous party .“持异端者”这帽子，一直在给人数较少的一派扣上的。

n. 附加物；下属；[动][解剖] 附器（如植物的枝叶和动物的腿尾） 同义词:affixture, annexment The 11th appendage , which is one of the smallest parts of the star , had by far the largest representation in the cortex .第11号附器，是星鼻上最小的附器之一，但在皮质上的表现区域却远大于其他附器。
n. 食欲；嗜好 同义词:weakness, habit, hobby Of all the colors in the spectrum , blue is an appetite suppressant .在光谱的所有颜色中，蓝色是一种抑制食欲的颜色。
adj. 开胃的；促进食欲的 同义词:stomachal Seafood is always so appetizing .海鲜总是那么的诱人。
adj. 可适用的；可应用的；合适的 同义词:becoming, shaped, likely, possible, meet These principles are applicable to all minority nationality areas .这两条对所有少数民族地区都是适用的。

adj. 适当的；贴切的 同义词:suitable, appropriate, proper, adequate, becoming The reporter hadn't mentioned Jesse Jackson , but Mr. Clinton somehow felt it apposite to refer to him anyway .记者在采访中并未提及杰西•杰克逊，但克林顿先生认为无论如何涉及到他都应该是理所当然的。
adj. 可感知的；可评估的；相当可观的 同义词:palpable, perceptible This intermediate would not be expected to build up to any appreciable concentration .不应指望这个中间体会以可观的浓度存在。
adj. 感激的；赏识的；有欣赏力的；承认有价值的 同义词:obliged, indebted Darkness wold make him more appreciative of sight ; silence would teach him the joys of sound .黑暗会使他更珍惜光明；沉寂将教他享受声音的欢快。
vt. 理解；逮捕；忧虑 vi. 理解；担心 同义词:see, absorb, read, seize, worry, cotton on The police apprehended the burglars.警察逮捕了那些窃贼。
n. 理解；恐惧；逮捕；忧惧 同义词:grasp, understanding, fear, comprehension It was intended to impede the apprehension of the person .它旨在妨碍对该人的拘押的。

adj. 忧虑的；不安的；敏悟的；知晓的 同义词:troubled, uncomfortable They may be afraid of losing you . They may be apprehensive about taking over additional responsibilities . And they , too , feel powerless .也许是害怕失去你，也许是担忧接过的额外责任，同时，他们也感到无能为力。
vt. 通知；报告 同义词:message, inform of to be apprised of the death of an old friend被告知一位老朋友的死讯[亦作apprize]
adj. 亲切的；可接近的 同义词:friendly, sweet, benign A good way to become more approachable is by joining a volunteer organization .要想变得更加平易近人，最好是参加一个志愿者组织。
n. 认可；赞许；批准 同义词:confirmation, authorization, endorsement Father smiled his approval [ approbation ].爸爸笑了笑表示同意[满意]。

adj. 认可的；赞赏的 同义词:sanctified, admissive Income allocation has a lot of planting principle but abide , approbatory of place of a society any allocation the principle is OK the basis that finds its fairness from ethics .收入分配有许多种原则可循，一个社会所承认的任何分配原则都可以从伦理上找到其公平的依据。
adj. 适当的 vt. 占用；拨出 同义词:suitable, proper, adequate, becoming, engage, take up to That selfish student always appropriates the biggest bookcase and desk.那个自私的学生总是占用最大的书橱和书桌。

n. 拨款；挪用 同义词:grant, embezzlement The large-scale appropriation of farmland in recent years for housing and factory construction has rendered millions of farmers landless .近些年大规模占用耕地建住宅与厂房，已致使数百万农民无地可耕。
vt. 近似；使…接近；粗略估计 vi. 接近于；近似于 adj. [数] 近似的；大概的 同义词:close to, border on, near, broad, round The computation of approximate solutions was an extremely laborious task .近似解的计算是极其繁重的工作。
n. 围裙；[航] 停机坪；舞台口 vt. 着围裙于；围绕 同义词:sarong, pinafore, enclose, enring The inner city is aproned by low-cost housing.内城被成本低的房屋围绕着。

adj. 水生的；水栖的；在水中或水面进行的 n. 水上运动；水生植物或动物 同义词:acquatic, aquicolous The major bones in human knees , backs and wrists arose in aquatic creatures hundreds of millions of years ago .人类的膝盖、背部及手腕的主要骨骼发展，在数亿年前的水生动物阶段便已经定型。
n. [水利] 渡槽；导水管；沟渠 同义词:conduit, sike Modern aqueduct systems employ cast iron or steel.现代输水管道多用钢、铁制成。
adj. 鹰的；似鹰的，像鹰的；钩状的 同义词:accipitral, falconine The profile of the old warrior was characterized by a strong jaw and an aquiline nose .老战士侧面像的特征是一个坚硬的下巴和一个鹰钩鼻。
n. 蔓藤花纹；阿拉伯式花纹 I like carpets with arabesque patterns.我喜欢带有阿拉伯式花饰的地毯。
adj. 适于耕种的；可开垦的 n. 耕地 同义词:tillable, cultivated land, tilth It is on the arable " construction " land that the latest policy offers something new .在用作建筑的非耕地方面，最新的政策倒是有些新的内容。
n. [法] 仲裁者；裁决人 同义词:intermediary, pacificator Surely , the bank 's policymaking board would have been the better arbiter .可以肯定的是，央行的政策制定委员会将会是更好的仲裁者。
adj. [数] 任意的；武断的；专制的 同义词:artificial, random, absolute But the subtext of that old saw , that beauty is arbitrary , is wrong .可是这句古老格言”美丽是主观臆断的“的潜台词是错误的。
vt. 仲裁；公断 同义词:umpire to arbitrate a dispute把争端交付裁决
n. 公断人，仲裁人 同义词:moderator, daysman The judgment of an arbitrator or arbiter.仲裁者或公断人的判决。
adj. 树木的；栖息在树上的 Monkeys live in an arboreal habitat .猴子生活在树上的栖息地。
n. 植物园；（供科研等的）树木园 同义词:botanic garden, botanical gardens Hum … Why don't we visit arboretum for a change?嗯，不如我们今次试下去别的…去植物园怎样？
adj. 神秘的；晦涩难解的；秘传的 同义词:mysterious, uncanny That Tony Blair was willing to risk his future over the arcane details of university finance was indeed gratifying .托尼'布莱尔愿意在这项不可思议的大学融资措施上以他的前途冒险，这确实令人欣慰。
n. 考古学 The newspaper article waked my interest in archaeology .报纸上的文章激起了我对考古学的兴趣。
n. 弓箭手 同义词:bowman, sagittary As Archer rang the bell , the long tinkle seemed to echo through a mausoleum .当阿切尔拉门铃时，那久久的铃声好似陵墓里的回声。
n. 原型 同义词:original form, antitype Sadly , there is no archetype of success .可悲的是，还没有成功的雏形。
n. 群岛，列岛；多岛的海区 The archipelago nation bestrides the world 's busiest sea lanes .这个群岛国家跨越了世上最繁忙的海上通道。
n. 档案，档案室；案卷（archive的复数） v. 把…收集归档；把…存档（archive的三单形式） 同义词:records, portfolios to vote on archiving the city's historic documents对收集归档的该市有历史意义的文件进行投票表决
adj. 热情的；热心的；激烈的；燃烧般的 同义词:intense, acute, warm, eager, tropical I believe the Olympic Games must be ardent in this year .我相信今年的奥运会一定会开的红红火火！
n. 热情；狂热；灼热 同义词:passion, flame, fire, warmth, abandon His political ardor led him into many arguments .他的政治狂热使他多次卷入争论中。
adj. 努力的；费力的；险峻的 同义词:hard, rapid, bold, struggling Humans can quickly wreck the natural environment , but repairing it is a long , arduous process.人类可快速破坏自然环境，但修复环境却是漫长而艰钜的任务。
n. 舞台；竞技场 同义词:stage, lists He could not descend himself into the arena .他自己不能下到竞技场里去。
n. 咏叹调，独唱曲 同义词:arioso Students have show growing interest in Aria , Latin America , African and Middle East .学生开始对亚洲、拉丁美洲、非洲和中东地区越来越感兴趣。
n. 贵族 同义词:prince, noble, nobility My father was a born aristocrat .我父亲是个天生的贵族。
n. 算术，算法 同义词:algorithm, number At each step , some arithmetic or logical operation is performed on some data .每个步骤中，一些算术和逻辑操作作用在一些数据中。
n. （西班牙的）无敌舰队 Francis Drake and the destruction of the Spanish armada and so on .弗朗西斯德雷克和消灭西班牙舰队等。
n. 停战，休战；休战协议 同义词:truce They will very likely try to wriggle out of the armistice terms .他们很可能设法拒不实施停战协定的条款。
n. 芳香 同义词:sweet, balminess We emerge from the dim room back into the Carolina sun and the dry aroma of the surrounding pine forest .我们从昏暗的展览室回到北卡罗来纳的阳光下，置身于周遭松林散发的乾燥香气中。
adj. 芳香的，芬芳的；芳香族的 n. 芳香植物；芳香剂 同义词:sweet, fragrant, scented plants, fragrances Asia having off -white flowers and aromatic seeds used medicinally and in curry .南欧和东亚的一年生草本植物，开黄白色花，种子芳香，可药用或制咖喱。
vt. 传讯，控告；责难，指责 同义词:law, cite The tramp was arraigned on a charge of stealing.那流浪汉被指控有偷窃嫌疑而受到传讯。
n. [会计] 拖欠；待完成的事；应付欠款 同义词:delinquencies Among all mortgage borrowers, 6% are behind on their payments ; among subprime borrowers , 17% are in arrears .在抵押贷款族里，有6%未按期付款，而次级贷款里则有17%逾期。
n. 自大；傲慢态度 同义词:bighead, consequentiality Her arrogance levelled the slave with the brute creation.他狂妄自大，把奴隶与牛马同等看待。
adj. 自大的，傲慢的 同义词:haughty, cocky I dislike his arrogant demeanour .我讨厌他那傲慢的行为。
vt. 冒称；霸占；没来由地将…归属于 同义词:grab, commandeer to arrogate privilege to oneself僭取特权
n. 砷；砒霜；三氧化二砷 adj. 砷的；含砷的 同义词:arsonium Almost all arsenic is removed as water passes through two containers .当水经过两个容器时，几乎全部砷都能被带走。
n. 纵火；纵火罪 The constitution was suspended in 1986 after an inquiry into arson and alleged corruption .1986年在针对纵火罪和所谓腐败质询后宪法被废弃。
n. 纵火犯人 Arsonist : Destroy 50 Engineer buildings .纵火犯：摧毁50个工程师建筑。
n. [内科] 动脉硬化 同义词:atherosclerosis Arteriosclerosis affects an increasingly broad segment of the older population.老年人中动脉硬化越来越多。
n. [外科] 关节炎 同义词:sacroiliitis They have to cope with arthritis and the other physical difficulties of aging .他们必须要对付关节炎和由于衰老而引起的其他病痛。

vt. 清晰地发（音）；明确有力地表达；用关节连接；使相互连贯 vi. 发音；清楚地讲话；用关节连接起来 adj. 发音清晰的；口才好的；有关节的 同义词:pronounce, enunciative Be careful to articulate your words so that everyone in the room can understand you.小心使你的话发音清晰，使室内每人都能听懂。
n. 诡计；欺骗；巧妙的办法 同义词:fraud, scheme, trick This is an artifice - free exchange of one commodity for another .这是一笔以一种大宗商品换取另一种大宗商品的没有花招的交易。
n. 火炮；大炮；炮队；炮术 同义词:Cannons, ordnance We made every effort to step up the building of artillery and engineer corps .我们做了极大努力加速炮兵及工兵部队的建设。
adj. 天真的；朴实的；无虚饰的 同义词:simple, naive Her grief was so artless .她是一个诚实天真的女孩子。
vi. 上升；登高；追溯 vt. 攀登，上升 同义词:raise, arise, go up, climb, scale, climb The rocket ascended into the cloud.火箭高高飞入云端。

n. 优势；支配地位（等于ascendency，ascendence） 同义词:superiority, advantage, edge, dominance, predominance Goldman's ascendancy is already showing stresses — most recently the struggle to manage conflicts of interests across its business lines.高盛的接任者已经表现出了存有压力-最近它正在挣扎着解决其生意上的利息混乱。
n. 上升；上坡路；登高 同义词:rise, upgrade, raise India 's ascent is, however , far from assured .然而，印度的高速增长远非确定无疑。
vt. 确定；查明；探知 同义词:confirm, identify, assure oneself to ascertain the facts查明事实真相
adj. 苦行的；禁欲主义的 n. 苦行者；禁欲者 同义词:austere, disciplinant, fakir I shall never be an ascetic .我将永不会做一个苦行者。

n. 禁欲主义；苦行主义；苦行生活 同义词:monasticism Moreover , it showed the enormous influence of Syrian asceticism , but it was equally rooted in popular Gnosticism and preserved its essential doctrines .此外，也表明了受到叙利亚人禁欲主义的庞大影响，但这是与流行的诺斯替主义有同等的根源，保留了它本质上的教条。

adj. 无菌的；防腐性的 n. [助剂] 防腐剂 同义词:sterile, germfree, antiseptic agent, conserving agent Use a fan or aseptic syringe to blow air into the cast to relieve itching , if necessary .必要时可用扇子或清洁的注射器将空气送入管型内以减轻瘙痒。
adj. 驴的；愚蠢的，固执的；驴子似的 同义词:fixed, persistent, foolish, stupid, set I hope you win their appeal and throw this asinine verdict out.我希望你可以赢得这场官事，把这个莫名其妙的判决推翻。
n. 芦笋；龙须菜；天冬 同义词:sparrowgrass, asperge Order . Let's have asparagus , spinach , shrimps and fish .点菜。来一份芦笋、菜、条和鱼块吧。
n. （表面的）粗糙；（气候等的）严酷；艰苦的条件；（性格）粗暴 同义词:roughness, granulation While asperity not clean , will result in business card printing and membership card making dot not tidy .而暗不天粗劣不肮脏时，会变成制卡和会员卡制息网点不参差。
n. 中伤，诽谤；洒水 同义词:calumniation, scandal Suddenly , who is knowing in aspersion , be spilled on my foot completely .忽然，不知是谁在洒水，全泼在我脚上了。
n. 沥青；柏油 vt. 以沥青铺 adj. 用柏油铺成的 同义词:bitumen, chian PAVE】 Today most roads are paved with asphalt .今天大部分的道路都铺有柏油。
n. [医] 窒息 同义词:apnea, suffocation A substance , such as a toxic gas , or an event , such as drowning , that induces asphyxia .窒息剂，窒息原因导致窒息的物质，如有毒气体，或一事件，如溺水。
vt. 使…窒息 vi. 窒息 同义词:strangle, choke, strangulate Business must adapt to this new psychology or asphyxiate .企业必须适应这种新的心理，否则就会窒息而亡。
n. 有抱负的人；野心家 adj. 上进的；有野心的 同义词:careerist, highflyer, high-flying He resolved that his conduct should be worthy of an aspirant who was already a model of discretion .他的谨慎一向足以为人表率，他决定他的行动应该无愧于这样的名声。
n. 渴望；抱负；呼气；吸引术 同义词:longing for, eagerness Young Edison had a aspiration to be an inventor .年幼的爱迪生就渴望成为一名发明家。
vt. 攻击；质问；着手解决 同义词:have at, come at to assail bitterly an enemy fort猛攻敌人要塞
n. 攻击；袭击 vt. 攻击；袭击 vi. 袭击；动武 同义词:attack, attempt, push, hit, come at, descend on, set at to assault the castle on all sides从四面八方向城堡发起突击
vi. 同意；赞成 n. 同意；赞成 同义词:accept, grant, agreement, yes, Ok, leave, Okay The king has assented to the new law.国王已同意新法律。
vt. 维护，坚持；断言；主张；声称 同义词:maintain, say, submit, stay, advocate She asserted that she was innocent.她坚称自己清白无辜。
adj. 肯定的；独断的；坚定而自信的 同义词:positive, centain Chinese diplomats have become more assertive since the West fell prey to financial crisis .中国的外交家们在西方遭受金融危机之后更加自信了。
n. 资产；优点；有用的东西；有利条件 同义词:substance, virtue, advantage, finances It is a huge asset .这是一个巨大的财富。
vt. 郑重声明；（严正地）宣称；断言 同义词:declare, tell the world to asseverate that it is true断言它是真实的
n. 勤勉；刻苦；殷勤 同义词:industry, diligence Bearing in mind the company spirit " no accumulation , no success ", we work assiduity .我们本着“没有积累就没有成功”的企业理念认真做好每一件事。
adj. 刻苦的，勤勉的 同义词:diligent, industrious His spirit of assiduous study is worthy of emulation .他刻苦钻研的精神，值得效法。
vt. 吸收；使同化；把…比作；使相似 vi. 吸收；同化 同义词:absorb, drink in, drink in, suck up What we eat is assimilated into our systems.人们吃的东西被吸收到身体里去。
vt. 平息；缓和；减轻 同义词:relax, moderate to assuage one's grief缓和某人的悲痛情绪
n. 保证；保险；确信；断言 同义词:certification, insurance, commitment, guarantee, safety Quality assurance is mainly focused on intended product .质量保证主要关注预期的产品。
adj. 确定的；自信的 n. 被保险人 v. 保证；确实（assure的过去分词） 同义词:established, confident, fixed, defined, positive, insured, engaged, stipulated Jack assured himself that they did as they were told.杰克确信他们是按照要求的那样去干的。
n. [内科][中医] 哮喘，气喘 同义词:wheezing Or doctors may misdiagnose it as asthma or another infection .或者医生会误诊为哮喘或者其他传染病。
adj. 散光的；乱视的；矫正散光的 Such as means to produce Laguerre - Gaussian modes, high order Bessel modes and complex astigmatic elliptical beams .分别介绍了如何产生拉盖尔-高斯光束，高阶贝赛尔光束，以及复杂像散椭圆光束。
n. [眼科] 散光；[光][电子] 像散性；[光][电子] 像散现象 When the cornea curves or flattens unevenly, the result is astigmatism , which disrupts focus of near and distant vision .散光是当角膜变弯或者变平时表面不平坦，影响视近、视远时的聚焦。
adv. 误入歧途地；迷途地；迷路 adj. 迷路的；离开正道的；不对头的 同义词:stray Jesus I am like a lamb who sometimes goes astray .耶稣啊，我像个有时会迷路的羔羊。
adj. 涩的；收敛性的；止血的；严厉的 n. [药] 收敛剂；止血药 同义词:severe, tight, hard, rigorous, harsh, stancher Harsh : Used to describe astringent wines that are tannic or high in alcohol .粗糙的：用于形容涩味葡萄酒的单宁或高酒精含量高。
n. [天] 星盘；天体观测仪 Mariners were also able to fix their latitude , by using an instrument called an astrolabe .海员们还可使用星盘这种仪器确定纬度。
n. 占星术；占星学；星座 同义词:horoscope, constellation We can not judge ourselves or others according to astrology or horoscope chart .我们不能仅仅通过占星或者星象图来判断自己和别人。
adj. 机敏的；狡猾的，诡计多端的 同义词:designing, knowing, subtle One is that non- US companies have become more astute about achieving global scale .其一是，非美国公司在实现全球规模方面已经变得更加精明。
adv. 化为碎片地；分离地 adj. 分成碎片的；分离的 同义词:separately, disjunctively, apart, isolated They were violently to be torn asunder at a coming signal .一个既将出现的信号会把他们强行分离得天各一方。
n. 庇护；收容所，救济院 同义词:shadow, umbrella, shelter France also wants to establish common European asylum policies .法国同时也建立欧洲普遍庇护政策。
adj. 不对称的；非对称的 同义词:unsymmetric, dissymmetric Even typical brains are the result of asymmetric contributions from Mom and Dad .即使典型的大脑也是父和母不对等贡献的结果。
n. 不信神，无神论 同义词:infidelity, antitheism Many keep quiet about their atheism .许多孩子对自己是无神论者闭口不谈。
n. 竞技（athletic的复数形式）；体育运动 Weightlifting is one of " athletics ".举重是“重竞技项目之一。
n. 地图集 For all practical purposes a ballistic missile such as Atlas is guided to its target .根据各种实用目的，可使象“阿特拉斯”这样的弹道导弹导向其目标。
adj. （音乐）无调的 We is trying to follow some atonal practice .我们在尝试按国际惯例办事。
vt. 赎罪；弥补；偿还 vi. 弥补；赎回 同义词:replace, recover, offset, tender, make up for it, make up for sth. to atone for one’s sins赎罪
n. 赎罪；补偿，弥补 同义词:compensation, satisfaction, offset We expect the transgressor to make any atonement possible to him.我们期待犯了过失的人有可能做到的赎罪行为。
adj. 凶恶的，残暴的 同义词:funest, felonious The broad masses demanded the execution of the criminal for his atrocious crimes .这个罪犯罪大恶极，广大群众要求处决他。
n. 暴行；凶恶，残暴 同义词:enormity, thuggism People were annoyed by his atrocity .他的暴行激怒了人们。
n. 萎缩，萎缩症；发育停止 vi. 萎缩；虚脱 同义词:depauperation, stunting, die back An ability may atrophy if it is not used.一种能力如不加以使用将会减退。
n. 达到；成就；学识 同义词:achievement, effort, success, wisdom, accomplishment In respect to the attainment of true spiritual consciousness there is yet another way .这就是关于真实体性上的知觉成就辨证而论的另一种方式。
adj. 留意的，注意的 同义词:advertent, observing The attentive reader of the accounts has only an obscure footnote to go by.那些有心的财务报表读者只看到些含糊的脚注。
adj. 减弱的；稀薄的；细小的 vt. 使减弱；使纤细 vi. 变纤细；变弱 同义词:rare, thin, fine, subtle, deaden, moderate, weaken The fat girl was attenuated by hunger.那胖姑娘饿瘦了。
vt. 证明；证实；为…作证 vi. 证明；作证 同义词:demonstrate, prove, favor, make sure, argue, give evidence of, bear witness to to attest the truth of a statement证明所述属实
n. 阁楼；顶楼；鼓室上的隐窝 同义词:garret, mezzanine floor We store trunks in the attic of the house .我们把箱子贮藏在房子的阁楼里。
n. 服装；盛装 vt. 打扮；使穿衣 同义词:clothing, wear, garment, apparel, dress oneself, habit, array The bride was attired in white.新娘穿着雪白的礼服。
n. 律师；代理人 同义词:lawyer, deputy, agent, factor, secondary Then call attorney .然后就叫律师。
n. 属性；特质 vt. 归属；把…归于 同义词:particularity, idiosyncracy, ascribe to The play is attributed to Shakespeare.此剧被认为是莎士比亚所作。
n. 归因；属性；归属 同义词:ascription, attributes property attributes The attribution of the play to that famous poet was shown to be wrong .将这个剧本归为那位著名诗人的手笔已证明是错误的。
n. 摩擦；磨损；消耗 同义词:friction, consumption Peasants were the pawns in this war of attrition .农夫们成为这场消耗战的被人利用的棋子。
vt. 使协调；使合拍；为…调音；调合波长 同义词:concert, coordinate with She has attuned herself to living in the quiet country.她使自己适应清闲的乡村生活。
vt. 拍卖；竞卖 n. 拍卖 同义词:be on sale, public sale, vendue It was sad to see all grandfather’s lovely things being auctioned off.看到祖父所有心爱之物在拍卖是令人伤心的。
adj. 无畏的；鲁莽的 同义词:fearless, intrepid Why has Britain suddenly become audacious ?为何英国突然变得富有冒险精神呢？
n. 大胆；厚颜无耻 同义词:boldness, hardiness He trumpets "the audacity of hope " yet proposes more government intervention .他标榜“无畏的希望”，却建议政府给予更多的干预。
vi. 审计；[审计] 查帐 n. 审计；[审计] 查帐 vt. （美）旁听 同义词:examine and verify, sit in on The accountants audited the company’s books at the end of the fiscal year.财政年度结束时，会计师们审查公司的账册。
n. 听力，听觉；试听 vi. 试听；试音 vt. 对…进行面试；让…试唱 同义词:hearing, ear to audition aspiring actors对有志气的演员进行面试

n. 听众；礼堂 adj. 听觉的；耳朵的 同义词:listener, assembly room, acoustic, aural And they put sensors in the mosquitoes ears , or auditory organs , to record how they responded to mating calls .他们把传感器放在蚊子的耳朵上或听觉器官上去记录它们是怎么回应求偶信号的。
n. [机] 螺旋钻；[木] 木螺钻；地螺钻 vt. 用钻子钻洞于 同义词:twist drill Already the Snowblast 's huge auger blades were engorging snow .扬雪车上庞大的钻头叶片在开始大量吞进积雪。

vi. 增加；增大 vt. 增加；增大 n. 增加；增大 同义词:improve, gain, accelerate, make, grow in, enhance, boost, jack, mount, hot, enhancement, increase, gain, rise, accession His salary is augmented by a small inheritance.一小笔遗产增加了他的收入。
n. 增加，增大；增加物 同义词:enhancement, increase, gain, rise, accession For the first time in 12 years , liposuction is a runner-up in popularity to breast augmentation .隆胸术的流行程度12年来首度超过吸脂术。
n. 占卜；预言；预兆 同义词:prediction, warning, message The maritime passage was a good augury for the aerial passage.顺利的航海仿佛也是航空的好预兆。
adj. 耳的；耳状的 同义词:otic, aural I have only one ( auricular ) that is perennial in my garden in Southern Indiana .我只有一株多年生的（耳状报春草）在我南印第安纳州的花园里。
n. [地物] 极光；曙光 同义词:polar lights It was the Great Aurora of 1859 itself that ushered in a new paradigm.实际上，正是1859年这次「大极光事件」确立了新的学说。
n. 赞助；保护；预兆（auspice的复数） 同义词:sponsorships, protections In 2005 , under American auspices , Mr Bashir signed a peace agreement with the main southern movement .2005年，在美国的主导下，巴希尔和南部主要的组织签署和平协议。
adj. 吉兆的，吉利的；幸运的 同义词:lucky, benign The year 2007 is especially auspicious .而2007年又是特别吉祥之年。
adj. 严峻的；简朴的；苦行的；无装饰的 同义词:severe, naked His way of life is rather austere .他的生活方式相当简朴。
n. 紧缩；朴素；苦行；严厉 同义词:simplicity, contraction Against them stand the " austerity now " camp .与之相对的是“立即紧缩”阵营。
adj. 真正的，真实的；可信的 同义词:actual, sincere, genuine, true, real Last - and hardest of all - they need to convey empathy , " in a way that is authentic to them ".最后（也是最难的），他们必须“以一种对他们来说自然而又真诚的方式”，传递出同情心。
vt. 鉴定；证明…是真实的 同义词:appraise, to identify to authenticate a report证明报告属实
adj. 有权威的；命令式的；当局的 同义词:magisterial, cathedratic There are no authoritative figures on the number and performance of micro lending institutions .并没有关于小额贷款机构的数量与表现的权威数字。

n. 授权，认可；批准，委任 同义词:commission, confirmation, warranty An additional safety upgrade in the RRW1 , not available in the W76 , is permissive action link ( PAL ), a computerized system that requires authorization to fire the weapon.另一项RRW1有而W76没有的安全升级措施是「许可行动连结」（PAL），这是一套需取得授权才可发射核弹的电脑化系统。
vt. 批准，认可；授权给；委托代替 同义词:confirm, allow The city authorized a housing project.该市批准了一项住房建筑规划。
n. [心理][内科] 孤独症；自我中心主义 Autism is a series of disorders that can range from mild to severe .自闭症是能够从轻微延伸到严重的一系列失调。

n. 独裁政治；专制政治；独裁政府；独裁统治的国家 同义词:monocracy, czarism Their differences lie in the ways of autocracy : should it be a benevolent , open and kind one, or should it be overbearing , wild , and evil ?他们的不同只在于主张怎样的专制：是王道的、开明的、仁慈的专制主义，还是霸道的、野蛮的、邪恶的专制主义？
n. 独裁者，专制君主；独断独行的人 同义词:dictator, autarch It's the kind of thing that gives an Iranian autocrat bad dreams .这种事对这个伊朗独裁者来说，是个恶梦。

n. 自动作用；[医] 自动症；自动性 Fine Usage , provide advance central control system , one touch key to control lighting , video , audio , and automatism curtain system etc .好用，提供了先进的中央控制系统，使用户通过一个按键达到灯光，视频，音频，电动窗帘等系统达到预定要求。
adj. 自治的；自主的；自发的 同义词:initiative, spontaneous Then it would be autonomous evolution instead of directed evolution .之后，取代定向进化的就将是自发的进化。
n. 自治，自治权 同义词:self-rule, swaraj Football teams would have more autonomy as to personnel , finances and facilities .足球队在人员，财政和设施上都有更大自主权。

n. 助动词；辅助者，辅助物；附属机构 adj. 辅助的；副的；附加的 同义词:helping verb, adminicle, additional, assistant, helping, attached, deputy To bring a load module from auxiliary storage in to main storage for execution .从辅助存储器将装入模块装入主存以便执行。
n. [生化] 植物生长素；植物激素 同义词:phytohormone, growth hormone Apical buds produce a growth hormone called auxin .顶芽分泌出叫做生长素的生长类激素。
n. 雪崩 vt. 雪崩 vi. 崩塌 同义词:slide, snowslide, lawine, molder A snow step avalanched.冰雪砌的台阶崩塌了。
n. 先锋派；前卫派 adj. 前卫的；先锋的 同义词:vanward As an important symptom of modernity , the Avant -Garde art has unavoidable paradox .作为现代性的重要表征，先锋艺术存在着难以规避的悖论。
n. 贪婪，贪财 同义词:greed, itching palm Avarice is never satisfied .贪欲从来不会满足。
adj. 贪婪的；贪得无厌的 同义词:greedy, grasping Exceedingly eager for material gain ; avaricious .产生物质利益和利润。
vt. 替…报仇 vi. 报复，报仇 同义词:revenge, get back on, get even with to avenge one’s wrongs on the enemy为自己受冤屈向敌人报 仇
vt. 断言，极力声明；主张 同义词:maintain, submit, advocate, declare He averred that he was innocent.他坚称自己无罪。
adj. 反对的；不愿意的 同义词:anti, unwilling When the dollar falls , as it has since March , risk - averse investors tend to buy gold .美元自三月份起一直下跌，下跌时，规避风险的投资商倾向于购买黄金。
n. 厌恶；讨厌的人 同义词:abomination, allergy In many cases , they have a general aversion to the idea of elaborate theology .在许多情况下，他们对阐述精微的神学思想有一种普遍的厌恶。
vt. 避免，防止；转移 同义词:escape, shift, shun She apologized to avert trouble.她因躲避困难而表示歉意。
n. 鸟类饲养场；大型鸟舍 The Waterfall Aviary has the highest man-made waterfall in the world .瀑布鸟舍拥有世界最高的人造瀑布。
adj. 渴望的，贪婪的；热心的 同义词:eager, hungry, desired, anxious, sick President Li avid basketball fan , so I believe he will appreciate this concept .李社长是个篮球迷，所以我相信他会赞成这个概念。
n. 副业；业余爱好；嗜好 同义词:weakness, habit, appetite, hobby Dance , then , is a avocation for you .那么跳舞对你来说就是一个“副业”。
vt. 承认；公开宣称；坦率承认 同义词:accept, recognize, agree, acknowledge, grant He avowed himself (to be) a socialist.他公开宣称自己是个社会主义者。
n. 声明，公开表示；公开宣布 同义词:statement, profession The press carried his avowal throughout the country .全国的报纸登载了他承认的消息。
adj. 伯父的；叔伯的；慈祥的 同义词:grandmotherly He was now playing the role of disinterested host and avuncular mentor .他现在正扮演着慷慨的主人和伯父似的指导人的角色。
adj. 使人敬畏的；令人惊叹的 同义词:mirable Mount Qomolangma is awe -inspiring sight .珠穆朗玛峰是令人惊叹的景象。
vt. 使敬畏；使畏怯 n. 敬畏 同义词:fear I was awed by her solemn words.她那番严肃的话使我敬畏。
n. 锥子；尖钻 同义词:bodkin, pointed drill It was fun to play with an awl .玩钻子是件很有趣的事。
n. 雨篷；[建] 遮阳篷；甲板等上的天篷 One evening , we sat talking very friendly together under awning .一天黄昏的时候，我们在布篷下很和谐地一块儿坐着聊天。
adj. 错误的；扭曲的 adv. 歪曲地；歪斜地；错误地 同义词:slantingly, agee, false, wrong, incorrect, improper, inaccurate But sceptics say inflation will gallop if the scheme awry .但怀疑人士称，若计划失败，将导致迅速通货膨胀。
n. [数] 公理；格言；自明之理 同义词:motto, maxim Were this to happen , then the assumption of their parallel axiom would be invalid .如果这一情况发生，他们的平行公理假设便会不正确。
adj. 公理的；自明的 同义词:self-explanatory The systematic , formal , axiomatic development of the logic of all forms and models of being.事物的所有表示和模型的逻辑的，系统的，正式的，和公理性的开发。
n. 轴；轴线；轴心国 同义词:sheft, spindle The earth turns around on its axis .地球绕其自身的轴旋转。
n. 车轴；[车辆] 轮轴 Align mark on front universal joint , or CV joint , to the mark on the axle pinion yoke , or flange .将前万向节或cv万向节上的标志与车轴小齿轮轴轭或凸缘上的标志对准。

adj. 蔚蓝的 n. 天蓝色；碧空 同义词:cerulean, ciel, ethereal blue The sky above and below was one azure expanse dotted here and here with silver sparkling clouds like the laughing faces of children .黎明时刻的种种红色、灰色、黛色、蓝色，都不见了，只有上下天空，一碧万顷，空中的一些云朵，闪着银光，像小孩子的笑脸。
vi. 喋喋不休；呀呀学语；作潺潺声 vt. 含糊不清地说；泄露 n. 含糊不清的话；胡言乱语；潺潺声 同义词:harp on, go on about sth, reveal, divulge, riddlemeree, balderdash The infant babbled(away 或 on) for half an hour.这婴儿连续半个小时咿呀学语。
adj. 酒神节的；狂饮作乐的 n. 狂饮作乐；酒神节 同义词:Dionysiac, Dionysia The tragedy is developed bacchanal doxology as one part of the fete ceremony of Dionysus .悲剧作为狄俄尼索斯祭祀仪式的一部分，是由酒神颂歌发展而来的。
adj. 酒神节的；狂饮作乐的 n. 发酒疯的人 同义词:Dionysiac Emperor Nero attended the bacchanalian orgy .就是她来参加这阴间的狂欢了。
n. [管理] 积压的工作；积压待办的事务；大木材 vt. 储备；把…积压起来 同义词:summerwood, reserve to fill (或 execute) orders backlogged交付积压的订货
n. 咸肉；腌肉；熏猪肉 同义词:cured meat, salted meat She made them ham and eggs , sausages , heaps of pancakes , bacon and milkshakes .她煮给他们火腿和蛋、香肠、一堆堆的煎饼、培根和奶昔。
n. 细菌 同义词:microbe, bacilus Both bacteria and viruses can cause it .细菌和病毒都可能导致这种病。
n. 徽章；证章；标记 vt. 授给…徽章 同义词:marks, bedge The big Irishman with the Immigration badge looked at him .那个带着移民局证章的大个子爱尔兰人瞧着他。
n. 獾；獾皮毛 同义词:brock You can't badger me into going to the party.你不能纠缠我去参加聚会。
