vt. 使…困惑；使…受挫折；用挡板控制 n. 挡板；困惑 vi. 做徒劳挣扎 同义词:puzzle, set back, confusion, checkboard It baffled me that he rejected my offer.他拒绝我的建议使我迷惑不解。
adj. 令人困惑的；阻碍的；令人丧气的；变幻的 v. 使困惑；挫败（baffle的ing形式） 同义词:retardative, impedimentary, confounding It baffled me that he rejected my offer.他拒绝我的建议使我迷惑不解。
n. 琐事，小事；弹子球戏的一种；轻快小曲 同义词:trivia, minutia Safety administration is severe be in cadre , severe in flow , severe in detail and bagatelle ;安全治理严在干部、严在流程、严在细节和小事；
vt. 引诱；在…中放诱饵；折磨 n. 饵；诱饵 vi. 中途休息 同义词:harry, worry, trouble, tear, induce, gentle, lure The dogs baited the bear.群狗逗熊。
adj. 秃顶的；光秃的；单调的；无装饰的 vi. 变秃 同义词:flat, blank, naked The young man was starting to bald rapidly.这个年轻人开始迅速脱发。
n. 胡言乱语；梦呓 同义词:riddlemeree, rigamarole " Gloria … Gloria … don't leave me … Gloria …" Ray murmurs in balderdash .“格洛亚…格洛亚…不要离开我…格洛亚…”雷在梦中喃喃的呓语道。
vt. 将某物打成包或包装成捆 n. 大包，大捆；货物 同义词:cargo, commodity to bale wastepaper for disposal把废纸扎成大捆以便销毁
adj. 恶意的；有害的 同义词:harmful, evil, malicious, vicious But this time the scare is about more than bad mortgage loans and their baleful effect on the credit markets .但是这次，恐惧已经远远不止是信贷危机及其对信贷市场的恶劣的影响那么简单。
n. 障碍；错误 vt. 阻止；推诿；错过 vi. 犹豫；突然止步不前 同义词:error, mistake, obstacle, let, bar, stem, block, dispute, lose, prohibit, daiker, hang back He balked at making the suggestion.他畏缩不肯提建议。
n. 歌谣，民谣；叙事歌谣；流行抒情歌曲 同义词:derry, volkslied He declared it was like ballad , that he would do his best to help me .他说这真象是一首山歌，说他愿意竭尽全力地帮助我。
n. 压舱物，[建] 压载物；道渣，碎石 vt. 给…装压舱物；给…铺道渣 同义词:rubble, rockfill They ballasted the ship.他们给船只装压舱物。
n. 芭蕾舞女演员，芭蕾舞女 The ballerina curves her arms above her head .芭蕾舞女把胳膊弯曲在头上。
n. 舞厅；跳舞场 同义词:dancery, palais I'm not a member of any organizations now , but I do take ballroom dancing classes once a week .现在我没有参加任何团体，但每周还是会去上一次国标舞的课。
n. 大肆宣传；大吹大擂 vi. 大肆宣传；大吹大擂 vt. 大肆宣传；大吹大擂 同义词:hype, blurb, crow one's head off, crow one's head off, hype The ads ballyhooed the book's virtues.广告大肆宣扬那本书的优点。
n. 香油；镇痛软膏；香峰草，香树膏 同义词:sesame oil Your letter has been a balm to me .你的来信对我是一种安慰。
adj. 芳香的；温和的；止痛的 同义词:pacific, sweet, soft, moderate, gentle But other states have balmy weather , too.但美国其他的州也有温和宜人的气候。
vt. 欺骗；使迷惑 同义词:sell, fox, kid He bamboozled me into exchanging the foreign currency.他哄骗我兑换了外汇。
adj. 陈腐的；平庸的；老一套的 同义词:trite, bromidic The policy - related passages in "The Audacity of Hope", his second autobiography , are scattershot and banal .在他第二部自传中于政策相关的章节，仍然显得漫无目的并且老套。
n. 平凡；陈腐；陈词滥调 同义词:ordinariness, trivialness White poplar , the creature far from banality , merits all my eulogy .白杨树实在是不平凡的，我赞美白杨树。
n. 毒药；祸害；灭亡的原因 同义词:tox, poison Avarice is the bane to happiness .贪婪是损毁幸福的祸根。
adj. 有害的；有毒的；使人苦恼的 同义词:harmful, toxic, evil, poisonous, destructive Lower share prices have baneful effect for companies too .更低的股价同样会有损各企业。
vt. 放逐；驱逐 同义词:ostracize, expel The king banished the traitor from the realm.国王把背叛者驱逐出王国。
n. 栏杆的支柱；楼梯的扶栏 同义词:baluster The boys amused themselves by sliding down banister .男孩们从楼梯扶手滑下以取乐。
adj. 破产的 vt. 使破产 n. [经] 破产者 同义词:broke, belly-up, put out of business, bust, insolvent Their embezzlement bankrupted the firm.他们贪污挪用公款使商行破产了。
n. 破产 同义词:failure, insolvency, improverishment The other extreme is declaring bankruptcy .另一个极端是宣布破产。
n. 旗帜，横幅；标语 同义词:slogan, oriflamme China Daily bannered the news that the American president would visit China.《中国日报》头版以通栏大字标题发表美国总统将访华的消息。
n. （善意的）戏谑；逗弄 vt. 善意地取笑；逗弄 vi. 开玩笑；谈笑 同义词:jocosity, tantalization, tantalise, fool, kid around They bantered him on the subject of marriage.他们在婚姻问题上逗弄他。
vt. 装倒钩于 n. 箭头鱼钩等的倒钩；伤人的话 The Eskimo barbed the arrows with pointed fish bones.爱斯基摩人用尖鱼刺作箭的倒钩。
n. 残暴；粗野 同义词:devilry, grossness The world is dark and barbarity .这个世界黑暗。残忍。
adj. 野蛮的；残暴的 同义词:wild, brutal Those immigrants were subjected to barbarous treatment.那些移民遭受到野蛮的虐待。
n. 烤肉；吃烤肉的野宴 vt. 烧烤；烤肉 同义词:bulgogi, bar-b-q They barbecued several pieces of beef, fowl and fish.他们在户外烤了几块肉、鸡和鱼。
adj. 有刺的；讽刺的；有倒钩的 v. 讽刺（barb的过去分词）；装倒钩 同义词:acid, spinose Back and forth I walk next to the barbed wire fence , trying to keep my emaciated body warm .我沿着带刺的铁丝网内来回走动，试图使我瘦弱的身体保持暖和。
vi. 蹒跚；闯入 n. 驳船；游艇 vt. 用船运输；蛮不讲理地闯入或打扰某事物 同义词:titubate, burst into, lighter, catamaran Ore and coal had been barged down the Ohio to the Mississippi.矿砂和煤已被用驳船沿俄亥俄河运载到密西西比河。
vt. 吠叫；咆哮；咳嗽 vi. 厉声说出；高声叫卖 n. 吠声；任何似犬狐叫的声音 同义词:have a cough, huff and puff, rap out, ululation to bark a tree剥树皮
n. 谷仓；畜棚；车库；靶（核反应截面单位） vt. 把…贮存入仓 同义词:granary, garage to barn hay and grain把干草、谷物存入仓内
n. [气象] 气压计；睛雨表；显示变化的事物 同义词:weatherglass It provides a convenient scale length for barometer .这为气压计提供了适宜的刻度长度。

n. 男爵；大亨；巨头 同义词:tycoon, big boy Most of Smith's opponents were French or French - speaking , including the philosopher Etienne Bonnot de Condillac and Baron de Montesquieu .斯密大多数的对手不是法国人就是讲法语，包括哲学家艾蒂安•博诺特•德•孔狄亚克和孟德斯鸠男爵。
adj. 巴洛克式的；结构复杂的，形式怪样的 n. 巴洛克风格；巴洛克艺术 Festivals , attended by aristocrats and the public, were a feature of the baroque courts .节假日期间，贵族和平民同时到访已经成为巴洛克展厅的一大特点。
n. 船；[船] 三桅帆船 同义词:vessel, ship One , an barque , had been big enough for a sub to bother with and the sub had shelled her .一条是陈旧的敞篷汽艇，比较大。潜水艇要搞掉它还真得费点儿力气，而它也确实挨了潜艇的炮弹。
n. 弹幕；阻塞；齐射式攻击；[水利] 拦河坝 vt. 以密集炮火进攻 vi. 以密集火力阻击 同义词:backup, snarl-up to barrage the enemy position with a torrent of machine-guns fire以密集的机枪火力向敌军阵地开火

adj. 贫瘠的；不生育的；无益的；沉闷无趣的；空洞的 n. 荒地 同义词:sterile, unprofitable, waste, wilderness, abandoned land Equivalent probes to Venus brought back the same bad news : the solar system barren outside of Earth .对金星进行的类似探测带回来的是同样的坏消息：太阳系里除地球之外一片贫瘠。
n. 街垒；路障；争论之处 vt. 设路障；阻碍 同义词:road-block, slow, impede The soldiers barricaded the streets to prevent an attack.士兵们在大街上设置路障，阻止进攻。
n. 障碍物，屏障；界线 vt. 把…关入栅栏 同义词:limit, block, bottleneck The barrier to reform has always been political , not economic .改革的障碍总是政治上的，而非经济上的。
vi. 进行易货贸易；[贸易] 作物物交换；讨价还价 vt. 以…作为交换；拿…进行易货贸易 n. 易货贸易；物物交换；实物交易 同义词:price bargain, bargain with, countertrade The soldiers bartered for furs with rifles.士兵们以步枪交换毛皮。
adj. 害羞的，腼腆的 同义词:shy, blate At first appearance , the boy seemed very bashful .乍看起来，这个男孩似乎很腼腆。
vi. 晒太阳；取暖；愉快或舒适 vt. 使…晒太阳；使暖和而舒适 同义词:lie in the sun to bask in the sunshine晒太阳
n. 低音管，巴松管 Bassoon Quartet .小妇人（为大管四重奏）。
vt. 粗缝；在…上涂油；狠揍；大骂 n. 调味品；涂抹液 同义词:tack on, duff up, seasoning, dressing to baste pieces of a garment把衣片绗缝起来
n. 一批；一炉；一次所制之量 vt. 分批处理 同义词:passel Concrete was batched.混凝土配料。
n. 指挥棒；接力棒；警棍；司令棒 同义词:night stick, billy club The riot police batoned the mob.防暴警察用警棍打聚众闹事者。
n. 小玩意；美观而无价值的饰物 同义词:gadget, doohickey The child was delighted with the bauble she had won in the grab bag .这孩子非常喜欢摸彩袋赢得的那个小玩意儿。
n. 矾土，[矿物] 铁铝氧石；[矿物] 铝土矿 同义词:alumina, beauxite The price of bauxite , Jamaica's other big earner, has more than halved since its peak last July .而牙买加另一大利润来源——铝土矿的价格自从去年七月达到顶峰后便下降了逾一半。
adj. 猥亵的；下流的；卖淫的 同义词:blue, dirty, salt All the people in the party were disgusted with his bawdy jokes .所有参加宴会的人都厌恶他那淫秽的笑话。
vi. 大叫；放声痛哭 vt. 大声叫出；大声宣布；叫卖 n. 叫骂声 同义词:scream out, shout out, peddle She bawled to me across the street.她在街对面大声叫我。
n. 集市；市场；义卖市场 同义词:exchanges, mart, plaza Strikes in the bazaar have been rare .集市罢工并不常见。
n. 灯塔，信号浮标；烽火；指路明灯 vt. 照亮，指引 vi. 像灯塔般照耀 同义词:lighthouse, phare, lamp, light up The ship was assigned to beacon the shoals.这船被指定用来标志浅滩。
n. 横梁；光线；电波；船宽；[计量] 秤杆 vt. 发送；以梁支撑；用…照射；流露 vi. 照射；堆满笑容 同义词:ray, stream, to transmit, send out, irradiate We beamed the X-rays through the material.我们用X射线透视物质。

vt. 打；打败 vi. 打；打败；拍打；有节奏地舒张与收缩 n. 拍子；敲击；有规律的一连串敲打 adj. 筋疲力尽的；疲惫不堪的 同义词:strike, tank, best, strike, hit, tempo, knackered, outspent The police beat the door down in order to get into the building.警察为了进大楼强行砸开了大楼的大门。
n. 搅拌器；[纸] 打浆机；助猎者 同义词:mixer, agitator Sure , with an egg- beater .当然，用打蛋器就行了。
adj. 幸福的；祝福的；快乐的 同义词:happy, blessed, festival My world was a beatific pleasure ground in your hand . Nobody could put up the shutters except you .这个世界是你手中的幸福游乐场，除了你，谁都不能叫它打烊。
n. 祝福；至福 同义词:wish, blessing Her favorite Beatitude is " Blessed are the meek for they shall inherit the earth ".她最喜欢的至福是“保佑温顺的人，他们将继承土地”。
n. 海狸；海狸皮毛 同义词:castor They beavered away to get a solution.他们努力寻求解决问题的办法。
n. 混乱，骚乱；精神病院，疯人院 同义词:disorder, chaos, confusion, disturbance, turmoil That is the arithmetic of Bedlam .这是乱七八糟的算术。
adj. 全身泥污的；满身湿透的；荒废的，破烂的 v. 把…在泥水中拖脏；把…拖湿（bedraggle的过去分词） 同义词:obsolescent, duddy She was all cold and bedraggled after falling into the river.她跌落河中后把全身弄得又湿又脏又冷。
adj. 象牛肉的；结实的；健壮的 同义词:solid, firm, tough Finally , strength isn't just about beefy muscles .最终，力量并不只是结实的肌肉。

n. 甜菜；甜菜根 vt. 生火；修理；改过 同义词:bette, repair, doctor The main ingredients are cane and Beet sugars combined with other carbohydrate foods such as corn syrup , cornstarch , honey , molasses , and maple sugar .糖的主要成份包括了甘蔗和甜菜的糖再混以其它碳水化合物的糖份如：玉米糖浆、淀粉、蜂蜜、糖蜜和枫糖浆等。
vt. 产生；招致；引起；当…的父亲 同义词:effect, attract, invite, produce, court In the Bible,Isaac begat Jacob.《圣经》中记载，以撒生了雅各。
vt. 羡慕，嫉妒；吝惜，舍不得给 同义词:spare, envy He begrudged his friend the award.他羡慕他的朋友获奖。
vt. 欺骗；使着迷；轻松地消磨 同义词:sell, fox, kid to beguile someone into doing something诱骗某人做某事
adj. 欺骗的；消遣的；令人陶醉的 v. 欺骗；使愉快地度过；迷住（beguile的ing形式） 同义词:recreational, deceitful, deceiving, double-crossing to beguile someone into doing something诱骗某人做某事
vt. 看；注视；把...视为 vi. 看 int. 瞧；看呀 同义词:look, watch, see, look, voila, ecce We got up early to behold the sunrise.我们早起观看了日出。
n. 旁观者；观看者 同义词:looker-on, stander-by Being sexy is too shallow . You are lovely enough. Beauty is out of the eye of the beholder .性感太肤浅了。你很可爱啊。情人眼里出西施。
vt. 痛打；不断辱骂和嘲弄 同义词:light into, duff up to belabour someone with a stick soundly用棍棒把某人毒打一顿
vi. 打嗝；喷出 vt. 打嗝；喷出 n. 打嗝；喷出物 同义词:eruct, spout out, spout out, spit up, gurk, eructation After the feast the prince belched hugely.筵席之后王子猛打嗝。
vt. 围攻；围 同义词:siege Enemy troops beleaguered the city.敌军围困该城。
vt. 掩饰；与…不符；使失望；证明…虚假错误 同义词:fail, mask His cruelty belied his kind words.他的残忍表明他的好话是虚伪的。
vt. 轻视；贬低；使相形见小 同义词:lower, slight, despise Don't belittle her piano playing just because you're jealous.不要仅仅因为你忌妒而贬低她的钢琴弹奏。
adj. 好战的；好斗的 同义词:fighting, aggressive North Korea has struck an unusually bellicose stance with its rich southern neighbour recently .朝鲜最近对其富裕的南部邻国采取了异常好斗的姿态。
adj. 交战的；好战的；交战国的 n. 交战国；参加斗殴的人或集团 同义词:fighting, warring Such numbers have made tax authorities in America , Canada and Britain more belligerent .这些数字之惊人已使美国，加拿大和英国的税务部门抵触情绪更加严重。
n. [经] 财产，所有物；亲戚 同义词:estate, property, treasure, possession, worth Residents do not have many belongings .居民没有更多的财产。
n. 祝福；赐福；恩赐；祈求上帝赐福的仪式 同义词:wish, blessing He went abroad with his parents' benediction .他带着父母的祝福“出国”去了。
n. 恩人；捐助者；施主 同义词:contributor, doner Scrooge later became Tiny Tim 's benefactor .斯克路基后来成了蒂尼·蒂姆的保护人。
adj. 有益的，有利的；可享利益的 同义词:helpful, useful, favorable, advantageous, conducive And the process of making biochar also creates beneficial by-products .而且生产生物炭的过程也产生了有益的副产品。
n. [金融] 受益人，受惠者；封臣 adj. 拥有封地的；受圣俸的 同义词:homager Within Asia , Indonesia has been a beneficiary of commodity demand .在亚洲，印尼是大宗商品需求的受益者。
n. 仁慈；善行 同义词:humanity, mercy, kindness, good He viewed them with the manner of a fatherly pilot, his countenance radiant with benevolence .他像一位慈父般的老向导那样看着他们，脸上堆着慈祥的笑容。

adj. 仁慈的；慈善的；亲切的 同义词:friendly, sweet, humane, benign When things go swimmingly, few people seem to mind being run by benevolent autocrats . When things get sticky, they are less obliging .顺境时，很少有人在意国家是否由仁慈的独裁者统治；危机时，人们就不那么好说话了。

adj. 愚昧的；赶路到天黑的 v. 使处于夜色包围之中；使愚昧无知（benight的过去分词） 同义词:ignorant For a party trying to present voters with a clear alternative to the benighted government of Taro Aso , the prime minister , Mr Ozawa must be above suspicion .对于想要向选民呈现一个清白政党，去代替愚昧的麻生太郎（现任日本首相）政府，小泽必须要远离猜疑。
adj. 良性的；和蔼的，亲切的；吉利的 同义词:nice, friendly, sweet, kind The doctor diagnosed the tumor as benign .医生诊断这个肿块是良性的。
n. 仁慈；善举 同义词:humanity, mercy, kindness, benevolence But he met instead a look of such mild benignity that he was left baffled .可是他看到他的神色竟如此温和、宽厚，使他感到困惑莫解。
vt. 遗赠；把…遗赠给；把…传下去 同义词:will, hand down Mary bequeathed half of the company to her niece.玛丽把她公司的一半遗赠给她侄女。
n. 遗产；遗赠 同义词:heritage, inheritance, legacy He left it to him on such terms as destroyed half the value of the bequest .他是在折损了遗产一半价值的条件下遗留给他的。
vt. 严责；申斥 同义词:keelhaul, come down on She berated him in public.她当众痛斥他。
vt. 使……失去；使……孤寂 The accident bereaved Jack of his wife.那起事故使杰克丧妻。
adj. 丧失的；被剥夺的；失去亲人的 v. 失去…的（bereave的过去式） 同义词:lost He bereft of all hope .他失去了所有的希望。
adj. 狂怒的 adv. 狂暴地，狂怒地 同义词:rageful, furious, wildly, furiously a berserking plane发疯般开火的飞机
n. 卧铺；停泊处，锚位；差事 vt. 使……停泊；为……提供铺位 vi. 停泊；占铺位 同义词:sleeper, harbourage, tie up We had to berth our ship without the aid of tugboats.我们只好在没有拖船帮助的情况下使我们的船停到泊位。
vt. 恳求，哀求；乞求，急切地要求得到 同义词:pray for, obsecrate He besought her to go at once.他恳求她马上去。
vt. 围困；包围；烦扰 同义词:eat, invest, case, burden The troops besieged the fort.部队围攻城堡。
vt. 弄污；损害；诽谤 同义词:hurt, wrong His shirt was besmirched with blood.他的衬衫上粘有血迹。
vt. 表示；预约；证明；预示；显示 同义词:indicate, prove, demonstrate, reveal, bid to bespeak the waiter's patience要求等候者耐心
vt. 使用；授予；放置；留宿 同义词:make use of, award, fashion, give, employ The country bestowed its highest medal on the war hero.国家给战争英雄颁发国家最高奖章。
vt. 背叛；出卖；泄露（秘密）；露出…迹象 同义词:reveal, sell He betrayed his party and country.他背叛了他的党和国家。
n. 饮料 同义词:drink, belly-wash, bevvy Drinking a glass of water after every alcoholic beverage helps stave off drunkenness .每次喝完酒精饮品后再喝杯水，这样就不容易醉了。
n. 一群 同义词:pack, cohort, clowder I was so driven, Bevy , I didn't know which way to turn.我真是迫不得已呀，白菲，我不知道走哪条路好了。
n. 参考书目；文献目录 同义词:reference, reading list This 600 - page medical advice book contains no index , no bibliography and no references .这本600页的医学建议书，没有索引、没有参考书目，也没有参考资料。
adj. 吸水的；嗜酒的 同义词:hydrophil, boozy I throw open my windows and from the yard outside came the hot uncommon sounds of bibulous laughter and unsteady steps .我打开窗户，外面院子传来不平常的，醉汉的笑声和不稳的脚步声。
vi. 闪动；斗嘴；潺潺而流 n. 吵嘴；口角；（水的）潺潺声 同义词:logomachy The two were always bickering.这两个人总为琐事争吵。
adj. 分叉的 vt. 分叉 vi. 分叉 同义词:biforked, forficate, branch off, tee off, branch off, fork to bifurcate your computer program at this point把你的电脑程序在此点分成两部分
n. 偏执的人；顽固者；盲信者 同义词:fanatic A bigot is a stone - leaf orator .执拗的人是一个极聋的演说家。
n. 偏执；顽固；盲从 同义词:stiffness, crankiness Bigotry , intolerance and ignorance are still rife .偏执，不容忍和熟视无睹仍然盛行。
n. 胆汁；愤怒 同义词:anger, wrath, choler It get my bile up to be treated in such an inconsiderate way .用这样不体谅人的方法来对待我，真使我怒气冲天。
adj. 双语的 n. 通两种语言的人 After college Rowling moved to London to work for Amnesty International as a researcher and bilingual secretary .大学毕业后，罗琳来到伦敦，在大赦国际从事研究员和外文秘书的工作。
adj. 胆汁的；坏脾气的 同义词:cholic, ornery The quality or condition of being bilious .多脂肪食物使有些人患胆汁病。
n. 狂欢，狂闹；放纵 vt. 放纵 vi. 狂饮作乐；大吃大喝 同义词:loose, revelry, give loose to, unbridle, feast on to binge on junkfood拼命吃大块食物
n. 生物圈 同义词:ecosphere It is the first whole atmosphere / biosphere laboratory .这是第一个完整的大气/生物圈实验室。
n. 桦木；桦树；桦条 vt. 用桦条鞭打 同义词:brich To see how much less birch would have covered, they used elephants as a proxy.为对桦树林覆盖面的减少量进行观察，他们将大象作为研究对象。

adj. 奇异的（指态度，容貌，款式等） 同义词:fantastic, funny, fatastic The latest suggestion , though , is probably the most bizarre of the lot: bovine serum albumin , a protein found in cows ' blood .然而，最新的建议可能是所有选择中最古怪的：牛血清白蛋白，一种在牛的血液中发现的蛋白质。
vt. 泄漏 vi. 胡扯 n. 泄密者；多嘴的人 同义词:leak out, uncork, maunder, prater Jack blabbed my confidences to Mary.杰克把我私下里说的话泄露给了玛丽。
n. 勒索，敲诈；勒索所得之款 vt. 勒索，敲诈 同义词:extortion, chantage, shake down, shark up They tried to blackmail me (into giving them the money).他们企图向我勒索(金钱)。
n. 叶片；刀片，刀锋；剑 同义词:sword, vane A knife is sharp because energy has been focused at the blade .一把刀之所以锋利是因为能量被集中在了刀刃上。
vt. 漂白；使变白 vi. 漂白；发白；变白 n. 铅矿石 adj. 漂白的；银白色的 同义词:snow, bleach out, bleach out, go white, bleaching, whited Workers were blanching linen in the sun.工人们正在把亚麻布放在阳光下晒白。
adj. 乏味的；温和的；冷漠的 vt. 使…变得淡而无味；除掉…的特性 vi. 变得平淡无奇；丧失特性 同义词:pacific, distant, soft, moderate, gentle Mr Ban is said to be bland , given to platitudes , lacking charisma .据说潘基文态度温和，用陈词滥调来说，即缺乏领袖魅力。
n. 哄骗；甜言蜜语；劝诱（blandishment的复数） The elephant is not immediately susceptible to such blandishments , however .然而大象不会立刻被这些讨好的话感动。
n. 嘟嘟声；号声；巨响 vi. 发嘟嘟声；发出响而刺耳的声音 vt. 嘟嘟地发出；高声发出 同义词:toot, trumpet call, tootle The trumpets blared as the procession got under way.当队伍开始前进时小号发出刺耳的响声。
n. 奉承话；谄媚；胡扯 vt. 奉承；哄骗 vi. 拍马屁；用好话劝诱 同义词:obsequiousness, rose water, flatter, lick one's boots, suck up to somebody, kiss ass She blarneys her leader with the shameless compliments.她用无耻的奉承话恭维她的领导。
adj. 玩厌了的，厌烦于享乐的 Chan has been known to blase about his Hollywood work .众所周知，成龙已经对他的好莱坞工作心生厌倦。
adj. 亵渎神明的；不敬神的 同义词:sacrilegious, antireligious Puts evil or blasphemous thoughts into one 's mind .在我们的心思放置邪恶或亵渎的思想。
n. 亵渎神明；轻视上帝或神祗 A blasphemy trial in Pakistan : just whose rights are at stake ?巴基斯坦审判渎神者，谁的权利有危机？
adj. 喧嚣的；公然的；炫耀的；俗丽的 同义词:declared, ambitious For now , however , the big equity exchanges are loath to present such a blatant competitive challenge .不过目前，大型股票交易所不愿意造成这种高调竞争的挑战。
n. （美）露天看台；漂白剂（bleacher的复数形式） Let's go see The Killers , And make out in the bleachers .我们一起看杀手乐团，然后在露天看台亲热。
n. 瑕疵；污点；缺点 vt. 玷污；损害；弄脏 同义词:defect, deficiency, vice, fault, disadvantage, hurt, soil, mud, cloud, spot The dictionary is blemished by those long ineffective example sentences.这部词典差就差在收录那些过于冗长不当的例句。
vi. 退缩；回避 vt. 畏缩，退缩 同义词:shy away from, cower, shrink back from, recoil from an unsteady eye that blenched under another's gaze在别人的凝视下畏缩不定的目光
vt. 祝福；保佑；赞美 同义词:celebrate, praise The bishop blessed the new church.主教为新建成的教堂祝圣。
n. 枯萎病；荒芜 vt. 破坏；使…枯萎 vi. 枯萎 同义词:fusarium wilt, desolation, destroy, undermine, founder, flag, wither away The disease blighted oaks and elms.疾病使栎树和榆树枯萎。
n. 百叶窗；盲人（常用复数） v. 使失明（blind的第三人称单数） 同义词:jalousie, persiennes Will you pull down the blinds a bit ?你把百叶窗稍稍朝下拉一点好吗?。
adj. 愉快的；快乐无忧的 同义词:good, bright, fragrant, cheerful The autumn air , blithe and vivacious, elated Philip .秋天的空气愉快而舒畅，使菲利浦意气风发。
n. 闪电战 vt. 以闪电战攻击 vi. 进行闪击 adj. 闪击的；凌厉的 to be blitzed mercilessly by enemy planes遭到敌机无情地轰炸
n. 暴风雪，大风雪；大打击 vi. 下暴风雪 同义词:snowstorm, bizzard In response to the critics , an Activision Blizzard manager revealed his real name on a forum .为了回应批评人士，一位动视暴雪的经理在一个论坛上公开了他的真实姓名。

adj. 发胀的，浮肿的；傲慢的 v. 肿胀，得意（bloat的过去时形式） 同义词:arrogant, swollen, to swell, glory in People who take the medication but continue to eat fatty foods , suffer from painfully bloated stomachs and diarrhea .服药者如果继续吃脂肪含量高的食物，就遭受胃浮肿和腹泻带来的痛苦。
vt. 封锁 n. 阻塞 同义词:blank off, close off, jam-up, snarl-up to blockade a port封锁港口

n. 轰动；巨型炸弹；一鸣惊人者 同义词:sensation, stir Blockbuster fantasy films like "The Lord of the Rings " are produced and directed by people who grew up with the game .象《指环王》这样的轰动全球的魔幻电影，就是被一群伴随着龙与地下城的游戏长大的家伙导演和监制的。
n. 斑点；污点；疙瘩 vt. 弄脏 同义词:spot, maculation, soil, mud, spot, dirty The clothes was blotched with dark red stains.衣服沾有深红色污渍。
adj. 烂醉如泥的，烂醉的 同义词:far-gone, pickled A look of vacuity on my face blotto , vague in acuity, biting the asses that brush by me.在对面的钟楼上，那个驼背在用一支金槌敲钟，鸽子闻声惊叫起来。
n. 吹牛大家 adj. 吹牛的；唠唠叨叨的 同义词:windy, rodomontade The worst kind of interviewer is the blowhard .爱吹牛的人是最差劲的面试官。
vi. 跌跌撞撞地走；犯大错 vt. 做错 n. 大错 同义词:misdo, boner, ricket to blunder into the wrong room慌乱地走错了房间
vt. 涂污；使…模糊不清；使暗淡；玷污 vi. 沾上污迹；变模糊 n. 污迹；模糊不清的事物 同义词:cloud, pollute, fog, work-up The doors and windows were blurred with soot.那些门窗被煤烟弄得很脏。
vt. 预示；为…的兆头 vi. 预示 v. 停留；继续；遭到（bide的过去式） 同义词:indicate, forecast, shadow, announce, spae The news bodes hard days for the company.这消息预示公司的艰难日子。
n. 保镖 同义词:triggerman, bouncer Because I am your bodyguard !因为我是你的保镖啊！
vi. 犹豫，退缩；惊恐 vt. 搞糟，弄坏；使……惊奇；使……困惑 n. 犹豫，退缩；惊奇 同义词:daiker, hang back, break, make a mess of, vibration, surprise, wonder, hesitation to boggle at the sight of blood一见血就惊恐
adj. 假的；伪造的 n. 伪币 同义词:false, spurious I bought a bogus bag !我买到了假的包包！
adj. 喧闹的；狂暴的；猛烈的 同义词:fierce, angry, violent, hard China's growth is widely expected to slow this year but to a still boisterous 9 - 10%.普遍预期中国今年的增长势头会放慢，但仍能达到堪称活跃的9-10%。
n. 支持；长枕 vt. 支持；支撑 同义词:holding, support, adhesion, backing, encourage, second, carry, hand, champion More timbers are needed to bolster the roof of the mine.需要更多的木材支撑矿顶。

n. 螺栓；闪电；门闩；弩箭 vt. 囫囵吞下；上门闩 vi. 逃跑；冲出 adv. 突然地；直立地 同义词:lightning, levin, do a guy, make a break for it, suddenly, sharp, abruptly The boy bolted (down) his lunch and ran to the playground.男孩狼吞虎咽地吃完午饭，就跑到操场去了。
adj. 用螺栓栓的；脱离的，分开的 v. 突然说出；突然冲撞；拴住（bolt的过去分词） 同义词:divided, separate The boy bolted (down) his lunch and ran to the playground.男孩狼吞虎咽地吃完午饭，就跑到操场去了。
n. 夸大的言辞 adj. 夸大的 同义词:tall, exaggeratory Tact can be as expressive as bombast .老练圆通和高调浮夸同样具有表现力。
adj. 夸大的；言过其实的 同义词:tall, exaggeratory I went on, using the bombastic language of the time .我使用当时流行的夸大其词的语言接着说。
n. 富矿带；带来好运之事；幸运 同义词:mercy, lady luck The combination of globalisation and rising wealth is proving to be bonanza for both religions .事实证明，对两大宗教而言，全球化与不断增长的财富的两相结合是一大鸿运。
n. [机] 阀盖；软帽 vt. 给…装上罩；给…戴上帽子 to bonnet the highlander给苏格兰高地人戴上无边呢帽
adj. 漂亮的；健美的 同义词:pretty, smart, tony, cute Bonny : You looked very silly yesterday making faces at the bulldog .你昨天冲着牛头犬做鬼脸看起来很傻。
n. 农民；粗野的人；不懂礼貌的人 同义词:farmer, peasant, provincial A rude , insensitive person ; boor .乡下人粗鲁的、迟钝的人；乡下佬。
adj. 粗野的；粗鲁的；粗鄙的；笨拙的；乡土气的 同义词:robust, gross, crude, rough, country It's possible he doesn't even realize how boorish his comments are .有可能他甚至都没有意识到自己的话有多么地粗野。

vt. 促进；增加；支援 vi. 宣扬；偷窃 n. 推动；帮助；宣扬 同义词:facilitate, promote, enhance, further, jack, pick pocket, rip off, assistance, motivation, hand, aid, publicity If you boost him up,he can just reach the top of the shelf.如果你托他一把，他正好能够到架顶。
n. 升压机；支持者；扩爆器 同义词:advocate, supporter Free snacks are a cost - effective morale booster .用免费零食鼓舞员工士气成本很低。
n. 酒；酒宴 vi. 豪饮；痛饮 同义词:wine, liquor, drink, binge drinking, drink like a fish They went out boozing late last night.他们昨晚出去狂饮至深夜。
vi. 钻孔 vt. 钻孔；使烦扰 n. 孔；令人讨厌的人 同义词:drill hole, counter sunk, drill hole, counter sunk, hole, aperture to bore a hole into the wall钻孔入墙
n. 区；自治的市镇 同义词:sanjak, tehsil " Immigration is the prism " through which everything is seen in the borough , she says .她认为，“移民就像是一个棱柱”，透过它所有的问题都一览无遗。
adj. 植物学的 n. 植物性药材 同义词:phytological The botanical evidence points to the south .而植物学证据指向南方。
n. 植物学；地区植物总称 同义词:phytology The first of these in the field of botany were the herbals .在植物学领域，这些最早的著作是本草书。
n. [毒物][内科] 肉毒中毒（食物中毒一种） Don't taste the food ; even a small amount can cause botulism .不要尝这食物；即使稍微尝点也会引起肉毒中毒。
n. 闺房；女人的会客室或化妆室 同义词:gynaecea, harim Not without many misgivings did he find himself in Mrs. Proudie 's boudoir .他到了普劳迪夫人的卧室，心中可是有很多疑虑的。
n. 卵石，大圆石；巨砾 同义词:ratchel, grait When a stone falls into a pond , the ripples persist for a while . The credit crunch was a whopping great boulder .一块石头掉落水池所引起的波澜，会持续好长一段时间。而信贷危机就是这样一块特别大的石头。
adj. 慷慨的；丰富的；充裕的 同义词:abundant, generous, full, handsome, liberal Let us give bounteous love to all mankind .让我们献给人类无限的情怀。
n. 花束；酒香 同义词:nosegay, posy An alternative to the all red bouquet is to buy some white roses and insert one red one in the center of the bunch.一种花束与所有都是红色花朵的花束不一样是，去购买一些白色的玫瑰穿插在红色的玫瑰花束中。
n. 回合；较量；发作；一阵 同义词:blast, fit Writing a book is a horrible , exhausting struggle , like a long bout of some painful illness .写书是一场可怕的劳心伤神的斗争，有如一场恶病的长时间发作。
adj. 牛的；似牛的；迟钝的 n. 牛科动物 同义词:slow, oxy Methods Endothelial cells obtained from bovine retinas were cultured in vitro .方法体外培养牛视网膜微血管内皮细胞。
n. 凉亭；树阴处 同义词:kiosk, arbour Build of your imaginings a bower in the wilderness ere you build a house within the city walls .在你们建房于城墙内之前，先用你们的想像在旷野建一所凉亭。
vt. 联合抵制；拒绝参加 n. 联合抵制 We are determined to boycott them.我们决定拒绝跟他们来往。

n. 支柱；[语] 大括号；曲柄 vt. 支撑；振作起来；激励；撑牢 vi. 支持；打起精神 adj. 曲柄的 同义词:leg, backbone, stay, mainstay, support, stimulate, uphold, power, sustain, support of, stand up for sb Brace those sagging shelves with more crosspieces.多用横档加固那些下陷的架子。
n. 支撑；支柱；背带 adj. 令人振奋的；凉爽的 v. 绷紧，顶住（brace的现在分词形式） 同义词:leg, staff, backbone, stay, cool, uplifting Brace those sagging shelves with more crosspieces.多用横档加固那些下陷的架子。
vi. 刹车 n. 闸，刹车；阻碍 vt. 刹车 同义词:spoke, lock He should not brake the car abruptly on an icy road.他不应该在结冰路上把汽车猛然刹住。
n. 虚张声势；冒险 同义词:risk, throw, venture, adventure The promise to build a new district is no mere bureaucratic bravado .建设新城区的承诺不仅仅是官僚式的虚张声势。
vi. 争吵；打架；大喊大叫 n. 争吵；打架 vt. 大声喊出；为…争吵 同义词:fight, row, argument, brush, dispute, fight, bark out, bellow out The young men had nothing better to do than brawl in the streets.那些年轻人除了在街上打架外没更好的事干。
adj. 强壮的；肌肉结实的 同义词:strong, tough The blacksmith has a brawny arm .那个铁匠的臂膀很健壮。
adj. 厚颜无耻的；黄铜制的 vt. 使变得无耻；厚脸皮地做 同义词:as bold as brass, bold-faced The invaders brazened their way into our motherland.侵略者肆无忌惮地闯入了我们祖国。
n. 违背，违反；缺口 vt. 违反，破坏；打破 同义词:separation, gap, violation, infringement, destroy, violate Our troops have breached the enemy defences.我方部队突破了敌人的防线。
n. 缰绳；马勒；系带；约束物 vt. 控制；给装马勒 vi. 昂首表示轻蔑；生气 同义词:trace, haltere, possess, contain, regulate, bit, bottle, pet, take offense Jane saddled and bridled her favourite horse.简给她心爱的马装鞍上辔。
adj. 灿烂的，闪耀的；杰出的；有才气的 同义词:excellent, prominent, outstanding, splendid, gorgeous What makes one person a genius , like brilliant Albert Einstein .是什么使一个人像爱因斯坦一样地是个天才。
n. 边；边缘 vi. 满溢；溢出 vt. 使…满溢 同义词:margin, rim, spill over, flow over His eyes brimmed with tears.他热泪盈眶。
adj. 盈满的，充满的 同义词:full, consumed The heart is a pan brimful of water ;心情是一盆将泼还止的水。
adj. 有斑的，有斑纹的 同义词:branded I saw his brindled cow feeding on fish remnants( Herman Melville .我看见他的用鱼杂碎喂养的斑纹奶牛（海尔曼·梅尔维尔）。
n. （峭壁的）边缘 同义词:margin, suburb, beaded edge The aftershocks of that post - bubble carnage have now brought Europe to the brink .而泡沫破裂后大屠杀的余震，如今将欧洲推向了危险的边沿。
vt. 提出；钻孔；开始讨论；给…开口 n. 钻头；凿子；胸针（等于brooch） vi. 突然横转 同义词:introduce, present, prefer, file, advance, cutting bit, drilling head to broach beer from a keg钻孔汲取啤酒
vi. 烤；炙 vt. 烤；炙 n. 烤；争吵；灼热 同义词:to roast, to roast, bake, argument, brush, dispute to broil a steak (or chicken)烤牛排(或鸡)
n. [无化] 溴化物；庸俗的人；陈词滥调 同义词:lousy cliches, platitude Then a salty solution , commonly containing lithium bromide , absorbs the refrigerant vapours .随后，含有溴化锂的溶液变吸收掉蒸汽状的制冷剂。
n. [内科] 支气管炎 D. is the new name for emphysema and chronic * bronchitis .是对肺气肿和慢性支气管炎的新叫法。
vt. 孵；沉思 n. 一窝；一伙 同义词:meditate on, be deep in thought, gang, tribe She brooded the problem.她思考那个问题。
vt. 忍受；容忍 n. 小溪；小河 同义词:stomach, go, abide, stand, tough, creek, rivulet I will brook no interference.我决不容许任何干涉行径。
vt. 浏览；吃草 vi. 浏览；吃草；漫不经心地看商品 n. 浏览；吃草 同义词:scan, glance through, page, glance through, lookthrough, scan Two cows browsed the hillside.两头牛在山坡上吃草。
adj. 唐突的；直率的；无礼的 同义词:short, explicit, naked, frank Brusque the facades , almaximum forbidding ; immaculate except for the splotches of shadow cast by the leaves .其正面粗暴甚至可怕，除了树木投下星星点点的影子，一片洁净。
adj. 残忍的；野蛮的，不讲理的 同义词:wild, cruel, inhuman Brutal methods of interrogation such as water boarding are, in the ordinary meaning of the word , torture .按酷刑这个词的普通含意理解，水刑等残忍的审讯方法属于酷刑。
n. 无情；残忍；暴行（需用复数形式） 同义词:ruthlessness, affectionlessness At the meeting they vigorously protested such brutality .他们在会上强烈抗议这种野蛮行为。
adj. 残忍的；无理性的 n. 畜生；残暴的人 同义词:cruel, ferocious, beast, subman In fact , Monte Carlo techniques are much faster than brute force.事实上，蒙特卡罗技术要比暴力破解技术快得多。
n. 气泡，泡沫，泡状物；透明圆形罩，圆形顶 vi. 沸腾，冒泡；发出气泡声 vt. 使冒泡；滔滔不绝地说 同义词:foam, yeast, boil, intumesce, gush over The water began to bubble in the teapot.水在茶壶里开始沸腾。
vi. 扣住；变弯曲 vt. 扣住；使弯曲 n. 皮带扣，带扣 同义词:button up, wind, curve Buckle your seat belt.把座位安全带扣上。
adj. 牧歌的；牧羊的；乡下风味的 n. 田园诗；农夫 同义词:idyllic, farmer, idyll It is bucolic refuge in the midst of a great bustling city .它是处在繁华的大城市之中的世外桃源。
vi. 挪动；微微移动；改变态度或意见；服从 vt. 使让步；移动；使改变态度或意见 n. 羔羊皮 同义词:obey, be obedient to, put, locomote, lambskin, capeskin She stepped on the gas but the car didn't budge.她踩油门，但汽车开不动。
n. 丑角；滑稽剧演员 同义词:jack-pudding, merryman He was one part blackguard, people said , and three parts buffoon .人家说他是一分流氓气，三分小丑气。
n. 臭虫，小虫；故障；窃听器 vt. 烦扰，打扰；装窃听器 vi. 装置窃听器；打扰 同义词:fault, trouble, eat, burden, bother, interfere, put out His phone was bugged.他的电话被窃听了。
n. 童车；双轮单座轻马车 adj. 多虫的 So you want to go back to the buggy days ?所以你想要回到马车横行的年代去？
n. 电灯泡；鳞茎；球状物 vi. 生球茎；膨胀成球状 同义词:third wheel, electric lamp Install turn signal lamp bulb .安装转向信号灯灯泡。
n. 胀；膨胀；凸出部分 vt. 使膨胀；使凸起 vi. 膨胀；凸出 同义词:expansion, inflation, expand, plim, fill, swell with His stomach bulged out over his belt.他的肚子在皮带上凸出来。
n. 金银；纯金；金银块 同义词:pure gold, solid gold Two that have done investors proud are the yen and bullion .让投资者引以为傲的两类资产是日元和黄金。

n. 欺凌弱小者；土霸 adj. 第一流的；特好的 vt. 欺负；威吓 vi. 欺侮人 adv. 很；十分 int. 好；妙 同义词:bucko, classical, royal, champion, daunt, greatly, quite, badly, too, far, ok, okay The little girl was bullied constantly at school.这小姑娘在学校里经常受欺侮。
n. 壁垒；保障；防波堤 vt. 保护；筑垒保卫 同义词:vallum, mole, secure, preserve, shelter The strength of our country bulwarked us through the financial crisis.我国的实力使我们得以安然渡过这次金融危机。

n. 流浪汉；屁股；狂欢作乐；能力差的人；嗡嗡声；执达员（等于bumbailiff） vi. 流浪；靠乞讨过活；发嗡嗡声 vt. 乞讨；闲荡 adj. 无价值的；劣质的；很不愉快的 同义词:behind, ass, vagabondize, stray, beg, muck about, bad, worthless All summer vacation long they just bummed around.整个暑假他们都是到处游荡。
vi. 犯错误；踉跄；结结巴巴地说话 vt. 弄糟；搞坏 n. 错误 同义词:trip, make a mistake, hash up, run into the ground, error, mistake, fault, inaccuracy She somehow bumbled through four years of college.她总算乱混过了四年大学。

adj. 丰盛的，丰富的 n. 缓冲器 vt. 装满；为…祝酒 vi. 干杯 同义词:abundant, full, luxurious, buffer, dashpot, full of, fill with, drink a toast, toast to Those same higher prices mean that , in 2009 , farmers will grow bumper crops .较高的粮价同时意味着，农民将在2009年种植超大量的粮食。
n. 土包子，乡巴佬 同义词:bumkin, jaap Beneath the polished veneer , he is a bumpkin .尽管有着优雅的外表，他不过是个乡巴佬。
n. [水运] 浮标；浮筒；救生圈；航标 vt. 使浮起；支撑；鼓励 同义词:dan, drogue, encourage, support, heart, uphold, sustain Flotation collars are used to buoy space capsules that land in the sea.漂浮套管用于使降落于海面的航天舱浮于海面。
n. 浮力；轻快；轻松的心情；（股票）保持高价或回升 同义词:buoyant force, floating power There was a buoyancy in their atmosphere .这是一个轻松愉快的场合。

adj. 轻快的；有浮力的；上涨的 同义词:flowing, rising Most of those have been mainland Chinese companies looking to take advantage of buoyant stock markets to raise funds for expansion .这些公司中的大多数都是中国内地企业，它们试图利用繁荣的股市来募集扩张资金。
n. 官僚主义；官僚机构；官僚政治 However , the problem goes far beyond the security bureaucracy .然而，问题远远超过安全官僚机构。
vi. 萌芽 vt. 发芽 n. 嫩枝 同义词:germ, spring up, come into bud, come up, shoots She burgeoned into a fine actress.她迅速成长为一名优秀的女演员。
n. 作戏；滑稽戏 adj. 滑稽的；可笑的 同义词:antimasque, funny, ridiculous I think most of his poems are pieces of burlesque .我认为他的诗中大多数是滑稽讽刺作品。
vt. 擦亮；使…光亮；将…打磨光亮 n. 光泽；抛光；闪闪发光 vi. 磨光发亮 同义词:rub up, shine, shine, polishing to burnish copper把铜抛光擦亮

vi. 探索，寻找；挖地洞，挖通道；住入地洞，躲藏起来；钻进某处；偎依著 vt. 挖掘，挖出；在…挖洞（或通道）；使躲入洞穴 n. （兔、狐等的）洞穴，地道；藏身处，住处 同义词:explore, search after, to dig, tap into, residence, hole, subway, underground, accommodation They burrowed into the ground.他们掘洞钻入地下。
adj. 疲倦的；被草丛笼罩的；不知所措的 v. 丛生；以灌木装饰（bush的过去分词） 同义词:tired, worn I'm bushed , time for bed . Good night , kitties , good night , Clio .我好累呀，要去睡了。晚安，小猫咪。晚安，克丽欧。

vi. 破产；爆裂；降低级别 vt. 使破产；使爆裂；逮捕 n. 破产；半身像；萧条；胸部 adj. 破产了的；毁坏了的 同义词:fail, crack, seize, put out of business, failure, bankruptcy, chest, breast Soldiers got in a fight and busted up the bar.士兵们参加斗殴并毁坏了酒吧间。
n. 扶壁；拱壁；支撑物 vt. 支持；以扶壁支撑 同义词:support, upholder, encourage, second, back, carry, hand The builders buttressed that wall with stone structures.建筑工人们用石结构加固墙。
adj. （妇女）丰满的；健美的 同义词:fat, full Some are like buxom lassies and others are like slender , poetic , quiet ladies .有的象肥美的少女，有的象纤瘦的、有诗意的、恬静的贵妇。
adj. 过去的 n. 过去的事 同义词:past, ago, back, bypast For that alone , his letters are a unique record of a bygone milieu .单凭最后一点，他的信笺便是对往昔社会环境的一份独特记录。
n. 标题下署名之行；铁路支线；副业 vt. 署名 同义词:avocation, bywork, affix one's signature The newspaper report was bylined.这篇新闻报道是署名的。
vt. 绕开；忽视；设旁路；迂回 n. 旁路；[公路] 支路 同义词:ignore, neglect, side road, passby I bypassed the city.我绕城走。
n. 牛棚，牛栏 同义词:stable, cowshed Can push milk everyday after breaking through milk byre , can sell not a few money !在开通了奶牛房之后，每天都可以挤到牛奶，能卖不少钱哦！
n. 电脑高速缓冲存储器；贮存物；隐藏处 vt. 隐藏；窖藏 vi. 躲藏 同义词:covert, lock, pocket, conceal, harbor, hide out They cached their sweets in their sleeves.他们把糖果藏在袖子里。
n. （证明品质的）优良标志；公务印章；私人印戳；标记；威望；纪念邮戳 同义词:marks, prestige France 's Champagne region , for instance , helps give Veuve Clicquot special cachet .例如法国香槟区就给「凯歌皇牌」特别的尊贵象徵。
n. 刺耳的音调；不和谐音 同义词:dissonance A more immediate worry is the cacophony of competing interests exposed by the downturn .一个更加直接的担忧是，经济衰退背景下各方争夺利益之音不绝于耳。
n. [园艺] 仙人掌 同义词:Cholla Stem, cholla We have to water this cactus once a month .我们必须每月给仙人掌浇一次水。
n. [医] 尸体；死尸 同义词:corpse, lich, lych Study Design . Cadaver study .研究设计：尸体研究。
adj. 尸体样的；惨白的 同义词:ghastly Death and decay , cadaverous smell .死亡与腐烂，苍白的味道。

n. 幼子，次子；实习生；军官学校学生 同义词:internship, trainee The author , who is a clinical psychologist , deftly weaves in a primer on the brain 's inner workings into the hunt for cadet 's killer.作者本人也是个临床心理学者，在搜寻罪犯的过程中，他熟练的讲解着初级的思维工作机理。
vi. 乞讨；骗得白食；行乞；贩卖 vt. 乞讨；行乞；贩卖 同义词:go begging, do business in, beg, do business in Our poor neighbours sometimes cadged food from us.我们的穷邻居有时向我们讨些吃的东西。
adj. 精明的；小心谨慎的；机灵的；有戒心的 同义词:clever, prudent John is pretty cagey . You have to keep an eye on him .约翰很谨慎小心的。你必须留意他。
vt. 以甜言蜜语哄骗；勾引 同义词:accost He cajoled his parents into consent giving him money to buy a new car.他哄骗父母答应给他钱买辆新汽车。
adj. 灾难的，悲惨的；不幸的 同义词:evil, catastrophic, miserable Light reveals the subtle alteration of things , the sly or calamitous impermanence or mortal life .事物的细微变动，人生的狡猾，倏忽无常，一一都在光中显露出来。
n. 灾难；不幸事件 同义词:disaster, tragedy, meltdown This calamity is beginning to look possible .这场灾难已经开始变得可能。
vi. 钙化；变成石灰质 vt. 使钙化；使思想僵化 An aortic valve need not be bicuspid calcify .主动脉瓣并非是两个瓣叶的才钙化。
n. [化学] 钙 Water contains calcium , iron and other minerals .水中含有钙、铁和其他矿物质。
adj. 计算的；深谋远虑的；审慎的 v. 计算（calculate的ing形式） 同义词:computational, foresighted, computing, figuring We must first calculate the horse-power needed to propel the ship.我们必须首先计算出驱动这艘船需要多大马力。
vt. 校正；调整；测定口径 同义词:adjust, update, coordinate This thermometer is calibrated by centigrade.这种温度计是用摄氏百分度标定的。
n. [军] 口径；才干；水准 同义词:standard, savoir-faire "You need high- calibre people to run it , " says Ms Milner .“经营需要很有才干的人，”米尔纳女士说。
n. 书法；笔迹 同义词:writing, penmanship Cloisonne , calligraphy and paintings . Nobody will go back home empty-handed.景泰蓝、字画等。外国朋友没有不满意而归的。

adj. 无情的；麻木的；硬结的；起老茧的 vt. 使冷酷无情；使硬结；使生茧 vi. 变得冷酷无情；结茧；变硬 n. 硬皮；老茧 同义词:stupid, asleep, relentless, ruthless, spin cocoons, incrustate Such an approach is not necessarily callous or insensitive .这样的做法未必就是冷酷无情或麻木不仁。

adj. 年轻而无经验的；羽毛未丰的 同义词:fledgeless, unfledged This is one of the hidden features of the political machine : the callow age of many of its cogs , including some big ones.政治这部机器中许多小齿轮，包括一些大的，他们年轻的年龄是是政治机器隐藏的特点之一。
n. [皮肤] 胼胝；愈合组织；老茧 vt. 使生老茧；使变硬；使结痂 vi. 变硬；结痂；生老茧 同义词:tyle, tyloma, stiffen, harden, stiffen Heavy work callused his hands.繁重的劳动使他的双手生出茧子来。
vt. 诽谤；中伤；诬蔑 同义词:wrong, asperse Countless facts have proved that he was not calumniated, but was justly charged with treason.无数事实已证明他并不是被人诬告，而确是犯了叛国通敌之罪。
n. 诽谤；中伤；诬蔑 同义词:scandal, defamation Your calumny against the great is impious .你对伟人的中伤有失虔敬。
n. 伪装，掩饰 vt. 伪装，掩饰 vi. 伪装起来 同义词:blind, mask, wrap up, mask Their military vehicles have been camouflaged.他们的军用车辆都已加以伪装。
n. 钟学；鸣钟术；铸钟术
n. 误传，谬传；谣言 同义词:misrepresentation, rumor There are rumours and slanders canarding about her romantic deeds.关于她的风流韵事有许多流言蜚语正在流传着。
n. [鸟] 金丝雀；淡黄色 同义词:serin, Kanariya canary warbled all day long.那只金丝雀整天在鸣叫。
n. 烛光；发光强度单位 adj. 小雪茄烟的 同义词:candle power Vision when the eye is adapted to levels of luminance of at least several candela per square meter .眼睛适应于至少为几坎德拉每平方米亮度时的视觉。
n. [法] 候选人资格；候选人的地位（等于candidacy） " We are going to set up a promotional committee and then officially launch our candidature , " said Alemanno .我们将设立一个宣传委员会，然后正式推出的竞选，说：“莱曼诺。
n. [植保] 溃疡病；口疮；腐败的原由，弊害 vi. 产生溃疡；腐败起来 vt. 使患溃疡；使腐败 同义词:aphtha, septicize, deprave Blighted stems often canker.有病的茎往往溃烂。
n. 食人者；吃同类的动物 adj. 食同类的；吃人肉的；凶残的 同义词:man-eater, murderous, lupine It is not my predilection to go beating a dead horse… but I have little pity for cannibal .我没兴趣对死人出手…但是我也不会同情吃人的傢伙。
n. 食人；嗜食同类；残忍的行为 同义词:anthropophagy The war is just like the cannibalism of animals .战争就如同动物之间的互相残杀。
n. 标准；教规；正典圣经；教士 Catholic leaders say it refers only to canon - law procedures and does not preclude criminal charges .天主教会的主教们声称这份文件只是涉及到教会法规的程序问题，而没有妨碍任何刑事指控。
adj. 依教规的；权威的；牧师的 n. 牧师礼服 同义词:ministerial, ecclesiastical Every sentence has a canonical derivation .每个句子都有一个规范推导。
n. 天篷；华盖；遮篷；苍穹 vt. 用天蓬遮盖；遮盖 同义词:baldachin, marquee, blot out, overcurtain The sky was canopied with dark clouds.天空乌云密布。
n. 斜面；伪善之言；黑话；角落 vi. 倾斜；讲黑话 vt. 把…棱角去掉；使…倾斜；甩掉 adj. 行话的；哀诉声的；假仁假义的 同义词:decline, corner, pitch, slope, lean, fling off, spin off, holier-than-thou They always cant about world peace.他们一贯侈谈世界和平。
adj. 脾气坏的；爱吵架的；难相处的 同义词:spleenful, mean-tempered He 's a cantankerous , nasty man who hates students with a passion .他是一个脾气很坏，令人讨厌的人，他的爱好就是与学生作对。
n. 大合唱；（意）清唱剧；康塔塔（一种声乐套曲） 同义词:oratorio Jesu , Joy of Man's Desiring from Cantata No. 147耶稣，人们渴望的喜乐，选自《第147号康塔塔》。
n. 峡谷 同义词:glen, coomb, kloof canyon unfolds in an inevitable sequence .峡谷按照必然的顺序显露出来。
adj. 宽敞的；广阔的；容积大的 同义词:extensive, vast, wider, spacious He has capacious mind [ memory ].他心胸开阔[记忆力强]。
n. 能力；容量；资格，地位；生产力 同义词:ability, competence, membership, status, productivity Subordination and silence best became their years and capacity .服从与沉默，最适合他们的年令与能力。
vi. 雀跃 n. 跳跃，雀跃；刺山柑花蕾；不法活动 同义词:gambol, bound with, jump, spring There are many lambs capering in the meadow.很多小羊在草地上蹦蹦跳跳。
n. 人头税；按人收费；每人均摊费 同义词:community charge Objective To investigate the effect of the application of sickbed capitation in clinical attendance .目的探讨床位包干制管理在临床护理中应用的效果。

vi. 认输，屈服；屈从，停止反抗；有条件投降；让步 同义词:throw in the towel, say uncle The enemy besieged in a few strongholds capitulated on the condition that they would be granted to return home voluntarily.被围困于少数据点中的敌军已投降，条件是允许他们自愿地回家。
n. （有条件的）投降；投降协定；（文件、声明等的）要点；条约 同义词:core, main, heart, treaty, essential The invading army had massacred many of the garrison after capitulation .侵略军在守军投降后仍将多人屠杀了。
adj. 反复无常的；任性的 同义词:moonish, wayward The world was dangerous and capricious .那是个危险又反复无常的世界。
adj. 挑剔的；吹毛求疵的 同义词:particular, picky There is no captious client but faulty product and service .没有挑剔的客户，只有不完善的产品和服务。
vt. 迷住，迷惑 同义词:possess, spell The children were captivated by his thrilling story.孩子们听他讲惊险故事听得入了迷。
n. 魅力；着迷；迷惑 同义词:charm, possession, grace, fascination The children were captivated by his thrilling story.孩子们听他讲惊险故事听得入了迷。
n. 壳；甲壳 同义词:shell, sheel He probably knows something about it . He may be wise but he has to be locked up in his carapace until he dies.他应该知道有关的东西吧。也许他很贤明的，但他的一生注定被锁在自己的甲壳里。
n. 克拉（等于karat） 同义词:karat You can shop for 24 carat gold jewelry .你可以选购24克拉的金首饰；
n. 羊毛衫，开襟羊毛衫（等于cardigan sweater） 同义词:knitted sweater, woolen sweater It's a little cardigan .一件对襟儿小毛衣。
vi. 倾侧，倾斜 vt. 使倾侧，使倾斜 n. 船的倾侧 同义词:pitch, slope, lean, slope, lean They careened the fishing boat to repaint the hull.他们将渔船倾斜过来重新油漆船体。
n. 脱字符号；插入符号 Inserts a tab character at the current caret position .在当前插入符号位置插入一个制表符。
n. 北美驯鹿 WOLVES dine on moose and caribou , creatures favoured by Alaska's human hunters .狼以北美驼鹿和驯鹿为食，这也是阿拉斯加猎人们最喜欢的猎物。
n. 漫画；讽刺画；漫画手法 vt. 画成漫画讽刺 Her smiling face has often been caricatured on the front covers of magazines.她的笑脸常在杂志的封面上被画成漫画。
n. 大屠杀；残杀；大量绝灭 同义词:holocaust, bloodbath The aftershocks of that post - bubble carnage have now brought Europe to the brink .而泡沫破裂后大屠杀的余震，如今将欧洲推向了危险的边沿。
n. [园艺] 康乃馨；肉色；粉红色 adj. 肉红色的 同义词:pink, fleshcolor He wore a red carnation in his buttonhole .他的扣洞上了一朵红色康乃馨。
n. 狂欢节，嘉年华会；饮宴狂欢 同义词:Dionysia, Fasching In the Rhineland and the south , it 's carnival time .在莱茵兰和南部地区，这几天是狂欢节时间。
n. [动] 食肉动物；食虫植物 同义词:predator We ARE the only ones here, which is awfully inconvenient when you're a carnivore !在这我们/确实/能独处，但是对食肉动物来说这才是最不方便的！
adj. 食肉的；肉食性的 同义词:raptatorial, zoophagous Sheep are not carnivorous but tigers are .绵羊非食肉类，而老虎才是。
vi. 欢乐地歌唱；唱耶诞颂歌 n. 颂歌，赞美诗；欢乐之歌 vt. 欢唱；歌颂 同义词:epithalamion, canticle, praise, pay a tribute to They often went carolling at Christmas.他们在圣诞节时常去挨门挨户地唱圣诞颂歌。
n. 喧闹的酒宴 While we're awake , let us join in carousal ;趁着清醒，我们一起加入狂欢；
vi. 畅饮；欢宴 n. 喧闹的酒会或宴会；一饮而尽 同义词:tuck away, quick one His followers did not rape carouse , like the troops of many warlord armies.他的部下也不象许多军阀的军队那样强奸民女，大吃大喝。
adj. 腐肉的；腐朽的 n. 腐肉；臭尸；不洁之物 同义词:doty, sloughy, slough The vultures also had a third role : clearing carrion .兀鹫同样有第三种作用，那就是吃死人肉。
n. 制图师；地图制作者 同义词:mapmaker Cartographer is a simple , efficient object relational mapper engine.这是个简单、效的对象-关系映射工具。
vt. 雕刻；切开；开创 vi. 切开；做雕刻工作 同义词:grave, engrave, slice from, cut open She carved a flower out of a radish.她把萝卜刻成一朵花。
n. 层叠；小瀑布；喷流 vi. 像瀑布般冲下或倾泻 v. 使瀑布似地落下 同义词:stack-up The price of a television set cascaded to 320 pounds last week.电视机价格上周暴跌到每台320镑。
n. （印度社会中的）种姓；（具有严格等级差别的）社会地位；（排他的）社会团体 同义词:social status, social position Geographic location , education and the erstwhile caste system being some of the key factors .其中重要的几个因素是地理位置、所受教育和过去的等级制度。
vt. 严惩；苛评；矫正；修订 同义词:chastise, throw the book at He was castigated for his carelessness in doing homework.他由于做作业时马马虎虎而受到申斥。
n. 惩罚；苛评；修订 同义词:punishment, rod, payment, discipline He was castigated for his carelessness in doing homework.他由于做作业时马马虎虎而受到申斥。
n. 灾难；大洪水，地震；（社会政治的）大变动 同义词:disaster, earthquake, tragedy, calamity The extinct volcano 's eruption would mean a cataclysm for the city .死火山又重新喷发，对这座城市来说意味着大难临头。
n. 催化作用；刺激作用 同义词:katalysis, catalytic action Additional contribution to catalysis can come from bound water molecules , metal io , or other factors .其它促成催化的因素来自结合水分子，金属离子或其它因子。
n. [物化] 催化剂；刺激因素 同义词:fuel, activator But a catalyst to shift a generation ?但是这能不能促使一代人转变？

adj. 绝对的（名词categoricalness，副词categorically，异体字categoric）；直接了当的；无条件的；属于某一范畴的 同义词:strict, absolute, positive, unlimited The overall result is that no categorical statements can be made.整体结论是，我们无法下明确的断言。
n. 种类，分类；[数] 范畴 同义词:variety, classification, kind, manner, sort, nature " Middle- class " describes an income category but also a set of attitudes .“中产阶级”描述的不仅是一种收入分类，亦是一套看法。
vt. 投合，迎合；满足需要；提供饮食及服务 同义词:humor, meet the demand He has a small hotel and also caters for weddings and funerals.他开了一家小旅馆，并承办红白喜事的酒席。
n. [无脊椎] 毛虫；履带车 adj. 有履带装置的 同义词:palmerworm, eruca Then take the caterpillar to the fire place , and say ' Come out fire ! ', then the fire will come out .然后拿毛毛虫放在煮饭的地方，说『火出来，』火就会出来。
n. [医] 泻法，导泻；净化；精神发泄 同义词:purification, distillation Controversy is being outweighed by catharsis as Cambodia faces up to its past .随着柬埔寨直面自己的过去，由此得来的涤荡净化压倒了争议。
adj. 导泻的；通便的 n. [药] 泻药；[药] 通便药 同义词:aperient, jalap, purger Nasser 's 1956 triumph endured in Arab memory as a moment of cathartic liberation .在阿拉伯的记忆里，纳赛尔1956年的大胜是净化解放运动的重要时刻。
n. 阴极 同义词:kathode, negative pole The measuring cell consists of an insulated silver cathode .测量电池是由绝缘的银阴极组成的。
adj. 天主教的；宽宏大量的 n. 天主教徒；罗马天主教 Critics of the study included an official of the United States Conference of Catholic Bishops .在对研究的批评家中包括了一位美国天主教主教会议的官员。
n. 干部会议；核心会议 vi. 召开干部会议；开核心会议 A supposed democracy caucus at the UN has achieved little.联合国一个假设的民主国家集团收效就甚微。
vt. 填隙使不渗水；捻缝；凿密 yields a light tough wood used for canoe outriggers and a fiber used for cordage and caulk ;产生一种轻而硬的木头，用做独木舟的舷外支架，光纤被用做绳索和防漏；
adj. [化学] 腐蚀性的；[化学] 苛性的；刻薄的；焦散的 n. [助剂] 腐蚀剂；苛性钠；焦散曲线 同义词:acid, vitriolic, corrosive agent, cauterant That invited criticism , and sometimes caustic caricature .而这些遭受批评和有时尖酸刻薄的漫画讽刺。
n. 行列，队伍；骑兵队 同义词:train, cortege A cavalcade went forth from the city to meet the Governor .一大队人马出城去迎接总督。
n. 骑士；武士；对女人献殷勤 adj. 傲慢的；漫不经心的；无忧无虑的 同义词:knight, chevalier, assuming, arrogant Yet Russia 's attitude to climate change to date has been cavalier , at best .然而迄今为止，俄罗斯对待气候变暖的态度充其量说是利己的。
n. 骑兵；装甲兵；装甲部队 同义词:horse, trooper Our regiment reeled when cavalry struck it .当骑兵部队进攻时，我们团溃退了。
n. 洞穴；凹处 vt. 挖空；置…于洞穴中 同义词:recession, cavity, hole, hollow out In the eerie silence of the cavern .洞里有一种可怕的寂静。

vi. 吹毛求疵；挑剔 vt. 吹毛求疵；无端指摘 n. 吹毛求疵；苛责；无端的指责 同义词:nit-pick, find quarrel in a straw, find quarrel in a straw, nibble at, fault-finding, hypercriticism Although his composition was flawless, the teacher was always cavilling at his handwriting.虽然他的作文写得完美无瑕，但老师对他的书法总是百般挑剔。
n. 腔；洞，凹处 同义词:recession, hole It occupies the central cavity of bone .它位于骨骼中央的骨髓腔里。
vt. 放弃；割让（领土） 同义词:desert, yield, quit This island was ceded to Spain more than one hundred years ago.这个岛屿在一百多年以前就割让给西班牙了。
adj. 著名的；有名望的 v. 庆祝（celebrate的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:famous, noted, renowned, distinguished, famed The priest celebrated High Mass in church.神父在教堂中举行大弥撒。
n. 名人；名声 同义词:personality, lion, fame " Law firms are trawling their celebrity client base, " he says .“律所正拖网打捞他们的名人客户”，他说道。
n. 快速；敏捷 同义词:speed, fleetness We are able to deal with emergency cases with celerity , seeking the most economical solutions .我所律师能迅速地处理突发案件，寻求最经济的解决方法；
adj. 天上的，天空的 n. 神仙，天堂里的居民 同义词:heavenly, ethereal, jinnee, djinni The angular distance of celestial body below the horizon .在地平线以下消失；指太阳和月亮等天体。
n. 独身 同义词:singleton, bachelorhood Both Mithraism and early Christianity considered abstinence , celibacy , and self- control to be among their highest virtues .密特拉教和早期基督教都认为节欲，独身生活和自我控制是他们的最高美德。
n. 独身者 adj. 独身的；禁欲的 同义词:stoical If guitars were women , I 'd make Charlie Sheen look like a celibate monk .如果吉他是女人的，陈冠希跟我比简真像是个禁欲的和尚。
n. 地窖；酒窖；地下室 vt. 把…藏入地窖 同义词:basement, earth pit Stop exaggerating and get me the pet carrier from cellar .别再继续夸大了，帮我把宠物篮子从地下室拿出来。
n. 墓地；公墓 同义词:graveyard, boneyard On the way to the cemetery the band played slow , solemn music suited to the occasion .在前往墓地的路上，乐队演奏节奏缓慢庄重的乐曲，以烘托这种气氛。
vt. 审查，检查 n. 检查员；[心理] 潜意识压抑力；信件检查员 同义词:examine, review, inspect, supervisor, inspector All the letters from the war area were censored.所有从战区寄来的信件都经过了检查。
adj. 挑剔的；受批判的（名词censoriousness，副词censoriously） 同义词:particular, picky A long angry or violent speech , usually of a censorious or denunciatory nature ; a diatribe .长篇抨击激烈演说一种愤怒的或激烈的长篇言辞，通常为挑剔或谴责性质；
n. 审查制度；审查机构 Perhaps they should go instead to court and fight censorship with the help of lawyers .或许他们应该诉诸法律，借助律师的力量与审查法对抗。
vt. 责难，责备 n. 责难 vi. 谴责，责备 同义词:impugn, decry, decrial, dyslogy, accuse of, blame for The traffic policeman censured the driver but didn't fine him.交通警察严厉地批评了这位汽车司机，但对他没有进行罚款。

adj. [力] 离心的；远中的 n. 离心机；转筒 同义词:acentric, exodic, revolving drum, rotating drum Centrifugal casting , compact structure , free from pinhole porosity and slag , smooth surface and even wall thickness .高速离心铸造，组织致密，无砂眼、夹渣，表面光滑、壁厚均匀。
adj. 向心的；利用向心力的 同义词:axipetal, endocentric After some treatment of centripetal force , he deduces Kepler's third law .在向心力的一些论述之后，他推出了开普勒的第三定律。
adj. [动] 头的 同义词:head, encephalic External cephalic version : how to improve its impact ?胎头外倒转术：如何改善它的效果?。
n. 制陶术，制陶业（ceramic的复数） Jinhongwei Ceramics Manufactory locates in Ceramics Capital Of China "---- Chaozhou .潮安县金鸿伟日用陶瓷厂位于“中国瓷都”―潮州。
n. 谷类，谷物；谷类食品；谷类植物 adj. 谷类的；谷类制成的 同义词:corn, grain, corny In Canada , we eat cereal for breakfast .在加拿大，我们早饭吃麦片粥。
adj. 大脑的，脑的 同义词:encephalic, cranic Subsequent imaging with MR revealed extension of the infarct into the left posterior cerebral artery territory .之后的磁共振显示梗塞的范围以扩大到左侧大脑后动脉区域。
n. 思考；精神活动；脑髓作用 同义词:thought, thinking cap Consciousness or cerebration has been said to have emerged in the evolution of higher primates .据说意识或思考在较高级灵长类的进化中已出现。
n. [解剖] 大脑 The surface of cerebrum is increased by many gyri .大脑表面由脑回的增多而增大。
n. 停止；中止；中断 同义词:stop, break, stay, hang, stand The crisis led to a cessation of the hallmarks of Indus elite culture .这项危机导致印度河菁英阶层文化特徵的中断。
n. （权利的）转让，出让；（领土的）割让 同义词:negotiation, attornment Issuance, claims and reinsurance cession functionalities .保险、索款及再保险割让功能。
adj. 鲸类的；鲸鱼的 n. 鲸鱼；鲸类动物 The sperm whale is believed to dive deeper than any other cetacean .人们相信，抹香鲸比其他鲸类动物潜得更深。
n. 糠；谷壳；无价值的东西 vi. 开玩笑；打趣 vt. 开玩笑；逗趣 同义词:mud, bran, fool, kid around, kid around, to play a joke We often chaff him for his fear of his wife.我们常常拿他的怕老婆开玩笑。
n. 懊恼；委屈；气愤 vt. 使…懊恼 同义词:complaint, grievance He was chagrined at his failure.他因失败而感到懊丧。
adj. 苦恼的；失望的 v. 使懊恼（chagrin的过去分词） 同义词:disappointed, strait He was always a little chagrined that Roth was Jewish .只要一想起罗思是犹太人的一员，他总是有点不安。
n. 变色龙；善变的人；轻浮的人 同义词:anole, Zelig The chameleon on a mirror riddle is best kept in idealized form as a thought experiment .这个镜子上的变色龙的谜语作为一个思想实验，最好是保持在它思考的形式里。
n. 枝形吊灯 Taking my hat from the chandelier , I followed .我从灯架上取下我的帽子，也跟着走了出去。
n. 混沌，混乱 同义词:disorder, confusion, involvement, mix, turmoil " There is order in chaos , " Farmer says .“在混沌中存在着秩序”，法默说。
adj. 混沌的；混乱的，无秩序的 同义词:troubled, confused Inherent complexity is the " true " complexity of chaotic systems .内在的复杂性是混沌系统“真正的”复杂性。
n. 小伙子；家伙；龟裂 vt. 使皲裂 vi. 皲裂 同义词:apple, customer, checking, egg, guy Cold weather chapped his hands.寒冷的天气冻裂了他的双手。
vt. 陪伴；护送 n. 年长女伴（陪伴未婚少女上社交场所的）；监护人（青年社交聚会时在场的） vi. 当女伴；当监护人 同义词:attend, keep company, keeper, guardian chaperon grouped the younger children together .那年长女伴将年纪较小的孩子聚集在一起。
n. 描述；特性描述 同义词:presentation, description The plot is good but the characterization lets you down .故事情节不错，但是人物塑造却令人失望。
n. 用动作等表演的字谜游戏（charade的复数） Word games aka ' charades ' was next.“文字解说”游戏考考同学们的领悟力…
n. 魅力；神授的能力；非凡的领导力 同义词:grace, fascination Two weeks before voting , Mr Berlusconi took to the hustings , and his personal charisma may have tilted the balance.选举前两个星期，贝卢斯科尼先生开始竞选活动，他的个人魅力或许改变了选举结果。
adj. 超凡魅力的；神赐能力的 But he was also a charismatic showman with a touch of the charlatan about him, and he loved a good spectacle .但是他同时也是一个富有魅力的表演家，身上带着一点江湖术士气，而且他喜欢让人来劲的场面。
n. 慈善；施舍；慈善团体；宽容；施舍物 同义词:tolerance, mercy The purpose of charity is to help people in need .慈善活动的目的就是帮助那些有需要的人。
n. 吹牛者；江湖医生 adj. 骗人的 同义词:fanfaron, saltimbanco, fallacious, deceptious That charlatan is anything doctor .那江湖骗子决不是医生。
vt. 特许；包租；发给特许执照 n. 宪章；执照；特许状 同义词:license, license, patent, permit a chartered accountant持证会计师
adj. 谨慎的；仔细的；吝啬的；怕羞的 同义词:careful, tight, cautious, prudent, wary Consumers , chary of spending , are hobbling domestic demand .德国谨慎花钱的消费者制约了国内需求。
vt. 追逐；追捕；试图赢得；雕镂 vi. 追逐；追赶；奔跑 n. 追逐；追赶；追击 同义词:go after, track down, pursue, go after, pursuit, hunting The children are chasing one another among the bushes.孩子们在树丛中互相追逐。
n. 峡谷；裂口；分歧；深坑 同义词:canyon, pit, variance This new writer was totally unware chasm in the story .这个写作新手完全没意识到故事中的脱节处。
n. 底盘，底架 同义词:underpan, batholith A terminal with its chassis connected to one side of a power line , allowing the chassis itself to provide the earth or ground .底盘和电源线一端相连的终端，底盘本身充当地线或接地线。
adj. 纯洁的；贞洁的；有道德的；朴素的 同义词:stainless, pure, white, plain I love to mix with people chaste in mind .我喜欢与思想纯洁的人来往。
vt. 惩罚；磨炼；抑制 同义词:control, stay, restrain She has been chastened by all kinds of experiences in life.她一生中经历了各种各样的磨难。
vt. 惩罚；严惩；责骂 同义词:rate, penalise The father chastised his son for his misconduct.父亲由于儿子行为不轨而责罚他。
n. 贞洁；纯洁；简洁 同义词:purity, immaculacy Chastity is a wealth that comes from abundance of love .贞节是一笔财富，在肥沃的爱情里滋长。
n. （法国封建时代的）城堡；（尤指法国的）别墅 同义词:villa, castle For three heavy hours , the stone faces of the chateau , lion and human , stared blindly at the night .庄园里的石面孔（狮子的面孔，人的面孔）茫然地望着黑夜，望了三个沉重的小时。
n. 沙文主义；盲目的爱国心 同义词:jingoism, kultur We resolutely oppose great power chauvinism .我们坚决反对大国沙文主义。
vt. 把…将死；使彻底失败 n. 将死；挫败 同义词:discomfiture Whoever gets a knockout or a checkmate first wins - it 's the ultimate combination of brain and brawn !谁第一个将对方击倒或将死谁就是胜利者—这是头脑和肌肉的最终结合！
n. [脊椎] 猎豹 The cheetah is the fleetest of animals .陆地上跑得最快的动物是印度豹。
n. 棋子；检验器；西洋跳棋；方格图案 vt. 使…交替变化；把…画成方格图案形 同义词:tester, chessman The cloth has a chequer pattern .这块布有格子花的图形。
n. v形臂章（军人佩戴以示军衔和军兵种的） Pairs traders , believing the market has overreacted to the deal , are buying Exxon and selling Chevron .配对交易者认为市场对埃克森的交易反应过度，因此买入埃克森并卖出雪佛龙。
n. 时髦；别致的款式 adj. 别致的 同义词:stylishness, trendiness, picturesque " Chic clothes but empty faces , " she said .“穿着时尚，面无表情，”她说道。
n. 狡辩；欺骗；强词夺理 同义词:fraud, deception " I 'm very worried about chicanery , " Schneider says.施奈德说：“我很担心这些诡辩。
vt. 责骂；斥责 vi. 斥责；责骂 同义词:rate, tongue, rate, hop on The manager chided him for his delay.经理责备他拖拖拉拉。

adj. 空想的，妄想的；荒唐的 同义词:romantic, fantastic His utopia is not a chimerical commonwealth but a practical improvement on what already exists .他的乌托邦理想并不是一种空想的共和国，而是对现有社会的一种实际改进。
n. 裂缝；叮当声；裂口 vi. 叮当响 vt. 使叮当响 同义词:crack, split They chinked the holes in the walls with plaster.他们用灰泥堵塞住墙上的洞。
adj. 无下颚的；优柔寡断的 同义词:irresolute, weak-minded A couple of old women were chinning in the corner.几个老太婆在角落里聊天。
n. 花栗鼠；[脊椎] 金花鼠 同义词:flickertail chipmunk of western America and Asia .美洲西部和亚洲的花鼠。
n. 手相术 同义词:palmistry as opposed to our character , is known chiromancy .用以克服性格，手相术以此而闻名。
n. 唧唧声；喳喳声；[通信] 啁啾声 vi. 吱喳而鸣；尖声地说；咂嘴打招呼 vt. 吱喳而鸣；尖声地说；咂嘴向…打招呼 同义词:chatter, squeal The sparrows chirp outside the window every morning.麻雀每天清晨在窗外嘁嘁喳喳地叫。

n. 骑士精神（复数chivalries）；骑士制度 同义词:errantry He was an apotheosis of chivalry .他是骑士精神的典范。
n. 唱诗班；合唱队；舞蹈队 vt. 合唱 vi. 合唱 同义词:chorus, chorus, chorus Gabriella : Just church choir is all. I tried to solo and nearly fainted .只是教堂唱诗班唱唱而已。尝试过一次独唱差点昏过去。
adj. 易怒的；暴躁的；胆汁质的 同义词:fierce, testy Choleric people don't cry easily or show much emotion at all .暴躁的人不会轻易哭泣，或显露过多的情绪。
n. 砍；排骨；商标；[网]削球 vt. 剁碎；砍 (俚)丑人 同义词:brand, label, logo, cut, hew, hew Chop some wood for the fire.给炉子劈点木柴来。
adj. 波涛汹涌的；波浪起伏的；不断改变方向的 同义词:surfy, surgy It was a bit choppy on the cruise but I was all right once I found my sea legs.在航游中有点风浪，但一旦我习惯于坐船旅行我就没什么问题了。
n. 编舞；舞蹈艺术；舞艺 The proposed choreography is intricate .被提出的安排是错综复杂的。
vi. 咯咯笑 n. 得意的高笑 The children chortled with delight at his joke.他的笑话逗得孩子们哈哈大笑。
n. 合唱队；齐声；歌舞队 vt. 合唱；异口同声地说 vi. 合唱；异口同声地说话 同义词:choir, choir, choir The birds were chorusing around us.鸟儿在我们周围齐声歌唱。
adj. 彩色的；色品的；易染色的 同义词:colorized A configuration is reducible if no minimal 5 chromatic plane graph can contain it .如果没有极小5色平面图能包含某个构形，就说此构形是可约的。

n. [天] 精密记时表；高度精确的钟表；航海经线仪 My watch is more expensive because it 's a chronometer .我的手表是精密型的，所以要比你的贵。

adj. 圆胖的，丰满的 同义词:fat, full, pudsy Kids at school would call me " fat chin " and " chubby cheeks.学校里的孩子们管我叫“胖下巴”和“小肥脸”。
vt. 丢弃，抛掷；驱逐；轻拍 n. [机] 卡盘；抚弄；赶走；咯咯声 vi. 咯咯叫 同义词:slough off, reject, drove out, cluck to chuck a child under the chin抚弄小孩的下巴
vi. 咯咯的笑，轻声地笑 n. 轻笑，窃笑 vt. 轻声笑着表示 同义词:snigger She chuckled with delight.她愉快地轻声笑了起来。
n. 大肉片；笨蛋；大木片 同义词:simple, turkey, put He 's a chump .他是个十足的笨蛋。

adj. 矮胖的；粗短的；厚实的 同义词:humpty-dumpty, podgy He had an Atari , with chunky plug - in cartridges and blocky graphics , and he liked to play " Defender " at the arcade .他有一款雅达利游戏机，里面有小型的子弹盒插件还有些块状图形，他喜欢在拱廊里面做“防守方”。
n. 吝啬鬼；乡下人；粗暴的人；（中世纪的）农民 同义词:farmer, peasant, provincial, screw Churl I 'll drop the love - juice in your eyes . Hey!坏东西，我将在你的眼精滴进爱情的花液。
adj. 没有礼貌的；脾气暴躁的 同义词:ill-tempered, badtempered But right now such objections seem churlish .但是现在这种投票否决似乎是无礼的。
n. 苹果酒；苹果汁 同义词:cyder, apple juice He is tapping the cask of cider .苹果酒是用苹果酿造的。
n. 肚带；紧握；有把握的事情 vt. 紧握住；系肚带 同义词:purchase, grip He cinched the belt of his knapsack around his shoulders.他把背包带紧紧地拴在肩膀上。
n. 煤渣；灰烬 vt. 用煤渣等铺 vi. 用煤渣等铺路面 同义词:ash, ember But he took off his sweater and they began jogging slowly around cinder track .不过，他还是脱了厚毛衣，两人开始沿煤渣跑道慢慢地晃着跑起来。
n. 密码；暗号；零 vi. 使用密码；计算；做算术 vt. 计算；做算术；将…译成密码 同义词:password, signal, nothing, figure, cast, cast, figure He ciphered the telegram in a few minutes.他只用了几分钟就把电报译成密码。
adj. 迂曲的；绕行的；迂回线路的 Many alien plants have become introduced by highly circuitous routes .许多外来植物是通过极其迂回曲折的道路引进的。
n. 婉转曲折的说法，累赘的陈述；遁辞 同义词:creephole This sort of ritual circumlocution is common to many parts of mathematics .这种繁冗的遁辞常见于数学的许多部分分式中。

adj. 细心的，周到的；慎重的 同义词:measured, scrupulous Firms that had been willing and ( despite the crunch ) able to borrow for investment now seem more circumspect .过去愿意并且能够借钱用于投资（尽管有信贷紧缩）的企业如今也变得更加慎重了。
vt. 包围；陷害；绕行 同义词:case, invest, frame to circumvent the lake围绕该湖
n. 水箱；水池；贮水器 同义词:basin, radiator grille A cistern receives rain water .蓄水池里装着雨水。
adj. 民用的；百姓的，平民的 n. 平民，百姓 同义词:many-headed, populace, common man Incidentally , that story about the big convoy from San Francisco is civilian morale .顺便提一句，关于从旧金山开来庞大护船队的传说是安抚民心的空话。
n. 礼貌；礼仪；端庄 同义词:ceremony, protocol Mr. Slope 's civility had been more than ordinarily greasy .斯洛普先生的礼仪比平日更为谄媚。
n. 千里眼；异常的洞察力 CLAIMS of clairvoyance , particularly when they come from economists , deserve a sceptical reception .有洞察力的主张，尤其是当其来自经济学家时，应被批判性的接受。
vi. 捞蛤 n. 蛤；沉默寡言的人；钳子 同义词:tong, few words How can a clam cram in a clean cream can ?一个蛤蜊怎么能够填满一个干净的奶酪罐子呢？
adj. 湿粘的；湿冷的（形容词比较级clammier，形容词最高级clammiest，名词clamminess，副词clammily） My clothes felt wet clammy .我的衣服摸起来又湿又粘。
adj. 吵闹的；大声要求的 同义词:tumultuous, rattly A foolish woman clamorous : she is simple, and knoweth nothing .愚昧的妇人喧囔。他是愚蒙，一无所知。
vt. 吵闹；大声地要求 vi. 叫喊；大声地要求 n. 喧闹 同义词:make a noise, bawl out, yelp, rumpus, whoop-up The people were clamouring for peace.人民大声疾呼要求和平.

n. 压制；取缔；严禁 同义词:hold-down, supression A savage clampdown on the US consumer might have thrown the world into recession .如果对美国消费者进行野蛮打压，世界恐怕早已陷入衰退。

adj. 秘密的，私下的；偷偷摸摸的 同义词:secret, private, underground, chamber, inside The THG episode fuels speculation that a network of clandestine laboratories exists that develops and produces illegal steroids .THG事件也不禁令人揣测，非法从事类固醇开发与制造的地下实验室网络，并非空穴来风。
n. 过失；荒唐的错误 同义词:error, mistake, sin, blame, guilt To error is human , and even the most efficient employee will eventually drop a clanger .是人就会犯错，即使最能干的雇员最终也总会干傻事。
adj. 氏族的；党派的；排他的 同义词:political, septal Sailor : [ to Lula ] The artefact your nous entireness is Gods clannish mystery .塞勒：[对罗拉]你脑袋里面想的是上帝自己的秘密。
n. 拍手者；铃舌；响板；唠唠叨叨的嘴巴 同义词:castanet, soundboard With time elapsing , the flaps collapse on the clapper 's lap .随着时间流逝，副翼在拍手者的膝盖上堆叠起来。
n. 澄清，说明；净化 同义词:explanation, notes, purification, legend, illustration Can you clarify this long sentence?你能把这个长句子解释清楚吗?
n. 清楚，明晰；透明 同义词:transparency, perspicuousness Feeling both guilty and loving , she expresses her deepest feelings with grace and clarity .她既内疚又充满爱意。她充满优雅，明晰地表达着她最深挚的情感。
n. 冲突，不协调；碰撞声，铿锵声 vi. 冲突，抵触；砰地相碰撞，发出铿锵声 vt. 使碰撞作声 同义词:interference, conflict, war, collision, warfare, tang, collide with The dustbins clashed as the men emptied them.人们倒垃圾桶时把垃圾桶弄得当当乱响。
n. 分类；类别，等级 同义词:category, degree, grade, rate, rank The new approach could help make such classification routine .这种新方法可促进此种归类方式的普及。
vt. 分类；分等 同义词:categorize, sort through He says the administration decision to re- classify those documents is symptomatic of a larger , growing problem .他说将档案重新分类处理的行政决定是问题更严重，不断扩大的一种前兆。
n. [心理] 幽闭恐怖症 Tourists often suffered from heat exhaustion , shortness of breath , panic attacks , and claustrophobia , spokesman Darren Boch said .发言人DarrenBoch说，游客们经常要忍受轻度中暑、呼吸短促、袭击恐惧以及幽闭恐惧症。
n. 劈开，分裂；[晶体] 解理；[胚] 卵裂 同义词:fragmentation, disruption He had made a cleavage in his life .他已在自己的生活里劈出了一条鸿沟。
vi. 裂开；披荆斩棘地前进；粘住；坚持 vt. 砍开；使分开；打通 同义词:gap, stay, separate, unhinge He cleaved a block of wood in two.他把一块木头劈成两半。
n. 切肉刀；[五金] 劈刀 同义词:carver, butcher knife See the image become cleaver .看到图片变得清晰。

adj. 分裂的；劈开的 n. 裂缝；龟裂 v. 劈开；分开（cleave的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:divided, split, checking, crack, split, separated, clave A cleft graft , for example , requires a scion with several buds on it .比如，其中一种是裂接，它要求接穗上有几个芽。
n. 仁慈；温和；宽厚 同义词:humanity, mercy, kindness, benevolence The condemned man petitioned me governor clemency .被判刑的人上书州长请求慈悲。
adj. 温和的；仁慈的 同义词:pacific, gentle, moderate, soft, mild Clement : Inclined to be lenient or merciful .仁慈的：倾向于宽厚或仁慈的。
vt. 紧握；确定；把…敲弯 vi. 握紧；钉牢 n. 紧抓；敲环脚 同义词:confirm, identify, hammer on, nail up He clenched his fists in anger.他气得紧紧握着拳头。
n. 客户；诉讼委托人 同义词:correspondent, client server software This isn't the type of clientele any restaurant wants to attract .对于任何一个餐厅，这不是他们想招揽的顾客。
n. 更年期；转折点，危机期 adj. 更年期的；重要时期的 同义词:menopause, turning point, involutional, menopausal Can the obese persons with Climacteric syndrome take this product ?更年期综合症引起的肥胖可否用该产品减肥？
v. 扭住；敲弯 n. 拥吻；钉牢 to clinch the nails to a board在木板上钉钉子并敲弯钉脚
n. 派系；阀；私党；小圈子 vi. 结党 同义词:valve, ingroup To disgrace Mr Putin and ultimately force his clique from power .是为了让普京蒙羞然后最终推动他的人马上台掌权。
n. 回廊；修道院；修道院生活；隐居地 vt. 使与尘世隔绝；用回廊环绕 同义词:monastery, monkery He has cloistered himself in a monastery for more than thirty years.他隐居于修道院中已三十余年。
adj. 隐居的，与世隔绝的 v. 使与尘世隔绝；在…设回廊（cloister的过去分词） 同义词:reclusive, enclosed The courtyard cloistered .庭院四周围以回廊。
n. 关闭；终止，结束 vt. 使终止 同义词:completion, finish, termination, drop, kill To produce another model required closure of the line and expensive retooling .若想更换产品型号则需要关闭生产线并进行昂贵的重组。
vi. 凝结 n. [生理] 凝块 vt. 使凝结成块 同义词:concrete, to freeze, gob, grume, clump The blood around the wound clotted quickly.伤口周围的血很快凝结起来。
n. （突然的）大暴雨；突然涌来的事物 The bus was delayed by a cloudburst .由于大暴雨，公共汽车来迟了。
vt. 吃腻 vi. 吃得太饱 She cloyed her appetite with rich food.她吃繢了美食。
adj. 厌烦的；倒胃口的；因过量而厌烦的 同义词:tired, harassed She cloyed her appetite with rich food.她吃繢了美食。
adj. 笨拙的 同义词:awkward, inept But it was a clumsy one.但这是一个笨拙的内阁。
n. 群；簇；丛；串 vi. 群聚；丛生 vt. 使聚集；聚集在某人的周围 同义词:gang, bunch, qun, bush, converge The students clustered their tents together.学生们把帐篷集中搭在一起。
n. [建][化工] 促凝剂；凝血剂；凝结剂 同义词:setting accelerator, agglomerating agent Increased coagulant dosage results in greater sludge yield for ultimate disposal .增加凝聚剂用量会增大最后处理的污泥量。
vt. 使…凝结 vi. 凝结 同义词:congeal, concrete, to freeze An enzyme that occurs in gastric juice causes milk to coagulate .胃液中的一种酶能使乳类凝结。
vi. 合并；结合；联合 vt. 使…联合；使…合并 同义词:bond, couple, combine, become one, band, unite The edges of the cut coalesced.伤口愈合了。
n. 联合；结合，合并 同义词:combination, alliance, combined with, unity, union, association, marriage The coalition could break down before the five years expire .此次联合可能在五年期限结束之前就破裂。
vt. 哄；哄诱；慢慢将…弄好 vi. 哄骗；劝诱 同义词:trick, rope into He coaxed his daughter to take her medicine.他哄着女儿吃药。
n. 补鞋匠；工匠；冷饮料；脆皮水果馅饼 同义词:craftsman, workman Joan served him iced tea and cherry cobbler and took him to the back porch swing .琼（女主人）把他带到后面走廊的秋千，并用冰红茶和樱桃酥饼招待他。
n. 遗嘱的附录 And in that codicil he acknowledges me .在那笔附录里，他承认了我。
vt. 强制，迫使 同义词:pressure, enforce He was coerced into signing the contract.他被迫签了合同。
n. 强制；强迫；高压政治；威压 同义词:enforcement, constraint, compulsion Force, violence and psychological coercion have convinced them to accept it .权势、暴力与心理胁迫使他们接受了自己的命运。
n. 围堰；保险箱；金库；资金 vt. 把…放进箱柜；用平顶镶板装饰 同义词:treasury, chest, fund, capital, peter I 'd like a cup of coffer with sugar and cream , please .请给我一杯加糖和奶油的咖啡。
n. 中肯；力量；肯切 同义词:strength, force, might, muscle, power having no cogency or legal force .没有力量或法律效力。
adj. 强有力的；使人信服的 同义词:powerful, forceful Some online comment cogent and literate and a lot is not .有些网络评论令人信服、文采横溢，但很多都不是这么回事儿。
vt. 仔细考虑；谋划 vi. 思考；考虑 同义词:mull over, reflect on, allow, think of, think about He is cogitating upon some means of revenge.他正在策划着报复的手段。
n. 深思；思考 同义词:meditation, soul-searching After much cogitation I have decided to resign .我经过再三考虑后决定辞职。
adj. [地质] 同源的；同类的 n. 同族；同根词 同义词:congenetic, isogenous, consanguinity, homologous series Mathematics and astronomy are cognate sciences .数学和天文学是互相关联的科学。
n. 姓氏；绰号 同义词:family name, sobriquet
adj. 连贯的，一致的；明了的；清晰的；凝聚性的；互相偶合的；粘在一起的 同义词:united, consistent, connected, corresponding, matching The government lacks a coherent economic policy .政府缺乏协调的经济政策。
n. 凝聚；结合；[力] 内聚力 同义词:combination, coupling, wedding, bond, join There was no cohesion and there was no one person in charge .没有任何凝聚力，也没有任何一个人来主管。
adj. 有结合力的；紧密结合的；有粘着力的 同义词:combinative Cohesive means that a certain class performs a set of closely related actions .聚合意思着一个普通的类执行一系列的密切相关的动作。
vi. 一致，符合；同时发生 同义词:cotton, square, identify, accord The centres of concentric circles coincide.同心圆的圆心是一个。

n. 巧合；一致；同时发生 同义词:accordance, unity, agreement, identity, keeping No, insisted Mr Johnson : it had been under surveillance for months , and the timing was merely a coincidence .约翰逊先生坚持称，该团体已经被监督了几个月了，就时机而言仅仅是个巧合。
n. 滤器，滤锅 同义词:cullender When you've boiled the cabbage , strain off the water through a colander .当你把卷心菜煮开后，用漏勺把水滤掉。
n. 抽象拚贴画（用报纸、布、压平的花等碎片拼合而成的） vt. 把…创作成拼贴画，拼贴 Many collage artists avoid the issue of copyright by using only source material that is in the public domain .美国许多大学教育艺术家只使用公有领域的原始资料以避免发生著作权侵权问题。
vt. 核对，校对；校勘 同义词:check against, check through She collated the final proof with the original manuscript.她将清样与原稿核对。

adj. 并行的；旁系的；附属的 n. 抵押品；[法] 担保品；旁系亲属 同义词:subsidiary, paralleled, security, guarantee Farmers often use cows and other livestock as collateral for government loans and subsidies .农民经常用奶牛或其他家畜作为政府贷款或补助的抵押品。

n. 校对；斋日的点心；牧师职务 同义词:lookthrough, proofreading Third , analyzing and researching the controversy of collation people proposed nowadays , from the perspective of dialectical .第三、从辩证的角度分析和考证今人对中华书局点校本《梁书》提出的校勘争议。
vi. 碰撞；抵触，冲突 vt. 使碰撞；使相撞 同义词:hit, impact on, crash His bicycle collided with a lorry.他的自行车撞在一辆卡车上。
n. （意见，看法）的抵触，冲突 同义词:interference, conflict, war, crash, impact The other process of droplet growth is by collision and coalescence .云滴增长的另一个过程是各云滴间的碰撞和并合。
n. 讨论会；专题座谈会 同义词:forum, consultation, seminar, symposium a colloquium at which the results of ( scientific ) research are reported .在会议上报告（科学）调查结果的讨论会。
vi. 勾结；串通；共谋 同义词:be in bed with, connive In certain industries , companies may actively collude to fix prices .在某些产业，这样的公司可能主动共谋统一订价。

n. 勾结；共谋 同义词:conspiracy, complicity Hamas proudly took the "credit" as a means of exposing , it said , the collusion between the Palestinian Authority and the occupying forces of Israel .哈马斯骄傲地宣称对两起事件负责，称其是在揭示巴勒斯坦当局与以色列占领部队间的相互勾结。

adj. 巨大的；异常的，非常的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro, intense Thanks to colossal improvements in sanitation and medicine , that figure is now 75 for men and 80 for women .由于人类在卫生学和医药学的巨大进步，现在男性的寿命是75岁，女性80岁。
n. 巨像；巨人；巨大的东西 同义词:giant, monster Now while the Colossus is very dangerous against ground targets , it's much more vulnerable to an air counterattack.到现在“巨神像”是个非常危险的高地攻击目标，更加容易受到空中打击。
n. 小马；生手 vt. 以笞绳鞭打 同义词:naggy, staig One day , colt carried a bag of wheat to the mill .一天，老马让小马驮着半口袋麦子到磨坊去磨面。
adj. 小马似的；轻佻的；不受拘束的，放浪不拘的 同义词:skittish, frivolous Jo , fifteen , was tall, thin, coltish , and gloried in an unconcealed scorn of polite conventions .乔，十五岁，是个瘦高个活泼的姑娘，她毫不掩饰对斯文习俗的蔑视，并以此自豪。
n. [医] 昏迷；[天] 彗形像差 同义词:stupor, exanimation The other new tool was the JFK Coma Recovery Scale .另外一项新的手段是JFK昏迷恢复量表。
adj. 昏迷的；昏睡状态的；麻木的；怠惰的 同义词:stupid, asleep, lazy The corporate finance profession is not dead , but semi- comatose .企业融资行业并没有消亡，而是处于半昏迷状态。

adj. 易燃的；易激动的；燃烧性的 n. 可燃物；易燃物 同义词:emotional, flammable, tinderbox, burnable Yet something momentous has happened in a pivotal country in the most combustible part of the world .然而在一个世界上最热点地区的关键国家，至关重要的事情已经发生了。
n. 燃烧，氧化；骚动 同义词:burning, inflammation The most common type of reaction studied calorimetrically is combustion .量热研究中最常见的反应类型是燃烧反应。
adj. 清秀的，标致的 I hope my young friend will like such a comely sample of his own blood.俺盼着咱们那位年轻的朋友喜欢你这么一位和他一脉相传的漂亮姑娘才好。
n. 戒律；法令 同义词:act, ordinance Bill Gates ran the word commandment through a database search .比尔·盖茨从数据库中检索“诫命”一词。
vt. 开始；着手 vi. 使……开始；使……得学位 同义词:institute, initiate, launch on, enter upon, put in hand The performances will commence in a minute.演出马上就开始。
n. 开始，发端；毕业典礼 同义词:beginning, threshold, opening, conception, fresh Hello , Cathy . Going to commencement ?嗨。凯茜。去参加毕业典礼吗?。
vt. 推荐；称赞；把…委托 vi. 称赞；表扬 同义词:recommend, put in a good word, speak well of, pay a tribute to I should like to commend this dictionary to you.我愿向你推荐这部词典。
adj. 值得赞美的；很好的；可推荐的 同义词:recommendable, all-right I should like to commend this dictionary to you.我愿向你推荐这部词典。
adj. 相称的；同量的；同样大小的 同义词:matching, worthy, fitting The amino acid is depleted commensurate with the development of the growing embryo .氨基酸的消耗是同生长的胚的发育相适应的。
vt. 同情，怜悯 vi. 同情，怜悯；吊慰 同义词:feel for, have pity on, sympathize, feel for They commiserated the misfortune of their teacher.他们同情老师的不幸。
n. 承诺，保证；委托；承担义务；献身 同义词:assurance, certification, guarantee, security, compliance Background and Commitment .背景与承诺。
adj. 宽敞的；方便的 同义词:convenient, spacious Although the house was small it commodious .房子虽小，住起来倒还方便。
n. 商品，货物；日用品 同义词:cargo, merchandise Time is the most precious commodity .时间是最宝贵的商品。
n. 骚动；暴乱 同义词:combustion, turmoil commotion arose in the aisle behind them among police guards and late comers.他们后面的走廊里，在警卫和来迟的观众间掀起一阵骚动。
n. 合同，契约；小粉盒 adj. 紧凑的，紧密的；简洁的 vt. 使简洁；使紧密结合 同义词:stipulation, covenant, close, brief The snow on the pavement was compacted and has turned to ice.人行便道上的雪被踩实并结成了冰。
n. 同情；怜悯 同义词:feeling, sympathy, pity, mercy The only appropriate response is compassion .唯一正确的回应是同情。
adj. 慈悲的；富于同情心的 vt. 同情；怜悯 同义词:tender-hearted, merciful, feel for, have pity on The compassionate old man and his child wept with her .富有同情心的老人和孩子跟着她一齐哭了起来。
n. [计] 兼容性 His big idea was " incentive compatibility ".赫维茨的伟大观点被称为“激励相容”。
adj. 兼容的；能共处的；可并立的 We return again to the search for a compatible element .我们回过头来再去寻找相容的元素。
vt. 强迫，迫使；强使发生 同义词:pressure, force, enforce They were often compelled to work eleven or twelve hours a day.他们常常被迫每天工作十一二个小时。
n. 姓名；称呼 同义词:name, appellation
adj. 引人注目的；强制的；激发兴趣的 v. 强迫；以强力获得（compel的ing形式） 同义词:attractive, dramatic, coercing They were often compelled to work eleven or twelve hours a day.他们常常被迫每天工作十一二个小时。
adj. 简明的，摘要的；简练的 同义词:concise, succinct How is it that the Greeks made their language the most graceful and compendious mode of expression ever known among men ?希腊人怎样使世人认为他们的语言是一种幽雅而简练的表达方式呢？
n. 纲要；概略 同义词:schemata, rundown The OECD compendium also shows that graduate jobs fared better during the global recession .报告还指出，全球经济衰退期间，大学毕业生的工作待遇相对较好一些。
vi. 补偿，赔偿；抵消 vt. 补偿，赔偿；付报酬 同义词:make good, to make up for, make good, to make up for The factory will compensate their workers if they are hurt at work.工人在工作中受伤，工厂得给予受伤补助。
vt. 当…的主持人 n. 主持人 同义词:host, moderators Compere : Do you like your job ?主持人：您喜欢您的工作吗？
vt. 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编 同义词:to edit, copy-edit It often takes five or six years of hard work to compile a good dictionary.编一部好的词典常常需要苦干五六年。
n. 自满；满足；自鸣得意 同义词:satisfaction, content, fill The answer seems to be an abundance of cheap money , which lured investors complacency .答案似乎是丰盈的低息贷款让投资者于诱惑下变得扬扬自得。
adj. 自满的；得意的；满足的 同义词:proud, fulfilled For the third argument —that protectionism will not get very far — is complacent .对于第三个论据，保护主义不会进行得太深入，这是自以为是的。

n. 殷勤；彬彬有礼；柔顺 同义词:hospitality, refined and courteous urbane He is indeed -- but considering the inducement, my dear Miss Eliza , we cannot wonder at his complaisance ;他真的太客气了──可是，亲爱的伊丽莎小姐，看他这样求你，你总还会怪他多礼吧。

adj. 彬彬有礼的；顺从的；殷勤的 同义词:urbane, obedient Under the complaisant eye of Mr Ahmadinejad , a former guardsman , it has won a big , even dominant , place in the economy .内贾德也曾是一个卫兵，在他听之任之的眼皮底下，卫队占领了大片重要的经济领域。
n. 肤色；面色；情况；局面 vt. 使增添色彩 同义词:situation, circumstance, thing, color, case This is the complexion of the " big choice " that Mr Brown and Mr Cameron are touting .这便是布朗和卡梅伦兜售的“大抉择”的情况。
n. 顺从，服从；承诺 同义词:commitment, obedience Many are also beefing up back-office operations , such as risk management and compliance .很多对冲基金还加强后台运作，例如风险管理和法规遵从。
adj. 顺从的；服从的；应允的 同义词:followed, subject, obedient, submissive The government , compliant as ever, give in to their demand .政府同往常一样唯唯诺诺，对他们的要求作出让步。
n. 恭维；称赞；问候；致意；道贺 vt. 恭维；称赞 同义词:praise, regard, speak well of, pay a tribute to Her guests complimented her on her cooking.客人们对她的烹饪技艺大加赞扬。
adj. 赠送的；称赞的；问候的 同义词:laudatory The resultant negative transparency is essentially complimentary to the original scene in both tone and color .最后得到的负性透明片，在色调和颜色方面均和原景物成互补关系。
vi. 遵守；顺从，遵从；答应 同义词:engage, abide by/obey/observe Visitors to the mine must comply with the rules.到矿上参观的人必须遵守规章。
vt. 行为；举动 vi. 相称；适合；一致 同义词:gear, cotton, suit, balance, identify She comported herself with dignity.她举止庄重。

n. 举止，态度；动作 同义词:behavior, bearing, motion, carriage Men pay the bill usually in China . We think it is a polite comportment . The man is a gentleman . It 's no rude .在中国，经常是男人付账单。我们觉得这是有礼貌的举动。男人是一个绅士。付账单的行为并不粗鲁。
n. 复合材料；合成物；菊科 adj. 复合的；合成的；菊科的 vt. 使合成；使混合 同义词:synthetic, complex material, synthetic, mulriple, babelize English is a composite of many languages .英语是多种语言混合而成的。
n. 镇静；沉着 同义词:sedation, calmness He sensed she was making an effort to regain composure .他感觉到她是在极力使自己镇静下来。
adj. 综合的；广泛的；有理解力的 n. 综合学校；专业综合测验 同义词:extensive, integrated, synthetic, widespread, general We have a rather comprehensive subway system here .我们这儿有相当广泛的地铁系统。
vi. 受压缩小 vt. 压缩，压紧；精简 同义词:impact, pack Wood cuttings and sawdust can be compressed into boards.木头的碎渣和锯末可以压成木板。
n. 压缩机；压缩物；收缩肌；[医] 压迫器 同义词:compression pump, constriction Install the high pressure relief valve in the compressor manifold fitting .在压缩机歧管配件里安装高压释放阀。
vt. 妥协；危害 vi. 妥协；让步 n. 妥协，和解；折衷 同义词:harm, meet someone halfway, meet someone halfway, come to terms with, accommodation, reconciliation He refused to compromise his principles.他对他的原则寸步不让。
n. 强制；强迫；强制力 同义词:enforcement, constraint, coercion Gambling is a compulsion with him .赌博对他来说是一种冲动。

adj. 强制的；强迫的 同义词:forced, mandatory The money that a repeal saves could help pay for monitoring compulsive molesters more intrusively— through ankle bracelets and the like .废除法律节省下来的钱可以用来帮助更强制性地监测性骚扰成瘾者，如通过脚环等等。
adj. 义务的；必修的；被强制的 n. （花样滑冰、竞技体操等的）规定动作 同义词:required, obligatory, required routine Synopsis : At present , our country implements nine-year compulsory education .内容提要：目前，我国实行九年义务教育。
n. 悔恨，后悔；内疚 同义词:the worm of conscience, repentance I might feel a trifle of compunction if I had to deal with a President of the United States .要是我不得不和一位美国总统打交道的话，我可能会感到有点内疚。
n. 估计，计算 同义词:estimation, calculation, appraisal, valuation, count Our goal is to create a way of expressing this computation as a series of function calls .我们的目标是找到一个方法，将这个计算展开为一系列函数调用。
vt. 计算；估算；用计算机计算 vi. 计算；估算；推断 n. 计算；估计；推断 同义词:cast, figure, figure, cast, calculation, estimation, appraisal, valuation, count Who can compute the distance of the moon from the earth?谁能计算出月球与地球的距离?

n. 反对票；反对论 vt. 精读；默记 adv. 反面地 adj. 欺诈的 prep. 以… 同义词:non, peruse, learn by heart, reversely, deceptive, imposturous I'll write a letter to the manager and see if I can con him into okaying it.我将给经理写封信，看看是否能说服他同意这件事。

vt. 连结；使连锁 adj. 连结的；连锁的 同义词:link, conjunctional, syndetic Connect building is the website by means of that helps you what all sorts of means obtain other website is concatenate .连结建立就是帮你的网站藉由各种方式获得别的网站的连结。
n. 串联，连结 同义词:tandem connection, connection in series it was cause by an improbable concatenation of circumstances .这是由奇异的事件的连接造成的。
adj. 凹的，凹面的 n. 凹面 vt. 使成凹形 同义词:hollow, cuppy Some are flared — that is , thicker at the rim than in the center , like concave lens .有些呈喇叭形──即边缘较中心厚，类似凹透镜。
vt. 承认；退让；给予，容许 vi. 让步 同义词:afford, accept, agree, recognize, extend, meet halfway, give ground This dictionary is generally conceded to be the best in China.这部词典普遍被认为是中国最好的词典。
n. 自负；狂妄；幻想 vt. 幻想 同义词:ego, pretentiousness, have vision of, fantasize The smaller the mind the conceit .越是心胸狭窄的人越是高傲。
adj. 自负的；狂想的；逞能的 同义词:proud, swelled-headed Was he so conceited as not to believe in the wisdom of the masses ?他回如此高傲，竟不相信群众的智慧？
adj. 可能的；想得到的，可想像的 同义词:feasible, possible, potential, desired Indeed it is conceivable that a bank could be recapitalised over a weekend.短期之内实现银行资金结构的调整还是可以想象得到的。
vt. 怀孕；构思；以为；持有 vi. 怀孕；设想；考虑 同义词:design, hold, allow, think of, think about He conceived a new plan very quickly.他很快就想出一个新的计划方案。
n. 协奏曲 Well, it 's a Chinese violin concerto called Butterfly Lovers .这是一首中国的小提琴协奏曲，叫《梁祝》。
n. 让步；特许（权）；承认；退位 同义词:recognition, license It is some concession .这已是一些让步了。
vt. 安抚，安慰；调和；驯服；怀柔；赢得 同义词:comfort, win, purchase, quiet He conciliated his angry daughter with a piece of candy.他用一块糖果来哄他发脾气的女儿。
n. 调解；安抚；说服 同义词:mediation, intermediation He conciliated his angry daughter with a piece of candy.他用一块糖果来哄他发脾气的女儿。
adj. 简明的，简洁的 同义词:brief, compact The physician 's need for objective , concise , and well- organized information on drugs is obvious.医生非常需要有关药物的客观性强，内容精炼，条理分明的情报资料。
n. 简洁，简明 同义词:compactness, sententiousness Concision and delicacy is not an unyielding attitude , but an expression of perseverant quality .简约与精细，并不是一种强硬的态度，而是泰朗坚定品质的表达；
vt. 捏造；混合而制；调合；图谋 同义词:manufacture, trump up to concoct a new dish调配一种新菜
n. 混合；调合；调合物 同义词:mixture, mix Pouring ivory -white milk concoction , Mother smiles to herself.再浇上象牙白的牛奶以后，母亲自顾地笑了。
adj. 相伴的；共存的；附随的 n. 伴随物 同义词:accompanied, codependent, accompaniment When patients have a concomitant disease or injury indicating antibiotics , they should be used .当病人同时患有具有抗菌适应症的疾病或损伤时，应该应用抗菌素。
n. 和谐；和睦；一致；协调 同义词:accordance, harmony, unity, peace, agreement, identity to concord every word in the book把书中每个词都编成索引
adj. 和谐的；协调的；一致的；和声的 同义词:harmonious, united, consistent, balanced, corresponding The ultrabasic bodies are generally concordant intrusions , with related feeder dikes.超基性岩一般为具有补给岩墙的整合侵入体。
adj. 并发的；一致的；同时发生的 n. [数] 共点；同时发生的事件 同义词:united, consistent, corresponding, matching, uniform, common point The judge sentenced Mr Gallant concurrent life sentences .法官判处格兰特数次终身监禁，同期执行。
n. 冲击；震荡；脑震荡 同义词:brunt, impingement Other signs of concussion are stomach and head pain , muscle weakness and a loss in sharpness of vision .其他一些脑震荡的症状还包括胃疼，头痛，肌无力，视力衰退。
vt. 谴责；判刑，定罪；声讨 同义词:denounce, deplore Most people condemn war.大多数人都谴责战争。
n. 谴责；定罪；非难的理由；征用 同义词:conviction, denunciation It was a dreadful sight they saw , a fearful condemnation of their rule in Hawaii .他们看到的触目惊心的景象是对他们在夏威夷统治的可怕谴责。
vi. 屈尊；谦逊 同义词:deign She is so proud that she will not condescend to speak to us.她非常骄傲，不肯放下架子同我们说一句话。
n. 谦虚；屈尊；傲慢态度 同义词:arrogance, abasement I say sell out , and I say it has a condescension to it.我说出售，对它而言还是一种屈尊。
vi. 慰问；吊唁；哀悼 同义词:grieve over, mourn over Kate wrote to condole with her friend on the death of her mother.凯特写信慰问友人的丧母之痛。
n. 哀悼；慰问 同义词:sympathy, consolation Please accept my heartfelt condolence .请接受我诚挚的慰问。
vi. 导致；有益，有贡献于 同义词:result in, account, profit His affability conduces to success as a salesman.他的态度和蔼使他成为一个成功的售货员。
adj. 有益的；有助于…的 同义词:beneficial, helpful, useful, advantageous, profitable All this will be conducive to a more sane and less destructive financial world .这一切将有助于构建一个更理性、破坏性更小的金融世界。
n. 糖果，蜜饯；调制；糖膏（剂）；精制工艺品 同义词:sweet, modulation spongy confection made of gelatin and sugar and corn syrup and dusted with powdered sugar .像海绵的糖果，由凝胶、糖和玉米糖浆制成，然后撒上糖粉。
vt. 吐露；委托 vi. 信赖；吐露秘密 同义词:voice, refer, rely, depend, trust, hope I confide absolutely in his honesty.我绝对信任他的忠实可靠。
n. 配置；结构；外形 同义词:allocation, mechanics, framework, profile, texture Cannot open Help for the System Configuration Editor .不能为该系统配置编辑器打开帮助。

adj. 确认的；保兑的；坚定的；惯常的 v. 确证；使坚定（confirm的过去分词）；批准 同义词:committed, frequent, firm, stable, decisive, authorized These tests are but a few of the many that have solidly confirmed the Standard Model .在众多确认标准模型的实验中，以上这些检验还只是一小部份而已。
vt. 没收；充公；查抄 adj. 被没收的 同义词:sequestrate, expropriate, forfeit The policeman confiscated the robber's pistol.警察没收了土匪的手枪。

vt. 面对；遭遇；比较 同义词:front, compare The next big issue confronting the workers is the question of wages.摆在工人面前的第二大问题是工资问题。
n. 对抗；面对；对质 同义词:war, antagonism US naval supremacy counts for little in this confrontation with four pirates in a small boat holding an American hostage .挟持了一个美国人质的四个海盗坐在一艘小船上。美国与其对抗时，无法发挥制海权的优势。

adj. 意气相投的；性格相似的；适意的；一致的 同义词:united, consistent, corresponding, solid, matching It was easy to see , from his beaming face, that he had congenial companions .从他愉快的笑容里不难看出，他已经交上了志趣相投的朋友。
adj. 先天的，天生的；天赋的 同义词:natural, native, born, innate Hemangioma : Congenital Benign tumour made of Blood vessels in the skin .血管瘤：一种新生血管构成的先天性良性皮肤肿瘤。

n. 集会；集合；圣会 同义词:assembly, concentration, convergence, meet, gathering The whole congregation got baptized that day .那天，所有的教众都得到了洗礼。

n. 适合，调和；一致；全等 同义词:accordance, coordination, unity, agreement, harmony, identity Moral construction of higher schools must be emphasized the congruity of theory and practice , knowing and doing.高校思想道德建设要做到理论教育与道德实践、与行的统一。

vi. 共谋；纵容；默许 同义词:conspire, collude Some government officials connive at graft.有些政府官员对贪污受贿视而不见。

adj. 内涵的；隐含的；含蓄的 同义词:implicit, intensional Being an important unit of the language , a word not only has form , but also meaning , especially cultural connotative meaning .词汇作为语言的一个重要单位、不仅具有形式和概念意义，更蕴含文化内涵意义。
n. 血亲，同族；亲密关系 同义词:kinsmen by blood, cognation They too have been deaf to the voice of justice and of consanguinity .然而，他们也同样地把这正义的、血肉之亲的呼吁置若罔闻。

adj. 显著的；显而易见的 同义词:obvious, prominent, marked, noted, outstanding Giving money to charity is thus more akin to conspicuous consumption than it is to blatant benevolence .这样，向慈善机构捐款就更类似于一种挥霍而不是炫耀自己的善行。
n. 阴谋；共谋；阴谋集团 同义词:designing, plot Like most conspiracy stories , " 13 Bankers " contains a kernel of truth .与多数阴谋故事一样，《13位银行家》也蕴含真相。

n. [天] 星座；星群；荟萃；兴奋丛 同义词:zodiac sign, asterism In Constellation rejected a bid for all its operations from EDF, agreeing instead to be bought by a unit of Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway .在九月，美国联合能源公司拒绝了同一公司的出价，且表示愿意被巴菲特伯克希尔哈撒韦公司旗下的一间公司收购。
