n. 厚颜无耻 同义词:brazenness, impudence He was so amazed at their effrontery that he stutters in confusion .他对他们的粗暴无礼感到非常吃惊，竟然结结巴巴，不知所措。
n. 灿烂；光辉 同义词:flame, brilliance His spiritual body had the effulgence of many suns , and demigods and sages surrounded Him and sang His praises .他灵性躯体的光璨好比许多太阳，而半神人和圣哲们则围着他唱颂他的荣耀。
adj. 光辉灿烂的 In fact , one has endless thoughts for the most effulgent sunbeam that shines after the storm .实际上，一有在风暴以后发光的最辉煌的光束的不尽的想法。
adj. 流出的；感情横溢的 同义词:excurrent, exudative THEY are not the world 's most effusive people at the best of times .即使在情况最好的时候，他们也绝不会是这个世界上感情表露最多的人。
adj. 平等主义的 n. 平等主义；平等主义者 同义词:equalitarianism, leveler Ours is an egalitarian company and it is our policy for all flights to be in economy .我们是一家推崇平等主义的公司，公司政策规定所有员工出差都乘坐经济舱。

adj. [心理] 自我中心的；利己主义的 n. 利己主义者 同义词:selfish, egoistic, individualist, egoist Egocentric speech is a very important phenomenon in childrens development of speech and thinking .自我中心言语是儿童言语和思维发展过程中的一个重要现象。
adj. 惊人的；过分的；恶名昭彰的 同义词:tremendous, excessive, ultra, tall, incredible Shares of the most egregious mortgage lenders have plunged and dozens have gone bust .最惊人的抵押贷款贷方股票已经下降，还有数十家已经破产。
n. 外出；出口 vi. 外出 vt. 使外出 同义词:exit, going out, stay away, go outside Forth from the hall egressed the bands.乐队从大厅里走了出来。
vt. 突然说出；射出 vi. 射精；射出液体 n. 一次射出的精液 同义词:jet, blurt to ejaculate one's thanks to someone激动地对某人千恩万谢

n. [生理] 射精；突然说出 同义词:gonobolia Interestingly , the genetically modified mice still showed the classic male - mating repertoire — mounting , penetration and ejaculation .有趣的是，基因改变的老鼠依然表现出典型的雄性求偶表演——骑上、插入、射精。
vt. 喷射；驱逐，逐出 同义词:to spray, spray on The chimney ejects smoke.烟囱排出烟来。
adj. 精心制作的；详尽的；煞费苦心的 vt. 精心制作；详细阐述；从简单成分合成（复杂有机物） vi. 详细描述；变复杂 同义词:detailed, full, tailor-make, thicken to elaborate his plans for a new engine精心设计一种新机器
n. 苦心经营，精巧；详细阐述 同义词:ingenuity Her style tends to elaboration .她的文风倾向于雕琢。
vi. 消逝；时间过去 n. 流逝；时间的过去 同义词:ebb away, passing, effluxion Fifteen minutes elapsed before the performance began.过了15分钟演出才开始。

adj. 有弹性的；灵活的；易伸缩的 n. 松紧带；橡皮圈 同义词:flexible, stretchy, band, rubberband A rubber ball attached to a paddle by an elastic string loses energy as it flies away from the paddle .一根弹性绳把一只皮球拴在一块叶片上当球飞离叶片时，球失去能量。
n. 弹性；弹力；灵活性 同义词:flexibility, give elasticity of his heart had been crushed out of him by early sorrows .过去的一件件伤心事已经弄得他意志消沉。
adj. 兴高采烈的；得意洋洋的 v. 使兴奋（elate的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:high-blown, rapturous news to elate the hearer使听众欢欣鼓舞的消息
n. 兴高采烈，得意洋洋 同义词:exaltation, rapture " Elation , " said she .“洋洋得意。”她说。
n. 选民；选区 同义词:constituent, precinct Mr Zapatero knows , too , that a successful terrorist attack can provoke a sharp change of mood in the electorate .萨帕特罗也深有体会，一次成功的恐怖袭击能够导致选民心情的急剧变化。
n. 挽歌，哀歌 同义词:keen, threnode There are playing beautiful elegy .那里正在演奏华丽的挽歌。
adj. 似象的；巨大的；粗笨的，笨拙的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro His mind is sharp , his memory elephantine , and he bristles with energy and vigour .梅莱斯头脑敏锐，记忆超群，精力充沛，活力四射。
vt. 抽出，引出；引起 同义词:premise, attract, produce, cause, operate to elicit the truth推导出真理(或：探得真情)
vt. 省略；取消；删去；不予考虑删节 同义词:understand, recall The experiment shows that the method is simple and rapid and elide complex handwork reduction .实验结果表明了该方法简单易行，省去了复杂的手工试凑约简。

adj. 合格的，合适的；符合条件的；有资格当选的 n. 合格者；适任者；有资格者 同义词:qualified, applicable, becoming, shaped, likely, acceptee For instance , to obtain additional federal assistance for unemployment insurance , states must make more workers eligible for benefits , in particular part-time workers .比如为了获得联邦额外的失业保险救助，州政府必须让更多工人——特别是兼职工人——获得更多的救济金。
vt. 消除；排除 同义词:avoid, exclude to eliminate hunger消灭饥饿现象
n. 精英；精华；中坚分子 同义词:essence, flower, regular, prime, distillation But its greedy elite will still try to manipulate the scheme .不过，该国贪婪的精英们仍将试图操控这一计划。
n. 精英主义；杰出人物统治论 Those now facing a further squeeze say the elitism has already gone too far .那些面临着更加拮据的状况的人认为精英主义已经走得太远了。
n. 不老长寿药；万能药；炼金药 同义词:panacea, nostrum If you will have your Elixir for Sun and Moon do both so .如果你将为太阳和月亮有你的练金药液这麽做两者。
n. [数] 椭圆形，[数] 椭圆 同义词:elliptical shape, elipse Duplicate the " hole " ellipse .重复的“洞”椭圆。
n. 省略；省略符号；脱漏 同义词:omis, apostrophe The application of the theory of ellipsis to ad texts is both a new attempt and a challenging job.省略是古老而未决的难题，把省略理论运用于广告语篇分析这是一种新的尝试，也十分富有挑战性。
n. [林] 榆树；榆木 adj. 榆树的；榆木的 同义词:elmwood The farmhouse is dignified by the great elm around it.这家农舍由于周围的大榆树而增光不少。
n. 朗诵法；演说法；雄辩术 同义词:eloquence With every advantage of lungs and elocution , the effect is singularly vapid .然而，扯着嗓子、扬顿挫地朗诵，其结果却是令听者兴味索然。
vt. 拉长；使延长；使伸长 vi. 拉长；延长；伸长 adj. 伸长的；延长的 同义词:pad out, outstretch, pad out, draw oneselg up, prolonged, stretched-out That painting doesn't look like him.The face is too elongated.那幅画不像他，脸太长了。
n. 伸长；伸长率；延伸率；延长 同义词:extension, stretching Mercury reaches its greatest elongation , 22 degrees to the east of the Sun , on May 14 .水星在五月14日会到达它最大的距角--位于太阳以东22度。
vi. 私奔；潜逃 同义词:absquatulate, abscond She eloped with her lover last week.她和她的情人上星期私奔了。
n. 口才；雄辩；雄辩术；修辞 同义词:speechcraft, silver tongue He thinks he can deceive the semi - learned by his eloquence .他想他能够用他的雄辨来欺骗半通者。

adj. 意味深长的；雄辩的，有口才的；有说服力的；动人的 同义词:meaningful, affecting, significant, moving, speaking It is a succinct and eloquent defense of the basic philosophical principles of liberalism .它还用简明、流畅的笔触阐述了自由主义的基本哲学观点。
vt. 阐明；说明 同义词:say, clarify It is much more difficult , though , to elucidate why one succeeds .但说清楚一段婚姻为什么能成功却要困难得多。
vt. 逃避，躲避 同义词:escape, avoid, get out of to elude capture逃避逮捕
adj. 难懂的；易忘的；逃避的；难捉摸的 同义词:complicated, abstruse Excessive worrying about an elusive public image was the order of the day .过分为一个朝生暮死的公众形象担心就是今天的风尚。
vt. 使消瘦；使衰弱；使贫瘠 vi. 消瘦下去 同义词:debilitate, devitalize A long illness had emaciated the invalid.久病使这病人消瘦了。
adj. 瘦弱的；憔悴的 v. 憔悴；消瘦下去（emaciate的过去分词） 同义词:weedy, scraggy A long illness had emaciated the invalid.久病使这病人消瘦了。
vt. 解放；释放 同义词:deliver, manumit to emancipate serfs from bondage把农奴从奴役中解放出来
n. 解放；释放 同义词:liberation, release, enfranchisement He dedicated his life to the emancipation of all mankind .他献身于全人类的解放。
n. 路堤；堤防 同义词:dike Her body falls down an embankment .她的尸体向下落在了下面的堤坝上。
vt. 禁止出入港口；禁止或限制贸易；征用或扣押 n. 禁令；禁止；封港令 同义词:ban, prohibition The government embargoes the enemy ships.该国政府禁止敌船出入其港口。
vt. 栽种；使嵌入，使插入；使深留脑中 同义词:rear, bed to embed tiles (or stones) in cement在水泥中砌进瓷砖(或石块)
vt. 修饰；装饰；润色 vi. 装饰起来；加以润色 同义词:paint, hang, modify The leather cover of the new dictionary was embellished with gold letters.这部新词典皮革封面上装饰着金字。
vt. 盗用；挪用；贪污 同义词:misappropriate The clerk was charged with embezzling $3 million from the bank where he worked.这个职员被指控从他工作的银行盗窃了3百万美元。
n. 侵占；挪用；盗用 同义词:appropriation, malversation The clerk was charged with embezzling $3 million from the bank where he worked.这个职员被指控从他工作的银行盗窃了3百万美元。
vt. 使怨恨；使难受；使受苦 同义词:imbitter Failure has embittered her.失败使她更难过。
n. 象征；徽章；符号 vt. 象征；用符号表示；用纹章装饰 同义词:symbol, significant, mark, indication, indicate, image, figure a medal struck to emblem the victory of the world warⅡ为标志第二次世界大战胜利而铸的奖章
adj. 象征的；可当标志的 同义词:symbolic, indicative Cuisine and dining traditions are emblematic of local culture .烹调技艺和饮食传统是当地文化的象征。
n. 体现；化身；具体化 同义词:picture, shape, pink She was the embodiment of nature and beauty .她是自然与美丽的化身。
vt. 体现，使具体化；具体表达 同义词:objectify, reify to embody a spirit体现一种精神
vt. 使有胆量，使大胆 Jack was emboldened to ask Helen to marry him.杰克鼓起勇气向海伦求婚。
vt. 使凸出；在……上作浮雕图案；装饰 同义词:paint, hang The silver cup is embossed with a design of flowers.这个银杯饰有花卉浮雕图案
vt. 刺绣；装饰；镶边 vi. 绣花；刺绣 同义词:paint, hang a dress embroidered with flowers in silk thread用丝线绣花的连衣裙
n. 刺绣；刺绣品；粉饰 同义词:stitchwork, broidery Paper cuttings used to the used as patterns , especially for embroidery and lacquer works .剪纸曾被用来做花样，尤其是用于刺绣和漆器品。
vt. 使卷入；使混乱 同义词:cloud, confuse to get embroiled in an argument卷入争论
n. [胚] 胚胎；胚芽；初期 adj. 胚胎的；初期的 同义词:morning, prime, earlier, young These substances are slowly depleted as the embryo commences to grow .随着胚开始生长，这些物质也慢慢用尽了。
adj. [胚] 胚胎的；似胚胎的 Its memory is the embryonic form of the widespread now virtual memory .它的存储器是现在广为采用的虚拟存储器的雏形。
vt. 修订；改进 同义词:reedit, to amend to emend on author校订著者的作品
n. 校正；修订；修正 同义词:modification, correction, revision Emendation records like correction are shown in the same way .校改记录如误字改正也以同样的方式显示。
n. 绿宝石，翡翠；[宝] 祖母绿；翠绿色 adj. 翡翠的；翠绿色的 同义词:jade, beryl, virid The pendant was set with pearls surrounding emerald .这耳坠中间是一块翡翠，四周镶着珍珠。
vi. 浮现；摆脱；暴露 同义词:ray, cast off The sun emerges from behind the clouds.太阳从云层里露出。
n. 出现，浮现；发生；露头 同义词:occurrence, appearance, going on, becoming, rise Its emergence from the gruesome era of apartheid is a miracle of reconciliation .她在可怕的种族隔离时代的异军突起是调解的一个奇迹。
n. 紧急情况；突发事件；非常时刻 adj. 紧急的；备用的 同义词:critical situation, bombshell, urgent, instant Listen to the radio or TV for emergency information .听收音机或看电视获取紧急信息。
n. [药] 催吐剂 adj. 催吐的 同义词:vomitory, queasy Drink moderate water as emetic , get medical attention .误食者，饮适量温水，催吐。就医。
vi. 移居；移居外国 vt. 移民 同义词:transmigrate, to immigrate, to migrate to emigrate from Ireland to Australia从爱尔兰移居澳大利亚
n. 显赫；卓越；高处 同义词:splendour, predominance At last they saw him emerge on the top of an eminence within hail .最后，他们看到他在一个山岭上出现了，置身于欢呼之中。

adj. 杰出的；有名的；明显的 同义词:outstanding, excellent, obvious, prominent, brilliant These pages have been filled with eminent thinkers arguing over whether it is time to bring the stimulus to an end .近来，众多显赫的思想家在本报唇枪舌剑，争论现在是否该终止经济刺激政策。
n. 使者；间谍；密使 adj. 间谍的；密使的 同义词:illegal, envoy He is something like an emissary of light , something like a lower sort of apostle .他大大小小也算是一位光明的使者，一位初级传经布道的圣徒。
n. （光、热等的）发射，散发；喷射；发行 同义词:shot, sending, launch, jet, projection Another important source of cadmium emission is the production of artificial phosphate fertilizers .另一个释放镉的主要途径是人工磷酸盐化肥的生产。
vt. 发出，放射；发行；发表 同义词:deliver, ray The sun emits light.太阳放出光。
n. [药] 润肤剂；软化剂 adj. 使柔软的 同义词:softener, softening agent More striking has been the emollient attitude to Britain 's friends in Europe .更引人注目的是来自欧洲友邦的安抚态度。

n. 薪水，报酬 同义词:compensation, payment, consideration, salary, reward The Master said , " It is hard to find a man who has studied for three years without thought of emolument ."孔子说：“读书三年，无意于作官得俸禄，这种人是难得的。”
vi. 夸张地表现感情 The actress emoted for all she was worth.女演员施展浑身解数来表演。
n. 神入；移情作用 Empathy will also require you to get past rationalizations and admit wrongdoing .同样，移情需要人们克服“合理化（辩解）”及承认过错。
adj. 经验主义的，完全根据经验的 Thorndyke, on the other hand, is interested mainly , as the title of his volume indicates , in the beginnings of empirical science .在另一方面，正如在其著作的标题中所指明的，桑代克主要对实验科学的发端感兴趣。
n. 经验主义；经验论 同义词:experimentalism The opposite of empiricism is rationalism .经验论的对立面是唯理论。
vt. 使用，采用；雇用；使忙于，使从事于 n. 使用；雇用 同义词:introduce, make use of, fashion, exercise, usage, utilization, use, hire This factory employs thousands of people.这家工厂雇用数千人。
adj. 九天的；（古人宇宙论的）最高天的；苍天的；由纯净之火或光形成的 同义词:firmamental And Empyreal substance cannot fail .赋有轻清的灵质，不能朽坏。
n. 最高天；苍天 同义词:ether, expanse His thoughts floated then serenely in the empyrean .他的思想这时会平静地飘浮在九天之上。
vt. 仿真；模仿；尽力赶上；同…竞争 n. 仿真；仿效 同义词:simulate, pattern, imitate, simulation, stylization to emulate one's father as a concert violinist作为一名能在音乐会上演奏的小提琴手胜过某人的父亲
n. [计] 仿真；竞争；效法 同义词:simulation, competition, war, struggle The socialist emulation drive in our factory is really lively .咱们厂的社会主义劳动竞赛搞得真热火。
vt. 使…乳化 vi. 乳化 Guar gum can viscosify , stabilize , and emulsify water systems as well as bind moisture to itself .瓜尔胶可增粘、稳定、乳化水体系并能够自身结合水分。
vt. 颁布；制定法律；扮演 同义词:play, portray to enact a bill into law通过议案使之成为法律
n. 制定，颁布；通过；法令 同义词:establishment, act The two most dramatic amendments have little chance of enactment .另外两项修正案最惹人注目但不太可能通过。
adj. 迷恋的；倾心于…的 v. 迷住；使迷恋（enamour的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:captivated Other west Texans are less enamoured of the original view .而其他德州西部对原有看法不再迷恋。
vt. 压缩；将…装入胶囊；将…封进内部 vi. 形成胶囊 同义词:to compress, telescope to encapsulate drugs用胶囊装药
n. [内科] 脑炎 同义词:cephalitis, phrenitis Herbs for the prevention of encephalitis can be found everywhere in this area .预防脑炎的草药在这一地区俯拾皆是。
vt. 使迷惑；施魔法 同义词:bemuddle, bewilder fairytales about witches who enchant handsome princes and beautiful maidens有关对白马王子和漂亮少女施魔法的巫婆的童话
adj. 迷人的；妩媚的 v. 使迷惑（enchant的ing形式） 同义词:killing, taking, engaging, charming, fascinating, confusing, puzzling She has the most enchanting smile .她有着最迷人的微笑。
n. 魅力；魔法；着迷；妖术 同义词:charm, possession, grace, fascination He composed heroic songs and began to write many a tale of enchantment and knightly adventure .他谱写英雄短歌并着手编写不少记叙巫术和骑士历险的故事。
vt. 译成密码 to encipher a message把电报译成密码
n. 附件；围墙；围场 同义词:attachment, attached sheet The enclosure of Norland Common, now carrying on, is a most serious drain .现在正继续进行着的诺兰德公地的圈地，是一个最沉重的负担。
n. 赞美，称赞；赞辞 同义词:praise, laudation Elaborate praise or laudation encomium .精心的赞美或称赞；
vt. 包含；包围，环绕；完成 同义词:involve, contain, carry out, accomplish, achieve They built a moat to encompass the castle.他们在城堡周围修了一条护城河。
vi. 侵占；蚕食；侵蚀 vt. 侵犯 同义词:eat into, to erode, to infringe on, infringe upon She has no right to encroach on my time.她没有权利占用我的时间。

n. 侵入，侵犯；侵蚀 同义词:violence, erosion, intrusion, invasion, penetration He speculated that the rise of agriculture had led to human encroachment on wild forests , giving the chimp version of the bug, P. reichenowi , the chance to find a new host .利文斯通推测，应该是在原始农业兴起、人类祖先慢慢侵入原始森林的时候，生长在黑猩猩身上的亚种疟原虫伺机寻得了新的宿主。
vt. 阻塞；妨害；拖累 同义词:drag, plug up Red tape encumbered all our attempts at action.繁文缛节阻碍了我们为采取行动而作的所有努力。
n. 累赘；妨害物 同义词:obstacle, impedimenta " Conveyance " includes every assignment , lease , mortgage , or encumbrance .“让与”包括各种转让、借、押或留置。

adj. 渊博的；知识广博的 同义词:profound, cyclopaedic Yet the online catalogues of encyclopedic museums are already visited by people from the Arctic Circle to the Horn of Africa .然而，百科全书式博物馆的馆藏在线展示已经被远及北极圈到非洲之角的人们浏览过了。
n. 钟爱；亲爱；亲爱的表示 同义词:dearness Debra Winger had to say goodbye to her children in Terms of Endearment ?黛博拉威格在《亲蜜关系》中得跟她的孩子们说再见的样子?。
adj. 地方性的；风土的 n. 地方病 同义词:provincial, local Fraud may well be rare among bank people, but endemic in its projects .世界银行内部很少有欺诈行为，但在其项目中很普遍。

n. 认可，支持；背书；签注（文件） 同义词:approval, holding, support, authorization, adhesion ICBC will not be the only Chinese bank to think that an American regulatory endorsement could be a step towards bigger things.美国的规范认可为中国银行的发展打开了新的希望，显然不是只有工商银行一家这样想。
vt. 授予，赋予；穿上 同义词:award, grant, give, gift, don to be endued with life被赋予生命
vt. 使衰弱；使失去活力 adj. 衰弱的；无力的 同义词:debilitate, devitalize, weak, marasmic She was enervated from (或 with) dissipation.她由于生活放荡不羁而气虚体亏。
vt. 给予选举权；给予自治权；解放，释放 同义词:deliver, emancipate to enfranchise working men and women赋予男女工人选举权
adj. 迷人的 v. 参加（engage的ing形式）；保证；雇用 同义词:killing, taking, charming, fascinating, glamorous, ensuring, participating She engaged herself to repay her debt within two months.她答应在两个月内偿还她的债务。
vt. 使产生；造成 vi. 产生；引起 同义词:create, inflict, result, breed Pity engendered love.怜悯产生爱。
vt. 使全神贯注；用大字体书写；正式写成（决议等）；独占；吸引 同义词:absorb, attract, draw, engage He is engrossed in his work.他专心于工作。
adj. 引人入胜的 v. 使全神贯注（engross的ing形式） 同义词:spellbinding, ravishing An engrossing task story ].迷人的工作故事]。
vt. 吞没；吞食，狼吞虎咽 同义词:gulf, devour The overflowing river has engulfed many towns and villages along its banks.泛滥成灾的河水已把其沿岸一带的许多城乡给淹没了。
n. 增加；放大 同义词:gain, increase, rise, accession, escalation The candlelight enhanced her beauty.烛光使她显得更美。
n. 谜，不可思议的东西 同义词:puzzle So far, in terms of policy , he has been something of an enigma .从政策方面而言，他至今都还是一位神秘莫测的人物。
adj. 神秘的；高深莫测的；谜一般的 同义词:mysterious, arcane Languages also sometimes contain enigmatic archaeological clues .语言有时也包含着深奥的考古学线索。
vt. 命令；吩咐；嘱咐；禁止 同义词:require, order, command, tell, bid to enjoin silence on a class责令班级学生肃静
vt. 使燃烧；点火于…；激起（热情等） vi. 开始燃烧；激动起来；发出光亮 同义词:prompt, set fire to, catch on fire, get hot to enkindle flame燃起火焰

adj. 开明的；文明的；进步的；被启发的 v. 启迪（enlighten的过去式） 同义词:progressive, civilized THE term " food miles " - how far food has traveled before you buy it - has enlightened lexicon .“食物里程”这个词汇已被编入词典，意思是食物在你购买前行驶过的距离。

n. 启迪；启蒙运动；教化 同义词:cultivation, edification Its 18th - century founders had no doubt that they were embarking on a daring experiment inspired by the highest ideals of the Enlightenment .18世纪的建国者丝毫不怀疑他们在进行一场由启蒙运动的最高理想激发下的大胆尝试。
vi. 支持；从军；应募；赞助 vt. 使入伍；征募；谋取…的赞助或帮助 同义词:support of, stand up for sb, recruit He decided to enlist in the Marines.他决定入伍当美国海军陆战队士兵。
n. 征募，应征入伍；服兵役期限 McCain says the benefit will encourage people to leave the service after one enlistment .迈凯恩说利益会鼓励人们在服役期间离开军队。
vt. 使绊住；使陷入 同义词:emmesh, let sb in for He was enmeshed by financial difficulties.他陷入了重重财政困难之中。
n. 敌意；憎恨 同义词:despite, hate, hatred, hostility This is not the time for enmity .现在不是互接伤疤的时候。
n. 巨大；暴行；极恶 同义词:greatness, vastness The cruel murderer was put to death for the enormity of his crime .这残人的凶手因罪行的凶残被处以死刑。
adj. 庞大的，巨大的；凶暴的，极恶的 同义词:huge, tremendous, massive, macro, vast " It was an enormous culture shock , " she says.她说：“那是一种巨大的文化冲击。
vt. 使狂喜；使著迷 同义词:transport, overjoy I was enraptured by her singing.我被她的歌唱迷住了。
vt. 安置；安顿下来；使…隐藏 同义词:establish, put, station, bed, plant to ensconce oneself in an armchair使自己安坐在扶手椅内

n. 全体；总效果；全套服装；全套家具；合奏组 adv. 同时 同义词:en bloc, entireness, meanwhile, together She also attracted the attention of Yo Yo Ma , a cellist with whom she now frequently performs as a member of his Silk Road Ensemble .她也引起了马友友的注意——作为这位大提琴家“丝绸之路”演奏团的一员，她现在经常和他同台表演。
vt. 铭记，珍藏；把…置于神龛内；把…奉为神圣 同义词:brand, heart A fragment of the Cross is enshrined in the cathedral.耶稣受难的十字架的一块小碎片被奉祀于大教堂里。
n. 旗；海军少尉；徽章 同义词:standard, armorial bearings At that moment , from behind the short bush , there appear the artillery ensign .此时从矮小的丛林后面出现了炮兵部队的军旗。
vt. 诱捕；诱入陷阱；进入罗网 同义词:trap to ensnare birds张网捕鸟
vt. 使纠缠；卷入；使混乱 同义词:cloud, intertangle The bird entangled itself in the net.小鸟陷入网中，被缠住了。
n. 纠缠；铁丝网；缠绕物；牵连 同义词:involvement, implication These developments are ongoing , and researchers have not yet agreed as to the best way of quantifying entanglement .这方面的研究正在进行，而大家对于量度缠结的最佳方式还没有共识。
adj. 有事业心的；有进取心的；有魄力的；有胆量的 同义词:aggressive, courageous Man is usually a wandering and enterprising animal .人通常是一种游动的和有进取心的动物。
vt. 迷住，使着迷 同义词:possess, spell Except you enthrall me , never shall be free .除非你奴役了我，我将不会得到自由。
vt. 诱使；怂恿 同义词:encourage, egg on They were enticed westward by dreams of gold.他们被黄金梦引诱到西部。
n. 诱惑；怂恿；引诱物；吸引力 同义词:appeal, charm This is a fatal enticement , the balance in my heart inclined .这是个致命的诱惑，我觉得心中的天平有点倾斜了。
vt. 称做…；定名为…；给…称号；使…有权利 His executive position entitled him to certain courtesies rarely accorded others.他的行政职务使他享有某种极少给予别人的礼遇。
n. 实体；存在；本质 同义词:presence, existence, essence, principle, texture With bees one always talks about the colony as a single entity .总是将蜜蜂这个群体作为一个单独的整体来谈论。
n. 昆虫学 同义词:insectology His hobby is entomology .他爱好昆虫学。
vt. 恳求；请求 vi. 恳求；乞求 同义词:pray for, appeal for, pray for, cry on to entreat the judge for mercy乞求法官宽恕
n. 恳求；乞求 同义词:prayer, suit, imploration Mrs. Quilp durst only make a gesture of entreaty .奎尔普太太仅能大着胆子做出一种哀求的姿势。
vt. 确立，牢固；用壕沟围住；挖掘 vi. 侵犯；挖掘壕沟 同义词:sink, radicate, to infringe on, encroach on an official entrenched in office确保职位的官员
adj. 根深蒂固的；确立的，不容易改的 v. 确立；保证；挖掘壕沟（entrench的过去分词） 同义词:rooted, inrooted, engaged, assured an official entrenched in office确保职位的官员
n. 企业家；承包人；主办者 同义词:contractor, enterpriser The original French word entrepreneur refers to someone who undertakes , who does something .企业家这个词来源于法语，原意是指承担任务和做事情的人。
vt. 委托，信托 同义词:refer, leave in trust We entrusted him with our lives.我们把我们的生命托付给他了。
vt. 缠住；盘绕；使缠绕 vi. 缠住；盘绕 同义词:coil, obsess, circumvolve Roses and honeysuckle entwine the little cottage.玫瑰与忍冬盘绕着小屋。
vt. 列举；枚举；计算 同义词:cast, specify, figure Let me enumerate many flaws in your hypothesis.让我列举你前提中的许多谬误。
vt. 发音；阐明；宣布 vi. 阐明；清晰地发音 同义词:bill, illustrate, shed light on, explain clearly She enunciates her words distinctly.她清晰地发音(或念字)。
n. 阐明，表明；清晰的发音 同义词:indicating, illumination Degree of clarity and distinctness of pronunciation in speech or singing enunciation .发音讲话或唱歌中发音的清楚和明晰程度；
n. 市郊，郊区；周围（environ的复数） v. 围绕；包围（environ的第三人称单数） 同义词:circles, surrounds And Africans have also evolved as their environs changed .即使是非洲人，也随著环境的改变而不断演化。
vt. 正视，面对；想像 同义词:imagine, picture, think of She envisages an era of great scientific discoveries.她展望一个伟大的科学发明的时代。
n. [生化] 酶 同义词:zyme The worm has a protective enzyme .血吸虫有一种保护性的酶。
n. 永世；无数的年代；极长时期 同义词:eternity, aeon Quality products , perfect service is the highest in China EON pursuit !优质产品，完美服务是EON在中国的至高追求！

n. 肩章；肩饰 同义词:shoulder mark, shoulder-flash Nevertheless , this piece of photograph is not openly resembling , illuminate downward from altitude however , can see his general crown and aureate epaulet only.不过，这张照片不是正面像，而是从高处往下照的，只能看到他的将军帽顶和金色肩章。
adj. 短暂的；朝生暮死的 n. 只生存一天的事物 同义词:brief, little, transient, passing In short the joy was ephemeral and the hangover acute .简言之，欢乐是短暂的，纵情后的头痛是严重的。
n. 老饕；美食家；享乐主义者 同义词:gormandizer, gourmet It is very rare today for a restaurant meal epicure back an entire month 's earning .今天很少说是去餐馆美餐一顿就会花掉整个月的工资。
adj. 享乐主义的；伊比鸠鲁（学派）的 n. 享乐主义者；美食家 同义词:gourmet, foodie But his eudemonism was not epicurean hedonism , because eudemonia was an activity .但他的幸福观不是享乐主义的快乐论，因为幸福是“实现活动”。
adj. 流行的；传染性的 n. 传染病；流行病；风尚等的流行 同义词:popular, fashionable, going, ruling, pop, infection, infectious disease The village was smitten by epidemic .传染病突然侵袭了那个村庄。
n. 上皮，表皮 同义词:epithelium, scarfskin Within epidermis develops a ring of parenchyma cells , the cortex .在表皮细胞内有一个质壁细胞环，即皮层。
n. 警句；讽刺短诗；隽语 同义词:aphorism, catchphrase We can express this statement as an epigram .我们可把这一命题表达为一个短句。
adj. 警句的；讽刺的 同义词:acid, ironic epigrammatic Japanese verse form of three short lines .由三行短诗构成的警句式的日本诗。
n. 结语，收场白；尾声，后记 同义词:finale, endgame This is really where I wrap everything up, it 's the epilogue .在这里我把所有事情完全、结束，是全书的尾声。
n. 认识论 同义词:theory of knowledge The epistemology of problem formation is the key in public management decision .公共管理的问题形成认知是公共决策的首要关键。
n. 书信；使徒书；书信体诗文 同义词:carta Peter knows , while he is writing this Epistle .彼得写这封书信时，心里很清楚。
n. 碑文，墓志铭 同义词:epigraph Or I shall live your epitaph to make.无论我将活着为你写墓志铭。
n. 绰号；浑名 同义词:soubriquet, sobriquet Buddhists adopted the term as an epithet for the Buddha and his arahant disciples .佛教常以此作为佛陀和他的阿罗汉弟子的一个别称。
n. 缩影；摘要；象征 同义词:symbol, abstract, brief, summary, significant The Atom whirls alone , the epitome of singleness .原子独自旋转，形成单一性的典型缩影。

n. [地质] 世；新纪元；新时代；时间上的一点 同义词:new age, New-Era With the collapse of communism ended a catastrophic epoch of millenarian politics and the delusion of a rationally planned economy .随着共产主义的崩溃，千禧年政治的灾难性时代和理性计划经济的妄想都得以终结。
adj. 平静的；变动小的 同义词:peaceful, pacific, calm, still Sure enough, it was also an era of equable growth .果不其然，那也是一个堪称平等的增长时期。
n. 平静；镇定 同义词:peace, equilibrium Could lonely wait my endless rest With equanimity .我将能孤独等待长眠，心平气和地。
n. 均衡；平静；保持平衡的能力 同义词:peace, proportion, equalization We must look for another system state function to find the equilibrium criterion .为了求得平衡判据，我们必须寻找体系的另外的状态函数。

adj. 马的；象马的 n. 马 同义词:horsey, caballine, horse, prad, yarraman, gee-gee One head of equine is classified as one unit . The fee for the first unit is HK$ 743 and HK$ 106 for every additional unit .一头马为一个单位﹐在同一张申请表内﹐第一个单位收费港币743元﹐然后每附加一个单位﹐多收港币106元。
adj. 公平的，公正的；平衡法的 同义词:judicial, fair, just, impartial He should have added that its role is also to " ensure wealth 's fair and equitable distribution ".他应该再补充一点，即政府的职责还包括“确保财富公平以及公正的分配”。
n. 骑马；骑术 同义词:horseback riding, horsemanship The Orient equitation club is mainly for its members who like riding.骑术俱乐部以会员为主，聚集了各界的爱马人士，并对游园客人等开放。
n. 公平，公正；衡平法；普通股；抵押资产的净值 同义词:fairness, righteousness A clog or fetter on the equity of redemption is void .阻碍和束缚衡平法上的赎回板均是无效的。
n. 等值；相等 同义词:equation, equivalent value This verifies the equivalence of pure shear and simple shear .这就证明了线剪切与简单剪刀的等价性。
adj. 等价的，相等的；同意义的 n. 等价物，相等物 同义词:equal, even, countertype, quid pro quo Irradiance or its equivalent , the plane radiant temperature , can be simply measured .可以简单地量测辐照度或其当量--平面辐射温度。
adj. 模棱两可的；可疑的 同义词:suspicious, doubtful You must state your position on matters of principle . Don't be equivocal .在原则问题上要表明你的态度，不要依违两可。
vi. 说模棱两可的话 同义词:quibble When asked directly for her position on disarmament, the candidate only equivocated.当候选人被直接问到有关她对裁军的态度时，她只是含糊其辞。
vt. 根除，根绝；消灭 同义词:destroy, root out to eradicate smallpox throughout the world在全世界消灭天花
vt. 抹去；擦除 vi. 被擦去，被抹掉 同义词:efface to erase pencil marks擦去铅笔记号(或笔迹)
n. 消除；涂擦的痕迹；消磁 同义词:removing, elimination The erasure happens because the new isomer of azobenzene is not as stable as the old one.纸张能够自动清除字迹是因为新的偶氨苯异构体不如原本形态稳定。
vt. 腐蚀，侵蚀 vi. 侵蚀；受腐蚀 同义词:weather, eat into, eat into, burn into Battery acid had eroded the engine.电池酸腐蚀了发动机。
n. 侵蚀，腐蚀 同义词:corrosion, eating away There is an erosion of confidence in banks especially now they have invested in products they don't understand .人们对投行的信任受到侵蚀，特别是现在它们曾投资于自己不理解的产品。

adj. 色情的；性爱的；性欲的 n. 好色之徒 同义词:pornographic, sexy, satyr, lewdster Of course , it is a book talking a lot about sex . Actually it is a famous book in erotic literature .当然了，其中有很多描写性的内容。事实上这是情色文学中很出名的一本书。
n. 使命；差事；差使 同义词:mission, message For a moment he forgot his errand .有一小会儿，他忘掉了自己的使命。
adj. 不定的；周游的；错误的；偏离正路的 同义词:false, wrong, improper If the errant husband has the divorce filed in Texas , the tables are turned even more dramatically .如果这位不忠的丈夫在德克萨斯诉讼离婚，这一表格的转变甚至更具有戏剧性。
adj. 不稳定的；古怪的 n. 漂泊无定的人；古怪的人 同义词:unstable, odd, volatile, curious, fantastic, weirdo Field studies have shown erratic results and low virus removal in general .实地研究指出，病毒的去除量一般都很少，并且不稳定。
adj. 代用的；人造的；假的 n. 代用品；仿制品 同义词:artificial, synthetic, substitute, proxy Ersatz coffee made mostly of chicory .代用咖啡主要是用菊苣做成的。
adj. 博学的；有学问的 n. 饱学之士 同义词:learned, knowing, wise, accomplished, read Erudite Park ( area ) of about 33000 square meters .博学园（面积）大约33000平方米。
n. 博学；学识 同义词:wisdom, scholarship His erudition exasperated the average reader , and was sometimes queried by the expert .他的博学使一般读者气结，有时也被专家提出质疑。
vi. 爆发；喷出；发疹；长牙 vt. 爆发；喷出 同义词:out break, blow up, out break, blow up A riot erupted.一场暴乱爆发了。
n. 爆发，喷发；火山灰；出疹 同义词:explosion, burst, outbreak This is a warning sign for an imminent eruption .这就是火山临近爆发前的一个警示信号。
vi. 逐步增强；逐步升高 vt. 使逐步上升 to escalate a war使战争逐步升级
vt. 避免；避开；远避 同义词:escape, shun to eschew evil避开邪恶
n. 陪同；护航舰；护卫队；护送者 vt. 护送；陪同；为…护航 同义词:guard, accompany vt. Will you escort this young lady to the dancing party tonight ?你今晚愿意陪这位小姐去参加舞会吗?

adj. 秘传的；限于圈内人的；难懂的 同义词:complicated, elusive Juergen Lipp , who has a bookstore specializing in esoteric articles in Hamburg , Germany , likes to surround himself with angels in numerous forms .尤尔根利普在德国汉堡拥有一个专营各类深奥书籍的书店。他喜欢各种类型的天使围绕在他身边。
n. 间谍；间谍活动；刺探 同义词:illegal, secret agent And it leaves the dangers of online crime and espionage .网络上的犯罪行为和间谍活动同样也是漏网之鱼，危险万分。

n. 拥护；信奉；订婚 同义词:up with, advocacy We have always the espousal of " science and technology development to the quality of survival , to management -based services for the purpose of " business principles .我们一贯遵奉“以科技求发展，以质量求生存，以管理为基础，以服务为宗旨”的经营方针。

vt. 支持；嫁娶；赞成；信奉 同义词:encourage, second, back, agree, carry Don't tell off-color jokes , reveal company secrets , gossip about co-workers or espouse your views on race , religion or the boss' personality .不要讲低俗的笑话、泄露公司机密、讲同事的闲话，也不要宣扬你关于种族、宗教的观点或对你老板性格的看法。
vt. 看到；认出；发现 同义词:detect, recognize, spot The well-known professor espies the smallest slip I make.我一有哪怕最小的差错，那位著名的教授都能看出来。
n. 确立，制定；公司；设施 同义词:corporation, facility, company, firm Establishment of border trade district is one of efficient routes .设立边境互市贸易区是有效途径之一。
n. 房地产；财产；身份 同义词:identity, property, treasure, possession, worth He is a estate agent .他是一个房地产经纪人。
adj. 可估计的；可尊敬的；有价值的 同义词:valuable, worthy Nothing in our life , after health and virtue , is more estimable than knowledge . - Sterne , Laurence.除了健康和品德，人生再没有什么比知识更可贵。--斯特恩。
vt. 使疏远；离间 同义词:alienate from, disaffect Their quarrel estranged the two friends.他们的争吵使两个朋友失和。
n. 疏远；失和 同义词:distance, alienation Their quarrel estranged the two friends.他们的争吵使两个朋友失和。

n. 河口；江口 同义词:kuala, river mouth Given an extensive area , guerrilla warfare can be developed and sustained even in the plains , not to mention the river- lake - estuary regions.有了广大地区这个条件，就是在平原也是能够发展和支持游击战争的，河湖港汊更不待说。
vt. 蚀刻；鲜明地描述；铭记 vi. 蚀刻 n. 刻蚀；腐蚀剂 同义词:brand, heart, sculpture, mechanical erosion A design is etched on a copperplate.铜版上蚀刻了一个图案。
n. 蚀刻术；蚀刻版画 v. 蚀刻；刻画（etch的ing形式） adj. 蚀刻的 The artist must have spend hour etching the image on the glass .这位美术家一定花了好几小时把这画像蚀刻在玻璃上。
adj. 天上的；轻的；象空气的 同义词:light, heavenly The mountain have an ethereal hue with a clearness almost polar in its severity .这些群山有一种永恒的色彩，明亮的程度近乎于极地。
n. 民族志；人种志；人种学 Spradley. "Field Notes . " Doing Ethnography . Excerpt .考察笔记〉《进行民族志研究》节录。
n. 民族精神；气质；社会思潮 同义词:temperament, national spirit The ethos of the internet economy also discouraged planning .互联网经济浪潮也对商业计划不利。
n. 礼节，礼仪；规矩 同义词:ceremony, manner, protocol Many young people are unaware of the etiquette that says you should treat your hosts to a meal .许多年轻人并没有意识到应该请女主人吃顿饭这样的礼节。
n. 语源，[语] 语源学 The hippies etymology is contentious .关于嬉皮士的语源是有争议的。
n. 桉树；桉属植物 To purchase vast sandy tracts from Turkish government and plant eucalyptus trees .向土耳其政府购进一片荒沙地，种上按树。
adj. 优种的；优生学的 Birth control was , in her mind , " the greatest and most truly eugenic method ."在她的脑海中，控制出生率就是“最伟大最真实的节育方法”。
adj. 颂扬的；歌功颂德的 Show your corporation and products to the world ! Eulogistic transmission starts from here…展示您的企业和产品给世界各地的消费者！
n. 悼词；颂词；颂扬；赞词 同义词:celebration, tribute Tomorrow morning the president will deliver a eulogy at the Washington National Cathedral .布什总统明天将在华圣顿国家大教堂发表一篇悼词。
n. 委婉语；委婉说法 同义词:hypocorism, nice Nelly " Peripheral " is now no longer a shorthand term, but a euphemism for " southern ".如今“边缘”一词已不再是缩写、而是“南部”的委婉说法。
adj. 悦耳的 同义词:harmonious, musical, sweet He was enchanted with the euphonious music .他陶醉在那悦耳的音乐中。
n. 悦耳之音；悦耳；和谐的声音 同义词:harmonization But there is in euphony a danger that must be considered .还有一项危险一定要注意，那就是音韵流畅。
n. 精神欢快，[临床] 欣快；兴高采烈；欣快症；幸福愉快感 同义词:elation, gaiety Like alcohol , a debt boom tends to induce euphoria .债务潮正如酒精，往往催生愉悦。
adj. 协调的；韵律体操的 同义词:harmonious, coordinated, concerted
vt. 疏散，撤退；排泄 vi. 疏散；撤退；排泄 同义词:withdraw, beat a retreat, withdraw, beat a retreat The fort was evacuated.碉堡被撤空了。
vt. 逃避；规避；逃脱 vi. 逃避；规避；逃脱 同义词:get out of, elude, escape, get out of to evade one's pursuer逃避追捕者
adj. 容易消散的；逐渐消失的；会凋零的 同义词:smorzando Its duration may be evanescent (measured in seconds ) or persistent over many hours or days .疼痛时间可以是瞬间（以秒计）的，也可持续数小时或数天。
adj. 逃避的；托辞的；推托的 同义词:dodgy, elusive If the enemy attacks , evasive action .如果敌人进攻，就避其锋芒。
adj. 性情平和的；不易激动的 The even-tempered craftsman was not frightened by his shout .这位师傅倒是够稳重的，他并没有被恒公的咆哮声吓住。

adj. [数] 偶数的；平坦的；相等的 adv. 甚至；即使；还；实际上 vt. 使平坦；使相等 vi. 变平；变得可比较；成为相等 同义词:flat, equivalent, equal, level, actually, really, too, effectively, yet, equate with, flatten out an even worse mistake一个更为严重的错误
vt. 驱逐；逐出 同义词:cast out, expel The family were evicted from their house for failing to pay the rent.这家人因没付房租而被赶出了家。
vt. 表明，表示；引起 同义词:indicate, attract, produce, bid, cause He evinced great sorrow for what he had done.他对自己的所作所为深表痛心。
vt. 取出内脏；除去精华 vi. 内脏凸出 adj. 内脏被取出的 同义词:gut to eviscerate a chicken掏出鸡的内脏
adj. 唤起的；唤出的 Those toys are evocative of my childhood .这些玩具唤起我对童年的回忆。
vt. 引起，唤起；博得 同义词:earn, attract, cause, produce, occasion to evoke a spirit from the dead从死者身上招魂
n. 大口水壶 Ewer is in very good condition with spout restored .茶壶在非常优良条件与被恢复的喷口。
vt. 使加剧；使恶化；激怒 同义词:anger, aggravate to exacerbate ill feeling使恶感加深
adj. 严格的；苛求的；吃力的 v. 逼取；急需（exact的ing形式） 同义词:strict, rigid, precise, firm, rigorous First of all, the basic material must be made to exacting standard .首先，轧制的原料必须达到严格的标准。
n. 强求；勒索；榨取；苛捐杂税 同义词:importunity, extortion The king 's exaction of money left people really poor .国王的强取豪夺使人民生活实在贫困。
vt. 使扩大；使增大 vi. 夸大；夸张 同义词:enlarge, broaden, put it on, pile it on to exaggerate the difficulties of a situation夸大处境的困难
n. 夸张；夸大之词；夸张的手法 同义词:inflation, grandiosity "Out of control , " to be honest , is a great exaggeration of the state that our enlivened machines will take .老实说，所谓“失控”，是对由我们赋予了生命的那些机器将有的状态的一种非常夸张的表述。
vt. 提升；提拔；赞扬；使得意 vi. 使人得意 同义词:promote, upgrade, prefer, elevate She was exalted to the position of president.她被提升为校长(或总裁)。
n. 得意洋洋，欣喜；提拔；举起 同义词:up with, lift He had the students all in a state of exaltation about literature .他使那些学生对文学产生了浓厚的兴趣。
vt. 恶化；使恼怒；激怒 同义词:anger, go ill She was exasperated by the senseless delays.她被无谓的拖延弄得很恼火。
n. 恼怒；恶化；惹人恼怒的事 同义词:deterioration, degeneration Her lips twitched in exasperation .她的嘴唇因激怒而抽搐着。
vt. 挖掘；开凿 vi. 发掘；细查 同义词:to dig, tap into The ground was excavated for a foundation.地面被挖空作为地基。
n. 挖掘，发掘 同义词:digging, disinterment The treasure survived until its excavation in 1978 .在1978年以前，这批宝物一直沉睡于地下。
vt. 超过；胜过 vi. 超过其他 同义词:better than, overcome, top, cap, outdo to exceed a speed limit超过时速限制，超速(行驶等)
adv. 非常；极其；极度地；极端 同义词:extremely, badly, highly, greatly, too " Failure rates exceedingly high , " notes a JAMA editorial .“减肥失败率极高，”JAMA的一位编辑说到。
vt. 优于，胜过；擅长 vi. 优秀；胜过他人 同义词:overcome, cap She excelled all other authors of her day.她超过同时代的所有其他作家。
n. 例外；异议 同义词:dissention, demurral It was , however , an exception .然而，这是一个例外。
adj. 可反对的；可抗议的；引起反感的 同义词:opposable, antipathetic Frankly speaking , there is nothing exceptionable in his conduct .坦率地说，他的行为并没有什么不好的地方。
adj. 异常的，例外的 n. 超常的学生 同义词:novel, exquisite In such exceptional circumstances , a statement of the reasons why summarization is not possible must be provided .在此类特殊情况下，必须提供一份关于为何不能进行摘要的原因的说明。
n. 过份荒淫的行为；剩余额（excess的复数） v. 暂不聘任；停职（excess的第三人称单数） Yet while it could cope with external shocks , the global economy could not ignore its own excesses .不过，尽管全球经济能够应对外部冲击，却无法忽视自身的过度问题。
n. 财源；国库；财政部 同义词:finances, national treasury As chancellor of the exchequer , if the IMF dared criticise the British economy he used to be dismissive .他认财政部长时，假如IMF胆敢对英国经济吹毛求疵，他对此还会不屑一顾。
vt. 切除；收税 n. 消费税；货物税 同义词:resect, abscise, consumption tax, goods tax to excise a part of a book删去书的一部分
n. 删除，切除；切除之物 同义词:cancellation, deletion They could equally well be result of a excision mechanism .它们也很可能是切断机理失灵的结果。
vt. 排除；排斥；拒绝接纳；逐出 同义词:preclude, rule out They excluded people under 20 from (joining) the club.他们拒绝20岁以下的人加入俱乐部。
n. 排除；排斥；驱逐；被排除在外的事物 同义词:removal, ruling out But it claims that Intel 's discounts and rebates were often conditional on the exclusion of its rival , AMD .但是它声称英特尔的折扣和返款经常以排除它的竞争对手AMD为条件。
adj. 独有的；排外的；专一的 n. 独家新闻；独家经营的项目；排外者 同义词:particular, antiforeign, scoop This is the firm that has an exclusive franchise to offer bus service in the city .这是一家在这个城市的公共汽车服务方面拥有独占权利的厂商。
vt. 想出；发明；设计 同义词:design, father, engineer, style, project to excogitate arguments against …想出一些反对…的理由
vt. 严厉的责难；擦破...的皮肤 Suzane was excoriated for her mistakes.苏珊因犯了错误而被指责。
adj. 折磨人的；使苦恼的 v. 折磨；使苦恼；使受酷刑（excruciate的ing形式） 同义词:torturous, cat-and-mouse, tormenting The headache excruciated her.头疼折磨着她。
vt. 开脱；使无罪 He was exculpated by the testimony of several witnesses.几名目击者的证词证明他无罪。
n. 偏移；远足；短程旅行；离题；游览圆 同义词:skewing, short trip But the point of an excursion is that you come home again .但是所谓旅行，那是终得归家来的。
adj. 恶劣的；可憎恨的 同义词:gross, dirty, wicked He stood at the desk , labouring in his execrable handwriting .他站在桌前，用他那拙劣的笔迹吃力地写着。
vt. 诅咒；憎恶；痛骂 vi. 诅咒 同义词:make the air blue, Curse of Lola, make the air blue, Curse of Lola She execrated all who opposed her.她咒骂所有反对她的人。
n. 刽子手，死刑执行人 同义词:slaughterman, deathsman executioner put down his axe and stood quietly .刽子手放下了斧子，一言不发地站着。
adj. 行政的；经营的；执行的，经营管理的 n. 经理；执行委员会；执行者；经理主管人员 同义词:administrative, front-office, manager, gerente Students with poor executive function need help to organize research .执行功能不好的学生需要帮助来组织研究。
n. 执行者；[法] 遗嘱执行人 同义词:performer There is no business of any executor or tax collector in the future .将来的一切都用不着遗嘱执行人和税收人过问了。
n. 注释，解释 同义词:notes, interpretation, explanation, construction, account Governance Exegesis must pass Zhuanzhou .治训诂必须通篆籀。

n. 免除，豁免；免税 同义词:exoneration, excusal Tax rates established by local councils within limits specified by national law . Partial exemption provided for certain pensioners .税率由当地委员会在国家法律限制内决定。对部分领救济金者提供免税。
vt. 运用，发挥；施以影响 同义词:handle, to put to use to exert strength, influence, etc.尽力，施加影响等
vt. 呼气；发出；发散；使蒸发 vi. 呼气；发出；发散 同义词:emit, to send out, to send out, give off to exhale slowly缓慢地呼气
n. 枯竭；耗尽；精疲力竭 同义词:effeteness, drying up Solitude and exhaustion were just a couple of factors that faced him each day .孤独和疲劳仅仅是每天他所面临的一些原因中的两个。
adj. 详尽的；彻底的；消耗的 同义词:thorough, complete, detailed, full, radical It is not , of course , exhaustive .当然这是不够详尽的。
n. 裸露癖；自我宣传癖；喜出风头癖 Must there be some exhibitionism in desperate need of expression_r ?是不是必须有些潜在的需求需要表达呢？
n. 裸露症患者；倾向自我宣传的人；喜欢出风头的人 exhibitionist desires to attract attention to himself .好表现的人渴望吸引人们注意自己。
vt. 使高兴，使振奋；使愉快 同义词:glad, please, satisfy The cold weather exhilarated the walkers.寒冷的天气使行人精神振奋。
adj. 使人愉快的；令人喜欢的；爽快的 v. 使高兴，使兴奋（exhilarate的现在分词形式） 同义词:snappy, gratifying The cold weather exhilarated the walkers.寒冷的天气使行人精神振奋。
vt. 忠告；劝诫 vi. 劝告 同义词:sound advice, advise, give advice, advise to to exhort someone to action劝告某人采取行为
n. 讲道词，训词；劝告 同义词:advice, expostulation As for exhortation , he argues that in practice , religion is not a legitimate source of morality .至于劝解，他辩说到，在实际中宗教并非道德的正统来源。
vt. 发掘；掘出 同义词:unearth, disentomb to exhume the dead body from the grave从坟墓中掘出尸体
adj. 稀少的；细小的 同义词:fine, sparse Forehead is two side hair more and more exiguous how be to return a responsibility ?额头两侧头发越来越稀少是怎么回事?。
n. 流放，充军；放逐，被放逐者；流犯 vt. 放逐，流放；使背井离乡 同义词:transportation, banishment, transport, banish She was exiled from her country.她被流放到国外。
n. 大批的离去 To date , there has been no mass accidents exodus of super delegates support away from Obama .到目前为止，尚没有大批超级代表离开支持奥巴马的阵营。
n. 异族结婚；[遗] 异系交配 同义词:intermarriage For two millennia , exogamy was a major transgression for Jews .两千年来，异族通婚一直是犹太人的一大禁忌。
vt. 使免罪 Lyndon was exonerated from the accusation of cheating.林登被免受进行欺骗的指控。
adj. （要价等）过高的；（性格等）过分的；不在法律范围之内的 同义词:excessive, ultra, tall Furthermore , the expense of lofting the heavy projectiles into orbit would exorbitant .不仅如此，将沉重的抛射物送上轨道的费用也十分惊人。
n. 驱魔；驱邪；用魔法召鬼魂 The excess that they encountered during the exorcism was so excessive .驱魔期间他们遇到了过多的过度行为。
vt. 除怪，驱邪 to exorcise a demon驱除恶魔
adj. 异国的；外来的；异国情调的 同义词:outside, extraneous Dark matter may seem exotic , but cosmologists regard it as the essence of simplicity .暗物质可能看来奇特，但是宇宙学家将其视为简单的要素。
vt. 扩张；使膨胀；详述 vi. 发展；张开，展开 同义词:dwell on, enlarge on, grow, go way They hope to expand their company.他们希望扩大公司的规模。
n. 膨胀；阐述；扩张物 同义词:inflation, exposition He also questioned the firm 's expansion plans and overseas acquisitions .他还质疑该公司的扩展计划和海外收购活动。
vt. 使移居国外；流放，放逐；使放弃国籍 vi. 移居国外；放弃原国籍 n. 被流放者；移居国外者 adj. 移居国外的；被流放的 同义词:transport, banish She was expatriated for some political reason.她因某种政治原因而被流放国外。
n. 方便，权宜；私利 同义词:conveniency, self-interest But there have been times when her philosophy has come up against the demands of political expediency .但是她的人生哲学也常同从政的权宜之计的要求相抵触。
vt. 加快；促进；发出 adj. 畅通的；迅速的；方便的 同义词:facilitate, promote, boost, further, convenient, rapid, fast, forward, ready to expedite shipments加速装运
n. 远征；探险队；迅速 同义词:velocity, speed He bound himself to pay half the cost of the expedition .他保证支付这次远足旅行费用的一半。
adj. 迅速的；敏捷的 同义词:rapid, fast, forward, ready, quick Ensure all changes to client product are completed in an expeditious manner.确保对所有客户产品变更的完整和及时。
vt. 驱逐；开除 同义词:remove, oust The bullet was expelled from the gun.子弹从枪中射出。
vt. 花费；消耗；用光；耗尽 同义词:invested, cost, spend, waste, consume I expended energy,time,and care on my work.我把精力、时间和心血花在工作上。

adj. 可消费的；排出的；不重复使用的；可牺牲的 n. 消耗品 同义词:consumable, consumable supplies Team members are responsible for three types of equipment and supplies at a disaster : expendable , nonexpendable , and personal .救灾团队成员对以下三类器材和供给品负有责任：消耗品，非消耗品，及个人物品。
n. 支出，花费；经费，消费额 同义词:spending, payout This expenditure would include two railway lines .这些支出将包括两条铁路线。
n. 专门知识；专门技术；专家的意见 同义词:special knowledge, professional knowledge The centre is itself an example of such expertise .该中心本身就是这种专门技能的一个实例。
vt. 赎罪；补偿 vi. 赎罪；补偿 同义词:pay, make good, make good, to make up for to expiate one's crimes赎罪
n. 呼气；终结；届期 同义词:expired air, aspiration But as with any paper asset with an expiration date , the window for such buy and sell activity is limited .但由于这些月饼券设有截止日期，因此这些买卖活动的窗口有限。
vi. 期满；终止；死亡；呼气 vt. 呼出（空气） 同义词:die, drop, determine, finish, pass, breathe out, exsufflate to expire air from the lungs从肺里呼出气
adj. 可解释的，可说明的 同义词:accountable, decipherable His behaviour is explicable in the light of his recent illness .他因近日患病，这种表现是可以理解的。
vt. 说明，解释 同义词:say, translate to explicate a difficult text解释一篇难懂的课文
adj. 明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的 同义词:precise, decided, distinct, specific, express Bill Venners : What do you mean ? Could you be more explicit ?比尔：你的意思是什么？能更“明确”的解释一下吗？
vt. 开发，开拓；剥削；开采 n. 勋绩；功绩 同义词:develop, mine, merit, feat to exploit a business opportunity利用商业机会
n. 探测；探究；踏勘 同义词:inquiry, detection, search Rockets have found application for the exploration of the universe .在宇宙探索中，火箭得到了实际的应用。
vt. 探索；探测；探险 vi. 探索；探测；探险 同义词:detect, probe into, probe into, search after Let us explore the possibilities for improvement.让我们探索改善的可能性。

n. [数] 指数；典型；说明者，说明物 adj. 说明的 同义词:index, model, representative, illustrative, explanative Mr Levin frequently denounces Mr Obama on his radio show as an exponent of the second of those two qualities .莱温先生在奥巴马电台秀里公开指责他是第二个倡导这两种品质的人。
n. 博览会；阐述；展览会 同义词:expansion, exhibition, fair It can be said that Cuture Industry Exposition is the representation for the consumption of the popular culture .文化产业博览会可以说是对大众文化的消费主义表现行式。
vi. 劝诫，告诫；忠告 同义词:preach to, warn sb. of sth. Her mother expostulated with her about the evils of gambling.她母亲就赌博的害处规劝她。
vt. 解释；详细说明 vi. 解释；详细说明 同义词:specify, translate, account, to interpret to expound theories阐述理论

adv. 清楚地，明显地；特别地，专门地 同义词:definitely, obviously, specially, clearly, particularly It is available free of use for any person , and expressly permits modification for custom purposes .任何人均可自由使用，而且明确允许为定制目的所作的更改。
vt. 没收，征用；剥夺 同义词:shear, sequestrate The government expropriated the land for an airport.政府征用这片土地以建立机场。

n. 驱逐；开除 同义词:ouster, exclusion After the expulsion of America 's ambassadors to Venezuela and Bolivia , Mr Correa hastened to say that he would not be following suit .美国驻委内瑞拉与玻利维亚的大使被逐出之后，科雷亚急忙地讲道，他不会步其后尘。
vt. 擦去；删掉 同义词:wipe away, absterge She expunged the sound of his voice from the tape recording.她从录音带上抹去了他的说话声。
vt. 删除，删去 同义词:cancel, delete from The moral offen-sive remarks in the book had to be expurgated before it could be printed.这本书在付印前必须删去道德上冲撞的话语。
adj. 精致的；细腻的；优美的，高雅的；异常的；剧烈的 n. 服饰过于讲究的男子 同义词:elegant, severe, novel, sophisticated, pretty Ah , yes , the exquisite agony of heartbreak .啊，是的，爱情心碎带来的剧痛。
adj. 现存的；显著的 同义词:obvious, prominent, existing, marked, living It works against less than half the extant threats , a level he calls " pathetic ".它只能应对不到一半的现有威胁，他将这个水平称之为“可悲的”。
vi. 即兴演奏或演说；临时凑合 vt. 即兴演奏或演说；当场作成 同义词:improvise The speaker can extemporize on any of a number of subjects.该演讲人对若干题目中的任一个都能即席发言。
vt. 减轻；低估；为…找借口；使人原谅 同义词:moderate, allay to extenuate a crime用借口来减轻罪行的严重性
vt. 消灭；根除 同义词:destroy, kill off to exterminate insects消灭虫子
adj. 灭绝的，绝种的；熄灭的 vt. 使熄灭 同义词:out If we continue to destroy the countryside many more animals will become extinct .我们若继续破坏自然环境，将会有更多的动物绝种。
n. 消失；消灭；废止 同义词:evaporation, disappearance A certain extinction rate is essential for evolution .一定的灭绝率，对于进化来说是必要的。
vt. 使连根拔起；灭绝，破除 同义词:die out, become extinct to extirpate an unwanted hair拔除不要的毛发
vt. 颂扬；赞美；赞颂 同义词:praise, celebrate, credit, bless to extol the beauty of Naples赞扬拿破仑的妙处
vt. 敲诈；侵占；强求；牵强地引出 同义词:exact, shark up to extort money from merchants向商人勒索钱财
n. 勒索；敲诈；强夺；被勒索的财物 同义词:chantage, blackmail He wanted the return of his job , which he had lost after accusations of extortion and robbery .门多萨先前因被控敲诈和抢劫而丢了饭碗，他要求恢复被革去的职位。
vt. 引渡；获取…的引渡 The American murderer was caught by the English police and extradited to America.那名美国杀人犯在英国被警方抓获后被引渡到美国。
adj. 外来的；没有关联的；来自体外的 同义词:outside, exotic Extraneous null statements are not always harmless .无关的空语句并非总是无害的。
vt. 外推；推断 vi. 外推；进行推断 同义词:understand, conclude to extrapolate public opinion from the public's known reactions to other issues从公众对其他问题的已知反应来推测民意
adj. 奢侈的；浪费的；过度的；放纵的 同义词:luxury, unreasonable Despite this, he was extravagant that he was always in debt .尽管如此，它还是因为太过于奢侈而总是处于欠债当中。
n. 极端；绝境；非常手段；手足 同义词:radicalness, Desperate Remedies extremity is a fault .万事极端都错误。
vt. 使解脱；解救；使游离 同义词:save, ease of to extricate someone from a dangerous situation使某人摆脱险境
adj. 外在的；外来的；非固有的 同义词:outside, exterior The question extrinsic to our discussion .这个问题和我们的讨论无关。
n. 外向；外倾者；性格外向者（等于extravert） Helli: Really ? You always look confident and calm ! I assumed that you were an extrovert .真的吗？你总是看起来那么自信冷静！我以为你是个个性外向的人。
adj. 繁茂的；生气勃勃的，充溢的 同义词:lively, rank So why did financial markets remain exuberant for so long ?但是为什么长时间来金融市场依然火爆？
vt. 散发；流出；使渗出 vi. 流出；渗出；发散 同义词:steam, shed, stream, discharge, issue, shed Sweat exudes from (或 through) the pores in the skin.汗从表皮毛孔中渗出。
vi. 狂喜，欢欣鼓舞；非常高兴 同义词:glory, be over the moon We exulted over our victory.我们为我们的胜利而欢欣鼓舞。
adj. 非常高兴的；欢跃的；狂喜的；欢欣鼓舞的 同义词:rapturous, enrapt The exultant joy of survival.无比欢欣的劫后余生。
n. 织物；布；组织；构造；建筑物 同义词:cloth, organization, formation, construction, textile The use of metallised fabrics is sometimes proposed to reduce the emissivity of a fabric .不时地有人建议采用镀有金属膜的织物以减少织物的发射率。
vt. 制造；伪造；装配 同义词:manufacture, make, doctor The finest crafts people fabricated this golden ring.这枚金戒指是由最优秀的工匠制作的。
adj. 难以置信的；传说的，寓言中的；极好的 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, super, great " In my mind , they fabulous , " she said .她说：“在我看来，它们非常完美。”
n. 正面；表面；外观 同义词:garment, right side The facade of stone drips , arcs , and blossoms as if it were vegetable .岩石滴水、圆拱和花朵的立面把它装点得如植物般花团锦簇。
adj. 诙谐的；爱开玩笑的；滑稽的 同义词:funny, humorous Stop facetious . This is a serious matter .他把这么一件严肃的事情当儿戏。
adj. 温和的；灵巧的；易做到的 同义词:pacific, gentle, moderate, soft, mild The facile answer is a multimethod approach.最方便的答案是多种方法的普查。
vt. 促进；帮助；使容易 同义词:promote, boost, further It would facilitate matters if they were more co-operative.如果他们再合作些就容易多了。
n. 设施；工具，设备 同义词:equipment, instrument, vehicle, furniture, establishment, engine That means it should not have any policy or lending facilities .这意味着它不应该拥有任何政策或贷款机构。
n. 传真；复写 adj. 复制的 vt. 传真；临摹 同义词:fax, electrical transmission, reproductive, copied, fax, copy from As a technology , facsimile transmission is more than a century old .作为一项技术，传真传送的历史已有一个多世纪。
n. 派别；内讧；小集团；纪实小说 同义词:wing, junta The progressive faction demanded a reserve system and currency supply owned and controlled by the government .进步派系要求建立由政府占有和控制的储备制度和货币供应。
adj. 好捣乱的；好搞派系的；源于派别的 Many of the old puritan colonists retained their factious temperaments in the New World.许多旧清教徒殖民者在新大陆仍保持他们好争论的脾气。
adj. 人为的，人工的；不自然的；虚假的 同义词:contrived, anthropogenic Extensive advertising can cause a factitious demand for an article .大规模的广告宣传能引起对某一商品的反常需求。
n. 家务总管；杂役；杂工 同义词:fatigue, dogsbody The old man who was his factotum came at the same moment to the foot of the stairs .与此同时，那位担任家务总管的老头儿来到了楼梯下。
n. 时尚；一时的爱好；一时流行的狂热 同义词:fashion, mode, style Research lurches from fad to fad — cancer viruses , immunology , genomics .研究方向变来变去--癌症病毒学、免疫学、基因学。
adj. 风行的；流行一时的 The paintings of Li Geye never belong to the category of faddish esthetics .李戈晔的绘画似乎从来都不曾属于过那种风尚美学的范畴。
n. 苦工；疲劳 vt. 使劳累 vi. 努力地工作 同义词:fatigue, drudgery, swink, break one's back Doesn't this sort of work fag you out?这类工作使你累坏了吧?
n. 仙女，小精灵；漂亮姑娘 adj. 仙女的 同义词:elf, little people, faerie They thanked the fourth fairy for her gift .他们感谢第四个仙女送上的礼物。
n. 仙境；乐园；奇境 同义词:wonderworld, elfland There is no need to resort to hair - dyeing - the snow -capped mountain is itself a beautiful scene fairyland .老年人不要去染白发，老人的白发像高山的积雪，有种仙境之美。
n. 假货；骗子；[体]假动作 vt. 捏造；假装…的样子 vi. 假装；[体]做假动作 adj. 伪造的 He was arrested for faking some famous paintings.他由于伪造一些名画而被捕。
n. [鸟] 猎鹰；[鸟] 隼 同义词:peregrin Although it is a member of the falcon family, the caracara looks little like a true falcon .尽管它属于猎鹰属，但看起来一点都不象一直真正的猎鹰。
adj. 谬误的；骗人的；靠不住的；不合理的 同义词:uncertain, unreasonable A close scrutiny of these arguments would reveal how fallacious it is .对这些争论的详细的研究结实出它是多么的荒谬。
n. 谬论，谬误 同义词:idola, paralogism But Mr Carey pulls the pathetic fallacy out of the hat with panache .但是凯里用华丽的辞藻把可怜的假象展现在了眼前。
adj. 易犯错误的；不可靠的 同义词:unreliable, irresponsible For the first time , Mr Sarkozy has begun to look fallible .这是第一次萨科齐看起来容易犯错。

adj. 休耕的；不活跃的 n. 休耕地；休耕 vt. 使（土地）休闲；潜伏 同义词:inactive, sleepy, lie low, to conceal The market is also crimped by a rule that no more than 20% of farmland in any county may lie fallow .市场还受到一条规则的束缚：任何县中休耕农田不得超过农田总数的20%。
n. 伪造；歪曲；[审计] 篡改；证明是假 同义词:violence, manipulation, forging to falsify facts, issue, etc.歪曲事实、问题等等
vt. 伪造；篡改；歪曲；证明...虚假 vi. 撒谎 同义词:colour, doctor, tell a lie to falsify facts, issue, etc.歪曲事实、问题等等
n. 熟悉，精通；亲密；随便 同义词:up on, acquainted with Too much familiarity breeds contempt .太熟悉就会掉以轻心。
vi. 挨饿 vt. 使挨饿 同义词:go hungry, suffer hunger, go be hungry, starve to be famished to death饿得要死
adj. 极饥饿的 v. 使饥饿（famish的过去式） The famished old folk could only swallow their tears .老人们空着肚子得拿眼泪当做水，咽到肚中去。
n. 狂热入迷者；盲信者；盲信 adj. 狂热的；盲信的 同义词:bigot, crazy, wild, enthusiastic Strickland had the directness of the fanatic and the ferocity of the apostle .斯特里克兰德有着盲信者的直截了当和使徒的狂热不羁。
n. 狂热，著迷；盲信 同义词:abandon, mania There are powerful strands of fanaticism in US politics .美国政界存在非常狂热的成分。
n. 吹牛，炫耀；喇叭或号角嘹亮的吹奏声 vt. 热热闹闹地宣布 同义词:display, blague For a world first, the announcement came with fanfare .作为一项世界先例，消息发布之低调令人吃惊。
n. （犬，狼等的）尖牙；[解剖] 牙根；（毒蛇的）毒牙；尖端 vt. 灌水引动（水泵） 同义词:point, tip The wind fanged his face.风似利齿般地刮着他的脸。
n. 幻想曲；集成曲；幻想作品 同义词:reverie Fantasia : Do you have any more information ?幻想曲：你有没有进一步的消息？
adj. 奇异的；空想的；极好的；不可思议的 n. 古怪的人 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, super, great, weirdo, geezer Write a short passage about your fantastic experience .写一篇小短文，关于你的奇妙的经历。
adj. 深远的；广泛的；伸至远处的 同义词:extensive, widespread, comprehensive The applications will show that the rather dry considerations have far-reaching consequences .各种应用将表明，这些相当枯燥的考虑具有深远的后果。
n. 闹剧；胡闹；笑剧 同义词:slapstick comedy, dido to farce a play with old jokes用陈旧的笑话给戏剧增添趣味
vi. 经营；进展；遭遇；过活 n. 票价；费用；旅客；食物 同义词:round, advance, passenger, food, fee, charge, diet He usually fares sumptuously.他平常吃得很丰富。
n. 一窝小猪；猪的一胎 vt. 产（仔猪） vi. 产小猪 adj. （母牛）未怀孕的 He planned to have the gilts farrow down about the end of May.他计划让母猪大约在五月份产小猪。
n. 招牌；[医] 绷带；饰带 同义词:signboard, facia New projector headlights and a lower fascia that resembles the 2010 Fusion Sport are also visible .新的投影机头灯和较低的筋膜类似于2010年的融合运动也清晰可见。
vt. 使着迷，使神魂颠倒 vi. 入迷 同义词:enthrall, beguile, be carried away The children were fascinated by the toys in the big department store.孩子们被大商场里的玩具迷住了。

adj. 迷人的；吸引人的；使人神魂颠倒的 v. 使…着迷；使…陶醉（fascinate的ing形式） 同义词:attractive, killing, taking, absorbing, engaging, captivating The children were fascinated by the toys in the big department store.孩子们被大商场里的玩具迷住了。

n. 魅力；魔力；入迷 同义词:charm, grace This has helped prompt them to join the fray and , in many cases, rediscover a fascination with collecting that dates back thousands of years .这些因素推动它们加入了这股热潮，并且重新发现了具有数千年历史的收藏爱好的魅力。
adj. 挑剔的；苛求的，难取悦的；（微生物等）需要复杂营养地 同义词:particular, demanding The Chinese , less fastidious than most Westerners about human rights or contracts , have been most active .而不像西方人对于人权和契约那么苛求的中国企业一直最为活跃。
n. 牢固；不褪色；要塞；巩固；堡垒；迅速 同义词:velocity, tower, consolidation, speed We guarantee the fastness of these dyes .我们担保这些颜料不“褪色”。

n. 死亡；宿命；致命性；不幸；灾祸 同义词:death, disaster, end, evil, dying It generally cannot cause death , but if its complication dont be treated promptly , to result in 2.5% - 8.0% fatality rate .胃溃疡一般不会引起患者死亡，但其并发症（主要是出血、穿孔和癌变），若不及时处理，可导致2.5％-8.0％的病死率。
vt. 看穿；彻底了解；测量…的深度 n. 英寻（测量水深的长度单位） 同义词:see through, look through I cannot fathom his remarks.我不能充分理解他的话。
adj. 深不可测的；不可了解的 同义词:unfathomable, abysmal Days are coloured bubbles that float upon the sufface of fathomless night .白天是彩色的泡沫，飘拂在深不可测的夜色中。
n. 疲劳，疲乏；杂役 vt. 使疲劳；使心智衰弱 vi. 疲劳 adj. 疲劳的 同义词:tiredness, weariness, wear down, tire Climbing the mountain fatigued the whole scout troop.登山使整个侦察连感到疲劳。
n. 昏庸；愚昧；愚蠢的言行 同义词:ignorance, dweeb God never puts blame on people 's fatuity , but people put blame on God of unjust .上帝从不埋怨人们的愚昧，人们却埋怨上帝的不公。
adj. 愚笨的；昏庸的；发呆的；自满的 同义词:imbecilic, mullet-headed After his boring speech for over an hour , the fatuous speaker waited for applause from the audience .经过一个多小时令人厌倦的演讲后，那愚昧的演说者期待着听众的掌声。
n. 旋塞；插口 同义词:soket Then draw water from the lowest faucet in the house.然后从最低的水龙头中接水就可以了。
n. 故障；[地质] 断层；错误；缺点；毛病；（网球等）发球失误 vi. 弄错；产生断层 vt. （通常用于疑问句或否定句）挑剔 同义词:error, deficiency, defect, mistake, trouble, mistake, err in, carp at, trip up a performance which could not be faulted无可挑剔的演出
n. 动物群；[动] 动物区系 同义词:zoology By contrast , the extent to which the Gat threatens Australia 's fauna is not clear .相形之下，猫威胁澳大利亚动物群的程度现在还没有弄清楚。
vi. 奉承 n. 小鹿；浅黄褐色；小动物 adj. 浅黄褐色的 vt. 生（小鹿或小动物） 同义词:honey, lick one's boots, beastie, cinnamon, bring into the world, pup The puppy was fawning on its master.小狗向它的主人摇尾乞怜。
adj. 奉承的；摇尾乞怜的 v. 奉承讨好（fawn的ing形式） 同义词:flattering, subservient The puppy was fawning on its master.小狗向它的主人摇尾乞怜。
n. 忠诚；忠实 同义词:faith, loyalty, devotion In many countries politicians ' fealty to open markets is already more rhetorical than real.在许多国家，政客们对自由市场的忠诚更像是虚浮的废话。
adj. 可行的；可能的；可实行的 同义词:possible, working, potential, viable We should take active attitude feasible countermeasures to stride over the green trade barrier .我们应该采取积极的态度，切实可行的对策，跨越绿色贸易壁垒的障碍。
n. 功绩，壮举；技艺表演 adj. 合适的；灵巧的 同义词:merit, exploit, becoming, shaped, applicable, likely, possible How is this feat achieved ?这个功绩是怎样的呢？
adj. 发热的；[医] 热病的；发烧的 同义词:burning, calorific But in febrile , partisan Washington that is a pipe- dream .但是在狂热、盲从的华盛顿，这只是一种妄想。
adj. 无效的；软弱的；没精神的；不负责任的；无气力的 同义词:soft, useless, ineffective matched only by bitter talk in Germany about the costs of bailing out feckless southern Europeans.而在德国这边，人们则在愤怒地谈论着援助不中用的南欧国家的成本。
adj. 肥沃的；多产的；丰饶的；生殖力旺盛的 同义词:rich, productive No study is more efficacious and more fecund in instruction .没有任何研究工作会比这更有功效，更富于教育意义。
n. 反馈；成果，资料；回复 同义词:production, outcome, information One very important caveat : Do not , I repeat , do not rely on feedback from your nearest and dearest .一个非常重要的告诫：不要--我再次重复--不要依赖于你最亲密、最亲爱的人的反馈。
vt. 假装；装作；捏造；想象 vi. 假装；装作；作假；佯作 同义词:act, simulate, come, vision, image, seem, act to feign sickness装病
adj. 假的；做作的；捏造的 v. 假装；捏造（feign的过去式） 同义词:affected, spurious, pretended Else of our sex, feigned they those nine .更温柔，否则他们怎会想出九位缪斯。
n. 佯攻；伪装 vi. 佯攻；假装 vt. 佯攻 adj. 假的 同义词:dissemblance, stalking-horse, act, put on, juke, spurious, unreal The boxer feinted with his right hand and struck with his left hand.这个拳击手用右手佯攻而出左手击打。
vt. 庆贺；庆祝 同义词:commemorate, congratulate We felicitated John on his engagement to marry.我们祝贺约翰订婚。
adj. 恰当的；善于措辞的；幸福的 同义词:happy, correct, apt, blessed He looked clever and ill -a combination by no means felicitous .他相貌聪明而不健康--两者决不是幸福的征兆。

n. 幸福；快乐；幸运 同义词:happiness, welfare, pleasure, joy, mercy I'm trying to get over her , but every three or four weeks , Felicity will text or call and say how much she misses me .我一直努力忘记她，但每隔三四周，费莉希蒂就会发短信、打电话告诉她如何想念我。
adj. 猫科的；猫一样的；狡猾的 n. 猫科动物 同义词:designing, knowing, subtle, cat, catamount My favorite animals are the lions and tigers , anything feline .我最喜欢的动物是狮子和老虎，所有的猫科动物。
adj. 凶猛的；毁灭性的 vt. 砍伐；打倒；击倒 n. [林] 一季所伐的木材；折缝；兽皮 v. 掉下；摔倒；下垂；变坏（fall的过去式） 同义词:fierce, destructive, floor, down with, hide, dropped to fell an opponent with a blow一拳把对手击倒
n. [法] 重罪犯；瘭疽；恶棍 同义词:tough, devil I'm a convicted felon .我成了一个已定罪的全国重犯。
n. 重罪 同义词:high crime Mike Gravel, a no-hope former senator in search of attention , suggested it should be made a felony to keep troops in Iraq .为寻求选民关注，声望低落的民主党前参议员迈克。格拉韦尔建议，应该对把美军留在伊拉克的人判以重罪。
n. 男女平等主义者 adj. 主张男女平等的 Yet Candidate Clinton is not running as a feminist .但是希拉里并不是作为一个女权主义者来参加竞选的。
n. 击剑者；剑术家；（澳）篱笆匠 同义词:swordman In foil and saber , only fencer can score a point.在花剑和佩剑比赛中，只有进攻方才能得分。
n. 剑术；围墙；筑栅栏的材料 v. 击剑；围住；避开（fence的ing形式） 同义词:swordsmanship, bounding wall, hedging His land is fenced with barbed wire.他的地用带钩的铁丝围起来。
n. （汽车等的）挡泥板；防卫物；（暖炉的）炉围；（船只的）碰垫 同义词:mudapron, splashboard Fender -benders are unavoidable in Taipei , even when your car is parked .在台北，即使车子停靠在路边，小小擦撞依然不可避免。
n. 发酵；酵素；动乱 vi. 发酵；动乱 vt. 使发酵；酝酿；使动乱 同义词:trouble, zymolysis, sour, leaven enzymes that ferment tobacco使烟草发酵的酶
n. 发酵 同义词:zymolysis, leavening The fermentation process of alcohol and the fermentation kinetics were studied .对酒精发酵过程和发酵动力学进行了研究。
n. [植] 蕨；[植] 蕨类植物 同义词:Pteridophyta, filicales The fern quickly grew from the earth .羊齿很快地从地里长出来。
adj. 残忍的；惊人的 同义词:tremendous, cruel, brutal, incredible, spectacular Since then a more ferocious Bribery Act has come into force in Britain .从此之后，一部更加严厉的贿赂法案在英国生效。
n. 凶猛；残忍；暴行 同义词:fierceness, cruelty So in other words , the birds weren't simply protecting their nests with the same ferocity no matter who approached.也就是说，嘲鸟不是简单地用相同的威胁方式来保护自己的鸟巢而不理会谁是闯入者。
vt. 搜出，查获；驱出；用雪貂猎取 vi. 搜索，侦破 n. 雪貂；白鼬；侦探 同义词:rake out, seek out, seek, beat for, dick, stoat to ferret out enemies把敌人驱赶出来
adj. [化学] 亚铁的；铁的，含铁的 同义词:iron Ferrous metals , timber , and pulp seem to offer the main field of reduction .看来，黑色金属、木材和纸浆是削减的重要对象。
n. 渡船；摆渡；渡口 vt. （乘渡船）渡过；用渡船运送；空运 vi. 摆渡；来往行驶 同义词:lift, cross, wing to ferry people across a river渡人过河
adj. 富饶的，肥沃的；能生育的 n. 肥沃，多产 同义词:rich, viable, pregnancy, enrichment Fertile lands in some states could be mistaken for lakes .有些州肥沃的土地可能会误变成湖泊。
n. 多产；肥沃；[农经] 生产力；丰饶 同义词:productivity, pregnancy The nadir of fertility appears to be 1.3 children per woman .生育力的最低点出现在每名妇女1.3个孩子。
adj. 热心的；强烈的；炽热的；热烈的 同义词:intense, eager, burning, sharp, enthusiastic Our belief , and fervent hope , is that the answer is No .我们的信仰跟热诚的希望就是问题的答案：绝不。
n. 热情；热烈；热心；炽热 同义词:passion, flame, heat, fire, warmth SuperB whisky gives off a rare fragrance and stirs up your fervor .香气芬馥的超级威士忌，给您激情无限。
adj. 节日的；喜庆的，欢乐的 同义词:convivial The peoples are in a festal atmosphere ___.人们都沉浸在节日的气氛中。

adj. 节日的；喜庆的；欢乐的 同义词:convivial And Santa 's gone fishy in Japan . A diver dressed in a festive white and red suit feeds all kinds of aquatic life at a Tokyo aquarium .日本的圣诞老人很奇特，在东京的一家水族馆里一名潜水员穿着喜庆的红白服装-给各种水生物喂食。
adj. 臭的；恶臭的；腐臭的 同义词:rank, olid Fetid Ground : decreased Energy cost to 5 .恶臭地表：减少能量消耗至5。
n. 恋物（等于fetich）；迷信；偶像 同义词:icon, idol And , he adds , China has still to get over its " investment fetish ".还有，他补充说，中国仍必须摆脱“投资迷恋”。
vt. 束缚；加脚镣 n. 束缚；羁绊；脚镣 同义词:chain, bound, chain, restriction, cord A clog or fetter on the equity of redemption is void .阻碍和束缚衡平法上的赎回板均是无效的。
v. 束缚（fetter的过去分词形式） adj. 被拘束的；无自由的 同义词:chained His wife feels spiritually fettered by the pots-and-pans pattern of married life.他妻子觉得精神方面受到了婚后家常琐事的束缚。
n. 胎儿，胎 同义词:foetus, homunculi Early in gestation , a fetus develops smooth , raised pads on the fingers , palms , and feet .在孕育的早期，胎儿生长平稳，手指，手掌，脚的肉垫开始生长。
n. 不和；争执；封地 vi. 长期不和；长期争斗 同义词:difference, conflict, misunderstanding The two families have been feuding for generations.那两家族彼此仇视已历数代。
n. 惨败 同义词:catastrophe, smashup In the next stop , Paris , the parade was a fiasco .在下一站巴黎，活动完全失败了。
n. 命令；许可；政法 vt. 批准；颁布 同义词:instruction, order, bidding, telling, permission, confirm, authorize Fiat faces a test case over its plan to close a manufacturing plant in Sicily .菲亚特关闭西西里一家制造工厂的计划就是一个考验。
adj. 浮躁的；易变的；变幻无常的 同义词:mobile, variable, liquid, unstable Europe 's banking system relied more than any other on fickle borrowing markets that had dried up .没有哪个银行比欧洲银行系统更加依赖多变的、业已枯竭的借贷市场。
adj. 虚构的；假想的；编造的；假装的 同义词:affected, imaginary, assumed, simulate They bought the materials fictitious names .他们用假名买下了这些材料。
n. 保真度；忠诚；精确；尽责 同义词:precision, loyalty A dog teaches a boy fidelity , perseverance , and to turn around three times before lying down.狗教会一个男孩忠诚，坚忍不拔，在倒下之前还要挣扎一下。
vi. 烦躁；坐立不安；玩弄 n. 烦躁；坐立不安；烦躁不安的人 vt. 使不安；使烦乱 同义词:have ants in one's pants, play fast and loose, restlessness, ants in one's pants, discompose, disquiet Stop fidgeting!别坐立不安的!
adj. 不安的，烦躁的；难以取悦的 同义词:troubled, uncomfortable We are not either fidgety or quarrelsome now.我们现在既不好寻事，也不爱争吵。
n. 封地，采邑 同义词:feod, appanage The heir on taking up his ancestors fief had to pay a relief.继承其前辈封地的人须交纳一笔“接替费”。
n. 魔鬼；能手；成癖者 同义词:expert, devil, demon, dickens Some people gasped at the sight of the fiend .有些人看到这个恶魔倒吸一口冷气。
adj. 恶魔似的，残忍的；极坏的 同义词:cruel, brutal A long scar across his cheek makes him look fiendish , but he is very good-natured .他棉颊上的长疤令他看起 来很凶恶的样子，但是他却很善良。
adj. 凶猛的；猛烈的；暴躁的 同义词:fell, violent, hard A cornered cat becomes as fierce as a lion .被逼急的猫会变得像狮子一样凶猛。
n. 无花果；无花果树；少许，一些；无价值的东西；服装 vt. 打扮；使马跑快 同义词:some of, clothing, little, garment, touch, dress oneself, array to fig out a horses给马穿上盛装
n. 虚构的事；臆造的事物 同义词:myth and not simply a figment of the imagination .而不仅仅是一个想象中的虚构物。
adj. 比喻的；修饰丰富的；形容多的 同义词:tralatitious, parabolical Her métier was brightly coloured pictures with dark angry lines , part abstract, part- figurative .她的杰作是一些色彩明亮，线条灰暗愤怒的画作，一些是抽象画，另一些则有象征意义。
n. 破浪神；有名无实的领袖；装饰船头的人像 The new leader may emerge as a mere figurehead for a cluster of generals and other bosses .对一群将军和其他权贵们而言，新领袖可能只是一个有名无实的领导人。
n. 小雕像，小塑像 同义词:statuette The victim was killed with a Statue of Liberty figurine , so you suspect the murderer came from New York .受害人被凶手用一座小型自由女神雕像杀害，据此，你怀疑凶手来自纽约。
n. 灯丝；细丝；细线；单纤维 同义词:hairline rule, leptonema Textured yarns are composed primarily of filament fibers .变形纱主要由长丝纤维构成。
vt. 窃取；偷窃 同义词:steal, scrump The boys were in the habit of filching fruit from the peddler's carts.那些男孩们有偷小贩车上水果的习惯。

n. 文件；档案；文件夹；锉刀 vt. 提出；锉；琢磨；把…归档 vi. 列队行进；用锉刀锉 同义词:document, portfolio, paper, record, folder, introduce, present, prefer, advance, put in, procession Please file (away) those letters in a drawer.请把那些信件归档放入抽屉内。
n. 肉片；鱼片；（猪、牛等的）里脊 同义词:cutlet, fillet Waiter : Filet mignon steak, please .服务员：肉片牛排到，请。
adj. 孝顺的；子女的，当做子女的 同义词:obedient first filial generation子一代(简写Ｆ₁)
n. 海盗；暴兵，掠夺兵；阻挠议事的议员；阻挠议事的行动 vt. 阻碍议案通过 vi. 掠夺；阻饶议事 同义词:corsair, sea wolf, prey upon, pillage He had filibustered for 23 hours without leaving the Senate floor.他连续23个小时未曾离开参议院而不停地演说，以此阻挠议案通过。
n. 金银丝细工；金银丝工艺品 vt. 用金银丝细工饰品装饰 adj. 饰有金银丝细工的 同义词:filagree The frost made a beautiful filigree on the window pane.寒霜在玻璃窗上形成了美丽的花纹。
n. 鱼片；头带；平边；饰线 vt. 用带缚；把…切成片 同义词:filet, tenia, slice up He carried a sharp fillet knife .他带了一把锋利的片刀。
n. 填料；馅料（filling的复数形式）；充填料 These alternative fillings are more expensive and less durable than amalgam , however .然而，这些替代填充物更加昂贵并且没有汞合金耐用。
n. 污秽；肮脏；猥亵；不洁 同义词:griminess, squalidity Anyway , we don't want this kind of filth in our courtroom .不管怎么样，我们法庭不接受这种脏货。
adj. 肮脏的；污秽的；猥亵的 同义词:dirty, salt, grimy I hate that damned rubber . I loathe the filthy natives .我恨这晦气的橡胶。我厌恶这些肮脏的土人。
adj. 应罚款的；可提炼的；可精制的 同义词:amerciable, pecuniary
n. 结局；终曲；最后一场；最后乐章；尾声 同义词:conclusion, outcome, ending It has been an appropriate finale to his career .现在看来，德尔塔已经成了他事业的最合适的终曲。
n. 雀科鸣鸟；雀类 " Meat eating is a natural diet , given sufficient physical activity , " Finch says .芬奇说：「只要有足够的体能活动，吃肉也是自然的饮食。」
n. 策略；纤细；灵巧 vt. 巧妙处理；以偷牌方式先出 vi. 偷牌；施展巧计 同义词:strategy, device, facility The Chairman finessed his way through the newspapermen's questions.主席把记者们的提问巧妙地应付过去了。
adj. 过分讲究的；过分注意的；过分繁琐的 同义词:overnice Thanks to a Mormon -dominated city council , drinking laws are finicky .由于摩门教徒主导市议会，酒精饮料法案非常严苛。
n. [昆] 萤火虫 同义词:glow-worm The light of the firefly does not produce heat .萤火虫的光不能产生热量。
n. 天空；苍天 同义词:heaven, sky, air, high A new star appeared in the firmament after his birth , a crucial sign of heavenly approval .在他出生后，天空中出现了一颗新星——这是获得上天认可的重要征兆。
adj. 会计的，财政的；国库的 同义词:monetary, financial This is not quite an act of fiscal unification .这实际上并不是一种统一财政的行为。
n. 渔业；渔场；水产业 同义词:aquaculture, fishing ground Although fishing has not resumed , cod have not returned to fishery .尽管捕鱼没有重新开始，但是鳕鱼也没有再出现。
adj. 分裂性的；易分裂的 同义词:disruptive Given their fissile nature , it is no wonder regulators are keen to simplify and standardise them .考虑到金融衍生品本身不稳定的属性，监管机构自然迫切寻求其简约化和标准化。
vi. 裂开；分裂 n. 裂缝；裂沟（尤指岩石上的） vt. 裂开；分裂 同义词:gap, seam, crack, split, spring off, rip through Though we all got out to examine fissure , he remained in the car .我们都出去检查大裂缝，但是他留在车里。
adj. 一阵阵的；断断续续的；不规则的；间歇的 同义词:abnormal, intermittent Who would fare better in this world of fitful time ?哪种人能在时间忽进忽止的世界活得好些？
vt. 哑然失色；使大吃一惊 同义词:take your breath away, take my breath away I flabbergast after hearing the price she told me .听了她告诉我的价钱，我大吃一惊。
adj. 松弛的；软弱的；没气力的；优柔寡断的 同义词:laid, soft He could be a brutal editor and a savage critic of flabby ideas .他或许是一位严厉的编辑，对不成熟的意见，他或许还是一位不留情面的批评者。
adj. [医] 弛缓的；软弱的；无活力的 同义词:soft, anetic The dangerous type chronic otitis media occurs with pars flaccid and marginal perforations .慢性中耳炎的危险型可出现鼓膜松弛部的穿孔和鼓膜边缘性穿孔。
vi. 标记；衰退；枯萎 vt. 标记；插旗 n. 标志；旗子 同义词:fail, decay, emblemize, symbol, seal The streets were flagged to celebrate the royal wedding.街上挂起了旗子，庆祝皇室婚礼。

adj. 鞭状的；[生物] 有鞭毛的 vt. 鞭打 n. [无脊椎] 鞭毛虫 同义词:hide, scourge I still wonder whether the chef , who had kept his cool throughout , should have thrown his rolling pin at the man or flagellate himself .大师傅自始至终强忍着没有发作，但至今我仍在揣想，当时他应当是操起擀面杖朝那人劈面摔去呢，还是该把自己痛打一顿。
adj. 公然的；不能容忍的；非常的；恶名昭著的（名词flagrancy，副词flagrantly） 同义词:declared, intense The most flagrant scofflaw of them all is the red-light runner.最明目张胆的藐视法律行径要算闯红灯了。
vt. 打；用连枷打 vi. 打；用连枷打 n. 连枷（打谷物用的工具） 同义词:strike, beat upon, strike, hit To thresh using a flail .像连枷一样移动；打谷。
n. 资质；鉴别力 同义词:discernibility, discriminating power He has a flair for good poetry [for making money ].他有鉴别好诗的眼光[赚钱的本领]。
n. 高射炮；抨击；谴责 同义词:attack, archie Mr Hurd has been heavily criticised for his behaviour but 68 -year-old Mr Whitacre deserves the most flak .赫德的行为大受挞伐，但现年68岁的惠塔克才应该受到最严厉抨击。
n. 华丽；炫耀 同义词:display, showing off Takel acquitted himself with his sense of style and was infamous for his flamboyance .塔科根据自己对时尚的理解表现自己，也因自己的浮夸而声名狼藉。

adj. 艳丽的；火焰似的；炫耀的 n. 凤凰木 同义词:ambitious, showy, flame tree, poinciana Not a threadbare green , it is a lush technicolor coat, a flamboyant robe surrounding the colossal corporeality of the planet .外罩的颜色不是残绿，而是一种苍翠华丽的色彩，它是一件覆盖地球巨大躯体的艳丽长袍。
adj. 易燃的；可燃的；可燃性的 n. 易燃物 同义词:combustible, tindery, tinderbox, inflammable Highly flammable synthetic materials should be avoided .高度易燃的合成材料应被避免。
n. [机] 法兰；[古生][机] 凸缘；轮缘；边缘 vt. 给…装凸缘 同义词:margin, suburb We usually use elbow flange , tee, reducer) as a kind of pipe fitting .我们常用弯头（管、兰、通、小关）为一种管件。
vt. 使闪耀；使张开；用发光信号发出；使外倾 vi. 闪耀，闪光；燃烧；突然发怒 n. 闪光，闪耀；耀斑；爆发；照明弹 同义词:sparkle, burn, shine on, explosion, stroboflash The fire flared up as the paper caught.纸着火时突然烧了起来。
adj. 燃烧的；发光的；引人注目的 n. [机] 扩口；舷缘外倾 v. 闪光；闪烁（flare的ing形式） 同义词:burning, attractive, dramatic, falling out, coruscating, shining The fire flared up as the paper caught.纸着火时突然烧了起来。
n. [分化] 烧瓶；长颈瓶，细颈瓶；酒瓶，携带瓶 同义词:lagena, winebottle The flask culture process was analysed .同时对摇瓶发酵过程进行了分析。
n. 无盖货车；平台型铁路货车 同义词:gondola car He curls up in a flatcar and watches the sky .他在一节平板车上蜷作一团、望着夜空。
n. [内科] 肠胃气胀；浮夸；自负 同义词:ego, coxcombry It's also not uncommon to experience increased flatulence and a " fishy " taste in the mouth .增加肠胃胀气和口中“鱼腥”味儿也是鱼油服用者中的常见现象。
vt. 炫耀；飘扬 vi. 飘扬；夸耀 n. 炫耀；飘扬；招展 同义词:show off, fly over, flow, stream, dance, display, showing off to flaunt one's guilt藐视自己的罪过
n. 香料；调味料 v. 给…加味（flavour的ing形式） 同义词:stacte, fines herbs Add a spoonful of banana flavouring .加一匙香蕉香糕。
adj. 完美的；无瑕疵的；无裂缝的 同义词:perfect, stainless, ideal, full Evolution will make them more flawless than we can .进化制作的东西将比我们做的更完美。
n. 亚麻；亚麻纤维；亚麻布；亚麻织品 同义词:linen cloth The workers were teasing flax .工人们正在梳理亚麻。
vt. 剥皮；掠夺；严厉批评 同义词:skin, harry, shell And he shall flay the burnt offering , and cut it into his pieces .那人要剥去燔祭牲的皮，把燔祭牲切成块子。
n. 斑点；微粒，小片 vt. 使起斑点；使有斑驳 同义词:spot, molecule The bird's breast is flecked with brown.这只鸟胸前有棕色斑点。
adj. 成熟的；快会飞的；羽毛丰满的 同义词:developed, mature, adult Of the Arab League 's 22 members , not a single one is a stable and fledged democracy .在阿拉伯联盟22个成员国中，没有一个单独的国家是稳定和成熟的民主国家。
n. 无经验的人；刚会飞的幼鸟 同义词:greenhand China's fledgling gold market is still evolving .中国的初期黄金市场仍在发展中。
n. 羊毛，绒头织物；羊毛制的覆盖物 vt. 剪下羊毛；欺诈，剥削 同义词:wool, erio, exploit, sweat to fleece a man of his money骗取某人的钱财
adj. 飞逝的；转瞬间的 v. 迅速移动（fleet的ing形式） 同义词:zapping To avoid making the story too heavy and serious , the film does also have its fleeting moments of silly fun .为了避免剧情过于沉重、严肃，影片还特意穿插了短暂的荒谬搞笑情节。
vt. 折曲；使收缩 vi. 弯曲；收缩 n. 屈曲；电线；松紧带 adj. 弹性工作制的 同义词:constringe, shrink, contract, bend, band, buckling He flexed his stiff arm slowly.他慢慢地弯曲他那僵硬的手臂。
adj. 灵活的；柔韧的；易弯曲的 同义词:elastic, pliable By this reckoning , a flexible body learns to acclimatize to stresses .由此可以判断，灵活可塑的身体学会适应压力。
vt. 轻弹；忽然摇动；轻轻拂去 vi. 轻弹；忽然摇动；轻轻拂去 n. 弹开；快速的轻打；轻打声 to flick dust from one's coat把上衣的灰尘弹去
vi. 闪烁；摇曳；颤动；扑动翅膀；假装昏倒 vt. 使闪烁；使摇曳 n. 闪烁；闪光；电影 同义词:spark, coruscate, gleam, movie, film, cinema The candle flickered in the wind.烛光在风中闪烁不定。

adj. 轻浮的；轻狂的；心情浮动的 同义词:flirty, light-minded Their fast -paced metabolisms make them a bundle of energy , and they are often regarded as flighty by other beings .他们快速的新陈代谢产生大量能量，使他们精力过剩，常被其他种族看作一群轻浮的人。

adj. 脆弱的；浅薄的；易损坏的；不周密的 n. 薄纸；复写纸；打字纸 同义词:tender, slight, carbon paper, alabaster paper Charities and churches are also trying to catch people that fall through the flimsy government safety net .慈善机构和教堂也在努力帮助单薄的政府保障网络下的漏网之民。
vi. 退缩；畏惧 n. 退缩；畏惧 同义词:cower, shy away from, boggle The baby flinched when he touched the hot radiator.那个小孩一摸到暖气便缩回了。
n. 燧石；打火石；极硬的东西 同义词:chert, firestone One can strike out sparks from flint with steel .用钢敲打火石，可以打出火花。
adj. 坚硬的；燧石似的；坚定不移的 同义词:rigid, ironbound In the Chablis region of France , it is the only grape permitted and it renders a " crisp , flinty " wine .在法国的夏布利产区，霞多利是唯一一种被官方认可，而且标记为“清爽，坚硬”的葡萄酒。
n. 轻率；无礼；言语尖刻 同义词:rashness, giddiness The flippancy of your answer peeved me .你轻率的回答令我懊恼。
adj. 轻率的；嘴碎的；没礼貌的 同义词:hasty, thoughtless How people can be so flippant with money .怎么可以这样浪费钱。
vi. 调情；玩弄；轻率地对待；摆动 vt. 挥动；忽然弹出 n. 急扔；调情的人；卖弄风骚的人 同义词:play fast and loose, toy with, whisk, scammer The bird flirted its tail.鸟来回摆动尾巴。

adj. 轻浮的；调情的；爱调戏的 同义词:featherbrained, light-minded The 440 students enrolled in the master 's degree course will learn how to write flirtatious text messages and emails impress people at parties and cope with rejection .440名计算机专业的硕士生将在这门课上学习如何写调情短信和电子邮件，如何在派对上吸引别人，以及如何应对别人的拒绝。

n. 群；棉束（等于floc） vt. 用棉束填满 vi. 聚集；成群而行 同义词:cluster, gang, bunch, qun, concentrate, collect, mass, crowd Students are flocking to such fields as genetics and molecular biology.大学生正在大量从事诸如遗传学和分子生物学等领域的研究。
adj. 松软的；叭嗒叭嗒响的；懒散的，邋遢的 n. 软磁碟 同义词:nesh, fluffy These beings were like penguins , fat floppy faces with through way eyes .这些生物就像企鹅一样，肥嗒嗒的脸上往前长着眼睛。

n. 植物区系；植物群 This nation , famous for its unique fauna and flora , is now allowing applications for the professional export of its protected species to overseas zoological gardens .该国以出产独特动物群和植物群闻名，如今开放专业申请将其保育类动物出口到海外的动物园去。
adj. 绚丽的；气色好的 同义词:flowery, ornate Nobody likes this florid style with little content .没有人喜欢这种缺乏内容的华丽文风。
vi. 挣扎，折腾；错乱地做事或说话 n. 挣扎，辗转；比目鱼 同义词:struggle along, flatfish, plaice The child was floundering about in the water.那孩子在水中挣扎。
n. 嘲笑；轻视；愚弄 vt. 嘲笑；藐视；愚弄 vi. 嘲笑；表示轻蔑 同义词:despite, derision, scoff at, laugh at, laugh at, make a mockery of to flout the law无视法律
vi. 波动；涨落；动摇 vt. 使波动；使动摇 同义词:wave motion, shake, destabilize fluctuating prices波动的价格
adj. 蓬松的；松软的；毛茸茸的；无内容的 同义词:shaggy, towheaded Some clouds appear light and fluffy .有些云看起开明亮蓬松。

n. 侥幸；锚爪；意外的挫折 vt. 侥幸成功；意外受挫 vi. 侥幸成功 同义词:chance, get away with it, luck out, get away with it, luck out As recently as a year ago people wondered whether M - PESA 's success was fluke .就在一年前，人们开始怀疑M-PESA的成功是不是只是昙花一现。
n. 假恭维；柔软易食的食品 All the rest is flummery .其它什么都是废话。
n. 失败 vt. 使狼狈；使混乱；使惶惑 vi. 出现错误；失败 同义词:failure, loss, defeat, losing, reverse, cloud, confuse, founder, bomb The politician was completely flummoxed by the questions put to her.那位女政治家被问得十分狼狈。
vi. 失败；放弃；考试不及格 vt. 使…不及格 n. 不及格；失败 同义词:founder, come to naught, failure, loss, losing, defeat, reverse She flunked biology examination.他生理学考试不及格。
adj. 荧光的；萤光的；发亮的 n. 荧光；日光灯 同义词:flourescent, splendent, daylight lamp I hate this cheap fluorescent lighting .我讨厌这些廉价的日光灯。

n. 激动，洋溢；面红；萌芽；旺盛；奔流 vt. 使齐平；发红，使发亮；用水冲洗；使激动 vi. 发红，脸红；奔涌；被冲洗 adj. 大量的；齐平的；丰足的，洋溢的；挥霍的 同义词:seed, warmth, excitation, agitation, heat, electrify, blush, massive, extensive, substantial, macro, much She began to flush with excitement.她由于激动脸开始发红。
vt. 使激动；使慌张；使酩醉 n. 慌乱，混乱；狼狈；激动 vi. 慌慌张张的行动；混乱 同义词:heat, impassion, chaos, disorder, confusion, involvement, warmth, out of joint, get mixed up The honking of horns flustered the driver.汽车的喇叭声使司机感到慌乱。

n. [流][机] 流量；变迁；不稳定；流出 vt. 使熔融；用焊剂处理 vi. 熔化；流出 同义词:issue, instability, fuse, discharge, issue, shed The problem may be even more severe for the small photospheric flux knots .对细小的光环磁通量节点来说，这些问题可能更为严峻。
n. 饲料；素材 vt. 喂 同义词:feed, forage The treaty obliged them to provide cannon- fodder for it .这项条约迫使他们为它提供炮灰。
n. 胎儿 同义词:fetus, homunculi Sometimes I wonder as a foetus if you fought for your life ?有时我像个婴儿一般无知，怀疑你是否为生活而战斗？
n. 弱点；小缺点；癖好 同义词:weakness, tendency It is a foible of all the people .这对人们而言，是一个致命的缺陷。
vt. 衬托；阻止，挡开；挫败；贴箔于 n. 箔，金属薄片；衬托，烘托；叶形片 abbr. 面向文件的翻译语言（file-Oriented interpretive language） 同义词:defeat, dispute, stem, block, tole The enemy's attack was foiled.敌人的进攻被挫败了。
vt. 折叠；合拢；抱住；笼罩 n. 折痕；信徒；羊栏 vi. 折叠起来；彻底失败 同义词:infold, enfold, Christian, believer to fold a sheet将纸折起来
n. 植物；叶子（总称） 同义词:vegetable, leaf, plant The perennial plants spread rapidly and are about six inches high with needle shaped moss -like foliage .这种多年生植物大约六英寸高，长着针形苔藓状的叶子，蔓延很快。
n. 民俗学；民间传说；民间风俗 At the time the book was published , John Lomax helped found the Texas Folklore Society .这本书出版时约翰•洛马克斯帮助建立了得克萨斯州民俗协会。
vt. 煽动；挑起；热敷 同义词:fan, egg to foment a riot煽动暴乱
