n. 枢轴；中心点；旋转运动 vt. 以…为中心旋转；把…置于枢轴上 vi. 在枢轴上转动；随…转移 adj. 枢轴的；关键的 同义词:center, central point, be relative to, key The swinging door is pivoted on one side; the revolving door is pivoted in the centre.转门的枢轴在一边；旋转门的枢轴则在中间。
vt. 抚慰；怀柔；使和解 同义词:propitiate, reconcile I tried to placate her by offering to pay for the repairs.我提出支付修理费来抚慰他。
n. 安慰剂；为死者所诵的晚祷词 The remaining teams received ei ther no treatment at all, or the placebo on competition day alone .剩下的队伍要么没有接受任何注射，要么只是在比赛当天注射了安慰剂。
adj. 平静的；温和的；沉着的 同义词:pacific, peaceful, calm, composed, soft But beneath that placid surface the IMF sees a snake pit of threats .但在风平浪静的表面下，IMF看到了种种蛇穴般的威胁。
n. 剽窃；剽窃物 同义词:piracy, cribbing Punishments for plagiarism differ in schools .每个学校剽窃的惩罚是不同的。

n. 原告 同义词:claimant, demandant The relief the plaintiff sought was an injunction and damages .原告请求的救济为强制令和损害赔偿金。
adj. 哀伤的；悲哀的 同义词:sad, sorrow-stricken Mother Gaia sings a plaintive tune as her wails belie her birthing pains .母亲盖亚吟唱着哀伤的曲调，她的哀号掩饰着她的分娩之痛。
n. 褶；辫状物 vt. 编织；把…编成辫（等于pleat）；给…打褶 同义词:pleat, pleach, complect She plaited her hair,她把辫子编了起来。
n. 飞机；平面；程度，水平 vi. 刨；乘飞机旅行；翱翔 vt. 刨平；用刨子刨；掠过水面 adj. 平的；平面的 同义词:extent, degree, measure, level, airplane, fly in, upsoar, plain, two dimensional The carpenter planed a table smooth.木匠把桌面刨光了。
adj. 轰鸣的；凄切的 That 's It plangent pollution from our own uses use of space .这都我们对太空的利用也是一种污染。

n. 浮游生物（总称） As other fish disappear , these plankton - eating organisms move in , to the despair of swimmers and the consternation of fishermen .当其它鱼类消失时，这些吃浮游生物的生物体进入，这使游泳者感到绝望，使渔民感到惊恐。
n. 匾；血小板；饰板 同义词:blood platelet, thrombocyte Examining plaque from his teeth , he was the first to see bacteria .通过观察牙齿上的齿菌斑，他成为第一个发现细菌的人。
n. 石膏；灰泥；膏药 vt. 减轻；粘贴；涂以灰泥；敷以膏药；使平服 同义词:plaister, gypse, stick, moderate His coat was plastered with thick yellow mud.他的上衣上沾着厚厚的黄泥。

adj. 塑料的；（外科）造型的；可塑的 n. 塑料制品；整形；可塑体 同义词:mouldable, malleable, restricting, true-up Plastic traveling bags are sold out today .塑料旅行袋今天已经卖完了。

n. 高原；稳定水平；托盘；平顶女帽 vi. 达到平衡；达到稳定时期 同义词:altiplano, high land, level out After initial logarithmic progress growth plateaued sharply.初期的上升进程之后，发展陡然平稳下来。
n. 陈词滥调；平凡；陈腐 同义词:lousy cliches, banality A fellow comes out with some platitude when I am speaking with my whole heart .一个人散布枯燥乏味的陈腔滥调时，而我正全心全力地演说。
adj. 理想的；柏拉图哲学的；不切实际的；纯精神友谊的 同义词:ideal, unreasonable, dream, perfecting The Platonic paradigm raises the question of why the universe is the way it is.柏拉图的典范引发了一个问题：为什麽宇宙会是现在这样子的？
adj. 貌似可信的，花言巧语的；貌似真实的，貌似有理的 同义词:smooth-tongued, rhetoric A more plausible approach could come from bubble fusion .还有一种方式更为合理：气泡核聚变。
n. 剧作家 同义词:dramatist I never know that he was a playwright .我到不知道他是个剧作家呢。
n. 广场；市场，购物中心 同义词:exchanges, square It took place on two small temporary pitches about the size of tennis courts in Copenhagen plaza .比赛是在哥本哈根市中心广场上搭起的两块网球场大小的临时场地上举行的。
vt. 借口；为...辩护；托称 vi. 恳求；辩护 同义词:excuse for, pray for, cry on The woman charged with murder was said to be mad and unfit to plead.被控犯谋杀罪的女人据说疯了，因此不适合出庭申辩。

adj. 平民的；普通的；粗俗的 n. 平民；百姓；粗俗的人 同义词:ordinary, civilian, general, low, average, populace, common man Because iron has a plebeian temperament .这是因为铁元素有一种“平民性”。
n. 充分；丰富；大量 同义词:abundance, lots of, wealth, ocean, sea I can feel the plenitude and joy during my work every day .在工作的日子里，我感觉每天都很充实、快乐。
adj. 重复的，冗言的 同义词:repeating, reduplicative
n. 过多；过剩；[医] 多血症 同义词:surplus, nimiety Over time , a plethora of distinct identities can emerge .时间长了，可能就会出现过多截然不同的身份。
adj. 柔韧的；柔软的；圆滑的；易曲折的 同义词:flexible, soft, tender Moreover , though anatomical sex is binary, mental " gender " is more pliable .此外，解剖学的性是两方面的，精神上的性可能更加圆滑。

adj. 顺从的；易弯的；易受影响的；能适应的 n. 顺从 同义词:compliant, obedient, compliance, deference, Friend VS Lover In most cases , the fact that an object is pliant should be communicated to users .在大多数情况下，某个物体是受范的这一事实应该告诉给使用者；
n. 钳子；老虎钳（plier的复数形式） 同义词:clippers, nippers I got out my pliers and torch and crawled under the ambulance.我拿出钳子和手电筒，爬到了车底下。
n. 柱基；底座 同义词:column base, mount The 10ft high statue 's plinth bears the immortal words : ' We shall never surrender .这座10英尺高的雕像基座上，镌刻着那句名言：“我们决不投降。”
vi. 辛勤工作；沉重地走 vt. 沉重缓慢地走 n. 辛勤工作；沉重的步伐 同义词:work hard, work like a horse, trudge We plodded wearily up the road carrying heavy packs.我们拿着沉重的包裹疲惫不堪地沿着路慢慢地走去。
n. 情节；图；阴谋 vt. 密谋；绘图；划分；标绘 vi. 密谋；策划；绘制 同义词:action, designing, scenario, lot, to divide, be up to something, to plan The prisoners plotted an escape route.囚犯画出了逃跑路线。
n. 策略；活动；工作 vt. 使部队由横队变为纵队 vi. 由横队变为纵队 同义词:strategy, device, activity, movement, pursuit I saw Mansfield 's move as a purposeful ploy in the congressional campaign .我认为曼斯菲尔德此举是国会斗争中一个有目的的行动。
n. 勇气；内脏；快而猛的拉 vt. 摘；拔；扯 vi. 拉；拽；扯 同义词:courage, nerve, heart, inside, pull, draw, pull Did you pluck your eyebrows?你拔眉毛吗?
n. 翅膀；鸟类羽毛 同义词:wing With this criterion , it 's not surprising that male plumage would grow more and more elaborate over the generations.根据这个标准，也就不觉得奇怪一带带的雄性羽毛会发育得越来越精致。

vt. 使丰满；使鼓起；突然放下 adv. 沉重地；突然地 vi. 变丰满；鼓起 adj. 圆胖的，丰满的；鼓起的 n. 扑通声 同义词:belly, heavily, suddenly, sharp, fill out, summon up, fat, full, chubby, plop She plumps up the sofa cushion.她把沙发垫子拍得鼓鼓的。

adj. 豪华的；长毛绒做的；舒服的 n. 长毛绒 同义词:grand, comfortable, peluche This plush pug - dog is a new product .这只长毛绒狮子狗是新产品。
n. 富豪统治，富豪统治集团 The most prolific of the debunkers of the plutocracy was Gustavus Myers .揭发富豪统治集团的作家中，最多产的是古斯塔夫斯·迈尔斯。
vt. 使用，不住地使用；折，弯；从事 vi. 辛勤工作；定期地来往（船、车等） n. 厚度；板层；褶 同义词:undertake, make use of, fashion, pursue, address, work hard, work like a horse, thickness three-ply三层的
n. 肺炎 同义词:pulmonitis A study in Pakistan found that children with severe pneumonia can recover fully at home taking antibiotics by mouth .巴基斯坦的一项研究发现，患严重肺炎的儿童也可以通过在家口服抗生素痊愈。
n. 蚕茧；豆荚 vi. 结豆荚 vt. 从豆荚中剥出 同义词:peapod, bean-pod Amazon , the world 's biggest online bookseller , uses POD machines, although it does not reveal how often .亚马逊这一世界最大的网上书店也使用按需印刷机，尽管它没透漏是否经常使用。
n. 足部医疗；[外科] 脚病学 Podiatry Today warns that purchasing the wrong shoe can result in injury .《今日足部医疗》提醒大家，买了不合适的鞋子会导致（足部）受伤。

n. 打油诗人；蹩脚诗人 同义词:versemonger, rimester His verse has the sing - song rhythm of poetaster .没有好的节奏我不能跟着音乐跳舞。
n. 辛辣；强烈；尖锐；辛酸事 同义词:intensity, mordacity The movie , " Trains , Planes , and Automobiles " treats this with hilarity and poignancy .电影“火车，飞机和汽车”是以欢娱和热情庆祝这个节日。
adj. 尖锐的；辛酸的；深刻的；切中要害的 同义词:sharpened, acerb The combination of physical decay and human dislocation is poignant .令人心痛的是自然和人为破坏的结合。
n. 指针；指示器；教鞭；暗示 同义词:connotation, indicator, finger, index We can use an indicator with a pointer or a continuous recording device .我们可以使用有指南针的指示器，或是连续记录的装置。
n. 平衡；姿势；镇静 vt. 使平衡；保持...姿势 vi. 平衡；准备好；悬着 同义词:balance, attitude, balance, equilibrize, hang, balance of, get ready The girl poised the glass on the edge of the table.小姑娘把杯子稳稳地放在桌子边上。
vi. 刺，捅；戳；伸出；刺探；闲荡 vt. 刺，捅；戳；拨开 n. 戳；刺；袋子；懒汉 同义词:moon, run through, stick, pink, soldier, spine Be careful not to poke someone in the eye with your umbrella.注意别把伞戳着别人的眼睛。
adj. 狭小的，不舒适的；衣服破旧的；无生气的 同义词:incapacious, contracted This bedroom is too poky for me .我这间卧室太窝憋。
n. [物] 极性；两极；对立 同义词:antagonism, opponency Objective To reestablish cell polarity of hepatocytes cultured in vitro .目的使培养肝细胞在体外重建细胞极性。
n. 极化；偏振；两极分化 In other words polarization properties are excluded .换句话说，偏振性质未包括在内。

adj. 好辩的；好争论的；挑起论战的 同义词:argumentative, disputative The letter was probably written for polemical impact .这封信可能是为了造成争论性影响而写的。
n. 磨光，擦亮；上光剂，擦亮剂；优雅，精良 vi. 擦亮，变光滑 vt. 磨光，使发亮 adj. 波兰的 同义词:grace, buffing, furbish, Polak Polish your shoes with a brush.用刷子把你的鞋子擦亮。

vt. 对...授粉 Flowers are often pollinated by bees.花常常由蜜蜂传授花粉。
n. 民意测验专家，民意调查人；整理民意测验结果的人 After plunging into a sorry plight , pollster quit poking about and plotted a conspiracy .在陷入困境后，那个民意调查者停止了游手好闲然后策划了一起阴谋。
n. 胆小鬼；懦夫 adj. 胆怯的 同义词:sheep, fraid, chicken, lily-livered No on likes to be regarded as a poltroon .没有人喜欢被认为是懦夫。
n. 一妻多夫；多雄蕊 But to allow polygyny but polyandry would be to discriminate against women .但是如果允许一夫多妻制却禁止一妻多夫制，那么可能就会是对妇女的一种歧视。
n. 一夫多妻，一妻多夫，多配偶 Polygamy is widely blamed for social ills ranging from school absenteeism to street violence .一夫多妻被广泛归咎于逃学或街头暴力等社会弊端。

n. 通晓数种语言的人；用通晓数种语言记载的书 adj. 通数国语言，数国语言的 Its setting is emphatically antipodean and so , too, are its voices : eight characters drawn from Melbourne 's polyglot middle classes .小说的背景强调正相反，而这正是它要表达的：刻画了来自墨尔本多元中产阶级的八个人物形象。
n. 博学的人 adj. 博学的 同义词:learned, knowing, wise, scholarly, well-read If the British Polymath half the time , this would be " more than expected ".如果“博学者”奖半数情况下由英国人摘取，那才叫“多于预期”。

n. 盛况；浮华；壮丽；夸耀 同义词:vanity, splendor The deal with Arafat , which was consummated with pomp and sentiment in the Rose Garden handshake of September 1993 , was deeply flawed .与阿拉法特的这份协议，于1993年在玫瑰园以同步交换方式达成，带有虚饰和情绪化的成分，是有严重缺陷的。
n. 自大；炫耀；浮夸 同义词:display, arrogance The prince 's manner was informal, without a trace of pomposity .王子的态度平易谦和，没有一点傲气。
adj. 自大的；浮夸的；华而不实的；爱炫耀的 同义词:arrogant, purple He bowed to the lady in a pompous manner .他装模作样地向那个女士鞠了一躬。
n. 雨披；南美披风 同义词:raincape The poncho is made of nylon .这“雨披”是用尼龙制造的。
vt. 仔细考虑；衡量 vi. 考虑；沉思 同义词:mull over, reflect on, allow, think about, think of I pondered the incident,asking myself again and again how it could have happened.我反复思考那件事，一再自问究竟是怎么回事。
adj. 笨重的；沉闷的；呆板的 同义词:mechanical, wooden, dead, cumbersome Ponderous , bound in leather , brass -studded , printed in Holland .书页沉重，皮革装订，黄铜饰钉，荷兰印刷。
n. 匕首；短剑 vt. 以匕首刺 同义词:knife, stiletto She drew out the poniard , holding it in her hand , and began a dance .她抽出短剑，拿在手里，就开始跳起舞来。

adj. 罗马教宗的；主教的 n. 主教仪典书；主教祭服及徽章 同义词:episcopal Papal diplomats , all priests nowadays , are trained at the Pontifical Ecclesiastical Academy in Rome .如今教廷的外交官都是牧师，都在罗马的圣座神职学院（PontificalEcclesiasticalAcademy）接受培训。
n. 矮种马；小型马 adj. 小型的；每日摘要的 vt. 付清 vi. 付清 同义词:pocket, miniative, pay in full, settle up, pay in full, settle up Harness the pony and we 'll go for a ride in the cart .给那匹小马套上马具，我们要坐车出去逛逛。
n. 大众；平民；人口 同义词:common people, common man The Roman populace enjoyed gardens attached to the public baths .罗马的公众则很喜欢公共浴室附带的庭院花园。
adj. 人口稠密的；人口多的 Forests are also gaining ground in the world 's two populous countries , India and China .在世界上两个人口最多的国家——印度和中国，森林面积也在增加。
n. 瓷；瓷器 adj. 瓷制的；精美的 同义词:china, stoneware, china, delicate, fine Excessive detonation has caused the porcelain on this plug to break away .过分的爆炸会引起火花塞上的陶瓷头的破裂。
adj. 猪的，像猪的 同义词:swinish The scientific name is porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome .其科学名称为：猪生殖及呼吸综合征。
n. [脊椎] 箭猪，豪猪 同义词:hedgepig porcupine wants to help Tod .豪猪愿意帮助托托。
adj. 多孔渗水的；能渗透的；有气孔的 同义词:leachy, stomatal As snow hardens , it becomes smoother , less porous .随着雪变硬，它变得光滑而少孔。
adj. 手提的，便携式的；轻便的 n. 手提式打字机 同义词:luggable, hand-held The problem is that existing apparatus for measuring density tend to be either precise or portable .问题是现有的测量仪器精确的不方便方便的却又不够精确。
vt. 预示；预兆；意味着 同义词:indicate, forecast, shadow, spell, announce Her silence portends trouble.她沉默不语可不是好兆头。
n. 前兆；预示；迹象；异常之物 同义词:breath, evidence, sign, indication Viral "Blips": Benign or Portent of Bad Things to Come ?病毒“信号”：坏事情到来的征兆？
adj. 不祥的；预兆的；令人惊讶的 同义词:surprise, bodeful portentous soufflé that never truly rises.一部自命不凡的杂凑，不可能真正成功。
n. 公文包；文件夹；证券投资组合；部长职务 同义词:folder, briefcase Applied to the TB portfolio , the result does not look good .应用在结核病组合中，结果看起来并不是很好。
n. （有圆柱的）[建] 门廊；[建] 柱廊 同义词:porch, entrance hall The gateway and portico had openings all around .门洞两旁与廊子的周围都有窗棂。
v. 造成，形成；摆姿势；装模作样；提出…讨论 n. 姿势，姿态；装模作样 vi. 摆姿势；佯装；矫揉造作 同义词:take shape, shape into, attitude, posture, posture Allow me to pose several questions.请允许我提几个问题。
n. 难题；装腔作势者；不易处理的事 同义词:difficult problem, conundrum In ethics , there is a poser about the difference between killing and letting die .在道德观点上，有这样的一个问题：杀害一个人和坐视不理让一个人死去有什么分别？
n. 装模作样的人；装腔作势的人 同义词:posturer This marks you as a clueless poseur the moment you walk in the door .在你踏进餐厅门的那一刻起，就代表你变成了一个愚笨而装腔作势的人。
vt. 安置；假定 n. 假设；设想 同义词:establish, put, station, bed, plant, conception, hypothesis, if, assumption His glance stayed posited on the spot.他的目光盯住那一点不动。
n. 信心；肯定 同义词:confidence, hope, reliance Strong positiveness of HMB45 and muscle makers were helpful to diagnosis .HMB45的强阳性表达和肌源性标记阳性对诊断有帮助。

adj. 疯狂的；着魔的 同义词:crazy, mad, insane Bernhardt possessed an iron will , particularly after the birth of her son , and used her thin , pale beauty and her wits to succeed .伯恩哈特有着钢铁般的意志，尤其是在她的儿子出生后，她用自己瘦而苍白的美丽和她的智慧取得了成功。
adj. 其次的；较后的 n. 后部；臀部 同义词:latter, following, next, bottom, hip posterior hypothalamus performs the function of defence against cold .下丘脑后部执行着抵御寒冷的功能。
n. 子孙，后裔；后代 同义词:child, seed, progeny But posterity has no vote .但是子孙后代没有表决权。
adj. 死后的；遗腹的；作者死后出版的 Since then , Handel has enjoyed 250 years of uninterrupted posthumous fame .迄今，韩德尔已然得享了持续250年的身后声誉。
vt. 假定；要求；视…为理所当然 n. 基本条件；假定 同义词:require, exact, desire, perhaps, assumption the claims postulated要求事项
n. 花束；（刻在戒指里圈上的）诗句（等于posey） 同义词:bouquet, nosegay So it is unique minority sculpt and posy different from mid- region bronze culture at hte same age.造型和铭文具有鲜明的少数民族特征及地域性。因而区别于中原地区同期的青铜文化。
n. 饮料（常复数） adj. 适于饮用的 同义词:beverage, drink, belly-wash, bevvy He could be doused in water but it had to be potable .他可以被溺在水里，但必须要是饮用水。
n. 喝；饮料 同义词:beverage, drink Actually , potation is not able to hurt nerve cell .其实，适量饮酒不会对神经细胞造成伤害。
n. 效能；力量；潜力；权势 同义词:efficiency, strength, might, muscle, power A system of affirmative action has given caste potency .平权措施系统带给种性很大的影响力。
adj. 有效的；强有力的，有权势的；有说服力的 同义词:valid, available, effective, virtual, telling His cause has become a potent rallying - point for the left .他的事业已经成为左翼的一个强大的凝聚点。
n. 统治者，君主；有权势的人 同义词:emperor, governor, ruler, sovereignty People rose up against the despotic rule of their potentate .我们的校长是个专横的人。
n. 喧扰，骚动；烦恼 vt. 使烦恼，使困扰 vi. 烦恼；忙乱 同义词:combustion, worry, trouble, turmoil, trouble, harass, trouble, worry She often pothers herself over unnecessary details.她常在不必要的琐事上自扰。
n. 百花香；混合物；杂曲；大杂烩 同义词:mixture, hybrid, mix, compound B: It smells like a potpourri bag .闻起来像是百味袋。
adj. 实际的；实用主义的；国事的 同义词:practical, actual, effective, real, positive My view of international institutions is pragmatic .我对国际机构的观点是务实的。
n. 实用主义；独断 同义词:utilitarianism, Deweyism Russia 's new pragmatism is set out in a leaked foreign- ministry paper .一份泄露的外交部文件中陈述了俄罗斯的新实用主义政策。
n. 昂首阔步；（马）后足立地腾跃 vi. 腾跃；昂首阔步；欢跃 vt. 使腾跃 同义词:strutting, cavort, curvet The horses pranced in the circus ring.马匹在马戏场上腾跳。
n. 恶作剧，开玩笑；戏谑 vt. 装饰；打扮 vi. 炫耀自己；胡闹 同义词:mischief, trick, paint, hang, dress oneself, array, trick out, play the peacock, monkey business She always pranks herself up with the best clothes.她常穿着漂亮的衣服。
vt. 瞎扯 n. 唠叨；空谈；瞎扯 vi. 唠叨 同义词:talk, phrasemongering, rabbit on, chatter Listen to him prating on about his wealth.听他没完没了地吹嘘自己有钱。
vi. 闲聊；胡说；小孩般说话 n. 无聊话；咿咿呀呀声 vt. 天真地说 同义词:chat about, make conversation, small change, wish-wash The water prattled over the rocks.水在石上淙淙地流过。
vt. 说教；讲道；鼓吹；传道；反复灌输 vi. 说教；讲道；鼓吹；宣扬 n. 说教 同义词:drum in, boost, sermonize, homily The teacher kept preaching about the importance of study.老师不断地宣讲学习的重要性。
n. 序文；电报报头；先兆 vi. 作序文 同义词:proem The Fifth part of basis preamble analysis summary this article contribution as well as deficiency .第五部分根据前文分析总结本文的贡献以及不足之处。
adj. 危险的；不确定的 同义词:dangerous, critical, risky, threatening Many of the sources of today 's growth are temporary and precarious .当前的经济增长只是暂时的，而且极不稳定。
vt. 领先，在…之前；优于，高于 vi. 领先，在前面 同义词:take over the lead, keep ahead, take over the lead, keep ahead M precedes N in the alphabet.在字母表上M在N的前面。
n. 先例；前例 adj. 在前的；在先的 同义词:prior, prius But precedent suggests that this will serve merely to increase the demand for light .但是历史告诉我们这个应用将只会增加对光的需求。
n. 规则；格言；训诫；命令 同义词:instruction, regulation, order, bidding, word What is the precept here ?这里讲的规则是什么呢？

n. 校长；教师；指导医师 同义词:teacher, principal, professor, president, master You see , madame , how rightly I spoke when I said I required a preceptor to guide me in all my sayings and doings here .您瞧，夫人，我刚才不是还说需要一位老师来指导我学习法国的风俗习惯吗？
n. 选区；管理区；管辖区 同义词:electorate precinct commander in a police or fire department , usually ranking above a lieutenant and below a chief .警察局副巡官；消防队中队长警察局消防队的辖区指挥官，通常级别高于中尉，低于警长（或队长）
n. 悬崖；绝壁；险境 同义词:escarpment, krantz The world has stepped back from the brink , but is still skirting the edge of the precipice .世界已从悬崖边缘后退，但并没有完全脱离绝壁附近的危险地带。

n. [化学] 沉淀物 vt. 使沉淀；促成；猛抛；使陷入 vi. [化学] 沉淀；猛地落下；冷凝成为雨或雪等 adj. 突如其来的；猛地落下的；急促的 同义词:deposit, sediment, sludge, immerse, catalyse, deposit, settle, rapid The truck overturned and precipitated us into the ditch.卡车翻了，我们摔进了沟里。

n. [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽 同义词:deposit, sludge, sediment, subsidence The cline is considered the probable result of geographic trends in precipitation , temperature , and perhaps also photoperiod .人们认为这种梯度变异可能是降水量，温度也许还有光周期等地理趋势造成的结果。
adj. 险峻的；急躁的，鲁莽的 同义词:rapid, bold precipitous drop in coal prices last year as the world economy swooned has delayed some projects .而去年全球经济衰退造成的煤价暴跌延误了一些工程。
n. 摘要；大纲 vt. 概括…的大意；为…写摘要 [ 第三人称单数precis 过去式precised 过去分词precised 现在分词precising ] 同义词:abstract, brief, program, summary, resume précising a scientific report给一份科学报告写摘要
vt. 排除；妨碍；阻止 同义词:eliminate, dispute, let, stem, block Their move does not preclude others from investing.他们这一行动并不影响其他人进行投资。
adj. 早熟的；过早发育的 同义词:early, ratheripe Childhood hardship matured in him a precocious sense of responsibility .儿时的磨难使他提早形成了一种责任感。
n. 预知；先知 同义词:prophet, prognosis Representative powers include clairaudience / clairvoyance , object reading , precognition , and ubiquitous vision .该系典型异能包括“锐耳术/鹰眼术”、“阅读物体”、“预知术”和“全域视野”。
n. 偏见；先入之见；预想 同义词:forecast, bias By 12 weeks after delivery , all the parameters returned to preconception values.到产后12周时各项指标均恢复未孕水平。
n. 先驱，前导 同义词:forerunner, vaunt-courier Crazing is the precursor of brittle fracture .出现小裂纹必然是脆性断裂的前兆。

n. [动] 捕食者；[动] 食肉动物；掠夺者 同义词:carnivore, reiver Laws that bar sex offenders from living in so many places should be repealed , because there is no evidence that they protect anyone predator can always travel.应当废除给性犯罪者居住地设定诸多限制的法律，并没有证据表明这些法律保护了谁，因为性犯罪者可以随意搬迁。
vt. 注定 同义词:fate, foreordain These events were clearly predestined to happen.这些事件是不可避免要发生的。
n. 窘况，困境；状态 同义词:difficulty, status, corner, dilemma, fix It should also benefit the world economy in its present predicament .这也将有益于世界经济及其目前所处的困境。
adj. 可预言的 同义词:divinable The earthquake had been predicted several days before.这次地震早在几天前就已预报到了。

n. 偏爱，嗜好 同义词:weakness, preference, habit, favour, appetite Given the Dutch predilection for stuffing a house full of knickknacks , I decided this was no bad thing.当我想到荷兰人喜好的屋中摆满各种各样的小玩艺，我认为简陋一些倒并非是件坏事。
n. 倾向；素质；易染病体质 同义词:tendency, liability, trend, preference, disposition A practicing forensic scientist has a built -in bias or predisposition toward the prosecution 's side.开业的法医学家对辩方有一种固有的偏爱或倾向。
adj. 主要的；卓越的；支配的；有力的；有影响的 同义词:remarkable, excellent, primary, major, prominent It is the land which makes predominant contribution .土地为我们作出了最显著的贡献。
adj. 卓越的；超群的 同义词:remarkable, excellent, prominent, ranking Since you are preeminent , I want to invite you to join our society .我们社团正需要你这样的江湖人士，有兴趣加入吗？
vt. 先占；先取；以先买权获得 The local people fenced the land to preempt it against other claimants.当地人把地围了起来，以获得排斥他人购买该地的优先购买权。
n. 优先购买；强制收购；抢先占有；取代 同义词:displacement, subrogation The Supreme Court has set forth various factors which are to be considered in preemption cases .最高法院已经宣布了先占权案例中必须被考虑的各种各样的因素。
vt. 打扮；用嘴整理；赞扬 vi. 洋洋自得；把（自己）打扮漂亮 同义词:dress oneself, array A bird preened its feathers.鸟用喙整理它的羽毛。
n. 前言；引语 vt. 为…加序言；以…开始 vi. 作序 同义词:prolegomena, perface, begin with, open with He prefaced the diaries with a short account of how they were discovered.他给这本日记写了序言，简述日记发现的经过。
vt. 预示；预想 同义词:indicate, forecast, shadow, announce This visit may prefigure an improvement in relations between the two countries.这次访问可能预示两国关系的改进。

n. 怀孕；丰富，多产；意义深长 同义词:conception, abundance, plenty, amplitude, enrichment Uruguay 's president , Tabare Vazquez , vetoed a bill that would have legalized abortion up to the 12th week of pregnancy .乌拉圭总统巴斯克斯否决了一项提案，该提案旨在使12妊娠周内的堕胎合法化。
adj. 怀孕的；富有意义的 同义词:cyetic, childing And not just help children survive and grow , he says , but even to support the diets of pregnant women .他说，这不仅可以帮助儿童生存和生长，甚至可以供应妊娠妇女的饮食。
adj. 不利的；有害的；引起偏见的 同义词:harmful, adverse, against, evil, disadvantageous Too much smoking is prejudicial to health .吸烟过多对健康有损害。
adj. 文字出现以前的，尚无文字的 Similar tales were told by various preliterate peoples in Asia , Africa , and the Americas .在亚洲、非洲和美洲各国，文字出现之前，也有相似的传说。
n. 前奏；序幕；前奏曲 vt. 成为…的序幕；演奏…作为前奏曲 vi. 作为序曲；奏序曲 同义词:intrada, prolusion, sound off She preludes her remarks with a jest.她开始讲话时先说一个笑话。
adj. 预谋的；预先考虑的；经预先计划的 v. 预谋（premeditate的过去式和过去分词）；预先考虑 同义词:prepense, aforethought We needed to know whether the crime had been premeditated.我们需要知道的是这一犯罪行为是否经过事先策划过。
adj. 首位的；初次的；女主角的 vi. 初次公演；首次露面 vt. 初次公演；初次上演 n. 初次的演出；女主角 同义词:first-time, leading actress, chief actress Her film was premiered in Cannes Festival.她的影片在戛纳电影节首次放映。
n. 保险费，额外费用；奖金 同义词:bonus, dividend He would create a premium ice cream using only the finest ingredients .他会打造出一种优质冰淇淋，只用最上等的材料。
adj. 全神贯注的；心事重重的；被先占的 v. 抢先占有；使…全神贯注（preoccupy的过去式） 同义词:concentrated, rapt Something seems to be preoccupying her at the moment.她此刻若有所思。
n. 优势；多数；占优势 同义词:majority, superiority, advantage, edge, dominance A second problem is the preponderance of family -controlled firms .另一个问题是家族企业占多数。
vi. （在重量、数量、力量等方面）占优势 vt. 胜过；压倒 同义词:advantage over, prevail over, overcome, exceed, cap, transcend Christians preponderate in the population of that part of the country.基督教徒在该国那一地区的人口中居多。

adj. 给人好感的；有魅力的；引人注意的 v. 预先影响；使先具有（prepossess的现在分词） 同义词:attractive, catching Growing up physically small in the shadow of prepossessing Kim Il -sung can hardly have been easy .身材矮小的他从小生活在世人瞩目的金日成的阴影下，不可能是一件易事。
adj. 荒谬的；可笑的 同义词:ridiculous, absurd That 's a preposterous idea !那是一种荒谬的想法！
n. 先决条件 adj. 首要必备的 同义词:prior condition, pre-condition A second prerequisite is that uranium 235 must be present in sufficient abundance .第二个必要条件是，铀235的含量必须够充足。
n. 特权 adj. 有特权的 同义词:franchise, special privilege, favoured Creating life is no longer the prerogative of gods .创造生命不再是上帝的特权。
n. 预感；前兆 vt. 预感；预言 vi. 预示；预言 同义词:anticipation, symption, predict, prognosticate, soothsay, divine Those black clouds presage a storm.那乌云预示着暴风雨将要来临。
adj. 预知的；有先见之明的 同义词:provident, previsional It is very prescient -- even though the corporations who use little children in their marketing hate it .这个说法很有预见性—尽管在市场营销中使用小孩子的公司不喜欢这个字眼。
adj. 规定的 同义词:specified, stated, regulation, set, stipulated The supervisor prescribed the steps in which orders must be filled out.主管规定了完成订货的步骤。

adj. 规定的；有时效的 n. 规定；命令 同义词:specified, stated, regulation, set, stipulated, provision, instruction, order, bidding, do We can understand production in the economics , anthropology and biology fields . But these explanations are abstract prescript in the framework of category thought.生产，可从经济学、人类学、生物学意义上理解，但这些理解只是对生产的抽象规定，遮蔽了生产的生存论存在论基础。
n. 药方；指示；惯例 adj. 凭处方方可购买的 同义词:tradition, instruction, convention, usage, pointing Prescription medicine for expected length of stay .足够停留时间所需的处方药。
n. 提出者；推荐者；赠送者；任命者 同义词:appointer, nominator He had the honour of being presented to the king.他有幸觐见国王。

n. 防腐剂；预防法；防护层 adj. 防腐的；有保存力的；有保护性的 同义词:antiseptic agent, conserving agent, antirot, rotproof Historically , formaldehyde was first used as a biological preservative more than a century ago .历史上，甲醛曾首次作为生物防腐剂在一个多世纪前被应用。
vt. 保存；保护；维持；腌；禁猎 n. 保护区；禁猎地；加工成的食品 同义词:maintain, save, secure, corn, sustain, conservation area, conservation district Wax polish preserves wood and leather.上光蜡可以保护木材和皮革。
vi. 主持，担任会议主席 vt. 管理 同义词:to chair, run the show, manage, conduct, run, direct, control The Prime Minister presides at meetings of the Cabinet.首相主持内阁会议。
vt. 压；按；逼迫；紧抱 vi. 压；逼；重压 n. 压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷] 印刷机 同义词:push, hug, clic, news bulletin Press this button to start the engine.要开动发动机就按这个按钮。
n. 变戏法 同义词:conjury, hokey pokey Multi-purpose: go for utility ( Exs Prestidigitation , Grease , Alter Self , Shadow Conjuration , Shadow Evocation.泛用法术：选择有多种用途的法术——举例，魔法伎俩，油腻，改变自我，阴影咒法、阴影塑能。
adj. 有名望的；享有声望的 同义词:celebrated An international jury made up of prestigious graphic humour artists will select the winners .一个国际评审委员会由著名的图形幽默艺术家将选择赢家。

adj. 迅速的 adv. 赶快 n. 急板；急板之乐曲或乐章 int. 转眼间 同义词:rapid, fast, forward, ready, express, chop-chop Presto ! In fila! … No ! pazzo son! ( Sergeant , Des Grieux , Captain , chorus .快！排好队！……不！我快疯了！（军士/德格莱/船长/合唱。
adj. 可能有的；可推测的 同义词:guessable, conjecturable OBJECTIVE To synthesize the presumable bone - targeting nonsteroidal anti- inflammatory agents .目的合成可能具有骨靶向性的非甾体抗炎药。
n. 放肆，傲慢；推测 同义词:importance, theory, speculation, guess, projection The same presumption of innocence goes for copyright and privacy .就版权和隐私问题也可以作出同样无罪的推定。
adj. 专横的；放肆的；冒昧的 同义词:imperious, masterful She had struck him as rather presumptuous - indeed it was a part of her charm .他仍然觉得她非常高傲，确实，这是她的一部分魅力所在。
n. 假定；预想；臆测 同义词:perhaps, assumption, forecast All these plans presuppose that the bank will be willing to lend us the money.这些计划是预先假定银行会愿意借钱给我们而制定的。
n. 假装；借口；虚伪 同义词:simulation, excuse, acting, blind Any such pretence on his part would have been simply ridiculous .他那方面的任何这种冒充，都会是荒谬可笑的。
adj. 假装的；虚假的 v. 假装（pretend的过去式和过去分词）；装扮 同义词:affected, assumed, simulate, feigned They pretended to take the cloth off the loom .他们装做把布料从织机上取下来。
n. 自负；要求；主张；借口；骄傲 同义词:requirement, opinion, desire, need, excuse pretensioned concrete预应力(或先张法)混凝土[参较 posttension]
adj. 自命不凡的；炫耀的；做作的 同义词:affected, ambitious That young man is extremely pretentious .那个年轻人非常自命不凡。
n. 自负；狂妄；自命不凡 同义词:inflation, ego The setting for love affects your mood , but you are disinclined to pretentiousness .在恋爱中的状态将影响你的情绪，并讨厌那些虚伪做作的感情。
adj. 超自然的；异常的，不可思议的 同义词:novel, magic, mysterious, exquisite Of the nature of a miracle preternatural .奇迹般的具有奇迹特性的；
n. 借口；托辞 vt. 以…为借口 同义词:excuse, blind He pretexted an early engagement in town the next morning.他借口明天早晨在城里有约会。
vi. 盛行，流行；战胜，获胜 同义词:obtain, win Justice has prevailed,the guilty man has been punished.正义已经获胜，有罪的人受到了惩罚。

adj. 流行的；一般的，最普通的；占优势的；盛行很广的 v. 盛行，流行（prevail的现在分词形式）；获胜 同义词:popular, general, fashionable, going, common, winning The frothy levels of government indebtedness prevailing in developed countries are certainly not reassuring .发达国家政府普遍存在的高负债水平，当然不会让人放心。
adj. 流行的；普遍的，广传的 同义词:popular, widespread, universal, fashionable, going But courses about how to do it better are less prevalent .但有关如何改善实践的课程，却不是那么常见。
vi. 搪塞；支吾其辞，闪烁其辞 同义词:fence with, tergiversate Tell us exactly what happened and don't prevaricate.有什么就详详细细地告诉我们，不要支吾。
n. 预知；先见 同义词:prognosis, foreknowledge She previsioned herself in a position where she could repay slurs.她预见到自己处于能补偿污点的地位。
vi. 捕食；掠夺；折磨 n. 捕食；牺牲者；被捕食的动物 同义词:grind down, lie on, victim, predation The villagers were preyed on by bandits from the hills.村民们受到山里强盗的抢劫。
vt. 刺，戳；刺伤，刺痛；竖起 n. 刺，扎；刺痛，刺伤；阴茎；锥 vi. 刺；竖起 adj. 竖起的 同义词:cut, pink, smart, thorn, stick up, run through, cocked The child pricked the balloon and it burst.那孩子在气球上刺了个洞，气球就爆了。
n. 刺；刺痛；植物的皮刺；针刺般的感觉 vt. 针一般地刺；戳；使感到刺痛 vi. 引起刺痛；感到刺痛 同义词:smart, thorn, stick, pink, tingle Be careful—the chestnut burs can prickle your fingers.当心，栗刺会刺你手指的。
adj. 多刺的；刺痛的；易动怒的 同义词:raw, thorny Many of the species native to California , such as the prickly chaparral , rely on fires to propagate .加利福尼亚有许多土生土长的物种需要依靠火灾才能繁衍增殖，比如多刺的灌木丛。
n. 一本正经的人；小偷 同义词:thief, pilferer He is a prig .他是一个自以为是的家伙。
adj. 拘谨的；整洁的；呆板的 vt. 使显得一本正经；把…打扮得整整齐齐 vi. 显得一本正经 同义词:mechanical, wooden, formal, dead She prims her thin lips after every mouthful of tea.她每喝完一口茶都让自己的薄嘴唇带出严肃的表情。

n. 大主教；灵长类的动物；首领 adj. 灵长目动物的；首要的 同义词:leader, chief, captain, boss, principal, all-important Treetop delivery rooms are unusual for humans but not for other primate species .在树上生产对人类并不寻常，但是其他的灵长类就稀松平常了。
n. 初级读本；识字课本；原始物 This is a Latin primer .这是拉丁文入门。
adj. 原始的；初期的（等于primaeval） 同义词:original, earlier, young Having a baby is a primeval act .产出婴儿是一种原始的动作。
adj. 原始的，远古的；简单的，粗糙的 n. 原始人 同义词:original, simple, crude, plain, rough, Euroman This epic extolled the founder of this primitive tribe .这部史诗歌颂了这个原始部落的创始人。

adj. 原始的；根本的；原生的 同义词:organic, original, fundamental, ultimate, radical Astronomers will tell you that they are born in the collapse of primordial clouds of gas and dust .天文学家们会告诉你，它们诞生于原始的由气体和尘埃组成的云团的崩溃。
vt. 精心打扮；装饰 vi. 装饰；打扮 同义词:paint, hang, dress oneself, sharp, trick out She primped her hair.她仔细地整理头发。
adj. 王子的，高贵的；慷慨的；豪华的 同义词:grand, royal, generous, handsome, distinguished His many projects , his immense knowledge and his princely manner made him a man apart .其众多的作品，广博的知识和高贵的举止使他成了一个与众不同的人。
n. 优先；优先权；[数] 优先次序；优先考虑的事 同义词:precedence, preference to sth The priority is protecting the police and the public from their attacks .当前的第一要务是保护警方和民众免受其伤害。
adj. 原始的，古时的；纯朴的 同义词:original, primitive This is suggested by observation of pristine coral reefs in the middle of the Pacific .这是在观察太平洋中部的原始珊瑚礁的报告中提出的。
n. 贫困；丧失；被剥夺了某物的状态 同义词:poverty, want " That is the advantage of privation . " answered the doctor .“这就是没吃没喝的优点。”博士说。
n. 特权；优待；基本权利 vt. 给与…特权；特免 同义词:franchise, peculiar the privileged class特权阶级
n. 试用；缓刑；查验 同义词:suspended sentence, try-on He was a mechanic who was on probation .它们不过是抑制情欲的一种考验。
n. 探针；调查 vi. 调查；探测 vt. 探查；用探针探测 同义词:investigation, research, examine, explore, burrow into He probed the swelling anxiously with his finger.他用手指很担心地触摸肿处。
adj. 好探索的；深入锐利的 n. 探索；探查 v. 探索（probe的ing形式） 同义词:ascertainment, exploring, questing He probed the swelling anxiously with his finger.他用手指很担心地触摸肿处。

n. 廉洁；正直 同义词:integrity, honesty, righteousness Mr Aquino's image is built on the notion that probity for which his late mother was famous is there in his genes .他已故的母亲因对抗独裁统治在国内非常受欢迎，选民认为他母亲优秀性格可能遗传给了他，这也就为他树立了良好形象。
n. 鼻子；[昆] 喙；象鼻；[无脊椎] 吻 同义词:nose, boko It has a long proboscis used for collecting nectar .它有着长长的口器以便从花中吸取花蜜。
n. 收入，收益；实收款项 同义词:earning, yield, receipt In any other case alcohol formed as the reaction proceeds cannot be oxidized .在其它任何情况下，反应进行时所生成的醇，不能被氧化。
n. 队伍，行列；一列，一排；列队行进 vi. 列队行进 vt. 沿著……行进 同义词:train, cavalcade, file He made little effort to hide from his wife this procession of young women .他毫不介意不对自己的妻子隐瞒这一大堆身边的年轻女人。
n. 倾向；癖性 同义词:tendency, liability, trend, preference, disposition in a proclivity for the uniform, the identical , and the inert ;存在于对千人一面、一致性和惰性的癖好；
vt. 耽搁，延迟 vi. 耽搁，延迟 同义词:time delay, detain, wait, time delay He procrastinated until it was too late to do anything.他拖延耽误以致一事无成。
vi. 生育（子女）；产生 vt. 生殖 同义词:result, breed, generate, reproduce procreating their kind生育他们的儿女
adj. 强求一致的；迫使就范的；残暴的 同义词:tyrannical, ruffianly We are firmly opposed to the policy of a Procrustean bed .我们坚决反对强求一致的政策。
n. 代理人；学监 vt. 监督 同义词:deputy, agent, factor, secondary, proxy, police, oversee, to monitor Torre said Proctor may have been too pumped up, trying to overthrow his pitches .老爹说天天p也许投高了，尝试把球投的太高了。
n. 采购；获得，取得 同义词:purchasing, acquisition, getting, taking, winning And procurement teams are beating up consultants on price .而采购团队会在价格上打压咨询机构。
adj. 挥霍的；十分慷慨的 n. 浪子；挥霍者 同义词:flush, dissipator, spendthrifty Nature is prodigal in variety , but niggard in innovation.自然界虽富于变化却吝于革新。
adj. 惊人的，异常的，奇妙的；巨大的 同义词:tremendous, wonderful, huge, enormous, massive This has helped to fuel China's prodigious growth .这帮助成就了中国巨大的经济增长。
n. 奇迹，奇事；奇才；奇观；预兆 同义词:phenomenon, wonder, miracle, warning Dressed in a ridiculous costume , he was presented at court as a prodigy of six .穿了一套可笑的服装，他被人以六岁神童的称号带到宫廷里去。
adj. 亵渎的；世俗的；异教的 vt. 亵渎；玷污 同义词:lay, mundane, cloud, unhallow Their behaviours profaned the holy place.他们的行为玷污了这处圣地。
n. 亵渎；不敬的言语 In matter of profanity he was sublime .以亵渎神圣的言行而论，他是首屈一指的。
n. 提供；提出；提议 vt. 提供；提出；奉献 同义词:proposal, offer, afford, introduce, present, prefer, tender She proffered him her resignation.她向他提交了辞呈。
adj. 熟练的，精通的 n. 精通；专家，能手 同义词:experienced, skilled, accomplished, perfect, clever, expert, specialist Mr. Barret is not proficient in diagnosis , let alone investigation .巴瑞特先生不擅长诊断，更不必提研究方面。
n. 侧面；轮廓；外形；剖面 同义词:configuration, side, shell, outline The huge trees were profiled against the night sky.在夜空的映衬下显出大树的轮廓。
vi. 赚大钱；牟取暴利 n. [贸易] 奸商；牟取暴利的人 同义词:make a killing, seek excessive profits, sharp-shooter Rent controls were introduced to prevent profiteering.为了防止牟取暴利因此实行了租金控制。
adj. 放荡的，不检点的；恣意挥霍的 n. 放荡者；享乐者 同义词:gay, dissolute, roue, squanderer There are two reasons to doubt that the Germans are suddenly becoming profligate .至于德国人是否突然变得花钱大手大脚了现在还不好说。
n. 深刻；深度；深奥 同义词:depth, deepness It is a way of infusing some Hollywood venture with profundity .这是一种注入了一些深度的好莱坞式冒险。
adj. 丰富的；很多的；慷慨的；浪费的 同义词:abundant, numerous, full, generous, plenty Her head was covered with a profuse mass of curls .她有一头浓密的卷发。

n. 丰富，充沛；慷慨 同义词:abundance, plenty, pregnancy, amplitude, enrichment They are outstanding not only for their size but also for the profusion , diversity and beauty of their mineral formations .这些洞穴不仅面积广阔，美轮美奂，而且拥有大量丰富的矿物构成。
n. 祖先；原著；起源 同义词:birth, father, root Red bone marrow contains stem cells , progenitor cells , precursor cells, and functional blood cells .红骨髓由干细胞、先祖细胞和功能性血细胞组成。
n. 子孙；后裔；成果 同义词:production, child, feedback, outcome, seed The progeny resembled one of the other of the parents .后代象亲本的一方或另一方。
vt. 预言，预测 同义词:predict, forecast, calculate to prognosticate future relations预示未来的关系
adj. 禁止的，禁止性的；抑制的；（费用，价格等）过高的；类同禁止的 同义词:inhibitory, verboten The cost of education prohibitive to lower-income families .许多低收入家庭对教育经费不敢问津。
adj. 抛射的；抛掷的；供抛射用的；（触角等）能伸出的 n. 射弹；抛射体；自动推进武器 Six months for projectile to encyst before the knees can be opened safely .有六个月时间让弹片结成胞囊，在膝头上动手术才能安全。
n. 普罗，无产者；工人 adj. 普罗阶级的，无产阶级的 同义词:worker, laborer He is the father of proletarian literature .他是无产阶级文学的奠基人。
vi. 增殖；扩散；激增 vt. 使激增 同义词:surge, sharp rise, balloon proliferated ideas层出不穷的想法
adj. 多产的；丰富的 同义词:abundant, productive, full, luxurious Abroad , she was the country 's best -known journalist , a prolific author and columnist .而在国外，她是俄罗斯最出名的记者，一个多产的专栏作家。
adj. 冗长的；说话啰嗦的 同义词:interminable, verbose prolix lecturer telling you more than you want to know .所说的比你想知道的还要多的、冗长罗嗦的演讲。
n. 开场白；序言 vt. 加上…前言；为…作序 同义词:opening remarks, introductory remarks to prologue an article为一篇文章作序
vt. 延长；拖延 同义词:drag on, drag out They prolonged their visit by two days.他们延长访问二天。
adj. 延长的；拖延的；持续很久的 同义词:drawn-out, stretched-out Cables are usually laid underground that their life prolonged .电缆通常铺设在地下，为的是延长使用期限。
vi. 散步 vt. 散步，漫步；骑马 n. 散步；舞会；骑马 adj. 散步的 同义词:have a walk, pasear, to take a walk, have a walk, walk along, ball, walk, dance to promenade on the beach在海滩上散步
n. 乱交；混乱 同义词:chaos, disorder, confusion, involvement, mix In fact , bonobo promiscuity seems to be an example of this.事实上倭黑猩猩的混交行为便是佐证。

adj. 混杂的；杂乱的 adv. 偶然地；胡乱地 同义词:miscellaneous, jumbly, random, wild, accidentally Their close relatives the meadow voles , by contrast , prefer a solitary , promiscuous existence .相比而言，草甸田鼠-草原田鼠的近亲，则更偏爱独居的，滥交的生活方式。

adj. 敏捷的，迅速的；立刻的 vt. 提示；促进；激起；（给演员）提白 n. 提示；付款期限；DOS命令：改变DOS系统提示符的风格 adv. 准时地 同义词:rapid, fast, fly, forward, ready, facilitate, boost, further, cue, noting, punctually What prompted her to be so generous?是什么原因使得她如此大方呢?

n. 激励；提示；刺激 v. 促进；激起；鼓舞（prompt的ing形式） 同义词:stimulus, incentive, animation, excitement, needle, pushing, facilitating A potentially even more interesting application could involve prompting cloned stem cells to differentiate into cells of the blood and bone marrow .还有一种应用可能更为有趣，这或许和诱导复制干细胞分化成血球与骨髓细胞有关。
n. 机敏，敏捷；迅速 同义词:velocity, speed What prompted her to be so generous?是什么原因使得她如此大方呢?
vt. 公布；传播；发表 同义词:deliver, post, notify, transmit to promulgate regulation颁布规则
adj. 俯卧的；有…倾向的，易于…的 同义词:liable, apt In Britain , and now in Germany , some converts to Islam appear to be prone to extremism .在英国，以及现在的德国，一些皈依伊斯兰教的人似乎对极端主义思想情有独钟。
adj. 显著的；断然的；讲出来的 v. 发音；宣告；断言（pronounce的过去分词） 同义词:obvious, prominent, marked, noted, outstanding, professed The priest said, “I now pronounce you man and wife.”神父说：“我现在宣布你们两人结为夫妻。”
vt. 支撑；维持 n. 支柱；支持者 同义词:maintain, support, uphold, sustain, leg, backbone, stay, advocate, mainstay He propped his stick against the wall.他把手杖靠墙立着。
vt. 传播；传送；繁殖；宣传 vi. 繁殖；增殖 同义词:breed, transmit, breed, increase The weeds propagate themselves rapidly.杂草繁殖极快。
vt. 推进；驱使；激励；驱策 同义词:stimulate, power A sailing boat is propelled by wind.帆船是由风力推进的。
n. [航][船] 螺旋桨；推进器 同义词:airscrew, airfoil The driving power enters the differential through the drive pinion on the end of the propeller shaft .也就是说，驱动力是从传动轴末端的传动齿轮输送到差速器的。

n. 倾向，习性；癖好，偏爱 同义词:tendency, liability, behaviour, trend, habit This is achieved in part by tapping into our natural propensity to believe in supernatural beings that can influence our fate .通过挖掘人们的相信影响我们命运超自然存在的自然倾向，宗教的主要功能就已经部分地达到了。
n. [药] 预防药；预防法；避孕用具 adj. 预防疾病的 同义词:preventive Education by itself is no paranormal prophylactic .这是光凭教育无法预防的。
n. 接近；邻近；近亲关系 同义词:approach, neighborhood Their relationship could not be explained as being based on mere propinquity : they were more than relatives ;他们的关系不能被解释为依据仅仅是接近：他们的亲属以上；
vt. 抚慰，安抚；与…和解 同义词:placate, conciliate They offered sacrifices to propitiate the god.他们供奉祭品以求神息怒。
adj. 安抚的；劝解的；讨好的 同义词:conciliatory, ingratiating They offered sacrifices to propitiate the god.他们供奉祭品以求神息怒。
adj. 适合的；吉利的；顺利的 同义词:adaptive, calculated, smooth, benign The present moment was peculiarly propitious for rebellion .目前这一时刻对于叛变特别有利。
n. 支持者；建议者；提出认证遗嘱者 同义词:advocate, supporter According to her Web site , she is a proponent of alternative medicine that uses a holistic approach .据她的网站说，她是利用综合疗法以替代药物的支持者。
n. 所有权；所有人 adj. 所有的；专利的；私人拥有的 同义词:ownership, holder, any, having, patent For years they have been using proprietary trading desks to take positions .他们花费好几年时间使用所有权交易专柜抢占位置。
n. 适当；礼节；得体 同义词:fitness, ceremony, relevance Packing condition means materials for and propriety of packing.填包装材料与包装状况是否良好。
n. 推进；推进力 同义词:drive, pulsion But magnetic propulsion has some drawbacks .但是磁力推进有一些缺陷。
n. 休会；闭会 同义词:adjournment Mr Harper turned a customary recess prorogation .哈珀把会期内惯例休会改成了会期间休会。
v. 休会 to prorogue the legislative session by the coming week立法会议休会到下周末
adj. 平凡的，乏味的；散文体的 同义词:ordinary, stock, stupid At this grand moment Pug Henry 's thoughts were prosaic .在这个伟大的时刻，帕格?亨利的思想却毫无诗意。
vt. 剥夺……的公权；禁止 同义词:bar, inhibit The sale of narcotics is proscribed by law.法律禁止贩卖毒品。
vt. 检举；贯彻；从事；依法进行 vi. 起诉；告发；作检察官 同义词:carry out, undertake, pursue, address, have, law, take legal action to prosecute an investigation进行调查
