adj. 活泼的；愉快的 adv. 活泼地 同义词:alive, lively, good, bright, activated, vigorously, spiritedly She was too sprightly to allow of their walking at a slow pace on her account .她很利索地跟着他们走，以免他们为了她的缘故而要放慢脚步。

n. 勇气；精神；引火柴；（苏格兰）怒意 vt. 鼓起勇气 vi. （苏格兰）发怒 同义词:courage, energy, nerve, soul, mind, nerve oneself, take courage, get up the courage, anger, chafe at, be hot under the collar, show one's teeth She spunked up her courage finally and knocked at the door.最后她终于鼓起了勇气敲了敲门。
adj. 假的；伪造的；欺骗的 同义词:false, bogus For now , the hubris of spurious precision has given way to humility .目前，虚假的精度所引起的妄尊已被谦卑所取代。
vt. 唾弃；冷落；一脚踢开 vi. 摒弃；藐视 n. 藐视，摒弃；踢开 同义词:conspue, absent treatment, do without, think scorn of, disdainfulness All my requests were spurned by my boss.我所有的请求均遭到老板的拒绝。
adj. 肮脏的；污秽的；卑劣的 同义词:dirty, filthy, grimy He toured India 's engorged cities and squalid villages .他周游印度各地拥挤的城市和贫穷污秽的乡村。

vt. 消除；镇压；压碎；使…咯吱咯吱的响 vi. 嘎吱作响 n. 噪声控制；嘎吱声；压倒对方的反驳；压碎的一堆 同义词:eliminate, avoid, suppress, crump The door was squelched by him.屋门被他打碎了。

adj. 蹒跚的；令人惊愕的；犹豫的 v. 蹒跚（stagger的ing形式） 同义词:doddery, hitchy, tottering Um , the size , the scale , the scope is truly staggering .这些城市的数量和规模真的是让我吃惊。
adj. 停滞的；不景气的；污浊的；迟钝的 同义词:slow, dull If the economy remains stagnant , the Bank will probably be slow to remove the liquidity .如果经济仍继续停滞不前，英国央行将可能放慢消除流动性。

adj. 做作的，不自然的 同义词:affected, hokey For the barking fat -faced mediocrity in the stagy black uniform he feels chiefly to be attempted, modified by caution .对于身穿行头般黑军服的这个肥头胖脑、汪汪狂叫的庸才，他所感到的主要是给谨慎小心冲淡了的轻蔑。

adj. 陈腐的；不新鲜的 vi. 变陈旧；撒尿；变得不新鲜 vt. 使变旧；变得不新鲜 n. 尿 同义词:banal, trite, urinate, urine, emiction Fresh thinking , instead of stale arguments , has rarely been so badly needed .新鲜的思维，而不是陈腐的争吵，似乎从未变得如此亟需。

n. （植物的）茎，秆；（支持叶子、果实和花的）梗，柄；追踪；高视阔步 vt. 追踪，潜近；高视阔步 vi. 高视阔步地走；潜近，偷偷接近 同义词:stem, tracking, handle, trail, follow up on, move in on He stalked to the building.他悄悄地靠近了那所建筑。
adj. 坚定的；健壮的 n. 坚定分子 同义词:committed, firm, confirmed, stable, decisive At best he was commended for his athletic presence and stalwart demeanor .人们推荐他的理由顶多是健美的身型和忠实的态度。
n. 毅力；精力；活力；持久力 同义词:energy, vitality, spring, steam, vigor Such exercises as keeping us strength and flexibility and stamina are important .能够提高我们的体力、柔韧性和耐力的运动很重要。
vi. 口吃；结结巴巴地说 vt. 口吃；结巴着说出 n. 口吃；结巴 同义词:titubate, stumble over, impediment, mogilalia He always stammered when he met her.他一遇见她就口吃。

n. 立场；姿态；位置；准备击球姿势 同义词:location, situation, site, lie Personal stance : Wanders around the museum switching off lights . But believes corporations hold the key to cutting emissions .个人立场：在博物馆里四处走动，随时关掉电灯。但认为减排的关键在于企业。
vt. 止血；使不漏；平息 vi. 停止流出 adj. 坚固的；忠实的；防水的 同义词:quell, defuse, faithful, resisting to stanch blood止血
adj. 冷淡的，不友好的 同义词:cold, lukewarm I imagine God to be rather formal , almost standoffish .在我想像中，神是拘谨的，近乎漠的。
n. 演出期；局；场；诗的一节 同义词:bureau, department First , the machine garage has an advantage of outstanding stanza .首先，机械车库具有突出的节地优势。
n. 主要产品；订书钉；主题；主食 adj. 主要的，大宗生产的；常用的；纺织纤维的 vt. 把…分级；钉住 同义词:topic, theme, subject, main products, primary, major, central, main, leading, pin up, nail up to staple one's drafts用订书钉把稿子钉起来
n. [轻] 订书机；主要商品批发商；把羊毛分级的人 同义词:stitching machine, binding machine You can use glue or stapler .你可以用胶水或订书机。
adj. 不幸的；运气不好的；倒霉的 同义词:evil, unfortunate, unlucky, tragic The star-crossed lovers moved step by step into tragedy .那些不幸的的情侣们一步一步走向悲剧。
adj. 含淀粉的；浆糊状的；刻板的 同义词:farinaceous, striped-pants No one carried a pound of superfluous flesh , in spite of the vast quantities of starchy food .虽然吃进了那么多的淀粉，可没有一个人长有一磅多余的肉。
adj. 完全的；荒凉的；刻板的；光秃秃的；朴实的 adv. 完全；明显地；突出地；质朴地 同义词:full, complete, absolute, total, wild, obviously, clearly, very, broadly And yet the differences stark .然而，两国是那么地不同。
n. 藏匿处；藏匿物 vt. 存放；贮藏 vi. 存放；藏起来 同义词:store, deposit, put out of sight, trust with They stashed the guns away under the ground.他们把那批枪埋藏在地下了。
adj. 静态的；静电的；静力的 n. 静电；静电干扰 同义词:electrostatic, franklinic A nearby supernova might come through as a burst of static .邻近的超新星可能听起来就像一阵天电爆丛；
adj. 固定的；静止的；定居的；常备军的 n. 不动的人；驻军 同义词:standing, settled, still, resident, set Relativity states that fast - moving objects age more slowly than stationary ones.相对论说，快速移动的物体会比静止不动的老化得慢。
n. 文具；信纸 同义词:writing materials, letter pad This shop handles paper and stationery .这家商店经营纸张文具。
n. 雕像；雕像艺术 adj. 雕塑的；雕像用的 同义词:effigy The statuary of Yan Xiu is on the top of the column ( bronze ).最上端安放严修先生的肖像（青铜）。
n. 小雕像 同义词:figurine There 's nothing like a little golden statuette on the mantelpiece to burnish a fragile ego.对于明星们来说，如果能够在壁炉上摆放上一座小小的金质奖杯，该是多么的荣耀啊！
n. 身高，身材；（精神、道德等的）高度 同义词:height, shape, altitude But what has squeezed the Shia party most is loss of the stature it recently gained among a wider Arab public .但对什叶派政党压力最大的还是它最近在广大阿拉伯群体中所获得的声望的丧失。
n. 地位；状态；情形；重要身分 同义词:capacity, ranking I was aware of my low status .我意识到了自己地位的低下。

n. [法] 法规；法令；条例 同义词:act, ordinance FOIA is a disclosure statute , and it does not affect the agencies ' discretion to release material that falls within the statutory exemptions .《信息自由法》系有关披露的法规，该法并不影响行政机关披露属于法规免责范围的材料的酌处权。
adj. 法定的；法令的；可依法惩处的 同义词:legal, lawful He says he would break the big five unions statutory stranglehold on representation in companies .他说他会打破五大联盟法定的对公司代表权的压制。
adj. 陡峭的；不合理的；夸大的；急剧升降的 vt. 泡；浸；使…充满 vi. 泡；沉浸 n. 峭壁；浸渍 同义词:tall, unreasonable, dip, dunk, crag, krantz to steep the tea in hot water用热水泡茶
n. 尖塔；尖顶 vt. 把…建成尖塔 同义词:minaret, spire They all hinge together like bats in a steeple .他们像尖塔里的蝙蝠似的靠拢在一起。
vt. 控制，引导；驾驶 vi. 驾驶，掌舵；行驶 n. 阉牛 同义词:possess, contain, regulate, bit, bottle, to navigate to steer a plane驾驶飞机

n. 干；茎；船首；血统 vt. 阻止；除去…的茎；给…装柄 vi. 阻止；起源于某事物；逆行 同义词:birth, blood, stock, block, dispute, prohibit, discourage, prevent from, head off The strawberries should be stemmed before they are tinned.装听之前，这些草莓得去掉果梗。
n. 恶臭；臭气 vt. 使…散发恶臭 vi. 发恶臭 同义词:malodor, effluvium, stink of The stench was especially bad at night when they camped near their newly dug latrines .夜晚，当他们在新挖茅厕的边上露营时，几股臭味掺和一道，更是奇丑无比。
n. 模版，蜡纸 vt. 用蜡纸印刷；用模板印刷 同义词:waxed paper to stencil a flower pattern on the handkerchief在手帕上印上花的图案
n. 速记法，速记 同义词:shorthand Please give me information on their shorthand stenography , and typing abilities .请告诉我们有关他们速记和打字的能力。
adj. 声音洪亮的 Speak softly ; you don't need a stentorian voice to be heard in this small room .说话轻柔点；在这小房间里你不需要这么大声被人听见。
vt. 使用铅版；套用老套，使一成不变 n. 陈腔滥调，老套；铅版 同义词:truism, conventionality to stereotype a painting with dark colour以陈旧方式用深色颜料作画
adj. 不育的；无菌的；贫瘠的；不毛的；枯燥乏味的 同义词:hungry, desert Best of all, the yen is not sterile asset like gold .最重要的是，日元并不是像黄金那样的“不结果”资产。
vt. 消毒，杀菌；使成不毛；使绝育；使不起作用 同义词:listerize, antisepticize He boiled his syringe and fired his knife to sterilize them.他把注射器放到水中煮，把刀子放在火上烧来进行消毒。

n. 船尾；末端 adj. 严厉的；坚定的 同义词:terminal, bottom, extreme, severe, committed, firm, confirmed, tight Alas , experience is a " lantern on stern , which shines only on the waves behind us ".唉，经验就是“一盏船尾的灯，它只在我们身后的波涛上放光”。
vt. 用听诊器诊断 n. [临床] 听诊器 同义词:echometer to stethoscope one's chest用听诊器检查胸腔
n. 坚持细节的人；顽固的人；费解的事物 同义词:donkey, bullhead People find her stickler about trifles.人们发现她是个拘泥的人。
adj. 粘的；粘性的 同义词:glutinous, viscous There are several explanations for why dividends have been sticky in Asia .对于为何亚洲的红利一直具有粘性，存在几个解释。
vt. 诬蔑；玷污；给…打上烙印 同义词:cloud, pollute to stigmatize one's family使家庭蒙羞
n. 匕首；小剑；细高跟女鞋 同义词:knife, coutel Stiletto heels could be banned from the workplace because of health and safety reasons , according to the Trade Union bosses .据英国工会经理们称，由于健康和安全因素，高跟鞋应该在工作场所受到禁止。

adj. 不自然的；呆板的；僵硬的 v. 使踩高跷（stilt的过去分词） 同义词:wooden, mechanical, rigid, dead Avoid questions that encourage " yes " or " no " answers , because this will lead to stilted conversation .另外，避免在谈话中出现需要对方回答“是”或“不是”的问题，因为这可能会造成谈话紧张。

n. [药] 兴奋剂；刺激物；酒精饮料 adj. 激励的；使人兴奋的 同义词:a shot in the arm, irritation, incentive, hortatory That 's because the stimulant constricts blood vessels and may reduce blood flow to the fetus .因为这种刺激性的物质会压缩血管并可能减小流到胎儿的血量。
n. 刺激；激励；刺激物 同义词:incentive, animation, excitement, needle, irritation China is a worry , thanks to the scale and composition of its stimulus .中国是个担忧，这要感谢中国激励措施的组合及程度。
n. 刺痛；讽刺，刺激；刺毛 vt. 刺；驱使；使…苦恼；使…疼痛 vi. 刺痛；被刺痛；感到剧痛 同义词:stimulus, smart, incentive, excitement, hit, stick, pink, smart, bite He was stung by a wasp.他被马蜂螫了一下。
adj. 吝啬的，小气的；有刺的；缺乏的 同义词:cheap, tight, lacking I'm not a stingy person , and I can do more frankly.我不是一个小气的人，但我可以做的更大度一些。
n. 臭味；讨厌的人 vi. 发出臭味；招人讨厌 vt. 使发出臭气；用臭味驱赶 同义词:smell, nuisance, funk The meat has stunk.这块肉已经腐坏发臭了。
n. 节约；定额，定量 vt. 节省；限制 vi. 紧缩，节省 同义词:economy, saving, quota, norm, block, qualify, save, tuck in Don't stint on time to make a plan.在制定计划上不要吝惜时间，多想一想好。
n. 奖学金；固定薪金；定期津贴；养老金 同义词:scholarship, fellowship All interships carry a stipend and most provide a tuition waiver.所有助教工作都有薪金，而且大多数还为学生免除学费。
vt. （雕刻）点刻；点彩 n. （绘画）点画；点刻法 vi. 用点刻；用点画 This is called a ruling and with very fine lines it gives the same appearance as a stipple .这称作网线。如采用极精细的网线，便可产生与网点相同的效果。
vi. 规定；保证 vt. 规定；保证 adj. 有托叶的 同义词:to formulate, prescribe, define, undertake, regulate, assure, state to stipulate a price规定价格
n. 规定；约定；条款；契约 同义词:provision, item, convention, do, appointment The general L/C usually bears this stipulation .公开议付信用证通常带有这个条款。
n. 针脚，线迹；一针 vt. 缝，缝合 vi. 缝，缝合 同义词:steek, seam, oversew, sew up to stitch two sacks together to make a curtain把两块麻袋片缝在一起权充窗帘
n. 股份，股票；库存；血统；树干 adj. 存货的，常备的；平凡的 vt. 进货；备有；装把手于… vi. 囤积；办货；出新芽 同义词:birth, blood, stem, ordinary, mediocre, be furnished with, corner I stocked many facial tissues in my shop.我的店里有大量面巾纸的存货。
n. 栅栏；围起的地方 vt. 用栅栏围住；用栅栏防卫 同义词:rail fence, pale to stockade one's house yard用栅栏围住住宅院子
adj. 矮壮的；健壮结实的 The trimly bearded , stocky Mr Meshal , relaxed and often humorous , plainly thinks time is on his side .这位身材矮壮，蓄着胡子的马沙尔先生语气轻松又不失幽默，显然认为时间在他一边。
vt. 贪婪地吃；使填饱，搀和 vi. 艰难地行走；狼吞虎咽 n. 乏味的食物；乏味的作品；贪吃的人；油腻的食物 同义词:scoff, gobble up, bolt down, chowhound, swallower I'm so hungry that I can stodge a sheep.我太饿了，现在我能吃掉一只羊。

adj. 平凡的；塞满的；庸俗的 同义词:ordinary, stock, crowded Being seen as a big , stodgy bank — even , you might say , something like a utility — is a novelty for BofA .被看成是一家庞大的，笨拙的银行-你甚至可以把它看成是公共事业--对美洲银行来说是一个新奇的事物。
n. 斯多葛学派哲学家；禁欲主义者 adj. 斯多葛派的；禁欲主义的 " Aesthetically , it 's stoic , even off -putting, " said the theatre manager , leading a tour .“美学上来讲，这种恬淡寡欲甚至令人心悸，”正带领观光团的剧院管理员这样评价。
n. 斯多葛哲学，斯多葛学派；恬淡寡欲 She showed stoicism during her husband's final illness .她在丈夫患病临终期间表现出了坚强的毅力。
vi. 烧火；做司炉工；大吃大喝 vt. 拨旺火；使饱吃一顿 同义词:fire, feast on to stoke the stove给炉子添燃料
adj. 迟钝的；缺乏热情的；冷漠的 同义词:distant, slow From the outside , its stolid grayness is more Soviet than Swiss .从外表看它的迟钝的灰色调，更接近前苏而非瑞士。
n. 胃；腹部；胃口 vt. 忍受；吃下 vi. 忍受 同义词:abdomen, belly, go, stand, abide, tough, tolerate, suffer from, bear with He now could stomach liquids only.他现在还只能吃流质食品。
vt. 妨碍；阻碍；小心翼翼地打球 vi. 妨碍；阻碍；小心翼翼地打球 同义词:let, slow, stand in the way of, hinder from He stonewalled against the motion.他以冗长的演说阻挠了那项动议的通过。
vi. 弯腰；屈服；堕落 n. 弯腰，屈背；屈服 vt. 辱没，堕落；俯曲 同义词:succumb, to surrender, waist bends, yieldance, go to the bowwows, go to the deuce He stooped and put down his gun.他弯下腰放下了他的枪。
n. 仓库，贮藏库；宝库 同义词:warehouse, treasury He is a storehouse of wisdom .这本书是知识的宝库。
adj. 结实的；矮胖的；勇敢的；激烈的 n. 矮胖子；烈性啤酒 同义词:acute, solid, firm, tough, game, punchinello Vandeuvres had sat himself down by the stout man , who still looked very sedate .汪德夫尔已经走到那个矮胖子身边坐下，那个人的样子，依然是很沉着的。
adj. 大胆的；刚毅的 同义词:bold, entreprenant a stouthearted fellow who had an active career in the army .一个在军队中有着活跃的事业的、刚毅的人。
n. 匿身处；偷渡者 Airlines took the view that stowaway incidents should not happen .航空公司认为偷乘飞机这样的事是不应该发生的。

adj. 紧张的；勉强的；牵强附会的；滤过的 v. 使紧张（动词strain的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:intense, stressed, narrow, reluctant Any effort to improve the countries' strained relationship is of course to be welcomed as an indispensable contribution to increased stability and security in the region .任何改善两国紧张关系的努力，都是为促进该地区的稳定和安全做出的必不可少的贡献，当然都应受到欢迎。
adj. 狭窄的；苦恼的 n. 海峡；困境 同义词:narrow, confined, difficulty, narrow, neck, corner, channel I , in strait , worship the God of my fathers in mine own language .我现在身陷危难之中，用自己的语言礼拜我祖先的上帝。
adj. 经济上拮据的，贫困的 v. 使窘迫；限制…的范围（straiten的过去分词） 同义词:needy, underprivileged I'm straitened for money.我现在经济有点拮据。

n. 海峡；困难（strait的复数） 同义词:difficulties, impediments " The visit completed along- awaited and honored mission entrusted by compatriots Straits , " Chen said at a brief send-off ceremony .在简短的送别仪式上，陈云林说道：“此次访问完成了海峡两岸的爱国同胞期待已久的光荣使命。”
adj. 搁浅的；陷于困境的；有…股的（常用来构成复合词） v. 搁浅（strand的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:neaped They found themselves stranded at the airport .他们发现自己滞留在机场了。
n. [医] 绞窄；勒杀；钳制；压缩 同义词:compression, hitting She died of strangulation and her neck broke . Wear simple clothes next time!她因勒颈窒息而亡，而且她的脖子也断了。
n. 策略；计谋 同义词:device, game plan There was no stratagem that he was not equal to .没有什么谋略是他所不能对付的。
vt. 分层；成层；使形成阶层 vi. 分层；成层；阶层化 同义词:demix, delaminate, bed What diagnostic testing data help to risk stratify patients with syncope ?何种诊断检查有助于区分有危险的晕厥病人?。
n. （组织的）层；[地质] 地层；社会阶层 同义词:thickness, layer, tier They do not constitute a separate class or stratum .知识分子和青年学生并不是一个阶级或阶层。
n. 条纹，线条；倾向 vi. 飞跑，疾驶；加上条纹 vt. 飞跑，疾驰；加条纹于 同义词:tendency, liability, trend, preference, disposition, drive, tear away Sunlight streaks the water with gold.阳光使水面形成条条金色光栅。
adj. 紧张的；费力的；奋发的；艰苦的；热烈的 同义词:intense, tough, rough Love is sweet , by the process of pursue is strenuous .爱情是甜蜜的，但追求的过程去是费力的。

adj. 有条纹的；有线纹的 v. 加条纹（striate的过去分词） 同义词:streaky, lineate The design was inspired by the striated limestone outcroppings common in the Great Lakes area ( see photo below).设计的灵感来自北美五大湖区域常见的露出地表的带花纹的石灰岩（见照片）。
n. 狭窄；苛评；非难 同义词:stenosis, angusty All carotid stricture or obliteration occurred at the initial part .结果：颈内动脉严重狭窄或闭塞全部发生在起始部。
n. 大步；步幅；进展 vt. 跨过；大踏步走过；跨坐在… vi. 跨；跨过；大步行走 同义词:evolution, steps, step over, step over He strode about the meeting room.他在会议室内大步地来回踱步。
n. 刺耳；尖锐 同义词:hoarseness, harshness And increasingly we feel the need to match the Republican right in stridency and hardball tactics .并且，我们渐渐地感到在尖锐和强硬政治策略上，有必要与共和党的右派较量一下。
adj. 刺耳的；尖锐的；吱吱尖叫的；轧轧作响的 同义词:grinding, sharp, harsh Unlike Fidel Castro , Raúl is sparing in his use of strident ideological rhetoric .与菲德尔不同，劳尔很少使用意识形态尖锐的词句。
vi. 发尖锐的摩擦声（尤指昆虫如蟋蟀所发）
n. 冲突；争吵；不和 同义词:interference, conflict, argument, war, collision Still , strife between the government and its employees was not inevitable , in his view .尽管如此，在他看来政府同其雇员间的冲突仍然不可避免。
adj. 显著的，突出的，惊人的；打击的；罢工的 v. 打（strike的ing形式） 同义词:prominent, obvious, marked, tremendous, noted, beating He's struck by his father.他挨了父亲的打。
adj. 严厉的；迫切的；银根紧的 同义词:severe, tight, hard, harsh, pressing The Clean Water Act expressly provides that it does not preempt more stringent state law .《洁净水法案》明确规定，该法并不先占更为严格的州法律。
vt. 剥夺；剥去；脱去衣服 n. 带；条状；脱衣舞 vi. 脱去衣服 同义词:shear, destitute of, belt, band He stripped an orange of its rind for me.他为我剥去了橘子皮。
n. 条纹，斑纹；种类 vt. 加条纹于… 同义词:category, variety, manner, nature, kind They are politicians of the Democratic stripe .他们是民主党一派的政客。
n. 年轻人，小伙子 同义词:young adult, jong On Wednesday , it was a sampler . She says the stripling 's fun .星期三，要做样本拼布。她说曲折压线技能很有趣。
n. 漫步；闲逛；巡回演出 vi. 散步；闲逛；巡回演出 vt. 散步；闲逛 同义词:tour, bummel, roam around, have a walk, roam around, have a walk He strolled along the beach along.他独自一人在海滩上闲荡。
adj. 巡回演出的；消闲散步的 v. 散步（stroll的ing形式）；闲逛 同义词:gallivanting He strolled along the beach along.他独自一人在海滩上闲荡。
vt. 漫不经心地弹 vi. 漫不经心地奏 n. 漫不经心的弹奏 to strum the violin with one's index finger用食指轻弹小提琴
vt. 炫耀；在…上趾高气扬地走；给…加支撑 n. 支柱；高视阔步 vi. 高视阔步；趾高气扬地走 同义词:show off, brag about, leg, backbone, stay, mainstay He strutted up and down before the manager.他在经理面前大摇大摆地走来走去。
adj. 闷热的；古板的；不通气的 同义词:sweltering, sultry This stuffy attitude has saved the city , together with others along the Pacific coast .这种僵化的态度挽救了这城市，还有太平洋沿岸的其他城市。
vt. 使震惊；打昏；给以深刻的印象 n. 昏迷；打昏；惊倒；令人惊叹的事物 同义词:shock, scandalize, coma, stupor The blow on his head stunned him for a moment.击在他头上的一拳使他有一阵儿昏了过去。
adj. 极好的；使人晕倒的；震耳欲聋的 v. 把…打昏；使震耳欲聋；使大吃一惊（stun的ing形式） 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, super, great The blow on his head stunned him for a moment.击在他头上的一拳使他有一阵儿昏了过去。
n. 噱头，手腕；绝技 vt. 阻碍…的正常生长或发展 vi. 表演特技；作惊人表演 同义词:touches, wrist An abnormal climate stunted the crops.不正常的气候妨碍了庄稼的正常生长。
n. 特技人，特技替身演员；表演者 同义词:player, entertainer Bey Logan : What style did Bruce Lee use to beat that stuntman ?贝根：什么风格没有李小龙打败使用的特技？
vt. 使惊呆；使昏迷 同义词:dumbfound He was stupefied with alcohol.他喝酒喝得神志不清了。
adj. 惊人的；巨大的 同义词:tremendous, huge, enormous, massive, macro The dam is a stupendous engineering feat .这水坝乃是一项惊人的工程上的壮举。
n. 昏迷，恍惚；麻木 同义词:coma, exanimation Then she felt herself go into a kind of stupor of exhaustion .不久，她只感到陷入一种精疲力竭的麻木状态。
adj. 坚定的；强健的；健全的 n. 羊晕倒病 同义词:committed, healthy, firm, robust, confirmed Kauffman was a sturdy guy with curly hair, easy smile , and no time to read .考夫曼是个健壮的小伙子，一头卷发，面带轻松的笑容，但没有时间看书。
vi. 结结巴巴地说话 n. 口吃，结巴 vt. 结结巴巴地说出 同义词:splatter, impediment, mogilalia His regrets was stuttering to me.他结结巴巴地向我道了歉。
vt. 从中作梗，阻挠；妨碍 n. 妨碍球 同义词:let, violate, stimy His action without authorization has stymied the whole plan.他擅自采取的行动已经妨碍了整个计划的实施。
adj. 止血的；收敛性的 n. 止血剂，止血药 同义词:anthemorrhagic, constringent, hemostat, stancher matted hairs sometimes used as a styptic .亚洲一种树冠茂密的树蕨，有时用于止血。
adj. 皮下的；皮下用的 同义词:subdermal, hypodermal Disfiguring subcutaneous lesions bulge onto the surface and at intervals discharge pus.皮下损害的形象是向表面凸起，并间断地分泌出脓液。
vt. 征服；抑制；减轻 同义词:master, stay, restrain, moderate Rome subdued Gaul.罗马帝国征服了高卢。
vt. 征服；使服从；克制 同义词:submit, master He has subjugated a male lion.他制服了一头雄狮。
adj. 纯净化的；理想化的；高尚的 vt. 使升华；使高尚 vi. 升华；纯化 n. 升华物 同义词:magnificent, noble, rarefy to sublimate water把水净化
adj. 庄严的；令人崇敬的；极端的；超群的 n. 崇高；顶点 vt. 使…纯化；使…升华；使…变高尚 vi. 升华；纯化；变高尚 同义词:ultra, extreme, solemn, sacred, majestic, height, summit, sky, peak, apex, rarefy the sublimed water净化水
adj. [生理] 阈下的；潜在意识的；微小得难以察觉的 n. 潜意识；阈下意识 同义词:subthreshold, subconsciousness Our influence , however subliminal , forms the basic scaffolding of who they will become .我们的影响虽然是潜意识的，却是孩子将来会成为什么样子的基础。
vt. 淹没；把…浸入；沉浸 vi. 淹没；潜入水中；湮没 同义词:flood, flow, drown out, swallow up The whole village and the fields have been submerged by floods.洪水已淹没了整个村庄和农田。
n. 投降；提交（物）；服从；（向法官提出的）意见；谦恭 同义词:opinion, compliance, view, comment, mind However, prior submission , they shall solicit opinions of the auditees .审计报告报送审计机关前，应当征求被审计单位的意见。
adj. 顺从的；服从的；柔顺的 同义词:followed, subject, compliant, obedient Yet he was as submissive to a word of advice as if he had been in constant terror.可是他好像一直提心吊胆，我劝他的话，他没有不听的。
n. 下属，下级；部属，属下 adj. 从属的；次要的 vt. 使……居下位；使……服从 同义词:inferior, underling, dependent, secondary, supporting, minor, peripheral to be subordinated in an office在事务所中任次职
vt. 唆使；收买；使作伪证 同义词:set on, instigate He tried to suborn the police.他企图贿赂警方。
vt. 传唤，传审；传讯 n. 传票 同义词:cite, arraign, citation, summons He's subpoenaed to go to the court.他被传唤到庭。
vi. 订阅；捐款；认购；赞成；签署 vt. 签署；赞成；捐助 同义词:sign, donate money, ink, agree, sign, uphold I have subscribed ￡20,000 for the institute.我为该机构已捐助了2万英镑。
adj. 屈从的；奉承的；有用的；有帮助的 同义词:useful, helpful, assistant " How are you feeling now , sir ?" he asked , with the subservient smirk .“现在，你觉得怎么样了，先生？”他含着谄媚的假笑问。
vi. 平息；减弱；沉淀；坐下 同义词:fall, settle, lower, cool, deposit The foundations of the building have subsided.该建筑的地基已下沉了。
adj. 附属的；辅助的 n. 子公司；辅助者 同义词:assistant, helping, affiliated, auxiliary, auxiliary, subcompany Mianma subsidiary machinery processing , sales , installation and rental housing .棉麻附属机械加工，销售，安装，房屋出租。
n. 补贴；津贴；补助金 同义词:pension, allowance But be they ostrich or pigeon , Cubans it seems will soon have to face the reality of subsidy cuts .但不管是鸵鸟还是鸽子，古巴人似乎不得不很快面临补贴削减的事实。
vt. 证实；使实体化 同义词:favor, make sure, validate, sustain to substantiate a scientific hypothesis证实科学上的一个假设

adj. 有实质的；大量的；真实的；独立存在的 n. 名词性实词；独立存在的实体 同义词:massive, extensive, actual, sincere, macro The question will be whether they favor a substantive reform or some kind of symbolic action .但问题是，他们是支持实质性的改革，还是某种象征性的行动。
n. 代用品；代替者 vi. 替代 vt. 代替 同义词:replacement, proxy, supply, fill in, replace, cover for, take the place of somebody, stand in for sb to substitute petrolic products for coal用石油产品替代煤

n. 基础；根据；下层 同义词:foundation, elements, basis, base, bed Its syntax , many grammatical features , a number of phrases and the style of a typical sentence do betray an important substratum .它的句法，许多语法特点，一些短语和典型句子的风格确实透露了重要的斯拉夫语基础。
vt. 把……归入；把……包括在内 to subsume the books.把图书分类 。
n. 托词；借口；诡计 同义词:excuse, scheme, fraud, blind The price of such subterfuge has been high .这种狡猾的手段让瑞银集团付出了巨大的代价。
adj. 地下的；秘密的；隐蔽的 n. 地下工作者 同义词:underground, secret, chamber, inside, cabinet But they do not last long under the subterranean pressure .但是它们在地下的压力下撑不了多久。

n. 微妙；敏锐；精明 同义词:delicacy, acuity He adds that the subtlety of rebalancing the style of leadership is in " where you control tightly [ and ] where you give space ".他补充道，调整领导风格的精妙之处在于“何时收紧控制，（以及）何时留出空间”。
n. 津贴；补助金；援助 同义词:assistance, aid, subsidy, pension, allowance The Lump Sum Grant is now the mainstream subvention system and is well accepted by the welfare sector .整笔拨款安排现已成为主流的资助方式，广为福利界所接受。
adj. 破坏性的；从事颠覆的 n. 危险分子；颠覆分子 同义词:ruinous His work shows traces of an unexpected subversive sense of humour .他的作品描绘了让人意想不到，极具色彩颠覆的幽默感。
vt. 颠覆；推翻；破坏 同义词:destroy, upset The rebellious troops attempted to subvert the present government.叛军曾企图推翻现政府。
adj. 简洁的；简明的；紧身的 同义词:brief, concise, compact Please give me a succinct summary of your points .请你简明扼要的概括下你的观点。
n. 救援；援助者 vt. 救援；援助 同义词:save, backer, aid, come to the rescue We could succor Malta .我们能救援马尔他。
n. 女妖；妓女；魔鬼；男魇魔 同义词:devil, demon First off the Succubus needs more survivability .首先，魅魔需要更强的生存力。
adj. 多汁的；多水分的；多汁性的 n. 肉质植物；多汁植物 同义词:juicy You are glad when the fast is over and you get your reward of a succulent meat meal .开斋后，你会欣喜万分地享用你得到的回报——一顿美味肉餐。
vi. 屈服；死；被压垮 同义词:to surrender, genuflect Most of us are known to succumb to persuasion through the media.我们之中的大多数人都抵挡不住传播媒介的宣传。
n. 小山羊皮 vt. 使织物起绒面 vi. 起绒面 adj. 软羔皮制的；仿麂皮织物制的 同义词:kidskin Car cleaning supplies suede , suede flowers.汽车清洗用品麂皮、麂皮花。
vt. 使满足；足够…用；合格 vi. 足够；有能力 同义词:content, gratify, serve, be in a position It suffices to comfort her with only a few words.只用几句话安慰她一下就行了。
adj. 足够的；充分的 同义词:competent, plenty, wealthy His theory of atom was not sufficient for treatment of large atoms or molecules .他的原子理论用于处理大的原子和分子是不能令人满意的。
vi. 受阻，受扼制；窒息 vt. 压制，阻碍；使……窒息 同义词:choke, silence, slow In most fires many people got killed not because they were burned to death but because they were suffocated.发生火灾时，在大多数情况下，许多人并非死于大火，而是死于窒息。
n. 选举权；投票；参政权；代祷；赞成票 同义词:poll, referendums Women had to fight for suffrage .妇女须为享有选举权而斗争。
vt. 充满；弥漫 同义词:abound with, be imbued with Looking at his photo,her eyes were suffused with tears.看着他的照片，她的眼中充满了泪水。
adj. 可建议的；耳根软的；易受影响的 同义词:susceptible, impressionable It is no secret that we are all highly suggestible under hypnosis .我们在高度的催眠状态下没有什么秘密。
n. 求婚者；请愿者；[法] 起诉人 同义词:gamomania, lonely hearts She might run off with the suitor , get picked up somewhere and then taken to the pound , for example .比如或许她会和初恋情人私奔，在别的地方被别人捡到，被丢到收容所里什么的。
adj. 生气的；阴沉的 同义词:angry, heavy Philip passed off her sulky reply with a laugh .菲利浦对她气呼呼的回答一笑置之。
adj. 愠怒的，不高兴的；（天气）阴沉的；沉闷的 同义词:heavy, mumpish The hills seemed rolled in sullen mist .山峦好象在阴沉的雾里翻腾。
vt. 玷污；使丢脸 n. 污点，损伤 同义词:cloud, shame, impairment, jaup to sully one's hands弄脏双手
adj. 闷热的；狂暴的；淫荡的 同义词:angry, stuffy Summer sultry . That I don't like it .夏天很燠热。那就是我不喜欢它的缘由。

adv. 概要地；立刻；概略地 同义词:soon, immediately, now, shortly, roughly Earlier this year , a newspaper editor made the mistake of printing a blunt critique of puritan religious beliefs , and was summarily fired.今年早些时候，一名报纸编辑刊登了一篇抨击清教徒信仰的评论文章，这一错误举动立即导致他被辞退。
adj. 华丽的，豪华的；奢侈的 同义词:grand, luxury, magnificent, brave, gorgeous The famous lawyer was shown to a sumptuous suite .那位著名的律师被引进了一套豪华的房间。
vt. 切开；切断 vi. 分离；断开 同义词:excide, slice from, keep apart, draw apart I don't want to sunder us.我不想让我们有隔阂。

adj. 杂的；各式各样的 n. 杂货；杂项 同义词:varied, omnigenous, groceries, general merchandise Sundry Americans , from the ambassador in Managua to the secretary of commerce , warned Nicaraguans of dire consequences if they chose him as their president .无数的美国人，从驻马那瓜大使到商务部长，都警告说如果选奥尔特加为总统后果将不堪设想。
adj. 过时的；退休的；老朽的 v. 退休；变陈旧（superannuate的过去分词） 同义词:ancient, retired, retired You can superannuate your boss.你可以辞掉你的老板嘛。
adj. 极好的；华丽的；宏伟的 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, grand, great Those states have done a superb job of managing their deer , elk and bear .这些州在管理野鹿、麋鹿和野熊方面做的很好。
adj. 目空一切的，高傲的；傲慢的，自大的 同义词:lofty, arrogant I dislike his supercilious demeanor .我不喜欢他傲慢的态度。
adj. 表面的；肤浅的 n. 表面文章；外表；浅薄的人 同义词:surface, external, facial, shallow, person, garment This stance has a superficial logic .这个观点的逻辑是肤浅的。
adj. 多余的；不必要的；奢侈的 同义词:unnecessary, spare, luxury, waste, redundant In writing telegrams , omit superfluous words .写电报稿要省去不必要的字。
vt. 添加；重叠；附加；安装 同义词:fit, fix I think you ought to superimpose the great trust of mine on your heart.我想你应该牢记住我对你的重托。
vt. 监督；管理；主管；指挥 vi. 监督；主管；指挥 同义词:manage, police, conduct, run, control, to monitor, to supervise to superintend the production of coins监督硬币的制造
adj. 最高的；最高级的；过度的 n. 最高级；最好的人；最高程度；夸大话 同义词:highest, supreme, maximum, peak, top, best, surfine She is a versatile and superlative actress .她是位多才多艺、演技高超的女演员。
adj. 高的；神的；天上的；超自然的 同义词:tall, high, sacred, lofty As for me , I say not this of all of them, but of the great supernal Gods .就我来说，我不是说智慧的全部，而是超自然的上帝。
vt. 取代，代替；紧接着……而到来 vi. 推迟行动 同义词:substitute for, displace He was superseded by a young girl for the post.一位年轻的姑娘取代了他的职位。
n. 迷信 同义词:aberglaube, fetish Science is the great antidote to the poison of enthusiasm and superstition .科学是对于宗教狂及迷信之毒的大消毒剂。
adj. 仰卧的；懒散的；掌心向上的；向后靠的 同义词:resupine, slouchy In fact America's government has been anything but supine of late .事实上最近美国政府绝对不是躺着不干事。
vt. 代替；排挤掉 同义词:replace, substitute for He was supplanted out of the house by his wife.他被妻子撵出了家门。
adj. 柔软的；灵活的；顺从的；易弯曲的；逢迎的 vt. 使柔软；使顺从 vi. 变柔顺；变柔软 同义词:flexible, soft, elastic, tender, ductile, reconcile, conform, tender, limber up She is singing a supple tune .她正唱着一个轻快的曲调。
n. 补充，补遗；补充物；附录 vt. 补充，增补 同义词:recruitment, renewal, to replenish, eke to supplement an appendix to the book为该书补编一篇附录
n. 恳求者，乞求者 Berkshire ' was a supplier of liquidity and capital to the system , not a supplicant , ' he wrote.我们是金融体系所需流动性和资金的供应者，而不是资金乞求者。
vt. 恳求，哀求；恳请 vi. 哀求；恳请；祈求 同义词:pray for, beseech, cry on to supplicate for happiness祈福
n. 假定；推测；想像；见解 同义词:speculation, theory, perhaps, eye, assumption The positions of the two lines are consistent with this supposition .两条线的位置是这种假定相符的。
vi. 化脓 vt. 使化脓 同义词:gather head, rankle, maturate JJ crawly suppurate , be clap ?JJ痒痒流脓了，是淋病吗？
adj. 准不会有错的，一定成功的 同义词:audience-proof There is one surefire way to know if the Southern Cross is visible in your sky or not.这儿有一个很准确的方法能让我们判断是否能在空中看到南十字星。
n. 过度；饮食过度；恶心（由于饮食过度所引起） vt. 使饮食过度；使厌腻；使过度沉溺于 vi. 饮食过度；过分放纵 同义词:excess, exorbitance, satiate He's still sleeping; he was surfeited with too much wine last night.他昨晚上酒喝得太多了，到现在还在睡觉。
n. 大浪；汹涌澎湃；巨涌 vi. 激增；汹涌 vt. 使颠簸 同义词:very rough seas, sharp rise, balloon, jolt, jounce to surge at anchor抛锚的船随波起伏
adj. 乖戾的；板面孔的，无礼的；阴沉的 同义词:heavy, cross In the open doorway our surly German shadow glowers .打开房门，我们那个阴沉的德国影子对着我们怒目而视。
vt. 猜测；推测 vi. 猜测；认为 n. 推测；猜度 同义词:make a guess at, guess at sth, consider, guess at sth, speculation, theory, guess, projection He surmised that the suggestion wouldn't find favour.他猜测该项建议不会受到人们欢迎的。
vt. 克服，越过；战胜 同义词:overcome, defeat, negotiate to surmount a hill爬过一座山丘
n. 剩余；[贸易] 顺差；盈余；过剩 adj. 剩余的；过剩的 同义词:residual, spare, remaining, residual, odd When was that old tank surplused out?那辆破坦克是什么时候卖出去的?
adj. 秘密的；鬼鬼祟祟的；暗中的 同义词:secret, underground, chamber, inside, cabinet When no one look he take a surreptitious puff on his cigarette .当没有人看时，他偷偷地抽了一口烟。
n. 代理；代用品；遗嘱检验法官 vt. 代理；指定某人为自己的代理人 adj. 代理的；替代的 同义词:agency, substitute, proctorize, sit in, acting, agent, deputy to surrogate someone's post as a teacher为某人代课
n. 脆弱的感情 Recommendations for use of antivirals may change as data on antiviral susceptibilities and effectiveness become available.在对抗病毒药物敏感性和有效性的测试数据完成后，推荐使用的药物可能变化。
adj. 易受影响的；易感动的；容许…的 n. 易得病的人 同义词:impressionable, suggestible Infants are particularly susceptible to vitamin D intoxication .婴儿尤其容易引起维生素d中毒。
n. 悬念；悬疑；焦虑；悬而不决 同义词:anxiety, solicitude I don't really care for suspense movies .我不是很喜欢看悬念片。
vt. 维持；支撑，承担；忍受；供养；证实 同义词:maintain, undertake, support, accept, favor to sustain the main beam支撑主梁的重量

adj. 持续的；持久的；持久不变的 v. 维持（sustain的过去式和过去分词）；承受 同义词:continuing, lasting, kept Fuel up with healthy snacks. Large meals can make you drowsy . Try eating smaller meals and more healthy snacks throughout the day for sustained energy .通过健康有节制的饮食来补充能量。大吃大喝会让你昏昏欲睡。试一试每天少吃多餐来保持一整天的能量。
n. 食物；生计；支持 同义词:food, diet, holding, eating, support They wanted to see him , because they wanted to draw a certain sustenance from his strength .他们想见到他，因为他们想从他的实力里吸取某种养料。
n. 缝合；缝合处；缝合用的线 vt. 缝合 同义词:stitching, seaming, seam, oversew to suture one's mouth闭嘴不谈，一语不发
adj. 苗条的；线条清晰的；和蔼的 同义词:nice, kind, benign The problem is that young , small funds do not stay svelte for long.问题在于新兴的小型基金并不安于现状。

vt. 吓唬；趾高气扬地行走或行事 vi. 大摇大摆；吹牛；虚张声势吓人 n. 大摇大摆；吹牛；威吓；下摆散开状的女式短大衣 adj. 炫耀的；时髦的 同义词:browbeat, gally, hot air, talk horse, fanfaronade, blague, modern, fashionable, tony, in, ambitious He with his hatchet men swaggered out of the bar.他和他那帮打手神气活现地走出了那间酒吧。
n. 出风头；虚张声势 vi. 炫耀；出风头 adj. 爱打扮的，华丽的 同义词:bravado, lifemanship, show off, brag about, magnificent, brave, gorgeous to swank about one's clothing (or ability)炫耀自己的服饰(或能力)
vi. 挤满；成群浮游；云集 n. 蜂群；一大群 vt. 挤满；爬 同义词:burst at the seams, be packed with, cloud, horde, climb, burst at the seams The students swarmed out of the classroom.学生们蜂拥着跑出了教室。
adj. 黝黑的；黑皮肤的 A swarthy boy opened a book and propped it nimbly under the breastwork of his satchel .一个面色黧黑的少年打开书本，麻利地将它支在书包这座胸墙底下。
vi. 膨胀；肿胀；隆起 vt. 使膨胀；使隆起 n. 肿胀；隆起 adj. 漂亮的；一流的 同义词:fill, intumesce, expand, plim, tumefaction, tumidness, pretty, smart, tony, cute Your ambition,I think, is swelling.我看你的野心是越来越大了。
adj. 闷热的；热得难受的 同义词:stuffy, sultry Djakarta was a collection of sweltering huts and hovels .雅加达实际不过是一大堆闷热的棚户和茅舍。
vi. 转弯；突然转向；背离 vt. 使转弯；使突然转向；使背离 n. 转向；偏离的程度 同义词:make a turn, bend, turning, obversion His car then swerved up the pavement.然后，他的车突然一个急转弯冲上了便道。
vi. 牛饮；大喝特喝 n. 痛饮，大喝；牛饮 vt. 牛饮；大喝特喝，豪饮 同义词:hoptoad, binge drinking, drink like a fish Don't swig beer the way you drink water.别像水似的把啤酒一口喝干。
n. 泔水；冲洗；痛饮；涮 vt. 冲洗；痛饮；涮；倒出 vi. 大口地喝；发激荡声 同义词:irrigation, pigswill, drink hard, syringe She sottishly told me,in that morning, that she swilled in the night before.那天早晨她醉得稀里糊涂地对我说，前一天她痛饮了一宵。
n. 欺诈；骗局 vt. 诈骗；骗取 vi. 诈骗 同义词:fraudulence, confidence trick, nobble, linken, shark, con game She was swindled out of ￡ 1,000 by a witch.她被一个女巫骗了一千英镑。
n. 猪；卑贱的人 同义词:pig, piggery WHO will now recommend that pharmaceutical companies make swine flu vaccine .现在，世卫组织将建议制药厂制造猪流感疫苗。
n. 漩涡；打旋；涡状形 vi. 盘绕；打旋；眩晕；大口喝酒 vt. 使成漩涡 同义词:vortex, gulf, swim Water behind the boat swirled.船后的水翻起无数个旋涡。
n. 苦读的人；努力工作者；辛苦的工作 vi. 刻苦用功 vt. 刻苦攻读 同义词:lucubrate I'm swotting at Latin.我一直在努力学习拉丁语。

n. 谄媚者；奉承者 adj. 奉承的；拍马的 同义词:toadeater, flatterer, flattering, subservient Joe Doe was the sycophant , the suck-up who told the boss what he wanted to hear and did all his dirty work .JoeDoe是谄媚者，告诉他想听的话，做他一切肮脏事情的马屁精。
adj. 说奉承话的；阿谀的 同义词:adulatory, gnathonic The trusty had a silly , sycophantic manner of raising one hand in salute .这个好囚犯用一种愚蠢的，拍马的态度举起一只手行礼。
n. 教学大纲，摘要；课程表 同义词:abstract, brief, summary, resume The government is seeking to impose a standard , minimum syllabus .政府正设法给学校定一个标准的最低限度的教学大纲。
n. [生态] 共生；合作关系；共栖 同义词:partnership, intergrowth Next symbiosis became a major mover and shaker feeding off the change produced by natural selection .接下来，共生开始成为进化的主要推动者和振荡器，依靠自然选择产生的变化滋养。
adj. 匀称的，对称的 同义词:well-proportioned, meristic This problem can be avoided by using three components which produce a symmetrical path curve .使用三块能产生反对称形路径曲线的元件，即可避免上述问题。
n. 对称（性）；整齐，匀称 同义词:balance, regularity The rule of combination of symmetry operations is successive performance of them .对称操作的组合规则，是逐次地去运用它们。
n. 讨论会，座谈会；专题论文集；酒宴，宴会 同义词:forum, consultation, seminar A symposium is a meeting or conference for discussion of a topic .讨论会即讨论某一论题的聚会或会议。
n. 突触 Objective To know the ultrastructure and function of synapse in mammal 's medulla oblongata megacell reticular nucleus .目的探讨哺乳动物延髓巨细胞网状核内突触的超微结构及其功能。
vt. 使……合拍；使……同步 vi. 同步；同时发生 同义词:sync up, coincide Look at your watches. Have them synchronize.看一下你们的表，咱们来对一下。
adj. 同步的；同时的 同义词:simultaneous, coinstantaneous Synchronous algorithm of Product data on the simplified application in peer network is developed.条件下精简型应用的产品数据同步的算法。
vt. 切分；词中省略，缩写 同义词:abbreviate They published several of my novels which were syncopated by them.他们出版了几本我的小说，出版前他们进行了缩写。
adj. 同义的；同义词的；同义突变的 For many people , sumo is synonymous with Japanese culture .对于很多人来说，相扑代表日本文化。
n. 概要，大纲 同义词:program, brief An abbreviated list , as of contents ; a synopsis .这是一些新书的内容提要。
adj. 天气的；概要的；对观福音书的 同义词:capsule As a weather observer , his job was to plot synoptic maps and launch wind balloons into the deep blue North African sky .作为一名天气观察员，他的工作就是绘制天气图以及投放风气球到北美的深蓝色天空中。
adj. 综合的；合成的，人造的 n. 合成物 同义词:comprehensive, integrated, artificial, general, composition Highly flammable synthetic materials should be avoided .高度易燃的合成材料应被避免。
vt. 注射，冲洗 n. 注射器；洗涤器 同义词:to inject, injector, washer Use a syringe device to gently direct water against the wall of the ear canal.用一个注射器轻轻的引水到耳沟内壁。
n. 桌子；表格；平地层 vt. 制表；搁置；嵌合 adj. 桌子的 同义词:form, tabulation, leave in the air, leave aside He tabled a card.他把一张纸牌放在桌上。
n. 画面；活人画；戏剧性局面；生动的场面（复数tableaux） 同义词:frame, screenshots The story inspired both an opera and musical tableau .这个故事派生出了戏剧和音乐表演。
n. 高原；台地 同义词:meseta, altiplano Night slowly reached tableland .夜，款款地来到高原上。
n. 禁忌；禁止 adj. 禁忌的；忌讳的 vt. 禁忌；禁止 同义词:ban, don't, ticklish, bar, inhibit The subject was tabooed.这个话题禁止讨论。

adj. 缄默的；不言而喻的 同义词:reserved, self-evident For all its tacit recognition that power has been flowing eastwards , the west still wants to imagine things as they used to be.尽管西方已经默认，权力正在流向东方，但他们仍然希望像过去那样设想事情。
adj. 沉默寡言的；无言的，不太说话的 同义词:uncommunicative, incommunicative He taciturn and unsociable , and rarely spoke to you .他总是不声不响，冷冰冰的，难得跟你交谈。
n. 大头钉；粗缝；行动方针；食物 vt. 附加；以大头针钉住 vi. 抢风航行；作文字形移动 同义词:food, diet, eating, annex, subjoin He tacked the timetable to the door.他把时间表钉在门上。
adj. 俗气的；发黏的；缺乏教养或风度的 同义词:meretricious, Philistine You 've been selling your integrity to tacky mall store ?你把自己诚实的人格卖给了。那种俗气的购物商场？
n. 机智；老练；圆滑；鉴赏力 同义词:wits, wittiness With shrewd tact and womanly kindness Nadyezhda had won his complete trust .娜蒂契达以她的精明机智和女性的好心肠赢得了他完全的信任。
adj. 机智的；圆滑的；老练的 同义词:experienced, diplomatic I shall never forget tactful patience with which he persuaded him to take nourishment .我什么时候也忘不了他劝说他增加营养的那种耐心和手腕。
n. 策略，战略 adj. 按顺序的，依次排列的 同义词:strategy, device The new tactic was put into operation early in 1939 .这个新的战略是在1939年初开始运用的。
adj. [生理] 触觉的，有触觉的；能触知的 同义词:haptic Tactile imaging is a perception or FEELING of localised bodily awareness .触觉想象是身体局部知觉的一个知觉或感觉。
n. 蝌蚪 同义词:pollywog Tadpole 2 : Is she on the lotus ?小蝌蚪2：她是不是在荷叶上啊？
n. 顺风 同义词:favorable wind, favourable wind Charlie 's plane actually landed in Chicago 15 minutes early because of the strong tailwind .查理的班机因为遇到强劲的顺风。（提早十五分钟）抵达芝加哥。
vt. 污染；腐蚀；使感染 n. 污点；感染 vi. 败坏；被污染 同义词:eat, poison, pollute, infection, affection The warm weather will taint the food.炎热的天气会使食品腐烂。
n. 取得；捕获；营业收入 adj. 可爱的；迷人的；会传染的 v. 拿；捕捉；夺取（take的ing形式） 同义词:procurement, capture, lovely, pretty, cute, killing, charming, capturing Taking a pen in her hand,she began to write.她手里拿着一支钢笔，开始写起来。

n. 散播谣言者；告密者；搬弄是非者 同义词:informer, confidential informant Perfect men , however, do not readily believe talebearer , because they know that human frailty is prone to evil and is likely to appear in speech .完善的人不轻信说三道四的人，因为他们知道人性软弱，容易偏向恶，并且轻易地表现在言谈中。
n. 护身符；法宝 同义词:periapt, menat The guy who made the talisman ?那个造出护符的家伙？

n. 爪；[建] 爪饰；如爪的手 同义词:unguis, claw It is based on the Talon robot , which is widely used by the military to disarm bombs .它是机器人“塔隆”的升级版，“塔隆”已被军方广泛用于炸弹拆除。
